story:
Short Summary

  • My name is Christopher Bernal and I am the Chief Operations Officer here at LaciLou, LLC. I started this company with the CEO Deborah Bello. Together we have come up with a great line of children's clothing and accessories. I have served in the US Military since 2000 with distinction and have deployed multiple times. I hold multiple degrees in Security and Project Management. The CEO has worked in finance and handled accounts for some of biggest multi-million dollar companies in the USA for the past 30 years.
  • Our campaign is important to us because we give back to the community all these companies say that they will donate socks, materials and money but does the average consumer ever see this happen. NO, plain and simple nobody ever sees this happening. We guarantee that everyone will have the chance to see where the money will be going. We will be a 100% made in the USA company and be 100% transparent.  We will donate 25 cents of every purchase to the Wounded Warriors Project and 25 cents to the Anti-Bullying Campaign. At the end of the year we will hold a party and not just any party but a Donation campaign party we will present one check to each of the campaigns. We will stream it live on Facebook and on our website for everyone to see that some of the money they have used to purchase products have gone to campaigns to help children and our veterans.
  • Contributors will help launch a top of the line specialized Children's clothing company that is geared towards the child and to help support the child's independence and uniqueness. All while helping two great causes that hopefully will change America and then the world. As a company we have big dreams but our goal is to help goals of the children blossom through their clothing. If a child can dream it we can produce it. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We are looking for $1,000,000 dollars to buy machinery, inventory and a warehouse in the USA. Everything will be 100% made in the USA all jobs will be provided to citizens of the USA. We will be producing a high quality product in the end and everything will be made in the USA, we will take no shortcuts. Just so that you are aware of what exactly your money would be buying one top of the line 18 gauge sock, hat and glove making machine with the software costs around $100,000. A top of the line Direct to Garment Printer costs around $25,000. A top of the line full sublimation printer costs around $100,000. A fully automated Manufacturing plant building costs around $500,000 and to purchase all the material to make a top of the line quality product that everyone can be proud of will be around $150,000. Designs and Sku's will cost $150,000 as well. 
  • The Top 10 contributors: will be invited to Myrtle Beach, SC for an end of year donation party. All expenses paid and the red carpet will be rolled out for you and one guest. For 3 days you get to attend the donation campaign party and tour the city and facility, you will get to see exactly what your money has bought you. You will also receive one pack of three mismatched socks every month for 3 years. The party will be streamed live on Facebook and on our website www.lacilou.com.
  • The next 10 contributors: will be invited to Myrtle Beach, SC for an end of year donation party, hotel and airfare paid for you and one guest. For 3 days you get to attend the donation campaign party and tour the city and facility, you will get to see exactly what your money has bought you. You will also receive one pack of three mismatched socks every month for 2 years.The party will be streamed live on Facebook and on our website www.lacilou.com.
  • The next 10 contributors: will be invited to Myrtle Beach, SC for an end of year donation party. For 3 days you get to attend the donation campaign party and tour the city and facility, you will get to see exactly what your money has bought you. You will also receive one pack of three mismatched socks every month for 1 year. The party will be streamed live on Facebook and on our website www.lacilou.com.
  • After that the next 100 contributors: will have the option to receive one pack of three mismatched socks every month for 3 years. 
  • After that the next 75 contributors: will have the option to receive one pack of three mismatched socks every month for 2 years.
  • After that the next 50 contributors: will have the option to receive one pack of three mismatched socks every month for 1 year. 
  • If we don't reach our goal we will take the money and still buy the machinery, inventory and warehouse with what we have and then finance the rest. We will not stop until we achieve the best products for every child to enjoy.

The Impact

With all the recent bullying that is going on in school that is making the news imagine what is not making the news. Every child needs to feel safe in school and we aim to help provide that not only in monetary compensation to the Anti-Bullying Campaign but some one of our sock lines will have inspirational words on them and slogans. Our goal as a company is to provide the best moment forward that we can to protect our children and as parents we should strive to make school, playgrounds and communities as safe as possible for a brighter tomorrow. Children should never be afraid to go on social media or school because of bullying we need to put a stop to it and "ROCK YOUR SOCKS".

The Wounded Warriors Project is something that is near and dear to my heart with so many of my brothers wounded in action or dealing with psychological issues are left untreated or not recieving the proper treatment and need help. Anything I can do to help our veterans get back to health and have some resemblance of a normal life I will do. Back in 2003 America was not ready for what war would do to our service members and did not have th care in place to help our service members. Fast forward to 2019 we have come a long way but still havent got to where we need to be, one suicide or one death of a service member due to lack of treatment is one too many. As a company we will do everything we can to help our veterans either by providing a job, shelter, clothes or money and that's our goal. 

THE MAJOR DIFFERENCE with our company is that we will be 100% Transparent you will be able to see where your money is going not only from the end of year presentation to the campaigns that you will be invited to in person or it being Streamed live on Facebook and our website. But you will see a difference in Anti-Bullying and Wounded Warriors Project because along with our product our advertising will be geared towards these two campaigns as well. 

Risks & Challenges

The Biggest risks we are taking is everything we have and own is going into this business to provide the consumer with a product that is not cheaply made or thrown together and will last. People need to get their money's worth out of a product today and we just aren't usually able to do that. So many companies are taking shortcuts and not providing the proper customer service and we are sick and tired of it. People value your transparency and a company that cares and that is why we create LaciLou for just that reason to provide parents with a great product and something children will love to wear.  We have already overcome some hurdles by finding a clothing manufacturer here in the USA that will produce all of our materials just for us and the LaciLou clothing line.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • If you can't help us out with a monetary contribution please help us out with word of mouth and the Indiegogo share tools. The best advertisement is word of mouth and to spread the word of the company would mean just as much to us as money would. Make some noise about our campaign. By ourselves we can't be heard but as a group we our loud and proud spread the word and remember to say "ROCK YOUR SOCKS".

story:
WHY MUSTNEEDS?

 

We've been running leather designer brands since 2012. People want top-quality designer briefcases without the huge price tags. With this project, I was able to make a premium briefcase at a fraction of the price of other luxury brands.

This briefcase is made by a luxury brand manufacturer and with its built-in 15” laptop compartment there will never be a more stylish way to bring your laptop with you for business or leisure.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Higher Quality and Reasonable Price

The high prices for these products are often due to brand markup and high costs of marketing and distribution. By connecting manufacturers and consumers directly through Indiegogo, we have achieved huge savings which we can pass on to you. Using crowdfunding pre-orders and mass production, we can offer a saving of 80% compared to similar luxury brand bags.

 

Choose the Color

 

  

 

 

 

   

 

 

 

 

 

 

HOW IS IT MADE?

The Best Quality in the World

We collaborated with a company that has created world-class luxury bags for clients all over the world, including Prada, Chloe and Paul Smith amongst many others. The manufacturer in Spain has six factories and 700 employees, and has been producing luxury brand products since the 1940s.

 

 

    

In making our bags, highly-skilled artisans take care over every stage of the process. Over 200 manual steps are required to make the perfect product.

 

 

 

European Full Grain Natural Leather

 

Luxurious bags start with luxurious materials. We use high quality cowhide leather with minimal processing utilizing the beautiful patterns of natural leather surfaces. 

 

This leather is soft to the touch, not easily deformed, and easy to care for.

 

 

 

It is also produced in an environmentally friendly way, minimizing environmental pollution. Although the world is gradually shifting away from meat consumption towards vegetarianism and veganism, the meat industry continues to produce a huge amount of cow leather that if not used is simply discarded.

 

 

Less but Better

Its basic design ensures that the leather's luxury stands out. Minimalist with essential features and a modern classic form for a lifetime of use. It has a design that goes well with formal wear and casual looks.

 

DETAIL

 

  Lightweight bag – 850g

 

 

 

Features

  • 15” laptop compartment (perfect for Apple Macbook Pro), with a sturdy separate reinforcement
  • Zipper pocket
  • Two open pockets
  • Shoulder strap
  • Name tag (card holder)
  • High quality YKK zipper
  • Oxford cotton lining (extremely durable)

 

 

Multi Pocket

 

 

 

 

 

Notebook pocket, zipper pocket and two open pockets make it easy to use even and a surprisingly large capacity.

 

Durable Subsidiary Materials

 

 

Oxford Cotton Lining

 

 

Glued by Hand!

Craftsmen work on the gluing with their bare hands while attaching leather. The powerful and environmentally friendly bonding materials are totally safe even for workers over long periods.

 

   

         

 

 

 

 

 

 


  

 We provide a shoulder strap for long-lasting comfort and and a leather-made name tag.

 

 

Quality Control Team

A team of highly-trained professionals inspect every bag before delivery meaning no bag will leave the shop unless it is perfect.

 

 

Package

                                 

Shipped in dust bags complete with a  warranty card.

 

 

 

Schedule

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Look Book

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Thanks a lot.

Contact us : mustneedsofficial@gmail.com 

www.mustneeds.com

story:
What is Zuvaa?

Africans have been designing fabrics and dressing the Kings and Queens of African in colorful textile and fashionistas since 5000BC. In the millennium, Zuvaa has re-envisioned this tradition by promoting African-inspired fashion diasporically and globally through an e-commerce innovative platform. Zuvaa is a peer to peer platform that uses e-commerce to globalize the African artisan market and connect makers and artisans with consumers globally. We have a distribution-based model that promotes export and trade between countries on the African continent and the rest of the world.

Our e-commerce platform connects artisans with consumers globally looking for unique and one-of-kind African inspired products. Our platform provides artisans and local designers with the tools they need to scale their SME's. Our distribution-based model promotes export and trade between countries on the African continent and the rest of the world. With a current focus on apparel, we plan to expand into home goods, art, and personal care. 

Our curated online platform connects consumers enamored by African textiles with high quality, modern,  and trendy African inspired designers. We provide a fully integrated e-commerce solution coupled with our unique online selling experience that we have seen grow designer revenue by up to 5x after selling on our platform.

 

Zuvaa's #BlackGirlMagic

When you support Zuvaa, you are also supporting thousands of artisans from across the African continent. In 2018 we have big plans to take Zuvaa to new heights and new levels. We are launching a new platform, new campaigns and an exciting new theme for our Pop Up Tour. As a bootstrapped company we can't move forward without the support of our community. Our global community of African Fashion lovers brought us to where we are now, and we need your support every step of the way to sustain this support. 

Help us actualize our vision to make Zuvaa the go-to place for all things African Inspired and become a home to talented designers from across the continent. From Africa to the World, is a phrase we coined to articulate our deep commitment to show the world the beauty of Africa. We need your help on this journey and your contribution (at any level) will take us one step closer to getting there. 

Let's Get It!

story:
Introducing The Meta Collection

Inspired by Australia's beautiful cities, the Meta Collection consists of two Series. The Creative Series with 3 designs and each available in black or white dial for a total of 6 watch options and the Executive Series consisting of 5 distinctive designs. A total of 11 designs are here and I am confident that you will find a few that you will love. Or two!

As a fine furniture designer, attention to detail is paramount in creating master pieces. This was the case in creating these watches. Nothing was spared when making these beauties to offer an amazing high quality pieces at an affordable price and delivering real value as I begin the journey of building a brand.

I look forward to having you on board as a supporter. Thank you very much for viewing the campaign and if you cannot support me, then please share. Cheers, Bill

Meet The Creative Series

Meet The Executive Series

The Creative Series. three styles each in two colours

These impeccable watches are sure to resonate with those who want luxury accessories but don’t want to pay the mark up typically associated with the industry.

The Meta Collection creates a perfect balance between Class, Exclusivity and Affordability.

If you're looking for a stylish timepiece that combines solid, high-quality construction with modern designs and a Vintage Edge then one of the Meta Watches will sure to fit the bill perfectly and they are all on offer for an unbeatable pre-order price and only on Indiegogo.

The Meta Executive Series​

Swiss Movement

The Executive Series are powered by the Ronda 5040.F, a 13 jewels / gold plated analogue quartz movement 3-eye chronograph with centre-stop seconds, Month and Day indicator and a retro style Date by hand and small second

The Creative Series are powered by the Ronda 5021.F, a 10 jewels / gold plated analogue quartz movement. 2-eye chronograph with centre-stop seconds, Date indicator and small second

Features at a Glance

KEY FEATURES

  • Every single element has been specifically designed, sourced and manufactured for these watches
  • Museum grade sapphire crystal with glare reduction
  • Multi-layered and applied elements dial
  • Chronograph ADD and SPLIT functions. The Creative series feature a Tachymeter and some models feature both a Tachymeter & Telemeter
  • Very long battery life up to 54 months
  • High quality handcrafted vegetable-tanned Italian leather straps with stainless steel deeply etched buckle. The Executive features a Butterfly-Style buckle
  • Quick Release swappable strap
  • Cold-Forged surgical grade 316L polished and brushed stainless steel case
  • Super-LumiNova on indices and hands
  • The chronograph pushers and crown are very nicely machined and branded
  • Water resistance – Up to 10ATM/100M
  • Deep-etched case back with unique numbering for each reference
  • Perfectly Sized for Any Wrist
  • 3 Years International Warranty

The Meta Creative Series | Exacto & Preciso

The Meta Creative Series | Artistico & Criativo

The Meta Creative Series | Connoisseur & Maestro

The Design

Working on this collection has been a pleasure and a massive learning experience. Achieving high quality is nothing easy. Photography does not do these beauties justice. Help make this a reality and thanks for the support.

Variations

Meta Executive Series Five References

Meta Executive Series Five References

 Features & Functions

The Executive Collection Quick Tour

Sizes and Dimensions

Risks and challenges

Passion for what we do and Honesty, Integrity and Excellence in how we do it. This is how we've operated our whole professional career and will not deviate from this as it remains the foundation and one of the pillars to success.

When you receive your watch, we realise that it might not be the perfect fit for everyone. If you feel that the watch did not meet your expectations and you have not worn or used it, simply contact us within 30 days for a full refund.

We have worked very hard over the past year to reach this stage. We will continue to do our best until you have received your selected Watch and are fully satisfied! And to do that, we sincerely need your support!

Our production is quite advanced and our manufacturer produces high-end famous Swiss watch brands so you can be very confident about our capacity to provide high-quality products on time. We spent nearly 1-year designing, developing, and receiving finalized production samples. Secondly, we have very skilful and professional suppliers and do not anticipate delays to our timeline. However, if by chance anything unexpected happens, we promise to remain open, transparent and keep you updated throughout the journey.

Thanks for the support! We are excited to take this next step with you, the Indiegogo community!

The Meta Creative Series | Artistico & Criativo




The Meta Creative Series | Connoisseur & Maestro

The Design
Working on this collection has been a pleasure and a massive learning experience. Achieving high quality is nothing easy. Photography does not do these beauties justice. Help make this a reality and thanks for the support.

Variations

Meta Executive Series Five References

Meta Executive Series Five References
 Features & Functions

The Executive Collection Quick Tour

Sizes and Dimensions

Risks and challenges
Passion for what we do and Honesty, Integrity and Excellence in how we do it. This is how we've operated our whole professional career and will not deviate from this as it remains the foundation and one of the pillars to success.
When you receive your watch, we realise that it might not be the perfect fit for everyone. If you feel that the watch did not meet your expectations and you have not worn or used it, simply contact us within 30 days for a full refund.
We have worked very hard over the past year to reach this stage. We will continue to do our best until you have received your selected Watch and are fully satisfied! And to do that, we sincerely need your support!
Our production is quite advanced and our manufacturer produces high-end famous Swiss watch brands so you can be very confident about our capacity to provide high-quality products on time. We spent nearly 1-year designing, developing, and receiving finalized production samples. Secondly, we have very skilful and professional suppliers and do not anticipate delays to our timeline. However, if by chance anything unexpected happens, we promise to remain open, transparent and keep you updated throughout the journey.
Thanks for the support! We are excited to take this next step with you, the Indiegogo community!

story:
MEET THE

WORLD'S FIRST REVERSIBLE WALLET

 

 

A revolutionary wallet with special dual faces design! 

 

FEATURES

 

 

DUAL TONE

The most special feature of MOS is two mirror side with different color tone. We put all time favorite color theme in place; black and light grey color for each side.

This flexible dual tone color enables you to change the wallet appearance to fit any of your styles. It's so easy, simply flip to changes color!
 

 

 

ULTRA SLIM DESIGN 

Compare to the standard bulk wallet available in the market, MOS has been designed to have the ultra slim design.

With approximate dimension of 100mm (length) x 90mm (width) and ridiculous slim at 4mm (thickness), MOS wallet will be easy to be slotted in your front pocket of jeans or even your favourite shirt!

 

 

PREMIUM QUALITY

Saffiano Leather is one of the finest materials available, mainly used by luxury brands.

We believe the natural finish of our leather will be perfectly matched to MOS awesome design.


 

CARRY ENOUGH STORAGE

Even with our ultra slim design, we ensure MOS will able to meet your requirement for daily use.

This wallet equip with 8 Card Slots; 4 slots for each side, perfect to hold your valuable cards while on the move.

 

 


FIT FOR ALL

MOS offer flexibility for the user to any country on the earth, where our bank notes slot are designed to be fit for any size of bank notes. 

Each side has 1 slot for cash notes to enable you to keep cash and any receipt or ticket at the same time!

 

 

USER-FRIENDLY

Are you left-handed?

Thanks to our special dual face design, MOS will be perfect match for both left-handed or right-handed man.

 

 

 

PROJECT TIMELINE

 

Our project has been kick-started since last year, from collecting all pieces of brilliant idea together until completion of the first prototype.

Now we are ready to launch the idea to public and we need your helpful support to born MOS into reality.

First batch of production will be started upon the completion of this campaign (end of March) and we estimate that the order will be ready to be ship out at the end of June or early of July.

 

 

OUR STORY

 

MOSZE is a group of designers looking for something simple yet flexible and elegant, but of course not to compromise its quality. As we believe that we shall not be limited to what we have now, we shall have a better vision and make something better than before to suit our daily use.

As our very first step along with our tagline, we are working on something that would give you a simple, yet flexible and elegant product. 

MOS wallet won't be possible without you. In order to get the such lower price with such quality material and craftmanship, we need to fulfill a minimum order with our manufacturers and that's where you come in. In return for your helpful support, you will be one of the first in the world to own a reversible dual faces MOS wallet!

You can also help us to spread the words to your friends and family, for them to have the opportunity to become part of MOS project.

Like our Facebook Page at here
Or you may visit our website for more info: www.mosze.com

Million thanks for your kind support and for helping MOS to born from scratch into reality!

story:
The first woman to cross the Atlantic

In 1928, Amelia took a Fokker F7 (also known as "Friendship") driven by two pilots, Wilmer Stultz, and Louis Gordon, to cross the Atlantic. They flew from Boston, USA, to southern Wales, United Kingdom. Having spent 20 hours and 40 minutes and experienced various bad weather conditions such as blizzard, the plane finally landed successfully in Barry Harbor in Wales. Amelia thus became the first woman to cross the Atlantic. After returning to the United States, she was warmly welcomed by the nationals and even the president, but Amelia was not proud of it. She regarded her performance in the flight was not satisfactory and candidly said "Stultz did all the flying-had to. I was just baggage, like a sack of potatoes."She added,"... maybe someday I'll try it alone."

 

Amelia worked secretly on her plans to make a solo flight across the Atlantic. On May 20, 1932, Amelia drove NR-7952 Lockheed 5B Vega from Harbour Grace, Newfoundland, Canada to Paris, France. At first, the flight was very smooth, but in 14 hours and 54 minutes, the sudden appearance of strong north wind blew Amelia’s plane away from the scheduled route. Plagued by bad weather, the wings of the flight were full of thick clouds and ice. Amelia had no choice but to force land on a meadow near Londonderry, Northern Ireland. “After scaring the cows in the neighborhood, I pulled up in a farmer’s backyard.” Although she was a little away from the planned destination, she crossed the Atlantic successfully and became the first woman and second solo person to make the flight. 

 

Xpeda Amelia Collection

Amelia is a legendary female pilot. Her untiring advocates in freedom, risk-taking and the spirit of never giving up, set her many flying records, which are still resounding till now. Her philosophy of life coincides with Xpeda's. To commemorate this first transatlantic woman's achievements and deeds, we deliberately designed a special edition watch to pay tribute to this legendary female pilot and pass on the spirit that "adventure is worthwhile in itself".

Click here for the full review

Click here for the full review

Click here for the full review

Click here for the full review

 

 

Adaptation of the NR7952 Lockheed 5B Vega

 NR7952 Lockheed 5B Vega is one of the aircraft that help Amelia achieve her legendary status. Airplanes during that era rarely use a bright colour on their plane, the NR7952 eye-catching colour and design never fail to attract attention. To redefine the aviation watch design and commemorate this legendary aircraft, we use the colour tone of the NR7952 aircraft on our watch to make it stand out from the crowd.

 

 

Aircraft Flight Instrument

The design of the dial, including the dial index, pattern, and the hands are all referenced to the aircraft flight instrument, from which the pilot can easily see the time and other information. We transfer this feature from an aircraft cockpit to an ordinary user’s wrist, allowing them to read the time at a quick glance.

 

 

Aviator sunglasses

The open balance wheel window on the watch dial is like the pilot’s eye and is the soul of the watch. Based on the photochromic sunglasses that pilots wear during flight, we applied the photochromic lens on the open-heart window of the watch dial to further relate this aviation watch piece to Amelia's legacy. 

 

 

 

 

 Introducing the "Umbra Lens"

We make the open-heart display window lens from a photochromic sunglass worn by pilots. This lens will darken with the intensity of the UV. We named this technology “Umbra”. Resembling the lunar eclipse when the sun is blocked by the earth, Umbra lenses represent this astronomic beauty on the watch, making it more interesting.

 

 

Open Heart Display

We added a circular display window at the 9 o’clock position to allow the user to see the beautiful operation of the balance wheel. Xpeda is the first watch brand to use “Umber” Transition Lens as the material for the open-heart display window. The window will have its colour darkened according to the UV intensity of the environment. The lens is transparent in an indoor environment to display the movement balance and will gradually darken under a strong sunlight environment without covering the contents of the movement. Such a design can protect the delicate part of the mechanical movement and add some fun elements to the watch.

 

Case and Finishing

We use 316L solid stainless steel for this watch case. With a diameter and a thickness of 42 mm & 12mm, weight in at 108g, it makes the watch suitable for males and females on different occasions. To give it a strong metal and contrast astatic, Amelia Vega Red case is polished to a perfect mirror finish and the lug with a brushed metal finish.

We also offer two other variants to the Amelia collection–The Amelia Sahara Black & Amelia Jet black. We finish the Amelia Sahara black case in matte black with desert sand numerals. On the Amelia Jet Black, the case is finished in matte black but we finish the numerals in metallic grey.  The concept behind this design is to further relate this watch to its pilot watch concept. Besides that, the all-black design gives this watch a sense of mystery and closely aligns with the adventure seeker's spirit.

 

Lens

We use K1 hardened mineral high dome glass as the lens to give it a three-dimensional look. The bottom layer of the glass is coated with anti-reflective material to enable the user to see the time from different angles.

 

Exhibition Case back 

To match the holistic design of the watch, we polish the stainless steel case to a mirror-like finish, while the black case will have a sandblasted finish. The names of Xpeda and Amelia are engraved on the case back to commemorate her legend. We adopt a display back design to showcase the mechanical movement. 316L stainless steel is used on the case back as well.

 

Dial and Hands

The rough texture on the watch dial makes it more layered and multi-dimensional. We adopt a perspective design at the 9 o’clock position to showcase the delicate balance wheel. The diamond-shaped design of the watch hands and the numbers are inspired by the aircraft’s flight instrument.

 

Luminous

To allow the pilot to see the information on the aircraft at night, the aircraft will incorporate the luminous function on the cockpit instrument. So, we adopted this design on our watch. By adding the Swiss luminous function, the hands will appear in pale green under a dark environment.

Movement

The NH38A movement of the watch is an automatic movement manufactured by Japan Seiko, with high accuracy, reliability, and longevity. This 3 hands self-winding mechanical movement features a second hands reset function and bi-directional winding system with an accuracy of -20 to +40 seconds per day. The power reserve is up to 41 hours. Vibration frequency is 6 vibrations per second, equivalent to 21,600 vibrations per hour. The movement carries 24 jewels and anti-magnetic up to 4,800 A/m.

 

Italian Leather Strap

We make the straps from Italian genuine leather. Italian leather is renowned for its material and craftsmanship. The strap they make differs from those made in other regions. Unlike normal straps, Italian leather straps are manufactured with the least damage done to the raw materials to maintain the high quality and flexibility of the leather and its durability.  The longer someone uses the straps, the softer the leather will be, hence making it more comfortable to wear.

 

Quick Interchangeable strap

The strap can be easily removed or replaced by tapping the lever on the back of the strap, which allows you to change your favorite strap according to the needs of different occasions.

 

 

 

 

Amelia Commemoration Wooden Box

Besides offering a well-crafted watch, we pack every Amelia watch in a delicate wooden box with a piece of metal signage engraved in Amelia’s name.

 

Xpeda Backstage Clutch Bag

Instead of the traditional watch box we received every time we bought a watch, we created a new way to package our watch. The Xpeda backstage clutch bag will be the standard packaging in the future. Apart from being just packaging and protection for the watch, this clutch bag allows you to travel with an additional watch, store safely in your baggage. To make it more interesting, multiple pockets in the bag allow you to carry additional strap and tools so you can change your strap on the fly.

 

We offer 3 variants of strap option for 3 of our Amelia collection. This includes an Italian leather strap, NATO-style nylon strap, and the stainless steel mesh bracelet. After the project ended, an option form will be sent out to all backers to allow the backer to choose their favorite combination.

 

 

 

 

Amelia's Legendary Life

Amelia Mary Earhart was born on July 24, 1897 in Atchison, Kansas, USA. She is an American pilot and the 16th woman to receive a pilot license from the Federation Aeronautique Internationale. When the 10-year-old Amelia saw her first plane at a state fair, it did not impress her. “It was a thing of rusty wire and wood, nothing worth my interest,” she said. Almost a decade later, at a stunt-flying exhibition, she became interested in aviation. On December 28, 1920, pilot Frank Hawks gave her a ride that would forever change her life. “By the time I had got two or three hundred feet off the ground, I knew I had to fly.” After three years, Amelia successfully obtained the pilot’s license and started her lifelong aviation endeavor. 

 

Amelia and flying

Amelia’s passion for flying is admirable. She crossed the Atlantic Ocean twice and created many flight records during her lifetime. From 1930 to 1935, she set seven women’s speed and distance records. Besides flying, she also advocated for the development of women in the aviation industry. In 1937, news struck the aviation world, and Amelia had gone missing during her round-the-world tour. On July 2 the US government officially announced Amelia’s death. During her lifelong aviation career, she dedicated time to her passion for flying and setting new heights within the aviation realm. Her passion and “never give up” attitude help cement her legendary status in the aviation community.

 

Who We Are?

When we couldn’t find a watch that truly reflects who we are and the life we live, we decided to create our own. Our goal is to make watches for people who live like us. We work hard and play harder. We love what we do and we don’t stop until we get things right. We are not afraid to express ourselves and to stand out in the crowd. We think freedom is a necessity, not a luxury. We are adventure explorers who travel to all corners of the globe to experience, to learn, and to be inspired. We believe everyone should reach out for their dreams and make the most of every moment of their lives. We don’t just think about it. We live it.


Our Creation

We are absolute perfectionists when it comes to creating our watches. We are big on details and even bigger in quality. We believe good is not good enough. The materials and workmanship of our watches will always strictly comply with the highest standards. We strive to put only top-notch quality pieces on your wrist, so we will never settle for less. 


The Paulistano Way 

It all began at our Brazil headquarters, situated right at the heart of Sao Paulo. The mindset of our small team of designers and engineers is in line with Sao Paulo’s motto of ‘I am not led, I lead’ – we are creators, not followers. Our designs are inspired by some of the best parts of our city – architecture, contemporary artworks, fashion, and vibrant nightlife. We want people across the globe to taste a bit of our lifestyle and culture whenever they wear our watches. 

 

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

To ensure that we control our supply chain, we will ensure the quality and sufficient product with well-known and high-quality manufacturers. We will check the product regularly and make sure the quality is up to standard. We have had experience in past handling orders, production, packaging, and shipping. We set a contingency plan in place for any unforeseen problem.

We will send progress updates to our supporters through picture sharing. If a problem is identified in the production stages, supporters will be informed immediately. Finally, we hope that Xpeda watch will become a stylish and high-quality watch brand. We will do our best to fulfill our commitment and provide watches that exceed our supporters’ expectations!

Thank you for reading the entire story and hope that you will support and help us succeed in this project.

story:
With Gaia & Dubos products, you can look impeccable while upholding your environmental and ethical values. 

Verify the origin and impact of each of our products. We have nothing to hide. Just pure sustainability and elegance. 

Fall in love with Gaia & Dubos garments. Cherish them and keep them for years. They will accompany you throughout every chapter of your life.

120-Day Easy and Free Returns + Lifetime Seam Guarantee

 

Why Turn to Crowdfunding?

Imagine receiving a new order every week, or even every day, and having to reach out to your ever-so-busy seamstresses, who have another full-time job and a house and a husband and kids and cats, and asking them to finalize the order as soon as humanly possible so the customer gets it on time, as promised.

This is not a viable business model, and it is less and less feasible as we grow. 

Plus, it takes a tremendous amount of time, effort and money to make our products, since everything is made by hand. 

Sure it sounds lovely and all, but we cannot keep growing and uphold a handcrafted production model!

Our Production Dilemma 

Right now, we are caught in a vicious circle: we kind of receive too many orders to meet demands and deal with delays, but we kind of don't receive enough orders to be able to carry a small inventory and have them crafted by an experienced and well-equipped manufacturer. 

Most garment factories, even the small ethical ones in Canada, ask for rather high minimal production quantities. 

Our Fabric Supplies

Our eco-friendly fabric suppliers also ask for minimum order quantities. If these minimums are not met, we need to pay extra. Another vicious cycle we are trapped in! 

You, Our Saviors! 

This is why we need your precious help!

We are offering you incredible discounts on our best-selling products so you can enjoy a genuinely eco-friendly, ethical and high-quality product, while we can slowly increase the scale of our production in order to decrease costs of production and offer better turnaround times to you, our beloved clientele. 

A Just-In-Time, Small-Batch Model

Don't worry, we will still produce in very small batches compared with the industry's standards. That way, we ensure we do not waste hundreds of clothes that are stuck in our inventory each season. 

The manufacturer we have selected to craft your rewards is based in Quebec, Canada. They have over 40 years of experience in women's fashion, and grow every year to create jobs in which workers are well treated and equitably paid. 

And yes! A part of our production will remain artisanal for now, so our seamstresses won't go out of business! 

We Want to Grow!

We want to grow worldwide and offer our sustainable products to even more women. 

Do you want to be part of the adventure? Order your favorite sustainable products today!

 

"This is THE best material I have ever worn! (Yes, better than cashmere!) I do not usually buy such items.. . I'm a wanna be eco person. This was SO worth the money! Excellent purchase. Highly recommend!" - Renee Fountain

 

"This shirt fits me perfectly. The quality of the seams is also impeccable and the fabric is very soft. I will wear it proudly." - Madone Turcotte 

 

"I love both colors, plus they are comfortable and easy-care. I wash them in the washing machine and they remain impeccable." - Nancy Potvin

 

"I am more than happy with this organic cotton dress. I bought it a couple of months ago and I am always as happy when I wear it. It's a versatile dress that combines comfort and class. It will give you the strange feeling of being dressed for both a chic event and for cocooning at home!" - Alexane St-Amant  

 

"Very proud of having encouraged this brand by buying this wonderful top, with whom I fell in love at first sight. I find it chic, comfy and easy to care for, and very versatile because it does not wrinkle. This is a must that suits every occasion and that will lasts over time since it can't really go out of fashion." - Carolane Tremblay

 

"I love this dress, it is very stylish and easy-care. It's my favourite dress." - Nancy Potvin

Click here for Size Guide

Gaia & Dubos was founded in 2015 by Léonie Daignault-Leclerc. She began her fashion designer career at the age of 12, designing made-to-measure garments for herself and her customers. Her love and devotion for the planet and humanity led her to found the brand. 

She has a College Diploma in Fashion Design, a Bachelor in Fashion Merchandising and a Master of Arts in Fashion, where she specialized in sustainable fashion. Internships in Paris, Madrid and Toronto helped her forge her identity as an entrepreneur and designer, and shape her approach towards the fashion industry.

 

Risks & Challenges

With years of experience in the fashion industry, Gaia & Dubos founder Léonie Daignault-Leclerc knows how to get out of trouble!

The fabric hasn't arrived? Let's squeeze production a couple of days later! The samples aren't perfect? Do them again, please! Shipping is a real puzzle? Have some friends help you out for a wrapping + stamping party!

All jokes aside, we DO feel absolutely ready to face all the challenges a Kickstarter campaign can send our way.

We can promise you will be a happy customer, no matter what. We WILL make it right for you!

We still hope you understand we COULD face major challenges with our fabric suppliers, manufacturer or mailing service. This is unfortunately out of our control, but we will stay the course to deliver our amazing products to you just in time!

We still have to warn you that you may fall in love with our brand and never want to shop anywhere else! But this is also out of our control... What do you want? We create the most sustainable high-end clothing there is! ;)

Other Ways You Can Help

Share our page with your friends and family! Word of mouth helps us tremendously!
story_txt:
With Gaia & Dubos products, you can look impeccable while upholding your environmental and ethical values. 
Verify the origin and impact of each of our products. We have nothing to hide. Just pure sustainability and elegance. 


Fall in love with Gaia & Dubos garments. Cherish them and keep them for years. They will accompany you throughout every chapter of your life.



120-Day Easy and Free Returns + Lifetime Seam Guarantee












 
Why Turn to Crowdfunding?
Imagine receiving a new order every week, or even every day, and having to reach out to your ever-so-busy seamstresses, who have another full-time job and a house and a husband and kids and cats, and asking them to finalize the order as soon as humanly possible so the customer gets it on time, as promised.
This is not a viable business model, and it is less and less feasible as we grow. 
Plus, it takes a tremendous amount of time, effort and money to make our products, since everything is made by hand. 
Sure it sounds lovely and all, but we cannot keep growing and uphold a handcrafted production model!
Our Production Dilemma 
Right now, we are caught in a vicious circle: we kind of receive too many orders to meet demands and deal with delays, but we kind of don't receive enough orders to be able to carry a small inventory and have them crafted by an experienced and well-equipped manufacturer. Most garment factories, even the small ethical ones in Canada, ask for rather high minimal production quantities. 
Our Fabric Supplies
Our eco-friendly fabric suppliers also ask for minimum order quantities. If these minimums are not met, we need to pay extra. Another vicious cycle we are trapped in! 
You, Our Saviors! 
This is why we need your precious help!We are offering you incredible discounts on our best-selling products so you can enjoy a genuinely eco-friendly, ethical and high-quality product, while we can slowly increase the scale of our production in order to decrease costs of production and offer better turnaround times to you, our beloved clientele.

story:
WinWinter Heated Insoles technology was designed for maintaining an optimal temperature for your feet. Did you know, that your feet are crucial when it comes to regulating your overall body temperature? Warm feet means warm body and insoles are designed simply to keep you warm. The Insoles have wide temperature range for you to choose your most comfortable level.

Compared to similar existing products on the market, WinWinter insoles have following main advantages due to its advanced technology:


 Wireless Charging: 

  • No need to take the insoles out every time to charge it. You simply place the small charging modules inside each shoe. 
  • While it charges, it also dries your insoles. 
  • Makes insoles more durable. The issue with wired charging insoles is that when moisture damages connectors on the insole over time. WinWinter insoles eliminate the issue by implementing wireless charging technology making insoles last a lot longer and allowing to create truly waterproof insoles.  


 Fully Automated

  • Insoles turn on when your feet temperature goes below your chosen comfortable warmth level and turn off when your comfortable temperature is reached.
  • Sensor integrated in the insole is like a big button that turns on by touch, so the product works even when you sit or lie down. 

    Waterproof 
  • Insoles are made of waterproof material. Since wireless charger doesn't need charging connector that is sensitive to moister, WinWinter are fully waterproof. Insoles have been tested by divers and proved to work under water.

     Charge lasts for 10 hours
  • 82.4°F is comfortable temperature for your feet. At that setting level fully charged insoles work 10 hours constantly turned on. Charge can even last for many days depending on outside temperature and your daily activities.


  Made comfortable for you to keep for long time

  • WinWinter insoles are made of high quality hygienic and hypoallergenic material. Each insole has orthopedic cushion, with an instep raiser for extended heel support. 
  • Main heating element is located around the toes because the forefoot starts to feel cold first. 
  • Made with high-wear resistance where control card and battery are covered by metal protective housing that helps to avoid deformation under body weight. 
  • Li-Po battery intended for multiple charging.



Story behind the idea

Initially there was an idea to make something useful and simple for people. Something that will solve a problem and something that is worth doing. Creating the heated insoles seemed like a great idea. It could solve the problem of vital importance of dealing with adverse weather conditions.

First steps

To start we bought all similar products that we managed to find on the Internet to see if the problem is solved. While testing them we realized that it's too difficult to use the models in everyday life. The hassle of manual turning on/off, charging required taking the insoles out of the shoes and some versions had separated battery mounted to the ankle that was very uncomfortable. Also overtime charging connectors on the insole would get oxidized from moisture which in turn shortens their lifetime especially when fully submerged in snow or water.  

So the goal was to create fully automated heated insoles that are comfortable, durable and hassle free simple to use.

Development path

Our team of engineers are excellent. They generated innovative solutions one after another to get best possible results. To make wireless charging we tried making charging mat, but the charge power wasn’t enough, so we made a dryer (the insoles are magnetized with dryer to charge and get dry at the same time). We’ve tested on/off button, multi-layer plate, 2 thermo-sensing elements before we came to the final solution with the capacitive sensor that seems to be the most convenient and reliable for reaching our goal. Our team of engineers kept on improving other technological aspects after getting feedback from people using the product. Automated temperature control was a great solution because we got many responses from people not liking the hassle of having extra device to switch on and off. The goal was to make so people didn't have to worry and think but could just put on their shoes and forget about getting cold feet. After making the wireless charger and getting rid of exposed connectors we were able to make fully waterproof insoles. For battery our team solved numerous engineering tasks to make it safe while providing optimal usage time and fitting well with overall design to stay comfortable.  We have combined control units into main control card to safe space. Battery and control card were protected with metal housing that helps to avoid deformation under body weight withstanding up to 660 pounds.  Also we made sure insoles were comfortable to wear and at the same time had durable material. Our tests showed that the fastest and most effective way to make the feet warm was to put carbon fiber heating around toes and outside of the foot.   

 

The Impact 

The funds raised will give WinWinter product jump start.  It will be used for operations, marketing and production to enter the market full force. The product has already been successfully tested in the market. There is an agreement with 8 factories for the production. We need to make the product package, prepare press moulds for all the insole sizes and for charging device.

Risks & Challenges

At first we're going to produce a small batch of the product so we can improve on all the details for the next batch. There may appear technical issues in the assembly of the parts stage as a lot of manual work is to be done. The engineers are ready to join the production process promptly. The product is constantly being tested thoroughly and actually no more obstacles are seen at the moment.

Backing the project is more than just sharing the money. Its supporting the dream to create something that the inventors and developers want to see exist in the world.

Help WinWinter Heated Insoles to make history!

And in the meantime live your life with pleasure and keep your feet warm with WinWinter. Warm feet means warm soul. 

Thank you for your support!



FAQ 

Where can I use Heated Insoles?

You can use Heated Insoles everywhere. For example it is perfect for snowboarding, mountain and cross-country skiing, horse riding, cycling, hiking, travelling, fishing, hunting or just walking with your friends.

How to find my Insoles size?

What temperature should my Heated Insoles get to?

You can choose a comfortable temperature from 82°F to 113°F.

What kind of footwear should I choose for Heated Insoles?

Heated Insoles work in most types of shoes or boots, but heel should not be high because insoles can only bend to certain point

How long Heated Insoles work?

82.4°F is comfortable temperature for your feet. At that setting level fully charged insoles work 10 hours constantly turned on. Charge can even last for many days depending on outside temperature and your daily activities.

How long will it take to charge Insoles?

It will take up to 6 hours to charge Insoles.

How can I understand that Insoles are charged?

When Insoles are charged, indicator starts blinking.

Should I take out Heated Insoles from footwear for charging?

No. It is better if you charge Insoles inside your footwear.

How many times can Insoles be recharged?

Insoles can be recharged over 500 times.

Are Heated Insoles waterproof?

Yes, Heated Insoles are fully waterproof.

What should I do if Heated Insoles becomes dirty?

Best to clean with a damp cloth.

Are there any medical reasons not to use WinWinter insoles?

No. It is absolutely safe.

What kind of battery is used in Heated Insoles?

Heated Insoles have a built-in Lithium - polymer battery. 

What kind of material is used in Heated Insoles?

High-tech EVA material is used.

What kind of charger is used in Heated Insoles?

Heated Insoles have a wireless charger.

How do I charge Heated Insoles?

Place charger-dryer modules to insoles on the marks shaped as charger modules and you will feel how modules get magnetized to insoles. No need to take them out of your shoes.

What is battery capacity?

Battery capacity might be from 1400 mAh to 2000 mAh, it depends on the size.

When do Heated Insoles start heating?

Heated Insoles are fully automated. They turn on when your feet temperature goes below your chosen comfortable warmth level and turn off when your comfortable temperature is reached. Insoles have a sensor for the temperature and sense the touch of your foot 

How do i set the temperature?

Charging block has temperature dialer that lets you choose your most comfortable temperature.

Should I charge Insoles in summer, when I do not use it?

To get longest lifetime, you should fully charge insoles every three months.

What should I do if I have more questions about Heated Insoles?

You should write to contact@winwinter.com

story:
About Gizadress

Giza is a new clothing brand that offers products born from the fashion concept of four young Italians, who in turn are major consumers and consequently creative interpreters. Our mission is to offer people the quality of the fabrics chosen and created in the Italian territory, with market quotations centered for the public of all age. We want to offer the consumers elements giving them the opportunity to differentiate themselves, and make their style iconic.



Design

Every garment Giza is the result of a specific research area, in order to enable and  to adapt it to any character and physique. The collection can range between different targets. The fit and the right juncture between basic and fashion allows us to attract the interest of many consumers.



Quality and Materials

The challenge for us is to offer fine fabrics in all our heads, so we have chosen production sites of the Italian territory, who use only the finest materials. The processes are subject to constant supervision by experts, who donate to our items the feature of a hand-crafted. For this production we have chosen 100% cotton.  The ongoing research has allowed us to plan the launch of innovative products, like our hi tech bag with solar panels, which can be useful for charging different devices that follow us during our days in a busy world where it is important to be always connected.


Collections and Inspirations

All our products draw inspiration from the value given to the name of our brand.

Giza is a city that owes its importance to accommodate the three most famous Egyptian pyramids. The brand is closely related to art and everything related to it. This item will be taken up and revised in a futuristic and artistic view in every collection.



Entrepreneurial Operation

We dedicated to Giza two years before launching on the market, because we tried all the original elements that could ensure sales arguments interesting. despite the majority of Italian business are emigrating abroad to receive tax breaks and produce at much lower prices, we wanted to challenge this trend and go against it, remaining faithful to the production at home, to revive the spirit of the real made in Italy.



History

Giza Dress was born in 2014 with the aim of valorize a brand 100%  born and produced in Italy, to revive the tradition of the concept of fashion based on a flexible and authentic look. The goal is to get around the big profit margins of the retail channel, most often inflated by the brand awareness and advertising marketing, and distribute products directly on the web, at much lower prices. Last year we have invested in research and agreements in the production of a capsule collection with partners  with refined and innovative feature. Now we need a further effort to realize all our sacrifices, and for this reason  we need your help. Our goal is to let us know more about our field sales, and get different feedback that will be useful for defining  next collections. We want to share  our project, appointing you an integral part of our company, and give you the chance to get into the mindset Giza. If you believe in our work and would like to support us, read on and discover all the possibilities that we offer to be one of us.




How the money will be invested

All that we can get, will be used in this way

• Finance Spring/Summer 2015 campaign

• Finance Spring/Summer 2015 production

• Maintain a high profile of web and adv marketing 




Taking care

We would like to attract the attention of all the people, from simple purchasers of clothing to potential emerging designers. For who will finance our project, we guarantee a member card with an extra discount that will not expire, a relief to walk in Giza's world feeling like a small piece of the puzzle of an ambitious project. In addition we'll issue a thanksgiving message reporting your full name on a dedicated section on our web site.


Gizadress bag & accessories collection

See below our bags & accessories collection divided into basic and Hi Tech version with solar panel useful to charge all your devices. composed with a mix of Leather and Faux leather.




Gizadress Catalogue

The processes are subject to constant supervision by experts, who donate to our items the feature of a hand-crafted. For this production we have chosen 100% cotton.  The ongoing research has allowed us to plan the launch of innovative products, like our hi tech bag with solar panels, which can be useful for charging different devices that follow us during our days in a busy world where it is important to be always connected.




Collections and Inspirations

All our products draw inspiration from the value given to the name of our brand.Giza is a city that owes its importance to accommodate the three most famous Egyptian pyramids. The brand is closely related to art and everything related to it. This item will be taken up and revised in a futuristic and artistic view in every collection.


Entrepreneurial Operation

We dedicated to Giza two years before launching on the market, because we tried all the original elements that could ensure sales arguments interesting. despite the majority of Italian business are emigrating abroad to receive tax breaks and produce at much lower prices, we wanted to challenge this trend and go against it, remaining faithful to the production at home, to revive the spirit of the real made in Italy.






History


Giza Dress was born in 2014 with the aim of valorize a brand 100%  born and produced in Italy, to revive the tradition of the concept of fashion based on a flexible and authentic look. The goal is to get around the big profit margins of the retail channel, most often inflated by the brand awareness and advertising marketing, and distribute products directly on the web, at much lower prices. Last year we have invested in research and agreements in the production of a capsule collection with partners  with refined and innovative feature. Now we need a further effort to realize all our sacrifices, and for this reason  we need your help. Our goal is to let us know more about our field sales, and get different feedback that will be useful for defining  next collections. We want to share  our project, appointing you an integral part of our company, and give you the chance to get into the mindset Giza. If you believe in our work and would like to support us, read on and discover all the possibilities that we offer to be one of us.



How the money will be invested

All that we can get, will be used in this way
• Finance Spring/Summer 2015 campaign


• Finance Spring/Summer 2015 production
• Maintain a high profile of web and adv marketing 



Taking care
We would like to attract the attention of all the people, from simple purchasers of clothing to potential emerging designers. For who will finance our project, we guarantee a member card with an extra discount that will not expire, a relief to walk in Giza's world feeling like a small piece of the puzzle of an ambitious project. In addition we'll issue a thanksgiving message reporting your full name on a dedicated section on our web site.

Each of us has inside of himself a little universe that although apparently might seem equal to many others can actually be only similar, never the same.
All small universes that make up the human race are different from each other by virtue of the elements that compose them, elements dictated by life experiences, personal inclinations acquired and innate and influences that in the various times of each of our lives are in contact with each single individual for longer or shorter periods, past or even present.
And ... In this new era in which the various individuals tend to be seen as simple bits stacked in databases of large companies and government agencies it is particularly important to give space and to highlight the own real identity.

Nowadays everyone possesses a smartphone, that thanks to its versatile nature allows us to customize the quality, quantity and appearance of our data, our applications and interface with which we interact with it.
A small glimpse of our person, of the wonder inherent in us that, unfortunately, is enclosed within the impersonal standardized form of our apparatus.
A uniqueness, ours, which is imprisoned from the outward appearance of a smartphone produced in millions of pieces all at the same.

In certain ways our smartphone is almost a life partner through which we can face life in its various aspects, working, social, emotional and loving.
And just as a result of its role as partner of everyday life, it reflects and reveals our being in many of its facets.

And at this point the obvious question.
Why to limit our uniqueness, our being, our tastes, within our phone?


From this simple question arises our project; Smartphone Stands customized, unique pieces in the world and able to communicate and enhance properly the small universe inherent in its owner.
Having all of us a great value and wishing to communicate and give importance to this value, usually not adequately taken into account; we thought, sketched, drawn, designed and realized something that can live up to the arduous task for which it was conceived.
Giving voice to our being, in a nutshell, means to give the chance to customize till the extreme the object that belongs to us, being able to get to make it unique, ours and only ours, in the materiality, in itself and in the soul that the object acquires.

Each Smartphone Stand is not made on an assembly line, but it is made as a single piece, piece in which there is manual work, the attention and the experience of the person who will carry out following your specific requests, ensuring that inside of this there is the fusion of the accomplisher’s passion and experience, with the taste and choices arising from life experience and innate abilities of those who will possess it.

To do this we have chosen quality fabrics, result of the most sophisticated modern technology.

Each of the fabrics proposed is waterproof and fire retardant in order to make the transportation of our life partner as secure as possible.

All fabrics are ecological and have the textures and colors visible in the images (with different zoom).


But the quality of a fabric alone is not able to make an excellent and above average quality product, to achieve exceptional results studies are required studies, experiments and the wisdom of creative that combine a large experience in the fashion industry with the great ability to innovate, leading to solutions that no one had reached before.
Make an idea and a fabric become a solid reality requires skill and this skill is the one that has allowed us to turn into a solid and durable reality what imagined, thanks to a careful selection and design of the various components, in fact the proposed Smartphone Stands are also resistant to the most extreme environmental conditions and are able to withstand wear, tear and strong stresses to which life could expose them.

The only quality, versatility and durability, however, are not able to make an object really unique, but are only able to make it an excellent product equal to all similar that would be produced along with him, as well as fabrics in itself, despite the variety proposed, are mass-produced, yards and yards of fabric all the same to themselves and... from this simple consideration the choice of the embroidery unique and made individually on each piece.
But ... As said before, giving voice to our being means to give the opportunity to customize to the extreme, so that the object created is equivalent to an object created in every way from you and this chance is reflected in the choices, besides the fabric and the thread used for the embroidery and the seams, the layout, the design and the word (or words) that you will want to embroider on this.

Even for the wires has been dedicated all the attention and the research used for the fabrics and the result is a variety of yarns different for colors and characteristics.
Among all the features taken into account and evaluated during the phase of project, one is worthy of note, the phosphorescence (not to be confused with the fluorescence).
Yes ... If you want you can choose between four (4) colors which will start to shine at nightfall.

Being our saying "Wide variety of choice!", this feature is also selectable.
The colors are those visible in the images and at the time when it will list the characteristics desired you can decide the color (9 variations) and its eventual phosphorescence (except black, present only in coloring NOT phosphorescent).

As mentioned, these wires are used to embroider drawings and writing according to the layout chosen because the "layout" is something very personal that says a lot about us and which result is critical to the satisfaction of those who create.

The choices available are shown in the figure and are even five (5).
The first three layouts allow the writing of Names, Names and Surnames, Pseudonyms and short sentences, up to a maximum of twenty (20) characters.
The fifth fourth gives the ability to insert a drawing (which for reasons of space will be a little smaller than the selectable with the fifth layout) and a writing formed by five (5) characters.
The fourth layout instead uses the entire surface available to achieve one of the seven (7) designs among which you can choose.

   

 


Of course, a writing, a name, a pseudonym are very personal, indeed unique, but we felt that this would not be enough and wanting to realize the uniqueness and the absolutely personal, we thought of another possibility, the choice of a character among six (6) combinations.
Basically, whenever we put our signature, actually we spread our experience and our personality, which graphologists study, analyze and examine from a very long time; and to give the opportunity to choose a character, allows us to give vent, even if in a lightly more limited way compared to a signature, of what belongs to us, that is in us, and that is right, is an integrating part of the unique object and of great value that you would like to realize.

Furthermore, as anticipated based on the layout chosen one could also choose a design among those available, whose realizations are visible in the images and that have been made trying to accomplish the best possible merger between classical and modern searching in each of them the artistic particularity able to make it unique and different from all the Others.

Yielding to engineering temptation, the possible combinations given by all the elements on which it is possible to choose are 12 * 9 * 5 * 7 * 6 * 3 = 68.040 to which is added the extreme personalization of the writing indicated and decided by you.

But we did not stop here.

Your Smartphone Stand must not only be beautiful and personal, it must also be functional, so we were not limited to choosing the right fabrics to make it versatile and convenient, making it able to withstand time, wear, efforts, water and fire, but we did a big study to make it as ergonomic and comfortable as possible.

The model foresees the possibility to be brought to the belt, which is very, very difficult for a Smartphone of big size, it was therefore necessary to find a solution to make it comfortable and enjoyable.

Smartphone and Smartphone Stands, thanks to the study of the shape of this latter are not disabling.
Everything is always handy, both standing and sitting or even lying down, on any surface (chairs, sofas, beds, cars seats, buses, trains or planes).

Additionally you can take it over your shoulder, you can use it as a hook for the keychain, the purse, the earphone holder etc ... etc ...

Specifically, we wanted to give the opportunity to anyone who wishes to make the Smartphone Stand even more practical giving this more versatility and enabling it to interface serving as support for additional elements by which to make the experience of its possession even more unique and enjoyable.

The base model includes a belt connector, but you may want more.

It is possible to have two practical eyelets to which connect a keychain, a spring-catch, a USB key, etc ... etc ..., as you can use them to put a pen or any object by tapered shape.
Moreover, you may want even more, you may want a shoulder strap, thanks to which bring the Smartphone Stand through this instead of the belt.
To allow its use in any situation (when you make your sports, when you walk, when you rest, etc... etc...) the shoulder strap is adjustable in length.

But we went over, giving the opportunity to also have a practical pouch made in the same fabric with which it will be realized the Smartphone Stand, which can be used according to your needs (ex. Earphones holder, purse, USB keys holder, etc... etc...).

And finally, we could not think of the fulfillment of a key-chain, also made with the same fabric of the Smartphone Stand, stitched with the same thread and that according to our tastes, needs or choices, can also be attached to the Smartphone Stand itself through the eyelets mentioned before (just like the little bag and the shoulder-belt), or simply kept in your pocket, bag, or where it is more comfortable.

All the qualities and possibilities listed so far mean that this object has not a connotation, a framing or a specific target, but these features are such as to make it a suitable object available for anyone because this Smartphone Stand has not a sporting or elegant look, has not as a target young people or adults, fashion fans or practicality fans.

This Smartphone Stand is an expression of whom owns it and is really the self-expression that will make it the most similar as possible to us, making it become exactly as you want.

In fact, through the choice of the fabric, the layout, the thread, the embroidery, the possible gadgets, this object can be elegant, sporting, exclusive, casual, fashionable, practical, fashion, etc ... etc ...

Till to-day, there is no element capable of all this, only this our idea foresees the realization of something so customizable, so adaptable, so comfortable, so quality, so high-grade ... Unique, such as who owns it.

All products are made in Italy, with the care, quality, elegance and manufacturing tradition that "Made in Italy" guarantees.

But... There are various sizes of smartphones, so... we have created three sizes to choose.

  • If the height of your smartphone is between 105 mm (4,13'') and 125 mm (4,92'') you can chose size 1.
  • If the height of your smartphone is between 125 mm (4,92'') and 145 mm (5,71'') you can chose size 2.
  • If the height of your smartphone is between 145 mm (5,71'') and 165 mm (6,50'') you can chose size 3.

Examples for different sizes:

Size 1:
Apple iPhone 5c, Apple iPhone 5s, Apple iPhone 5, Apple iPhone 4s, Apple iPhone 4, Apple iPhone 3Gs, Apple iPhone 3G, Apple iPhone, LG L35, LG L40, Samsung Galaxy Fame, Acer Liquid Z3, Vodafone Smart Mini, LG Optimus L3 II, Sony Xperia E, Samsung Galaxy Young, Acer Liquid Z2, Sony Xperia Miro, Sony Xperia Tipo, NGM Wemove Action, Samsung Galaxy Chat, Samsung Galaxy Mini 2, Sony Xperia Go, Vodafone Smart II, Samsung Galaxy Next Turbo, Sony Xperia U, HTC Desire C, Motorola Defy Mini, LG Optimus L3, Samsung Galaxy Y Pro, Motorola Fire XT, Motorola Pro+ / Motorola Pro, HTC Explorer, Apple iPhone 4s, Apple iPhone 4, Apple iPhone 3Gs, Apple iPhone 3G, Apple iPhone, Blackberry Q5, Blackberry Q10, Microsoft Lumia 435, Microsoft Lumia 532, Nokia Lumia 530, Nokia Lumia 510, Nokia Lumia 520, Nokia Lumia 620, Nokia Lumia 820, and many more...

Size 2:
Apple iPhone 6, Microsoft Lumia 535, Nokia Lumia 735, Nokia Lumia 830, Nokia Lumia 930, Nokia Lumia 625, Motorola Moto X, Motorola Moto X (2014), LG L Bello, Motorola Moto G (2014), HTC Desire 516, Samsung Galaxy S III Neo, Samsung Galaxy S5, Sony Xperia M2, Samsung Galaxy K Zoom, Huawei Ascend G630, Acer Liquid E3, LG L90, Sony Xperia Z3 Compact, Acer Liquid Jade, LG Nexus 5, LG Optimus L9 II, Huawei Ascend P6, Sony Xperia SP, Samsung Galaxy S4, HTC One, Sony Xperia Z, LG Nexus 4, Blackberry Z10, Blackberry Classic, Blackberry Z3, Blackberry Z30, Nokia Lumia 635, Nokia Lumia 630, Nokia Lumia 625, Nokia Lumia 1020, Nokia Lumia 925, Nokia Lumia 920, Jolla / Jolla & Angry Birds Stella, and many more...

Size 3:
Apple iPhone 6 Plus, ASUS Zenfone 2, ASUS Zenfone Zoom, ASUS Fonepad Note FHD 6, HTC Desire Eye, LG G Pro 2, Sony Xperia T2, Ultra, LG G3, LG G Flex 2, Samsung Galaxy A7, Motorola Nexus 6, HTC One max, Nokia Lumia 1520, Samsung Galaxy Note 4, Samsung Galaxy Note 3, Samsung Galaxy Note 2, LG Optimus G Pro, Sony Xperia T3, LG G Flex, Samsung Galaxy Note Edge, HTC Desire 820, Samsung Galaxy Mega 5.8, LG G3 Stylus, Huawei Ascend G7, Huawei Ascend Mate 7, Huawei Ascend G750, HTC Desire 816, Nokia Lumia 1320, and many more...
