story:
Click the pink button that says "Back It" to purchase a scarf and support our cause! 

 

Overview

The Summiya Travel Scarf was designed by a Pakistani student named Summiya and is meant to educate girls like her in Pakistan. For every five scarves sold, one student can attend school for a year. 

 

A SCARF WITH A HIDDEN COMPARTMENT, AND MESSAGE!

 

Each scarf is $40 (not including shipping). The extra cost for shipping in the United States is $9 (per scarf). If you live in either Aspen or Snowmass, Colorado, you have the option to not pay for shipping and the scarf will be dropped off at your door with no expense. For local delivery, email Macy Hopkinson with your full name, address, and phone number. 

The Summiya Scarf was created through a collaboration with Waypoint Goods, where 100% of the profits are given to pay for girls' tuitions in Pakistan. A friendly competition was held in our school in Bhara Kahu where each of the students created their own design and the winner would have their design created into a scarf. That winner was a girl named Summiya.

Click HERE to donate more to the cause! 

 

 

Meet Summiya

"My name is Summiya and I am 15 years old. I belong to a tribal and very conservative family from Bajaur Agency and I speak Urdu and Pashto. My father moved my family to Bhara Kahu, located on the outskirts of Islamabad, after an army operation occupied the area. I have five sisters and two brothers. Pashtun culture differs from the average Pakistani culture in that it is more conservative and strict. Women are confined within the walls of their houses. My siblings and I are not allowed to go to the market or visit our relatives in the neighborhood. In fact, the only place that we can go is to our school. I love to read stories but I do not like cooking or helping with household chores, which is what Pakistani society expects a girl to do. I do not have enough time to play after school because I have to help my mother with chores. My father is a shopkeeper and my favorite subject is math. My biggest challenge in life is that I belong to a family where educating a girl is not considered important. None of my cousins are in school. They stay at home, help with housework and look after their siblings."

"My teachers say that I have more confidence after I was declared the winner of the competition; however, my father told me he would not allow my sister and I to continue attending school next year because there are boys in the class. The teachers at my school are working very hard to find a solution with my family so that I can stay in school. I hope that my classmates and I get the opportunity to complete our education and fulfill our potential so that we can help our families and our communities. In the future, I want to earn a Master's degree and then teach and reach out to girls in my community who do not have access to education."

About the Summiya Scarf

"When designing the scarf, I knew I wanted to create something different. I also wanted to win the competition so I put my heart into creating the design. Since blue is my favorite color, I used it as the base and white for the design. I am proud that my design was selected for the scarf and that my name is part of it." 

The Summiya Scarf was produced in a collaboration between the Marshall Direct Fund and Waypoint Goods. It can be styled dozens of different ways and is a travel scarf, which means that it has a secret zipper pocket to store your keys, chapstick, money, phone, etc. 

 

Pen Pal Exchange

Members of the Power to Pakistan club in Aspen, Colorado, participated in a pen pal exchange with the Pakistani students at this school, including Summiya, with the goal of reducing cultural stereotypes.

 

SUMMIYA'S PEN PAL LETTERS

 

About Power to Pakistan

Power to Pakistan helps girls in Pakistan, just like Summiya, receive an education, no matter their circumstances. We are a non-profit advocacy club at Aspen High School and we aim to provide access to education for youth in rural areas of Pakistan in order to eliminate generational poverty, build gender equity, and support students to have better futures. This club supports the sister organization to the Marshall Direct Fund, Moqah Foundation, whose mission is to educate youth, empower women, and mobilize communities. Power to Pakistan fundraises money to support youth, mostly girls, with scholarships to attend school for free in rural areas of Pakistan.

Power to Pakistan was created to give these girls the future that they deserve and a purpose in life through education. In Pakistan, more than 22 million children are out of school (Human Rights Watch), which is approximately the population of Beijing! We believe it is unfair that children in Pakistan are being denied an education because of their gender, socioeconomic statuses, or accessibility to schools. By providing girls with an education, they become employable which can provide income for their families and support them to have stronger roles in their communities. An education is important in children’s lives because it establishes a sense of purpose, especially for girls who have been underrepresented in the past due to their inability to attend school. Other outcomes of girls' education include delaying early forced marriages, providing youth with the tools to resist extremist recruitment, keeping students out of full time forced labor, and preventing youth trafficking. Power to Pakistan was established to support these youth to reach their goals and fulfill their dreams.

More Information

To Donate More Click Here

Visit Power to Pakistan's Website

Visit Moqah Foundation's Website

Video Music: https://www.bensound.com

story:
Below is a really working prototype (not a simulation)

We know that some backers are now afraid to support crowdfunding campaigns following the recent failure of massively overfunded projects. We assure you that we are fully ready and experienced. We have chosen a fixed amount that is dimensioned to be able to fulfill all the stages of the production process. Moreover, even if theSportGPS campaign and product were ready, we have postponed our campaign during more than 8 months in order to double check all the stages. We are waiting to receive your support and ready to give you back a great sport watch.

theSportGPS will free you from your smartphone during workout.

  • GPS powered multi-sports chronometer watch

  • Music Player (MP3) with standard mini-jack earphones

  • Voice coaching messages (while listening to your music !)

  • Autonomous (you don't need to bring your smartphone)

  • POI map + tracking + workout history

  • Sunlight readable screen + water resistant


theSportGPS watch rather than an application?

The question is legitimate. Why buy a GPS sport watch instead of just download an application ?

  • First answer, everyone does not want to be burdened by a phone during workout. Of course it is possible to store it in a pocket or use an armband, but this is clearly not what is the most comfortable for a long run.

  • Also, a Smartphone screen is mostly illegible, the moisture invades the armband quickly, it is almost impossible to control the application because the touch screen function provides erratic and random behavior. Not to mention the weather conditions that may put a strain on the Smartphone while our watch does not fear the elements.

  • Moreover, thesportGPS watch has the great advantage of being worn on the wrist and therefore information could be watched easily even during exercise.
    And that's may be the main benefit in comparison to an application whose interest is frankly more to post-analyze a workout session. Besides, use a GPS sport watch keeps your hands free, the key metrics on the screen are readable even in bright sunlight and the watch parameters setup is easily accessible at any time.
  • We may also mention the vocal coach, it allows to receive performance information while listening to the music without even having to look at the watch screen. Last but not least argument for the watch dedicated to runners is its ability to offer a long battery operation time rather than an application that drains quickly the Smartphone battery by the extensive use of GPS.

Workout in music!

Two riders on three are training in music. Despite this, the music player function is not available on the majority of runners' watches. Too bad for an accessory that claims to rid you of your Smartphone during workout.

Only theSportGPS has a large 16GB memory thus, it can store more than 2000 songs in MP3, more than enough for any running session. You have only to connect earphones directly into the standard jack and voila, no need for expensive Bluetooth earphones. If practicing sport with music and without a Smartphone is your main criterion, the choice is quickly made with theSportGPS that has no rival.

little tip: theSportGPS can also be your flash drive to store your secret documents

Set a track and follow it with theSportGPS!

This is one of the highlights of theSportGPS watch, the application that lets a user configures the watch on a PC, also lets him to capture positions on a map and so creates a track of points of interest which then will draw a visible path on the screen of the watch along with the position of the athlete.

theSportGPS companion software tool:

A lot of options to customize your sport gps.

theSportGPS in the News...



Why a Crowdfunding Campaign?

Because we want this to be a chance to meet our community and give them such  awesome deals during this campaign; theSportGPS will be available in the retail in September 2016 at $199.

Our goal is to raise $250,000 in order to launch the tooling and to pay for the cost of everything that's needed to produce theSportGPS watch. The donations you give us will be used to fund the molding, casting, production, packaging and shipping of the product. Our main goal during the development was to build the world first real "All-in-One" revolutionary sportwatch.

In return, you will get the coolest and most unique sport watch & MP3 player! With your help, we'll be able to make these sport watch as high quality as possible.

What you will receive

  • theSportGPS will offer incredible discounts during this campaign
  • Super Early Bird perks start at $99 (compared to $199 in the retail)

  • Early Bird perks start at $119 (compared to $199 in the retail)

  • Backers will be the FIRST in the World to wear theSportGPS from End of June 2016 (compared to September 2016 in the retail)

  • Disclaimer: Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

About Us

theSportGPS team is a group of smart hardware and software engineers rich in energy and full of innovative spirit. The Company is based in USA and South Korea and have a long experience in the GPS devices industry.

Our software engineers have worked with complicated projects and businesses and had hands-on experience on the development of Sport GPS as well as in the automotive market.


Risks & Challenges

We have fully functional prototypes of theSportGPS and we have a team of smart engineers in USA and in South Korea - who are working around the clock to ensure that we can build a great product and deliver it on time. However, like many crowdfunding projects, there are a number of risks and challenges that we need to mitigate before we can get theSportGPS to each one of you. We would like to keep you informed of these potential pitfalls and what we are doing to circumvent them. As our early supporters already know, we have postponed our crowdfunding campaign for some months because we wanted to be really ready and don't reproduce what unfortunately many other companies did because of products not well designed and developed.

               


First off, there are risks associated with the manufacturing of any hardware product. A tremendous amount of effort will be expended to ensure that the assembly line can produce theSportGPS reliably. Fortunately, we have forged great working and personal relationships with our manufacturing partners to ensure that the manufacturing process will happen smoothly.

Secondly, there are risks associated with the logistics to physically deliver theSportGPS to you. But, we assure you that we are prepared  with our fulfillment partners to ensure speedy and reliable delivery of theSportGPS into your hands.

Last but not least, we want you to know this: what we value the most is our relationship with you, our supporters. As a result, you have our word that we will remain completely transparent and keep you in the loop every step of the way.


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you just can't contribute with a perk, that doesn't mean you can't help us:

  • Spread the news to all your relatives, friends and co-workers and everyone that theSportGPS Indiegogo campaign is alive!
  • Feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thanks to all of you in advance :-)


Specifications

Processor :

ARM - Cortex-M3

Sensors :

High precision Advanced GPS with multi-constellation support (GPS - Glonass), Accelerometer

Memory :

16GB available for MP3 music tracks, sport activity tracking, personal data (used as a flash memory drive)

Battery Life :

6 hours (GPS and MP3 player active with average use)

7 hours (GPS active with average use)

14 hours (MP3 player / GPS inactive with average use)

6 days in Watch mode (GPS inactive and MP3 player inactive with average use)

Recharging time to 100% : 3 hours

Display :

Sunlight readable low power high-resolution Memory LCD 1.28 inch (128 x 128 pixels)
Display informations include :
Time (12 or 24 hours... like a watch !), Battery Status, Charging, GPS status, Duration-Time Elapsed, Average Pace, Instant Pace, Stopwatch Chronometer, Calories, Distance, History, Laps, Latitude-Longitude, Altitude, POI map and user location, Backlight.

IPX6 - Water and Sweat Resistance

Connectors :

1 earphones standard mini-jack 3.5mm connector

1 micro-USB adaptor / flash memory drive mode and battery recharging

In the Box :

  • The Sport GPS smart-watch device
  • Belt clip
  • 3.5mm jack to micro-USB adaptor
  • USB to micro-USB cable (recharge and Windows computer synch.)
  • Quick start guide

On www.thesportgps.com :

  • TheSportGPS User software tool for Windows powered PC
  • The Sport GPS MP3 player smart watch Manual


FAQ
Frequently Asked Questions

  • Who is this product made for?

    The sport GPS is a watch made with outdoor sports needs in mind. It will help you to see your performance while training and give you all the tools to see your progress. You will also be able to upload your results into all the popular exercise tracking web applications so you can share and compare with others. Your complete workout history is kept inside the device.
    The Sport GPS will also make your workouts more pleasant with its unique music player using a standard earphone connector. In this configuration you will also enjoy hearing your progress through the voice of the built-in coach.

  • Why should I use it?

    The Sport GPS gives you a comprehensive picture of your sport activities during and after your workouts by keeping all your history.
    By listening to your favorite music while training, it will be more pleasant to go longer and farther.

  • How is the sport GPS is better than a smartwatch like the recent Apple Watch or Samsung smartwatch for outdoor sports?

    The question is more, would you like to take your expensive, fragile and bulky smartphone with you while exercising?
    Apple Watch and other smartwatches are smartphone "slaves". They are not able to work if they are not connected to your smartphone.
    The Sport GPS is an autonomous GPS sport watch and MP3 player that needs nothing but itself to give you all the information you desire in order to see what you accomplished in your workout. Train with music using standard earphones through the 3.5mm connector.

  • Is TheSportGPS a fitness tracker?

    Fitness trackers on the market today are just evolved cousins of the pedometers from yesteryear.
    Though they could be used even inside buildings, they are not providing really accurate measurerements for outdoor workouts. Many of them need a companion application running on a smartphone or a Web site to give you performance figures, whereas TheSportGPS is fully autonomous and provides much more accurate results.

  • Does it count steps?

    No, it actually measures your real distance using much more accurate GPS Technology.

  • Where can I buy it?

    The first items will be made available through a crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo starting February 24th 2016.

  • Isn't it not too big for my wrist? (What are the dimensions?)

    It's a really tiny and light product. (35x64x13mm)

  • I use Runtastic, Strava, MapMyRun... on my iPhone today, how easily can I switch to using TheSportsGPS?

    Very easily. All your workout data files are exportable as GPS Exchange Format (.GPX) or TCX files. This format is fully supported by all applications such as Runtastic, Strava, Runkeeper and so on.

  • Can I read the screen in sunlight?

    Yes, this is one of the key features of the sport GPS together with the POI map and the MP3 player. Our screen technology offers even better visibility in sunlight in comparison to other commonly used display technologies.
    This makes a big difference when you compare our sport watch with a smartphone or many other sport devices that have, hard to read screens in sunlight.

  • What data does TheSportGPS show?

    The Sport GPS shows : Time, Duration, Distance, Speed and Pace (instant, maximum and average), Calories, Lap, Goal, Elevation, Latitude, Longitude, POI map and Position... all in Imperial or Metric.
    Most of the displayed information can also be heard through the voice coach.
    The sport GPS watch has four screen layouts - one for the chronometer data, a second one for the music player, and one for Historical data, and finally, one for the key user rules setup.

  • Can I customize what data is displayed on the screen?

    Between all the information provided by the Sport GPS you can select which one you want to see and in which order. You can also decide which ones to receive voice messages for simply by using the "TheSportGPS" user tools software on a PC with MS Windows. (Mac OS support in preparation)

  • Many sport watches have a touchscreen and The Sport GPS has six buttons, Why?

    As an outdoor device, The Sport GPS should be fully functional even if your fingers are sweaty or when it is rainy.
    Touch screens don't work correctly in such conditions. That's why we have designed the sport GPS with six buttons and a TAP action User Interface.
    Navigation between screens and functions are as easy as up-down / left-right / start-stop / okay-cancel actions.

  • Does TheSportGPS have a backlight in order to be usable for night workout?

    Yes. TheSportGPS has a bright sunlight display and has a backlight for your night time workouts.

  • What music formats can it play?

    The sport GPS music player supports WAVE (.wav) and MPEG Layer 3 (.mp3) file formats. (and soon we will add other formats like Advanced Audio Coding (.AAC)

  • How many songs can I store on it?

    You could store as many songs as your Sport GPS is able to store in its SD-card memory up to as huge as 65,535 music files.

  • Is it easy to change music?

    To import music into the Sport GPS you just have to "drag and drop" on the Sport GPS flash disk. And like any other files, paste or delete to add or remove a song in your sport watch.

  • Can I change the language of the voice messages?

    The first ready product will be delivered with English voice messages and interface. Quickly after, the sport GPS will support a large set of languages with a simple update of The Sport GPS watch's internal software

  • Does it have a map built-in?

    Not a map as in a navigation product. But, using our user tools you could create POIs on a Google style map and create a track. That POIs and track will be visible on your screen at the same time of your current geographical position. And you can still use the GPS to find your direction to "home".

  • How accurate is the GPS?

    Very accurate as the sport GPS watch uses the latest GPS technologies such as multiconstellation coverage and A-GPS. Of course, as with any GPS device you should have a view of the sky to be able to receive the satellites' signal.

  • How does TheSportGPS connect to a GPS signal so quickly?

    We've done some magic! We are using Advanced-GPS technology. We recommend that you connect your SportGPS periodically to the USB port of your computer and run the user tool (minimum once a month). It will automatically update the A-GPS data in order to provide you a quick GPS fix.

  • Does TheSportGPS watch work indoors?

    GPS is an outdoor technology. However, the stopwatch and music player functions work indoors.

  • Do I need a PC or Mac to download data? (Will there be dedicated software needed?)

    The Sport GPS is provided with a companion user application running currently on a PC with Windows. We are preparing the Mac OS version. The Sport GPS is like a Flash disk when connected to any computer on the USB port which allows you to copy and paste your music files on any platform.

  • How do I create a POI?

    A Point Of Interest (POI) is entered in the device from the user software map screen. A track can have up to 30 POIs. Tracks you have created can be saved or exported in Keyhole Markup Language (.KML) file format so you can share them with others or store for later use.

  • Can I download POI's?

    Yes, you should convert them in Keyhole Markup Language (.KML) format and then import them to your device. If you have more than 30 POIs, only the first 30 will be taken into account.
    To do so, you could use a free software like Google Earth.

  • Can it track elevation too?

    Yes, altitude data is available like your latitude and longitude. It's also recorded in the track file.

  • Is my "TheSportGPS" water resistant ?

    TheSportGPS is water resistant, meaning it can sustain sweat and rain.

  • How do I update internal software of my TheSportGPS device (firmware)?

    Updates for your TheSportGPS are available through the companion software. The software installed on your computer will periodically check for a new update and will install it automatically and refresh A-GPS data as needed.

  • Can I get the strap in different colors?

    Yes, we will offer different colors and straps will be available as one of the accessories on our Web shop

  • What is theSportGPS social networks hashtag?

    Very simple, our hashtag is: #theSportGPS
story_txt:
Below is a really working prototype (not a simulation)We know that some backers are now afraid to support crowdfunding campaigns following the recent failure of massively overfunded projects. We assure you that we are fully ready and experienced. We have chosen a fixed amount that is dimensioned to be able to fulfill all the stages of the production process. Moreover, even if theSportGPS campaign and product were ready, we have postponed our campaign during more than 8 months in order to double check all the stages. We are waiting to receive your support and ready to give you back a great sport watch.theSportGPS will free you from your smartphone during workout.


GPS powered multi-sports chronometer watch




Music Player (MP3) with standard mini-jack earphones




Voice coaching messages (while listening to your music !)



Autonomous (you don't need to bring your smartphone)





POI map + tracking + workout history




Sunlight readable screen + water resistant





theSportGPS watch rather than an application?
The
question is legitimate. Why buy a GPS sport watch instead of just download an
application ?
First
answer, everyone does not want to be burdened by a phone during workout. Of
course it is possible to store it in a pocket or use an armband, but this is
clearly not what is the most comfortable for a long run.
Also, a Smartphone screen is mostly illegible, the moisture invades the armband quickly, it is
almost impossible to control the application because the touch screen function
provides erratic and random behavior. Not to mention the weather conditions
that may put a strain on the Smartphone while our watch does not fear the
elements.


Moreover,
thesportGPS watch has the great advantage of being worn on the wrist and
therefore information could be watched easily even during exercise.And that's
may be the main benefit in comparison to an application whose interest is
frankly more to post-analyze a workout session. Besides, use a GPS sport watch
keeps your hands free, the key metrics on the screen are readable even in
bright sunlight and the watch parameters setup is easily accessible at any
time. 
We may also mention the vocal coach, it allows to receive performance
information while listening to the music without even having to look at the
watch screen. Last but not least argument for the watch dedicated to runners is
its ability to offer a long battery operation time rather than an application
that drains quickly the Smartphone battery by the extensive use of GPS.




Workout in music!
Two
riders on three are training in music. Despite this, the music player function
is not available on the majority of runners' watches. Too bad for an accessory
that claims to rid you of your Smartphone during workout.

Only
theSportGPS has a large 16GB memory thus, it can store more than
2000 songs in MP3, more than enough for any running session. You have only to
connect earphones directly into the standard jack and voila, no need for
expensive Bluetooth earphones. If practicing sport with music and without a Smartphone is your main criterion, the choice is quickly made with theSportGPS that has no rival.little tip: theSportGPS can also be your flash drive to store your secret documents


Set a track and follow it with theSportGPS!

This
is one of the highlights of theSportGPS watch, the application that lets a user
configures the watch on a PC, also lets him to capture positions on a map and
so creates a track of points of interest which then will draw a visible path on
the screen of the watch along with the position of the athlete.theSportGPS companion software tool:A lot of options to customize your sport gps.
theSportGPS in the News...
Why a
Crowdfunding Campaign?



Because we want this to be a chance to meet our community and give them such  awesome deals during this campaign; theSportGPS will be available in the retail in September 2016 at $199.
Our goal is to raise $250,000 in order to launch
the tooling and to pay for the cost of everything that's needed to produce theSportGPS watch. The donations you give us will be used to fund the molding, 
casting, production, packaging and shipping of the product. Our main 
goal during the development was to build the world first real "All-in-One" revolutionary sportwatch.
In return, you will get the coolest and most unique sport watch & MP3 player! With your help, we'll be 
able to make these sport watch as high quality as possible.
What you will receive
 

theSportGPS will offer incredible discounts during this campaign
Super Early Bird perks start at $99 (compared to $199 in the
     retail)
Early Bird perks start at $119 (compared to $199 in the
     retail)
Backers will be the FIRST in the World to wear theSportGPS from End of June 2016 (compared to September 2016 in the retail)
Disclaimer: Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best
efforts and not guaranteed. 





About
Us




theSportGPS team is a group of smart hardware and software engineers rich in energy and full of innovative spirit.
 The Company is based in USA and South Korea and have a long experience in the GPS devices industry.



Our software engineers have worked with complicated projects and businesses and had hands-on experience on the development of Sport GPS as well as in the automotive market.



Risks & Challenges

  We have fully functional prototypes of theSportGPS and we have a team of smart engineers in USA and in South Korea - who are working around the clock to ensure that we can build a great product and deliver it on time. However, like many crowdfunding projects, there are a number of risks and challenges that we need to mitigate before we can get theSportGPS to each one of you. We would like to keep you informed of these potential pitfalls and what we are doing to circumvent them. As our early supporters already know, we have postponed our crowdfunding campaign for some months because we wanted to be really ready and don't reproduce what unfortunately many other companies did because of products not well designed and developed.                
First off, there are risks associated with the manufacturing of any hardware product. A tremendous amount of effort will be expended to ensure that the assembly line can produce theSportGPS reliably. Fortunately, we have forged great working and personal relationships with our manufacturing partners to ensure that the manufacturing process will happen smoothly.Secondly, there are risks associated with the logistics to physically deliver theSportGPS to you. But, we assure you that we are prepared  with our fulfillment partners to ensure speedy and reliable delivery of theSportGPS into your hands.Last but not least, we want you to know this: what we value the most is our relationship with you, our supporters. As a result, you have our word that we will remain completely transparent and keep you in the loop every step of the way.

  Other Ways You Can Help Even if you just can't contribute with a perk, that doesn't mean you can't help us:  Spread the news to all your relatives, friends and co-workers and everyone that theSportGPS Indiegogo campaign is alive! Feel free to use the Indiegogo share tools!   
Thanks to all of you in advance :-)

Specifications

Processor :
ARM - Cortex-M3
Sensors :
High precision Advanced GPS with multi-constellation support (GPS - Glonass), Accelerometer
Memory :
16GB available for MP3 music tracks, sport activity tracking, personal data (used as a flash memory drive)
Battery Life :
6 hours (GPS and MP3 player active with average use)
7 hours (GPS active with average use)
14 hours (MP3 player / GPS inactive with average use)
6 days in Watch mode (GPS inactive and MP3 player inactive with average use)
Recharging time to 100% : 3 hours
Display :
Sunlight readable low power high-resolution Memory LCD 1.28 inch (128 x 128 pixels)
                Display informations include :
                Time (12 or 24 hours... like a watch !), Battery Status, Charging, GPS status, Duration-Time Elapsed, Average Pace, Instant Pace, Stopwatch Chronometer, Calories, Distance, History, Laps, Latitude-Longitude, Altitude, POI map and user location, Backlight.
IPX6 - Water and Sweat Resistance

Connectors :
1 earphones standard mini-jack 3.5mm connector
1 micro-USB adaptor / flash memory drive mode and battery recharging
In the Box :

The Sport GPS smart-watch device
Belt clip
3.5mm jack to micro-USB adaptor
USB to micro-USB cable (recharge and Windows computer synch.)
Quick start guide

On www.thesportgps.com :

TheSportGPS User software tool for Windows powered PC
The Sport GPS MP3 player smart watch Manual

                        The sport GPS is a watch made with outdoor sports needs in mind. It will help you to see your performance while training and give you all the tools to see your progress. You will also be able to upload your results into all the popular exercise tracking web applications so you can share and compare with others. Your complete workout history is kept inside the device.The Sport GPS will also make your workouts more pleasant with its unique music player using a standard earphone connector. In this configuration you will also enjoy hearing your progress through the voice of the built-in coach.
                        



Why should I use it?


                        The Sport GPS gives you a comprehensive picture of your sport activities during and after your workouts by keeping all your history.By listening to your favorite music while training, it will be more pleasant to go longer and farther.
                        



How is the sport GPS is better than a smartwatch like the recent Apple Watch or Samsung smartwatch for outdoor sports?


                        The question is more, would you like to take your expensive, fragile and bulky smartphone with you while exercising?Apple Watch and other smartwatches are smartphone "slaves". They are not able to work if they are not connected to your smartphone.The Sport GPS is an autonomous GPS sport watch and MP3 player that needs nothing but itself to give you all the information you desire in order to see what you accomplished in your workout. Train with music using standard earphones through the 3.5mm connector.

                        Fitness trackers on the market today are just evolved cousins of the pedometers from yesteryear.Though they could be used even inside buildings, they are not providing really accurate measurerements for outdoor workouts. Many of them need a companion application running on a smartphone or a Web site to give you performance figures, whereas TheSportGPS is fully autonomous and provides much more accurate results.

                        No, it actually measures your real distance using much more accurate GPS Technology.

The first items will be made available through a crowdfunding campaign on Indiegogo starting February 24th 2016.

It's a really tiny and light product. (35x64x13mm)

Nico and Engue, two ambitious Montpelliérains invented the concept of Brasure, and it has now been a year since they began working on it.

Son design est étudié pour un effet ultra push-up (même sur les petites poitrines) et procure un décolleté extraordinaire. Un effet qui vous permettra aussi une meilleure pratique de la mazophallation... 

Brasure se porte dans toutes les situations, et sous tous types de vêtements. Un confort digne des lingeries haute couture ! Le guide quant à lui, est invisible sous les vêtements et s'intègre parfaitement au soutien gorge.​

Le guide (permettant de maintenir la verge) est équipé d'un dispositif recouvert d'un matériau glissant et élastique totalement hypoallergénique. Il permet ainsi une excellente glisse !!! Le système a été breveté et testé. Pour votre plus grand plaisir ...

" Nous avons utilisé Brasure lors d’une de nos date night et ma compagne m’avait fait la surprise. J’avais remarqué que son décolleté était magnifique, mais je n’étais pas au courant de ce que c’était. Lors du repas, elle m’a avoué ce qu’elle portait et j’avoue que j’étais très pressé de rentrer à la maison… La suite fut à la hauteur de nos espérances."

"J’ai proposé à mon ami d’essayer Brasure, en lui expliquant ce que c’était. Il a tout de suite été emballé. J’ai réalisé un strip-tease devant lui pour bien démarrer la soirée, puis nous nous sommes rapprochés. Le jeu avec le soutien gorge est venu tout naturellement et de manière très sensuelle, pas du tout forcée. Nous en avons discuté après, nous sommes tous les deux d’accord, ce fut un moment merveilleux de plaisir partagé et très excitant. "

"Nous avons entendu parler de Brasure, nous étions en quête de nouvelles expériences. C’est donc tout naturellement que nous avons essayé. Nous nous sommes beaucoup amusés. C’était très fun de rigoler avec cette nouvelle pratique. Les sensations étaient très intenses, mais surtout nous nous sommes sentis très proches."

          

 

Nicolas & Enguerrand, deux Montpelliérains ambitieux, ont inventé le concept Brasure et voilà maintenant un an qu'ils y travaillent.

Se basant respectivement sur des expériences et des études concrètes, Brasure est né et évolue avant tout pour la satisfaction totale de ses utilisateurs-trices.

Créateurs du premier soutien-gorge sextoy, Nicolas et Enguerrand sont aujourd'hui fiers de vous proposer un produit abouti et soigneusement conçu. Ils comptent sur vous pour que l'aventure continue !

 

          

 

RISKS AND CHALENGES // RISQUES ET DÉFIS

Our team is composed of business leaders and experienced project managers.

They have already completed many successful projects.

The model proposed here was made with great care by a French expert for several decades. The parties in this project have already been identified, namely, raw material suppliers and converters for the manufacturing part.

For financing, communication, marketing parts we have attached ourselves to the services of a team :

- An expert in institutional funding

- An expert in crowdfunding

- A community manager

- A bank broker

- A business lawyer

- A specialised patent design office

We have funded all the work done so far. So we took all the risks, and we can already say that if you make this campaign a success we can provide counterparts within two months.

Suppliers and manufacturers  have been identified as existing international businesses for many years with solid reputations.

We are perfectionists and we have done our homework. Therefore the risk is minimal.

Brasure is already the subject of a patent, financed from our own funds.

What you see are the prototypes, you can expect that the final result is beyond your expectations in terms of quality, once passed by the manufacturing process.

This process has already been carefully prepared by our design office who has extensive experience in large-scale manufacturing lingerie models.

We must not forget that the purpose of such a creation is a large-scale manufacturing, everything was figured from the beginning for this.

We have worked with all the partners before and have set aside time for output and fulfillment. We have also gone through multiple prototypes and testing on the bra, and feel confident that the product we are presenting is one you will love.

We studied in detail the quantity that we can offer and at which prices, to be certain of being able to provide counterparts within the deadlines.

//

 

Notre équipe est composée de chefs d’entreprise et de chefs de projets chevronnés.

Ils ont déjà réalisé de nombreux projets avec succès.

Le modèle proposé ici a été réalisé avec le plus grand soin par un bureau d’étude français expert depuis plusieurs dizaines d’années. Les différents intervenants dans ce projet ont d’ores et déjà été identifiés, à savoir, les fournisseurs de matières premières et les façonniers, pour la partie industrialisation.

Pour les parties financements, communication, commercialisation, nous nous sommes attachés les services d’une équipe composée : 
- D’un expert en financement institutionnel 
- D’un expert en financement participatif 
- D’un community manager 
- D’un courtier en banque 
- D’un avocat d’affaire 
- D’un bureau d’étude spécialisé en brevet

Nous avons financé sur nos fonds propres tout le travail réalisé jusqu’à présent. Nous avons donc pris tous les risques, et nous pouvons déjà affirmer que si vous faîtes de cette campagne un succès nous pourrons fournir les contre-parties dans un délai de 2 mois. 
Les fournisseurs et les façonniers identifiés sont des entreprises internationales existant depuis de nombreuses années avec de solides réputations. 
Nous sommes perfectionnistes et nous avons fait nos devoirs. C’est pourquoi le risque est minimal. 
Brasure fait déjà l’objet d’un brevet, financé sur nos fonds propres.

Ce que vous voyez sont des prototypes, vous pouvez vous attendre à ce que le résultat final soit au-delà de vos espérances en terme de qualité, une fois passé par le processus industriel.

Ce processus a déjà été soigneusement préparé par notre bureau d’étude (lors de la conception de l’ensemble) qui possède une grande expérience dans l’industrialisation à grande échelle de modèle de lingerie. 
Il ne faut pas oublier que le but d’une telle création est la fabrication à grande échelle, tout a donc été pensé depuis le début pour cela.

Nous avons étudié avec minutie les quantités que nous pouvons vous proposer et à quels prix, afin d’être certains d’être en capacité de fournir les contreparties dans les délais imposés.

 

EXCHANGE POLICY

If you follow the sizing chart carefully, then your brasure shall fit you just fine. Still, if you wish to exchange your Brasure for any reason, we will allow you to do that, but you’ll have to pay for the two way shipping. As we are just starting up and offering our Brasure at highly discounted prices on indiegogo, we won’t be able to accept returns.

SHIPPING NOTE

All orders are shipped out in unmarked boxes with no references to the contents inside. Not a name, not even the word 'sextoy' or « lingerie » - completely discreet.

Please note that shipping to any country outside North America and Europe may be delayed or cancelled depending on the feasibility of local product approval requirements or local import regulations. This is a global launch, and we will ship according to the agreement made here on Indiegogo. However, there may be additional duties, fees or taxes raised by the authorities in your country. You will need to take care of them yourself when receiving the shipment.

Nous en avons discuté après, nous sommes tous les deux d’accord, ce fut un moment merveilleux de plaisir partagé et très excitant. "
"Nous avons entendu parler de Brasure, nous étions en quête de nouvelles expériences. C’est donc tout naturellement que nous avons essayé. Nous nous sommes beaucoup amusés. C’était très fun de rigoler avec cette nouvelle pratique. Les sensations étaient très intenses, mais surtout nous nous sommes sentis très proches."

          

 
Nicolas & Enguerrand, deux Montpelliérains ambitieux, ont inventé le concept Brasure et voilà maintenant un an qu'ils y travaillent.
Se basant respectivement sur des expériences et des études concrètes, Brasure est né et évolue avant tout pour la satisfaction totale de ses utilisateurs-trices.
Créateurs du premier soutien-gorge sextoy, Nicolas et Enguerrand sont aujourd'hui fiers de vous proposer un produit abouti et soigneusement conçu. Ils comptent sur vous pour que l'aventure continue !

story:
The story behind the equiMedpak

Having been around horses all my life I know the stress injured horses can cause their owners. Dealing with an injury quickly and efficiently can make all the difference, especially with a serious bleed.

Through research of equine first aid kits on the market we believe there is  nothing that properly meets the modern horse owner's needs. This provided the inspiration for the equiMedPak.

The equiMedpak has been specifically designed with the equestrian owner in mind; Simplicity, accessibility, practicality and cleanliness when dealing with an emergency.

The equiMedPak design

The team have worked over for over a year on a succession of designs and prototypes for the pack. These started with the simple drawings below, to several working prototypes, refining and improving at every stage.


3D Designs "equiMedpak" Stages of development

Every owner's nightmare is the dreadful fear of suddenly finding their horse sick or injured either in a field, stable, in transit or even while out at a show and consequently having to take urgent action until the vet arrives. I am sure all equestrian owners can identify with exactly what I am talking about and know in the extreme emergencies time is of the essence which is why this specially designed backpack is fully kitted with all the emergency items, ensuring owners have everything they require. The design of the bag in itself gives users reassurance. Strong, durable and waterproof it safeguards the contents in the bag from the elements. Being a backpack it allows the user to carry the bag safely and with ease allowing hands to remain free, a real advantage if you're on your own and having to lead a horse to safety.

The front pouch unzips and folds out revealing an array of strong storage solutions which hold our first aid items firmly in place, giving the user a clear view of the items on display with easy access to take them out and put back faster in the event of an emergency. This also ensures the items never get damaged or lost.

The middle section of the bag holds more veterinary items and allows the user to add items of their own choice.



Latest Prototype:

Storage holders for all the important veterinary items



The equiMedPak veterinary Kit consists of:

Vet Wrap x 2

SoffBan x 2

Petroleum Jelly Tube x 1

Intrasite Gel x 1

Saline solution pods x 3

Poultice x 1

Melolin dry dressing x 1

Roll of cotton wool x 1

Roll of Gamgee x 1

Roll of Duct Tape x 1

500ml Iodine

500ml antibacterial solution

Scissors

Digital Thermometer

1 pair of Latex gloves

Hoof Pick

Syringe

Collapsible bowl

Head Torch

Portable Mobile Phone Charger

Rider First Aid

Antiseptic wipes

Hand sanitizer

A selection of plasters

Gauze bandage


Special features built into the design:


Grommet allowing access to the portable mobile phone charger. The user can either charge their mobile phone in the relative safety of the pouch, or thread through the USB lead to allow the phone to be charged while talking hands free to the vet


High visibility florescent strips which are located on the front of the bag and straps.

Strong handle positioned on top of the bag

Hang in the Tack Room

Hang inside the Horsebox

On the outer sides of the backpack are located two bottle holders designed to prevent spilling the contents on the floor due to uneven ground or the horse knocking it over!

Metal zips to allow the user to use a padlock if required to keep the contents secured

Easy access to all your emergency items

Hands free allowing the owner to walk the horse back to the yard safely.

Easy, comfortable fit while riding allowing trail riders to take emergency veterinary items with them while on long distance rides!

Don't miss out on the EARLY BIRD DEALS once they are gone they are gone!
    • £25 you receive the equiMedPak bag without contents plus have your name inscribed on the Wall of Fame
    • £50 you receive 1 fully equipped equiMedPak (Saving £35 of retail value) plus have your name inscribed on the Wall of Fame
    • £100 you receive 2 fully equipped equiMedPak's (Saving £70 of retail value) get an additional 2 Vetwraps and 2 Soffban, have your name inscribed on the Wall of Fame plus a special edition Thank You T.Shirt for supporting the product

    See who has given the thumbs up for the equiMedPak!

The whole team at Direct Equine Group are firmly behind endorsing this intuitive and much needed product. It's well designed, and has pretty much everything that you would need in an emergency. Every yard needs one. We will certainly be getting ours ordered as soon as they become available. We will also make sure that our entire global database gets to hear about it.

Good luck – Ross Jago MD Direct Equine Group

Ross Jago

Managing Director – Direct Equine Group

ross@directequine.com

www.directequine.com


The RVC used our product drawings during one of their clinic talks to equine owners on First Aid, wounds and treatments back in June and expressed what a great idea the product is.

"What a fantastic idea this is! Am well proud of Mandy Hall for thinking of it and designing it! How many of us have been in the field trying to deal with a horse and our hands are full. And then whilst you are struggling in the field your mobile starts running out of charge yet you need to call the Vet. I love that this rucksack allows you to charge your phone in it also!! An innovative piece of kit but Mandy needs people to help back the project to get it off the ground. Can you pledge an amount to get this kit off the ground. Check out the pledges because for just £50 you support the project and get a kit to use. For £15 you get a portable mobile phone charger and support the project. But every little helps so if you can only spare a £1 - it will all help. Lets get this great piece of kit out there in the field! Sue Burton Sanctuary Founder & Manager REMUS MEMORIAL HORSE SANCTUARY" Formed in 1983 to provide lifetime help and care for horses, donkeys & other large farm animals, who are victims of physical or mental abuse, be it as a result of ignorance or malicious intent. Visit our website: www.remussanctuary.org Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RemusHorseSanctuary Subscribe to our monthly e-newsletter: http://eepurl.com/TvmYv

International Dressage Rider Simon Coccoza

"The Equine Friendly First Aid backpack is a brilliant idea. It would stop me having to fish around to find things when timing matters and with the benefits of a phone charger and being a handy backpack, it becomes one of those tools that you wondered how you did without. Love it". Visconte Cocozza - Rider and Trainer of La Fédération Française d'Equitation
Gina McKnight International Blogger. inamc.blogspot.co.uk/2015/03/equine-wellbeing-friendly-first-aid.html?m=1

The equiMedPak timescale

Timescales: Shipping to backers March 2016

WHY PLEDGE ON THE EQUINE FRIENDLY FIRST AID BACKPACK?  

EWBM studied the functionality of the equine first aid kits on the market and found that they only catered for a limited amount of items as well as being unpractical in case of an emergency. There was a need for a kit that could be both practical as well as functional including being hygienic. 

Let's make it happen!

Supporters like you play such a vital role getting us to where we need to be. The equiMedPak is a small product, but with your help we can make a big impact on the world of equine wellbeing; it is the perfect modern solution to how we have traditionally used our first aid kits. Of course, making and delivering the product the right way requires resources. Your help with this campaign will allow us to manufacture in sufficient volumes to keep prices low and quality high. As we gear up to start production we want to make sure that the product we deliver isn't just 100% perfect, but 110% great! Come and join us for this next exciting step at turning the idea, design and prototypes into reality!

Risks and challenges

Every effort is being made to cover eventualities, from production through to delivery to you. As a business we always endeavour to supply on time, but if any factors outside our control such as manufacturing or shipping delays occur, we will ensure all those who pledged will be notified. Our aim is not only to produce a unique product but also to give our backers the care and attention they deserve.

Sue Burton Sanctuary Founder & Manager REMUS MEMORIAL HORSE SANCTUARY" Formed in 1983 to provide lifetime help and care for horses, donkeys & other large farm animals, who are victims of physical or mental abuse, be it as a result of ignorance or malicious intent. Visit our website: www.remussanctuary.org Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RemusHorseSanctuary Subscribe to our monthly e-newsletter: http://eepurl.com/TvmYv


International Dressage Rider Simon Coccoza

"The Equine Friendly First Aid backpack is a brilliant idea. It would stop me having to fish around to find things when timing matters and with the benefits of a phone charger and being a handy backpack, it becomes one of those tools that you wondered how you did without. Love it". Visconte Cocozza - Rider and Trainer of La Fédération Française d'Equitation


Gina McKnight International Blogger. inamc.blogspot.co.uk/2015/03/equine-wellbeing-friendly-first-aid.html?m=1



The equiMedPak timescale
Timescales: Shipping to backers March 2016



WHY PLEDGE ON THE EQUINE FRIENDLY FIRST AID BACKPACK?
 
EWBM
studied the functionality of the equine first aid kits on the market and found
that they only catered for a limited amount of items as well as being
unpractical in case of an emergency. There was a need for a kit that could be
both practical as well as functional including being hygienic. 
Let's make it happen!
Supporters like you play such a vital role getting us to where we need to be. The equiMedPak is a small product, but with your help we can make a big impact on the world of equine wellbeing; it is the perfect modern solution to how we have traditionally used our first aid kits. Of course, making and delivering the product the right way requires resources. Your help with this campaign will allow us to manufacture in sufficient volumes to keep prices low and quality high. As we gear up to start production we want to make sure that the product we deliver isn't just 100% perfect, but 110% great! Come and join us for this next exciting step at turning the idea, design and prototypes into reality!
Risks and challenges
Every effort is being made to cover eventualities, from production through to delivery to you. As a business we always endeavour to supply on time, but if any factors outside our control such as manufacturing or shipping delays occur, we will ensure all those who pledged will be notified. Our aim is not only to produce a unique product but also to give our backers the care and attention they deserve.

story:
We are Dave and Evie Fisher, husband and wife living on the beautiful Sunshine Coast in Queensland, Australia. We have a beautiful little one year old boy named Bowie, who stole our hearts from the moment we found out he existed.

Our little man, Bowie's favourite outfit is a nappy (truth be told he would probably ditch that too if he could). But there's something clinical and boring about the nappies currently available in our market. Tired of searching for a disposable nappy that is good quality, well fitting, gentle on our baby and the planet, doesn't cost a fortune and looks adorable, we've decided to make our own.

Enter Kindling Baby Care. With plans to expand the brand further down the track, to begin with we will be producing nappies and wipes. Customers will be able to either purchase as they please or they will have the option to set up a flexible monthly subscription.

ABOUT THE NAPPIES

The first shipment will be available in Leopard Print and Watermelon*. We plan to add more prints to the line with each shipment produced. They will be available in four sizes to start with:

Size Baby Weight Nappies per Pack
Infant 3-6kgs (6.5-13lbs) 42
Crawler 5-10kgs (11-22lbs) 36
Toddler  9-13kgs (20-29lbs) 30
Walker 13-25kgs (29-55lbs) 26

*unless target is far exceeded infant size will only be available in Watermelon print for first shipment.

The nappies are made with a biodegradable bamboo fibre which is deliciously soft and extremely absorbent. They have extra sticky refastenable velcro tabs, three times stretch elastic wasteband and a 3D leak gaurd.

ABOUT THE WIPES

The wipes are made from biodegradable 37gsm bamboo fibre. They are alcohol, chemical and fragrance free and also PH balanced making them perfect for sensitive babies skin. They have added aloe vera and vitamin E to help sooth babies skin. They will come in packs of 64 wipes.

As we know very well how quickly little ones grow, there will be a window of time before perks are shipped when you will be able to change the size you have selected. We will contact you via email once the campaign has ended to inform you when that window will be.

We are also working on being able to offer International Shipping but at this point are only able to offer a strictly limited amount of 120 packs to New Zealand.
If you have any queries please email us at kindling@kindlingbabycare.com

Thank you for your support
Dave, Evie and Bowie xx



Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/kindlingbabycare/

Instagram:
@kindlingbabycare

story:
Introducing MARTIE26

 

Our journey began on a sunny day in Bucharest, Romania, in May 2019. Our founder Massimo was sitting outside the National Museum of Romanian History. There was a guy out there who was telling tourists the story of the first King of Romania.

Carol 1st became king of Romania in 1881 after a long period of fights across the Nation. He had a crown, as every king has, but his one was different.

He decided to use cast iron instead of gold.

Why? Cause he decided to melt a cannon he got from a battle against the Ottomans, and he asked Romanian artisans to make a crown from that.

While listening to that story Martie26 was born. Create beauty from tools made to hurt.

Are you ready to listen to the full version? Seat down and relax.

 

Facts

Do you know? In the United States, it is equally likely to die in a car accident than to die killed by a bullet. Yep, think about how many traffic jams you have been in and consider the fact that you may have the same possibility to get into a shooting fight.

In 2017 the victims of these two categories of events were in both cases around 40 thousand.

Free firearms make far more deaths (Americans) than Washington's wars over the past 18 years. "Accidental" deaths from firearms between 1999 and 2017 are more than double the number of soldiers killed in the mission from 2001 to 2019 (the victims of firearms, overall, are more than 100 times as much).

These are just numbers, we cannot tell how many tears and bad feeling these figures caused.

Our idea: use metals from weapons (guns, bullets, knives…) and turn them into something beautiful, like a jewel could be.

When Massimo went back to his home city, Vicenza, the projects started. Vicenza is well known around the world for the jewel district: factories, designers, artisans… skills about jewelry at every corner. So it has not been hard to find ideas and skills.

We use metals melted from weapons and bullets and we will enrich our jewels with precious materials like stones, gold, and silver.

About the brand

MARTIE means March in Romanian. March (for the Latins) was the month dedicated to Mars, God of War. Besides this, Carol I received his crown in March 1881, and they put it on his head on March 26th, 1881.

So, we decided to branded our collection as MARTIE26.

This gave us another idea: every design will not be manufactured in a thousand pieces like big companies do.

We have partnerships with freelance designers and small artisanal companies, we are not looking to manufacture hundreds of pieces.

We will make just 26 pieces for every design.

What does this mean? That just 26 people will have the same design, not more, just 26.

26 masterpieces fully manufactured by Italian and Romanian artisans.
 

Why are we setting a crowdfunding campaign?

Cause we collected different designs, we are moving forward with supplier and artisan, but we need to prototype our first collection and trademark our designs.

We want to take our designs from paper to metal. Our goal is to have our first collection released by Q3 2020.

We need:

  • to buy a 3D printer - FormLab2
  • to buy a small melting metal furnace
  • to fully set up our lab
  • to try different galvanic processes (gold 14K, white gold, black gold, rose gold)
  • to boost up our marketing activities
  • to debug and put online our website and e-shop
  • and last but not least: we will give 5% of the income to charities

Risks & Challenges

If we don’t raise funds we will not be able to speed up the project as we have planned. This will not affect the project as it is now, but we think it would be sad not to take advantage of its full potential.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help us here at Martie26. If you like our project, please help us to reach more people.

Please invite people to visit our Indiegogo page and use the Indiegogo share tools to spread our project!

story:
#LookAtThatHat

Designed in London, England - Aberdora offers disruptive, gender-neutral collections of premium Hat-Cap couture and wallets.

Sunray Hat Cap Collection + Limited run available as Perk
 
 

#LookAtThatHat - The Campaign

Contributors to this campaign will enable Aberdora to centralise production and transform:

  • Current headwear offerings into a unique comprehensive line of sustainable, fully customisable boutique hat cap cross-pollinations, including ethical vegan materials + a customisable consumer facing product configurator.
  • Current wallet  offerings into a unique comprehensive line of sustainable fully customisable Aberdora gender neutral wallets including ethical vegan materials + RFID protection + a customisable consumer facing product configurator.

From inception,  there were supply chain issues in relation to outsourcing and manufacturing for Aberdora's unique line of hats: A10/12 Fur Felt/Velvet, Kepi, A45, Sunray and wool felts.

Laced 1 BD Distressed Hat by Aberdora + available as a perk. 
Photo credit: @imranhanifphotography​

Aberdora signature hats fuse both traditional millinery and sports cap production processes. It was challenging to outsource producer with both technologies under one roof, far from common.

In the absence of a suitable solution, production of our initial limited run* (available as perks) was spread across various facilities, such as: esteemed Christys' London (Oxford) and finishings at K & K factory in London, as well as Aberdora founder, Imran's home design studio in London. This led to logistical and cost issues mentioned above.

Aberdora A10 Classic Brown Fur Felt & Velvet available as a perk.
Photo credit: @imranhanifphotography​

2020 Vision

Due diligence done, in 2020 Aberdora solidified a working relationship with Tonak.

Tonak are a well-established ethically sound Czech-based hat manufacturer with both traditional millinery and sports cap production capabilities under one roof. 

So, it's all systems go!

Aberdora is now able to produce unique, high quality customisable boutique hats, which are ethical and sustainable, at a price range to suit all.

How It All Started

Photo credit: @imranhanifphotography​

Words from the Aberdora Founder Imran Hanif

"Hi, I'm Imran Hanif, founder of Aberdora -  the man behind the brand appearing and performing vocals in the promo video for this campaign: #LookAtThatHat.

Look at my serious music face! With Naked Players drummer Peter "Dr Ummer"  Jones @ Miloco Livingston Studio 2017 

By trade, I'm an accomplished composer, musician, artist, and millinophile, who grew frustrated by the lack of choice when buying hats and caps, and faced with the following situation: 

Problem: I was always on the hunt for a certain understated, yet disruptive individualistic look, but found such a treasure to be non-existent.

Solution: Learn to cut and sew, and then customise or up-cycle existing designs to my taste.

                  

Aberdora jacket concept. Watch this space!

Out and about in town, I would admiringly be asked, “Where did you get that hat?”, or I would overhear passers by say "Look at that hat" (#LookAtThatHat)

These positive reactions became so frequent that I decided to develop and commercialise my very own brand of hat concepts. The unisex accessories brand Aberdora was born.

Aberdora is an acronym, a lyrical extract from an unreleased song I wrote previously:

Axiomatic Beings Evolve Rise Diligently Overcoming Realis(z)e Amelioration

With humble beginnings, the decision to commercialise my hat concepts was the start of a six year journey, during which I acquired a wealth of millinery knowledge, and ordering my first custom hat block from Boon And Lane.

Collecting my first hat block from the great Stephen Lane of Boone & Lane​

Aberdora Custom Hat Block by Boone & Lane

Early days at home 2014, experimenting, learning and laughing.

Shop talk milliner's tip: best pusher downer for me is a Japanese rice serving spatula, works wonders! And I devised my own rounding jack courtesy of B and Q.

5 years later.........

Aberdora Sunray Hats. A fusion of sports tech and traditional straw millinery. 

This photograph was taken at my Uncle Wesley's house in Browns Town, Jamaica. The view was amazing!

Jamaican customs officers were curious as to know why there were so many hats in my suitcase.

Photo credit: @imranhanifphotography

 

Kepi Purple Tartan - Part of Aberdora's boutique cut and sew range of hats. Available as a perk. @imranhanifphotography

 

Hats By Aberdora - left to right: A12 Classic Black/Fur Felt & Velvet, Asym Brown/Fur Felt & Velvet, Kepi Faux Fur (available as perk) @imranhanifphotography

From left to right: Our Classic A10/Fur Felt & Velvet, Faux Fur Kepi, A12 Classic Brown/Fur Felt & Velvet. Available as perks. Photo credit: @imranhanifphotography​

 

The Aberdora A45: One hat incorporating three styles. Available as a perk.

Photo credit: @imranhanifphotography​

Business As Usual 


Work In Progress. Music & Voice: imranmusic.tv  @imranhanifphotography

Wallets 

Aberdora Trifold Mesh Wallet. Also available as a perk and in leather as well.

Photo credit: @imranhanifphotography

Aberdora Bifold Mesh Wallet. Available as a perk.

Wallet Prototyping

Trifold Mesh (Prototype 1): I was in dire need of a wallet and this was the perfect solution. “Road testing” this was so much fun!

After many iterations, I’d arrived at a gender-neutral design which includes a registered industrial design feature that cleverly positions the “note carrier” inside the inner side of the card pockets. Meanwhile, the short side of the card pockets are set at a 90-degree angle, offset to the note carrier fold, minimising the thickness when fully loaded with money notes and cards.

For the Trifold version, the fold of the inner bi-fold structure sits at opposite end from the cascading credit card pocket opening(s), resulting in a significantly thinner profile than traditional bi and trifold wallets.

Aberdora Bifold wallet design fundamentals - exploded explainer

 

Trifold Leather Wallet (available as a perk)​

Trifold Mesh Wallet (available as a perk)​

My first of many enjoyable visits to our wallet manufacturing partner in Portugal.​

Bifold Mesh Wallet carried by Aberdora founder Imran @imranhanifphotography

Aberdora would like to raise  £34,000 for the following priorities: 

  1. £10,000 for the transformation of current hat collections into a new unique line of sustainable, fully customisable boutique hat cap fusion including, ethical vegan materials.

    Fund objective priority 1. covers costs for: materials, sampling iterations, initial manufacturing run + logistics and a contingency for overheads.
     
  2. £7,000 for a dedicated online product configurator, harnessing 3D technology so you can customise hats to your own individual taste.

    Fund priority objective 2. includes 18 months @ £205 per month technology license fee + creation of 3D assets.

    A live use case can be found on the  Armis Polo website.
     
  3. £10,000 for the transformation of current wallet collections into new unique line of sustainable fully customisable Aberdora gender neutral wallets including ethical vegan materials + RFID protection. 
     
  4. £7,000 for a dedicated online product configurator so you can customise your wallet. 

    Fund priority objective 4.  includes 18 months @ £205 per month technology license fee + creation of 3D assets.

This would be a dream come true!

5. £122,918 - Although not included  in the original fund raising objective above, reaching this priority objective figure, along with preceding fund objective priorities 1-4 (totalling: £156,918), would allow Aberdora to:

  • Create new job roles starting with an in-house design intern, and a machinist.
  • Further expand operations and create future employment opportunities.
  • Open a new design studio (approx 2,000 sq feet) with 3 industrial sewing machines an 3 hat blocking stations, while providing a better workspace for product research, design and development.

Fund priority objective 5. covers the following costs:

Rent per annum @ £25,000 X 2 Years                    50,000
Initial rental deposit: 2 months                                    3,600                                                
Industrial Flat Bed Sewing Machine                           1,600
Industrial Overlocker                                                          400
Industrial Vertical Wheel Post Sewing Machine      1,700
Pattern Cutting Tables, Benches 2 Desks                2,300
Shelving & Storage box units                                           700
Miscellaneous Fabrics for Sampling                          5,000
Miscellaneous hat bodies for sampling                    5,000
3 X  iMacs 27" 3.7GHz 6- 9th-generation
Intel Core i5 processor                                                     6,747
3 Wacom Graphics Pads                                                     210
5 X 5TB Lacie Drive Datastore.co.uk                           1,201                                                                                 
1st machinist: 37 hour week  Year 1                          28,860
1st Intern Year 1                                                                11,800
Accounting & Payroll                                                        1,800
Legal & IP                                                                             2,000                                                                                         
                                                                                           =======

Total Priority 5 - Design Studio Cost                       122,918

Transformation Road Map - Hats & Wallets

How the budget will be applied.

Transformation from existing hat and wallet lines to the fully customisable scenario with a consumer facing product configurator is estimated at a 3 month turnaround, as demonstrated above. 

So from when this campaign ends and Aberdora is in receipt of funds raised, the above transformation road map will commence. 


What happens if the fund raising target is not achieved?

If in the event that the intended fund raising goal is not achieved, what ever amount of money is raised will be invested in the numeric order of the above said 4 fund usages priorities, with priorities 1 and 2 being actioned first and so on.

Contributors

Contributors to this campaign will help immensely, enabling the Aberdora vision to transition through to fruition, to grow and continue offering disruptive fashion accessories, and provide future employment and careers for creatives alike. 

What You Get - Contributor Perks

Gain access to a limited  collection of boutique Hats, Unisex Wallets, T shirts and more + Early bird discounts of up to 60% OFF. See perks.

Post COVID lockdown, of course - If the campaign fund target is reached including dream priority 5, a Phase 2 launch party will be thrown at the proposed Aberdora design studio in honour of all contributors and of course all contributors and are invited.

And yes, to mark the ocassion just for you, Imran will perform #LookAtThatHat + more bouncy hot tracks and guest performers,  DJ's + Drinks. ("OMG! - what have I got myself into?")

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share on social media or forward this crowdfunding link to friends, family and colleagues

And that's all there is to it. I hope to see you at the Phase 2 launch party.

Best wishes,

Imran 

Accountants: Qadeer Accounting

Legal: Russells Solicitors
