Aberdora is an acronym, a lyrical extract from an unreleased song I wrote previously:
Axiomatic Beings Evolve Rise Diligently Overcoming Realis(z)e Amelioration
With humble beginnings, the decision to commercialise my hat concepts was the start of a six year journey, during which I acquired a wealth of millinery knowledge, and ordering my first custom hat block from Boon And Lane.

Collecting my first hat block from the great Stephen Lane of Boone & Lane​

Aberdora Custom Hat Block by Boone & Lane

Early days at home 2014, experimenting, learning and laughing. 
Shop talk milliner's tip: best pusher downer for me is a Japanese rice serving spatula, works wonders! And I devised my own rounding jack courtesy of B and Q.

5 years later.........

Aberdora Sunray Hats. A fusion of sports tech and traditional straw millinery. 
This photograph was taken at my Uncle Wesley's house in Browns Town, Jamaica. The view was amazing! 
Jamaican customs officers were curious as to know why there were so many hats in my suitcase. 
Photo credit: @imranhanifphotography
 

Kepi Purple Tartan - Part of Aberdora's boutique cut and sew range of hats. Available as a perk. @imranhanifphotography
 

Hats By Aberdora - left to right: A12 Classic Black/Fur Felt & Velvet, Asym Brown/Fur Felt & Velvet, Kepi Faux Fur (available as perk) @imranhanifphotography

From left to right: Our Classic A10/Fur Felt & Velvet, Faux Fur Kepi, A12 Classic Brown/Fur Felt & Velvet. Available as perks. Photo credit: @imranhanifphotography​
 

The Aberdora A45: One hat incorporating three styles. Available as a perk. 
Photo credit: @imranhanifphotography​

Business As Usual 
Work In Progress. Music & Voice: imranmusic.tv  @imranhanifphotography

Wallets 

Aberdora Trifold Mesh Wallet. Also available as a perk and in leather as well. 
Photo credit: @imranhanifphotography

Aberdora Bifold Mesh Wallet. Available as a perk.
Wallet Prototyping

Trifold Mesh (Prototype 1): I was in dire need of a wallet and this was the perfect solution. “Road testing” this was so much fun!
After many iterations, I’d arrived at a gender-neutral design which includes a registered industrial design feature that cleverly positions the “note carrier” inside the inner side of the card pockets. Meanwhile, the short side of the card pockets are set at a 90-degree angle, offset to the note carrier fold, minimising the thickness when fully loaded with money notes and cards.
For the Trifold version, the fold of the inner bi-fold structure sits at opposite end from the cascading credit card pocket opening(s), resulting in a significantly thinner profile than traditional bi and trifold wallets.

Aberdora Bifold wallet design fundamentals - exploded explainer
 

Trifold Leather Wallet (available as a perk)​

Trifold Mesh Wallet (available as a perk)​
My first of many enjoyable visits to our wallet manufacturing partner in Portugal.​Bifold Mesh Wallet carried by Aberdora founder Imran @imranhanifphotographyAberdora would like to raise  £34,000 for the following priorities: 

£10,000 for the transformation of current hat collections into a new unique line of sustainable, fully customisable boutique hat cap fusion including, ethical vegan materials.Fund objective priority 1. covers costs for: materials, sampling iterations, initial manufacturing run + logistics and a contingency for overheads. 

£7,000 for a dedicated online product configurator, harnessing 3D technology so you can customise hats to your own individual taste.Fund priority objective 2. includes 18 months @ £205 per month technology license fee + creation of 3D assets.A live use case can be found on the  Armis Polo website. 

£10,000 for the transformation of current wallet collections into new unique line of sustainable fully customisable Aberdora gender neutral wallets including ethical vegan materials + RFID protection.  

£7,000 for a dedicated online product configurator so you can customise your wallet. Fund priority objective 4.  includes 18 months @ £205 per month technology license fee + creation of 3D assets.
This would be a dream come true!5. £122,918 - Although not included  in the original fund raising objective above, reaching this priority objective figure, along with preceding fund objective priorities 1-4 (totalling: £156,918), would allow Aberdora to:
Create new job roles starting with an in-house design intern, and a machinist.
Further expand operations and create future employment opportunities.
Open a new design studio (approx 2,000 sq feet) with 3 industrial sewing machines an 3 hat blocking stations, while providing a better workspace for product research, design and development.
Fund priority objective 5. covers the following costs:Rent per annum @ £25,000 X 2 Years                    50,000Initial rental deposit: 2 months                                    3,600                                                Industrial Flat Bed Sewing Machine                           1,600Industrial Overlocker                                                          400Industrial Vertical Wheel Post Sewing Machine      1,700Pattern Cutting Tables, Benches 2 Desks                2,300Shelving & Storage box units                                           700Miscellaneous Fabrics for Sampling                          5,000Miscellaneous hat bodies for sampling                    5,0003 X  iMacs 27" 3.7GHz 6- 9th-generationIntel Core i5 processor                                                     6,7473 Wacom Graphics Pads                                                     2105 X 5TB Lacie Drive Datastore.co.uk                           1,201                                                                                 1st machinist: 37 hour week  Year 1                          28,8601st Intern Year 1                                                                11,800Accounting & Payroll                                                        1,800Legal & IP                                                                             2,000                                                                                                                                                                                    =======Total Priority 5 - Design Studio Cost                       122,918Transformation Road Map - Hats & WalletsHow the budget will be applied.Transformation from existing hat and wallet lines to the fully customisable scenario with a consumer facing product configurator is estimated at a 3 month turnaround, as demonstrated above. So from when this campaign ends and Aberdora is in receipt of funds raised, the above transformation road map will commence. What happens if the fund raising target is not achieved?If in the event that the intended fund raising goal is not achieved, what ever amount of money is raised will be invested in the numeric order of the above said 4 fund usages priorities, with priorities 1 and 2 being actioned first and so on.ContributorsContributors to this campaign will help immensely, enabling the Aberdora vision to transition through to fruition, to grow and continue offering disruptive fashion accessories, and provide future employment and careers for creatives alike. 

What You Get - Contributor Perks
Gain access to a limited  collection of boutique Hats, Unisex Wallets, T shirts and more + Early bird discounts of up to 60% OFF. See perks.

Post COVID lockdown, of course - If the campaign fund target is reached including dream priority 5, a Phase 2 launch party will be thrown at the proposed Aberdora design studio in honour of all contributors and of course all contributors and are invited.And yes, to mark the ocassion just for you, Imran will perform #LookAtThatHat + more bouncy hot tracks and guest performers,  DJ's + Drinks. ("OMG! - what have I got myself into?")

Other Ways You Can Help
Please share on social media or forward this crowdfunding link to friends, family and colleagues
And that's all there is to it. I hope to see you at the Phase 2 launch party.Best wishes,Imran Accountants: Qadeer AccountingLegal: Russells Solicitors

story:
IKKA: with watches and trees for a greener tomorrow


IKKA is a watch brand on a mission to change the world, offering stylish timepieces for city-dwelling thrill-seekers and planting trees for the future.


 

The IKKA Story


Agi and I have always wanted to do something that makes a lasting impact; to find a cause that’s worth fighting for, and to come up with something that changes our future for the better.
The world is filled with wonder and adventure everywhere we turn: from the playfulness of the clouds and the picturesque colors of the sunset, through the fragrance of the forests and the awe that hits us when we look up at the glittering night sky, to the relaxing sound of flowing water, we’re surrounded by boundless beauty.
However, looking at what’s happening around the globe today, it’s also notably clear that things are headed in the wrong direction.
In 2018  September, inspired by the overwhelming beauty of our planet and spurred by the growing number and severity of environmental issues our world is facing, we finally had our light bulb moment: how about we combine our obsession for quality mechanical watches with our love of nature?
As an engineer, Agi believes in tangible, technical solutions. On the other hand, I’ve always been a more adventurous, intuitive type of person. It was our innate differences that laid the groundwork for everything that came after. In a short while, our idea has started to take a very distinct, rounded shape, and following a year of hard work, IKKA was created.

Sylvia , IKKA co-founder
 

Our mission
 

We believe that to truly enjoy life, you have to live it one second at a time. That’s why we have created IKKA, a watch brand with a green spin, made for city-dwelling thrill-seekers who want to take back control over their most valuable asset: time.

We fashion high quality, sleek, and sophisticated timepieces that help you stay in the moment wherever you go, whatever you do. Because only by focusing on the here and now, can you really start living your life to the fullest.

What’s more, after every watch we sell, we plant a princess tree or deliver it (tree sapling delivery time: from october - till may, tree size: 4-6 inch) straight to your door, driving home our message about the significance of individual action and building a more sustainable future. This way, your watch becomes more than just a portable measurement device: it will also act as a reminder of giving nature one more tool to heal itself with, wrapped neatly around your wrist.



                               
 


About princess trees and their climatic benefits

The combined effect of climate change and greenhouse gas emissions is becoming growing threat to our ecosystems. These issues affect every country in the world, and they are partially caused by the rapid and large scale social and economic developments of the past century. The ever-expanding carbon footprint of industrial development, extremely high levels of car traffic, and power plants is no longer a match for Earth’s declining forests.

We’ve spent a lot of time searching for the right species of tree that can adapt to almost any environment, until we’ve finally stumbled upon princess trees. Popular for their ability to produce high volumes of oxygen, princess trees are also favored in landscaping as ornamental trees.

Known for their high tolerance, fire resistance, and flexibility, princess trees are rapid growers, thanks to a unique evolutionary adaptation that allows them to use C4 carbon fixation: they can put on up to 1 meter of height each year, while their nitrogen-rich leaves provide good fodder, and their roots prevent soil erosion. Requiring nothing more but full sun and regular watering for proper growth, princess trees absorb 10 times more carbon dioxide than any other tree species, releasing large quantities of oxygen into the atmosphere. This makes them a perfect choice to purify the air from pollutants and to combat the effects of industrialization.

In just a few years, they can absorb large amounts of carbon dioxide, thanks to their outstanding growth rate and huge leaves. In addition, princess trees bind dust, produce oxygen, improve degraded soil, combat desertification, and by releasing water into the atmosphere, they can also cool the air around them.

In short, princess trees are a genuinely valuable asset in our fight against climate change.




 







Our Products
 

IKKA watches artfully blend minimalist design with engineering prowess. Powered by movements made in Japan, our watches are built for adventuring, excellence, and expressing your authentic self. Accompanied by a 2-year warranty and a princess tree sapling (4-6 inch), you can wear them safe in the knowledge that you made a difference, no matter which model you pick. We have teamed up with the One Tree Planted organization who will plant a sapling after every watch sold, in case you don't want yours shipped together with your order. 

Don’t have anywhere to put your complimentary tree? Let us handle the planting, and we’ll make sure that your sapling ends up in the right place.

There’s something wrong with the product? Send it back and we’ll ship you a new one, completely free!


 
                             
                                


                                
 

"Created out of a passion for high-quality analog, IKKA is a brand aimed at city-dwelling thrill-seekers who want to take back control over their most valuable asset (time), and who have a special place in their heart for Mother Nature."
Market Watch

"The company plants a princess tree sapling through their network of tree planting organizations, but you can also ask them to deliver it straight to your doorstep."
Digital Journal

"Guaranteed to last by a two-year warranty and Japanese movements, IKKA watches combine engineering prowess with sleek sophistication, allowing their users to wear their love for the environment on their wrists."
News9


 

Prototype
 

Our team has working versions of our products, but we need your contribution to be able to go into mass production.

Campaign goal

$45,000

Here is the brief breakdown of what your generous donations will be used for:

             
 

Raw materials: We need to order raw materials for production.

Delivery costs: The cost of delivery between our suppliers, us, and you, our customer.

Production: Watches and trees stock building.

Storage: The upkeep of our warehouse facility and our storage system.

Marketing: Building up our brand image and communicating the IKKA lifestyle through digital channels.

Webshop: Setting up and operating our webshop


Our timeline:



To make this a reality, we need your help. Join us on this exciting journey and be a part of the change!


Weblap
https://ikkawatch.com/


Contact
info@ikkawatch.com


Follow us:

Instagram: www.instagram.com/ikkawatch
Facebook: www.facebook.com/ikkawatch

story:
Sexy lines, a gorgeous hand finished case and a modern dial, the all new Langdon Yorkville is designed to be the ultimate versatile sports watch. Classy and sporty, the Yorkville fits in the boardroom just as easily as it does on the yacht or golf course. With a 39.5mm stainless steel case, the famous Seiko NH35 automatic movement, sapphire crystal and 100M of water resistance - we handpicked every component to build you a watch you'll be proud to strap to your wrist. 
 

Being watch lovers ourselves, the main reason we started our brand was to help introduce others to our hobby. The main way we can achieve this is by creating timepieces that offer quality components, excellent build quality and Japanese automatic movements that are all brought together in thoughtful designs. Our Philosophy is Simple: Great Watches for a Great Price. 

 


 

Each Yorkville is built using a unique, square-shaped case, made from marine grade stainless steel. The watch, which has an overall diameter of 39.5mm, measures 47mm from lug to lug, with an overall height of 12mm. The dial sits behind a scratch-resistant sapphire crystal, which offers the best protection against scratches. The case has been given a beautiful, heavy brushed finish, with polished accents on the edges that give the Yorkville an ultra luxurious look.

Moving over to the crown-guards, you will find two screws which add to the design and gives the watch a bit of ruggedness. In between the prominent crown guards, you will see a polished screw-down crown that has our branded ‘L’ engraved on the surface. The screw-down crown helps to maintain the water resistance of 100M, which is enough for bathing and worry-free shallow swimming and water activities.

Having a look down towards the ends of the case, you will find that Yorkville uses a hidden lug design. This gives the watch a unique shape and also hides any unsightly gaps between the case and strap. To further accent the design, the side edges of the Yorkville has been beveled and polished to match the edges of the bezel. This multi-finish design is done by hand that will draw attention to your wrist time and time again.
 

The dial of the Yorkville is bold, yet subtle at the same time. For the hour markers, we have used, thin, silver applied indices that offer a slightly raised look. The 12 and 6 o'clock markers are elegant Arabic style numerals that add to the luxurious design. The matching dauphine watch hands have been skeletonized, which really gives the design some character. 

The date window is fixed at the 3 o'clock position and we’ve employed the black date wheel on the NH35 so that it won’t distract the eye. In between the hour markers, you will find minute markings to help read the time. Lastly, the Langdon branding has also been applied, instead of printed, which matches with the rest of the dial components and keeps the design synchronized and uniform.
 

The caseback on the Yorkville is constructed from stainless steel and has a screw-down design allowing for the tightest fit and best protection against water. The caseback also has an exhibition window, made from scratch-resistant mineral glass, that allows you to see the automatic movement at work. 

Around the exhibition window, we have engraved the model name as well as movement information and water resistance specifications. 
 

This stainless steel bracelet is made from the same marine grade steel that was used to construct the case. It’s a modern, flat, 3-link style bracelet, that has been given a satin finish. To match the dimensions of the watch, the bracelet sits on 22mm lugs and then tapers down to 18mm at the clasp. To keep the profile as thin as possible, each case link is only 2mm in height, which helps reduce the weight of the watch and also gives the Yorkville a refined feel.  

These bracelets have been paired with a slim, push button style clasp featuring our branding laser engraved on its brushed surface. 

Each bracelet also has 6 removable links so that you can adjust it to the correct size for your wrist. The bracelet can be adjusted to fit most wrists (extra links are available upon request for those with larger wrists). 


In addition to the steel bracelet, we'll be providing Backers with an additional rubber strap at each reward level. These rubber straps are constructed from a high quality silicone rubber material that is not only soft and durable, but comfortable to wear. Each 22mm strap will have our branding tattooed on the matching stainless steel buckle. 


 

The Yorkville comes in 2 color options and we're making only 50 of each. 

*Please make sure you select the reward that corresponds to the color that you want.
 


 


A Watch That Doesn't Use A Battery? All of our watches are powered by what's known as an automatic movement. An automatic watch, also known as self-winding watch, is a mechanical watch in which the natural motion of the wearer provides energy to run the watch, making manual winding or even a battery unnecessary. An automatic movement is the ultimate example of watchmaking and is the preferred  choice of watch enthusiasts and collectors.

The Yorkville watches are is powered by a caliber NH35 automatic movement, manufactured by Seiko. This is a movement that is extremely robust movement that has been a reliable engine for many micro-brand watches. The NH35 has a proven track record of being dependable and long-lasting. The movement runs at 21,600 BPH or 6 beats per second and has a 40 hour power reserve and has a stop second feature (hacking). It also has a date complication and employs 24 Jewels that help keep the movement running efficiently.
 

 

Packaging You Will Actually Use - To keep with  our minimalist design trend and to lower our environmental impact, all  of our watches will be packaged in our branded watch pouch. This pouch  is made from felt and genuine leather and is designed to keep your watch  protected against scratches. Our packaging is fully reusable and is a  practical way of carrying, storing or traveling with your watches when  they're not being worn.


Our Service Guarantee - All of our watches are  backed by a full 1 year warranty. If at any point during the warranty  you experience any issues with your watch, we will repair or replace it  for you. All warranty requests can be initiated through our website  which will be ready shortly after the campaign is over.
 

Production on the Yorkville has already begun, we are expecting the watches to be finished early October and after a thorough round of QC, we will begin shipping watches by October 20th.

The bracelet can be adjusted to fit most wrists (extra links are available upon request for those with larger wrists). In addition to the steel bracelet, we'll be providing Backers with an additional rubber strap at each reward level. These rubber straps are constructed from a high quality silicone rubber material that is not only soft and durable, but comfortable to wear. Each 22mm strap will have our branding tattooed on the matching stainless steel buckle.  The Yorkville comes in 2 color options and we're making only 50 of each. *Please make sure you select the reward that corresponds to the color that you want.  A Watch That Doesn't Use A Battery? All of our watches are powered by what's known as an automatic movement. An automatic watch, also known as self-winding watch, is a mechanical watch in which the natural motion of the wearer provides energy to run the watch, making manual winding or even a battery unnecessary. An automatic movement is the ultimate example of watchmaking and is the preferred  choice of watch enthusiasts and collectors.The Yorkville watches are is powered by a caliber NH35 automatic movement, manufactured by Seiko. This is a movement that is extremely robust movement that has been a reliable engine for many micro-brand watches. The NH35 has a proven track record of being dependable and long-lasting. The movement runs at 21,600 BPH or 6 beats per second and has a 40 hour power reserve and has a stop second feature (hacking). It also has a date complication and employs 24 Jewels that help keep the movement running efficiently.  Packaging You Will Actually Use - To keep with  our minimalist design trend and to lower our environmental impact, all  of our watches will be packaged in our branded watch pouch. This pouch  is made from felt and genuine leather and is designed to keep your watch  protected against scratches. Our packaging is fully reusable and is a  practical way of carrying, storing or traveling with your watches when  they're not being worn.Our Service Guarantee - All of our watches are  backed by a full 1 year warranty. If at any point during the warranty  you experience any issues with your watch, we will repair or replace it  for you. All warranty requests can be initiated through our website  which will be ready shortly after the campaign is over. Production on the Yorkville has already begun, we are expecting the watches to be finished early October and after a thorough round of QC, we will begin shipping watches by October 20th.

story:
Our goal is very simple: to design a quality bag for the modern everyday use  - a product that enables people to keep up with our accelerated world, a product which fuses functionality and design. No matter if you are a business person or a committed environmentalist, a biker, a driver or a walker - Fuse will help you anywhere and anytime. Keep your devices charged and connect to the world while enjoying your trip, excursion or fighting your everyday battles. Whenever you want!

Fuse bags are handmade products of long-lasting quality, made of animal friendly materials (no real fur, no real leather!). Besides design the focus is on functionality, as our bags are capable of charging almost any electronic device with a special built-in power bank placed in an easily removable, hidden inside pocket with a specially designed outside part to connect to your charger.


Charge up your life! HOW?


1. Built-in but also removable charger pocket - charge your device inside or outside your bag!



2. Just connect your device! (iPhone, iPad, mobile phones, tablets)


Power bank parameters:

  • 10400 mAh built-in power bank charger 
  • one output port and one input port
  • you can take it along with you wherever you go
  • Lithium-ion polymer, long service life, more safety
  • LED indicator light 
  • with 4 connectors and a USB cable to meet your needs
  • can charge your device even 5 times 


WHY SHOULD I BACK THIS PRODUCT?

  • the use of mobile devices is inevitable in the modern world
  • you can charge your devices straight from your bag
  • removeable, practical and hidden inside pocket for the power bank
  • our bags are handmade and designed for everyday use 
  • made of animal friendly materials
  • we also mind bikers :)
  • practical but also outstanding design
  • long lasting and high quality product
  • if you place an order and help us to raise the desired fund we will come out with further stunning designs (varietiy of colours and patterns, new collections)

About the bags 

Basically we offer two types of bags - backpacks/shoulder bags and cycle bags. All of the bags are designed for the everyday use, you can put even shoes, gym wear, laptop in it - basically anything you wish.
You have the opportunity to choose any of the bags below:


1. Backpacks/shoulder bags

Urban black 

   
Size: 38x40x13 cm


Urban wolf 

   

Fabric combination of grey canvas, and black & blue artificial leather. Linen inside with 1 compartment and 1 inner pocket. Can be worn as backpack and shoulder bag too! Ideal for everyday use. Size: 38x40x14 cm

Birdy 

 

Fabric combination of red canvas, and black artificial leather. Linen inside with 1 compartment and 1 inner pocket. Can be worn as backpack and shoulder bag too! Ideal for everyday use. Size: 38x40x14 cm
_____________________________________________________________________________

2. Cycle bags:

Fleur (limited pattern*)

             

Other pattern available: Jungle

                      

Double-strap closure with clasp, and one external zipper pocket on front side. One inner pocket. The uniqueness and main characteristic of the bag is its multifunctional use: can be easily attached to the rack, handlebar and saddle too by relocating the hook straps on the back of the bag! When not used on bicycle, can be worn as shoulder and crossbody bag too! Adjustable shoulder strap. 
Perfect for everyday use to workplace, school, picnic, city shopping, party and more! Size: 39x35x14 cm 

*: Pease note that Fleur pattern is limited and we can offer just a few pieces of this type!


Elegance

             
Size: 40x25x14


Stripy/Dotty 

   

Also available in dotty pattern!

Size: 40x25x14


HOW can I order the bag of my choice?


Please help us to handle orders by giving the code of your bag in the remittance info when transfering your contribution! 


What We Need & What You Get


Our main goal is to collect the funding which enables us to start the manufacturing of the bags. If you kindly help us with your contribution in reaching our €10 000 goal we will send you the bag of your choice!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our project but cannot donate it, please share the idea on any platform to help us in reaching larger audience. Thank you in advance for that!

story:
ZafeBit is a Smartwatch with some special features.
ZafeBit has Two Personal Safety alarms that you can trigger within seconds.
The GPS in your ZafeBit Smartwatch will let your friends locate you wherever you are if you get into an emergency.

It´s also an Activity Tracker, Sportwatch and even a Mobile Phone.

We have created ZafeBit with design and safety in focus, we wanted it to look clean and modern to make it wearable but we have filled it with functions to fit almost all people, whatever their interrests are.

Why choose between a Sportwatch, an Activity Tracker, a GPS or a Personal Safety Alarm on your wrist when you can have it all in one?





ZafeBit Smartwatch messure your steps, calories burned, distance, heartbeats plus it will monitor your sleep and can wake you up with a silent alarm. To make it the perfect training device we have also added a stopwatch.

You can answer a calls, read your sms, get message notifications from Facebook, Skype, WhatsUp etc. and remote your mobile camera to get the best selfies. 
To make it perfect we have added WIFI so you can surf the web if you are in a hotspot.
Connect your watch to your mobilephone with blueooth to follow your activity and share it with your friends.

With that said, ZafeBit got something for ALL kind of people because even if you don´t do extreme sports or are interrested in how many steps you have taken we bet that you don´t want to miss that important call or message, but the most important thing is that IF an emergency happen you know that you will be able to alert your friends in seconds.



We have built in two different Safety Alarms into ZafeBit, a Silent Alarm and a Sound Alarm that will make a loud 110db noice to scare an attacker away.
You will be able to turn on/off both alarms off inside your app where you also set your emergency contact list of people that will get your alertmessage.

It´s not only an alarm for violent situations.
The silent alarm in ZafeBit Smartwatch is a perfect feature if you are an Extreme Sporter that need a solution to share your position if you need assistance.

To activate the alarm you must push the two SOS buttons at the side of your watch and when you do your ZafeBit watch will vibrate 3 times to notify you that you have activated it.

You will have 5 seconds to turn it off if you didn´t mean to activate it, after that the first person at your list will get an alert that you are in an emergency.
When your friend get the alert he or she will be able to click on the message to see your exact location. They will also see two call buttons, one that calls you and one that calls 911 or 112 depending on where you live. (You set it in your app)

If the first person doesn´t take action and click on the alert within 10 seconds, your app will move on and send an alert to the second person on your list and so on.
When all persons have been contacted without any response it will start over with the first person again up to three times.

If this alarm is activated inside your app, your watch will make a loud 110db noice and the meaning of this is to scare an attacker away or at least give you a few seconds to get loose and get away.

If this alarm is activated it will start instantly when you trigger the alarm buttons.

  • Tooling and production
  • Developing apps to iOS and Android
  • Certification

The retail price of ZafeBit Smartwatch will be $199 and when you support our campaign here at Indiegogo you will a great discount.

If you share our campaign to your friends and contacts we will reward you, meaning you can get yourself a ZafeBit Smartwatch for FREE.
Make sure that you read the guide below this box before you start.



How it works: 

Simply log in to Indiegogo to get your personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons or share your unique URL (below the main video at the top of the page). Spread the word about us with your friends all over the Internet and you'll earn refunds quickly! You can even track your own progress by visiting your Indiegogo "My Profile" page and clicking on "Referrals."

We can´t see any risks, we have everything ready with the manufacturer of the ZafeBit Watch and they are just waiting to get a go from us to startup.
If we don´t reach our goal of $95 000 you will get your money back, but hopefully we will get there and go higher so we can release our stretching goals.




Do i need a smartphone to use ZafeBit?
No, you can use most functions in ZafeBit if you add a simcard to it, but we recommend you to let it connect to your phone to be able to use all functions of the activity meter.

Do i need to add a simcard?
No, that is an extra option that we have added to make it possible to send emergency alarms if the phone are broken or stolen.
It also make it to a great device for extreme sporters that don´t want to carry a lot of devices when they are climbing, biking etc.

Who can see my position?
No one can see it until you trigger your alarm at your watch in case of an emergency. When you do the person that get your alert will be able to see your position, nobody else.

What is the battery time?
It´s 160 hours standby time and 4 hours active use like call or surf etc.

As soon as you contribute you are welcome to take part of our referral program, that can give you a ZafeBit Watch almost for free.

You are of course free to share this page without contributing and if you would like to send us traffic and share the link it would be a great help for us.

story:
MISSION STATEMENT 

The  foundations of LEONFETCH are inspired by our relationship with man's best friend.  Loyalty, reliability, and play are the key elements that bond us with our favourite friends.  We at LEONFETCH want to  explore and translate this into the products we design.      

 

CONSULTANTS / BLOGGERS / MAGAZINES / SOCIAL 

LEONFETCH has steadily gained attention of high profile bloggers, consultants, magazines and stylists from around the world. They are a tight-nit community and love all things different. They were drawn towards the LEONFETCH brand because we dare to be different.

KENADA RUNNING SHOE BY LEONFETCH

Let us introduce you to LEONFETCH,  the brand and our Kenada sneakers.  We are big lovers of Japanese culture and those of you who are sharp eyed will notice a connection with a famous Anime movie. Either you love it or hate it, our striking and functional split toe design is a definite feature.  A split toe or Tabi is very Traditional in Japanese culture,  it is preferred choice of footwear where tactile confidence is needed while working,  e.g workers on building sites, gardeners and general work that requires physical activity.  Tabi toes were also used during the 90's and was popular among African marathon runners as it replicates a natural running style,  as many of these runners did train in bare feet.  

HANDMADE

Our sneakers are handmade. We have a partnership with craftsmen in Japan and we work on every detail, from stitching and colourways to material selection. We strive for the best to achieve a reliable premium product for play and loyalty. 

STYLE AND FUNCTION

Loyalty, reliability, and play. We believe these qualities can equate to individual style and a functional piece of wear!  Rock the Kenada, a running shoe for all occasions! 

 

PERFORMANCE & HEALTH

Performance testing was also part of our campaign,  we benefit from a close partnership with craftsmen in Japan who are experts in fit, ergonomics and engineering.  However due to our obsessive nature we still wanted to product test ourselves!  We brought on an experienced fitness consultant Dominic Adam to our team.  With Dominic we were able to confirm performance and build quality.   

 

Enrich your training on natural or soft surfaces and activate all your foot muscles and tendons. Kenada's simulates the barefoot experience and forces your feet to adapt to the terrain. A strong athlete starts with strong feet. 

 

COLOUR-WAYS

Colours inspired by the playful BMX scene and archive collection's of fashion. Stand out or conform we have a colour for you!  

 
 

ACCESSORISE 

By now you were probably wondering about socks! Normal socks won't work!  Don't worry we have teamed up with a Japanese manufacturer and all Kenada sneakers come with high grade Tabi Socks, specially designed to work with our design. At the end of the campaign there will be an option to specify your preferred sock colour.  You can also purchase additional pairs through our perk options. 

As part of our perks we are offering our LEONFETCH T-Shirts with multiple buys.  This T-Shirt has a unique  rabbit logo on the front chest reflecting our playfull brand.  Sizes available -  S - XL.    You can also purchase separately through our perk options.

PRICING 

We cut out the middle man which means we can control the cost and deliver a better priced product without compromising on quality. So we sell directly to you via pre-orders to cut retailers margins and optimise logistics. As such, we're able to mark it for £210 (vs. £350 full store retail price).  For launch we're offering great savings!

 

THE PERKS

Choose your Perks! Whether you just want to give us a shout out or buy a big batch order for you and your friends, we have all options below!  As Early backers there are great savings to be had!

Want to stock our product in your boutique/store? We have a 10 x kenada boutique special please contact us : info@leonfetch.com

 

SIZE & FITTING

Our sneakers are designed for a comfort fit. If you find the size you order isn't quite right for you, we are happy to exchange for an alternative.   We will ask for a small additional charge towards shipping for returns.   

PLACE YOUR ORDER

Click on the perks you wish to buy on the right hand side.  You will be able to choose colour and size options on a survey that will be e-mailed to you after you pledge.  We welcome any specific requests, please e-mail us!

DEVELOPMENT

Our base is here in the UK and our craftsmen produce in Japan.  We speak English they speak Japanese!  We were against it from the start.  Solution? Well we didn't have the budget to go to Japan!  The phone calls made 5 am in the morning  ending up in  awkward silences, hellos and thank you's so e-mail it was!   E-mails were simplified, challenges and solutions were illustrated and photographed. But wires were still crossed. But we got here..

TARGETS 

We really want to be the up there with the most successful campaigns and we want to reach the sky. Our minimum is 100 units but we really want to go beyond.  1000 units would enable us to keep to plan and hit the economies of scale needed. Not only do we want you to embrace us but also spread the word about us! 

WHATS NEXT?

Scenario 1 : OK we did it,  so we hit our targets & delivered all our perks on time.  The question is what next? You not only bought a one time product but started a seed for future products to develop that reflect our core philosophies, loyalty, reliability and play.  

  • As a brand we want to explore new design details and offer more new lines in the future. 
  • We are hoping the best piece of marketing we can get is word of mouth!  We know the internet is accessible to everyone,  but nothing beats human interaction.  Continuing from the success of previous trade shows, we can strengthen this connection by showcasing at future exhibitions, shows and events. 

(Above)  Leonfetch at sneaker trade shows - Sneakercon 2017

Scenario 2 :  So we didn't hit our potential and we did not  reach minimum order target.   As a safety net for you,  we have opted for a fixed fundraiser!   This means if we don't reach our targets you get your money back!  But we don't think this is the end,  this is a great opportunity for us to take a step back and re-evaluate.  

 

 

THE CHALLENGE 

You already know what is involved in such campaigns,  there are many factors that are out of our control. Not only are you giving us an opportunity to provide you with a great product , it also gives us a chance to learn and evolve.  We understand the most important thing is that you are informed throughout the process .  To adhere our core philosophy of reliability we promise to keep you updated through our website, e-mail and social media.

We welcome your questions -  Please email us!

 

IMPORTANT NOTE 

It is the contributor’s responsibility to ensure items can be legally imported to their country and how much import taxes might cost,  'WE' have little to no control over this. If contributors incur a customs/VAT tax, they will receive a notice and simply go to their carrier or post office to pay the tax before the item is released.

 

 

GALLERY

As such, we're able to mark it for £210 (vs. £350 full store retail price).  For launch we're offering great savings!
 
THE PERKS
Choose your Perks! Whether you just want to give us a shout out or buy a big batch order for you and your friends, we have all options below!  As Early backers there are great savings to be had!

Want to stock our product in your boutique/store? We have a 10 x kenada boutique special please contact us : info@leonfetch.com
 
SIZE & FITTING


Our sneakers are designed for a comfort fit. If you find the size you order isn't quite right for you, we are happy to exchange for an alternative.   We will ask for a small additional charge towards shipping for returns.   
PLACE YOUR ORDER

Click on the perks you wish to buy on the right hand side.  You will be able to choose colour and size options on a survey that will be e-mailed to you after you pledge.  We welcome any specific requests, please e-mail us!

DEVELOPMENT
Our base is here in the UK and our craftsmen produce in Japan.  We speak English they speak Japanese!  We were against it from the start.  Solution? Well we didn't have the budget to go to Japan!  The phone calls made 5 am in the morning  ending up in  awkward silences, hellos and thank you's so e-mail it was!   E-mails were simplified, challenges and solutions were illustrated and photographed. But wires were still crossed. But we got here..



TARGETS 
We really want to be the up there with the most successful campaigns and we want to reach the sky. Our minimum is 100 units but we really want to go beyond.  1000 units would enable us to keep to plan and hit the economies of scale needed. Not only do we want you to embrace us but also spread the word about us! 

WHATS NEXT?
Scenario 1 : OK we did it,  so we hit our targets & delivered all our perks on time.  The question is what next? You not only bought a one time product but started a seed for future products to develop that reflect our core philosophies, loyalty, reliability and play.  

As a brand we want to explore new design details and offer more new lines in the future. 
We are hoping the best piece of marketing we can get is word of mouth!  We know the internet is accessible to everyone,  but nothing beats human interaction.  Continuing from the success of previous trade shows, we can strengthen this connection by showcasing at future exhibitions, shows and events. 


(Above)  Leonfetch at sneaker trade shows - Sneakercon 2017
Scenario 2 :  So we didn't hit our potential and we did not  reach minimum order target.   As a safety net for you,  we have opted for a fixed fundraiser!   This means if we don't reach our targets you get your money back!  But we don't think this is the end,  this is a great opportunity for us to take a step back and re-evaluate.  
 
 





THE CHALLENGE 

You already know what is involved in such campaigns,  there are many factors that are out of our control. Not only are you giving us an opportunity to provide you with a great product , it also gives us a chance to learn and evolve.  We understand the most important thing is that you are informed throughout the process .  To adhere our core philosophy of reliability we promise to keep you updated through our website, e-mail and social media.
We welcome your questions -  Please email us!



 
IMPORTANT NOTE 
It is the contributor’s responsibility to ensure items can be legally imported to their country and how much import taxes might cost,  'WE' have little to no control over this. If contributors incur a customs/VAT tax, they will receive a notice and simply go to their carrier or post office to pay the tax before the item is released.
 


 
GALLERY

story:
In the Beginning...

It all started with the search for something a proud Satanist can possibly wear without it being something seemingly made for a teen. It had to be something of nothing short of the best quality and design I could find at the time.

The search had occurred for many years. Often just keeping an eye out on internet searches for something that would come relatively close to what I felt was worthy of purchase and wearing. A few had stepped up to fulfill the demand but I still saw some design flaws that I was not completely happy about.

Eventually the time came where I felt the need to be the next runner up to create what the market has been lacking. Fulfill the demand for Sigil of Baphomet pendants and other related jewelry. However, it needed to be something that met my standards. Standards that I knew people would agree with and appreciate. It had to be jewelry of the highest quality and craftsmanship!

After just 2 years since launching the creation of Sigil of Baphomet pendants, it was an instant success! Satanists across the globe have found their source for the type of jewelry that specifically caters to their religion. Since then, the Sigil of Baphomet website was launched and the expansion has quickly grown into different sizes and colors. Even going so far as to create items that have never been produced....including the Sigil of Baphomet RING!

Here's the deal...

The Sigil of Baphomet Ring is currently available on my website but the price tag is too high for too many. Its expensive to produce in the U.S. The technology used is out of most people's budget. This is why I am here today.

In the past 2.5 months I have worked with my manufacturing team to create a more affordable ring that everyone can purchase . The ring will be made of Stainless Steel and will closely match the current version that is currently available. The cost of the manufacturing will be reduce the cost of production by 80% therefore reducing the price the ring is currently listed for by 80% as well. Pictured above is an UNFINISHED RING (color has not been added).

The breakdown:

  • The funds will go towards producing a ring in men's sizes 6 thru 13. Pendants are a one size fits all, rings, different scenario. The demand for the ring in various sizes is larger than my capacity to produce.
  • A ring will be given to every contributor in the size of their choice. Higher contributions will include a ring and pendant(s) of your choice.
  • If the goal is not reached, funds will go towards producing other products such as Stainless Steel pendants, cuff links, and watches.

The Impact

Your contribution today will allow for the production and the sale of the baphomet ring in various sizes. Modern Satanism is no longer what some may perceive as a fad or a phase people who are into hard rock. This is serious jewelry for the modern Satanist:

  • Production of the rings will allow to meet the demand and sales revenues will provide funding for future projects to come.
  • My website is officially 2 years old this October (launched 2013). The first batch of products were started on just $348. Now, the website is on track to generate approximately $45-$50 in sales in 2015. As the peak of the retail season approaches, much of the current funding available is tied up into restocking ahead of the retail rush. Contributions are solely for the purpose of funding the largest project since this began, production of the Baphomet pendants.
  • You can visit the website: www.SigilofBaphomet.com from there, Click the links available to Facebook, Amazon, and Ebay. Read the comments, see the seller reviews and rankings. The numbers speak for themselves. Lots of people are completely satisfied with what I have produced. This is the next level in the category.

Risks, Challenges, and More About the Perks

Many posts have been made on Facebook regarding the enduring process of creating the Sigil of Baphomet ring. My website is also updated in the blog page detailing the challenges regarding this creation. Now the challenges have been defeated, the ring sample is being created currently. The only set back is the funding. If the peak season was over, the funding will likely be there. However, the demand exists for something to be available now.

Risks are minimal since the hard part of getting this ring designed and created for mass production has already been established. Its all a matter of funding at this point. The demand is proven based on my history of sales from the venues in which my items are sold.

Perks...

Perhaps you wish to contribute in an indirect way outside of Indiegogo...Well now you can. Most of the perks listed are already in stock, the only exception is the ring, of course. Another way that you can help us is by purchasing some of the other products not listed in the PERKS section. These funds from sales will be rolled over for the cost of production towards the ring. The ring, as I previously mentioned is a very big job for a small business as myself. The production needs to meet the demand. This meant that I needed a ring in every size whereas a pendant does not require sizes. Thanks for reading and I hope you consider supporting me. I am also the producer of THE SATANIC TEMPLE pendants that can be found on THEIR website! A direct link to their pendant can also be found on my website.

Darker Days are coming....Hail Satan!

Other Ways You Can Help

Share:

  • Share the page on facebook. Tell potential contributors.
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools!

story:
CASE COMPONENTS

CASE

  • SIZE: 45 mm (43 mm bezel)
  • THICKNESS: 12.2 mm 
  • WEIGHT: 50 gm
  • MATERIAL: Stainless Steel and
  • WATER-RESISTANCE: 50 metres / 164 feet

CRYSTAL/ SCREEN

  • GLASS: Corning® Gorilla® Glass SR+
  • ACTIVE SCREEN SIZE: 1.30” (33 mm) Fully circular AMOLED display with 10,000:1 high contrast ratio, always-on display with adaptive brightness
  • RESOLUTION: 292 ppi (380 x 380) resolution

STRAP

  • MATERIAL: Vulcanized Rubber
  • WEIGHT: 15 gm
  • COLORS: Blue, Black, Brown. Orange, Yellow

CLASP

  • TYPE: Deployant Buckle Clasp

 

TECHNOLOGY

CORE

  • PROCESSOR: Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ Wear 2100 processor
  • MEMORY: 1 GB RAM
  • STORAGE: 8GB eMMC storage memory

SENSORS

  • 9-Axis (Gyroscope/Accelerometer/Compass)
  • Ambient light sensor
  • Barometer
  • Haptic engine
  • Optical heart rate monitor (PPG)
  • Microphone
  • Proximity

OS 

  • OS: Wear by Google
  • COMPATIBILITY: Android 4.3+ / iOS 9.4+ 

CONNECTIVITY

  • Bluetooth® 4.2 Low Energy
  • WLAN 2.4 GHz 802.11 b/g/n
  • GPS
  • NFC

BATTERY

  • 500mAh Li-Polymer battery
  • Up to 90 hours with mixed usage and with kinetic movement

story:
Enhance your Lifestyle!

If you would fully live your passion - what would be the outcome?

 

Yogarts is the result of passion, a dream and the curiosity to try out something new.

Our love for Art, Movement and Freedom has brought these new mats to life.

 

The Product

 

In choosing material, production, co-operators and size we have tried to make the mats as natural, environmentally - as well as people-friendly, stink-free on delivery, washable, light and practical in carrying around, beautiful and unique to look at and energetically inspiring to move on. People have been amazed by the material, the firm grip on the floor - which allows a heavy practice - the unique and energizing designs as well as the light weight compared to other mats.

 

The first Series is inspired by the 5 Tattwic Elements:

Fire, Earth, Water, Air and Light. Each Element has its very own essence and quality.

Fire would rule our passion, our drive, our willpower and strength in mind, our focus and motivation to go for what we want in life.

Earth really is about our roots, our centredness, stability and structure; it's slow and steady and allows us to connect very deeply with ourselves and the planet.

Water rules our emotions, our feelings and vulnerability. It is where we digest all the input and sensations of the world around us. Water is always in motion and constantly changing, like the tides. Deeply connecting to your emotional side allows for enhanced empathy and authenticity.

Air enhances our light-heartedness, it is flirty and loose. Always on the go and never settling. Like the butterfly, the light air breeze or the kiss of a stranger. This uniquely, divine touch of innocence, joy and easy pleasure without any further involvement. It is gone as soon as it has come.

Light. This element is only found in the tattwic system and might be a different experience for anyone. For me it is expansion, wideness and the connection to the divine. It has the golden qualities that so far outstretch our human experience. It is beyond and that is where it takes you.

 

The Benefits

By connecting to the Elements, we can purposefully connect to different aspects of our personality; enhance given qualities and talents; and re-activate those that lie dormant.

The Yoga Mat 'Earth'

  • Experience a new level of energy, use the power of the elements to energize!

  • Travel with the mat - not only ex- but also internally

  • Fully connect with your mat and through that with various layers of yourself

  • Relate more deeply to your own practice, nature and the surrounding energies

  • Enjoy the calming comfort of your soft mat's surface!

  • Protect our planet with healthy and environmentally friendly production

  • Receive your mat stink-free and be able to wash it whenever it has undergone any (too) sweaty adventures with you

  • Make it your new best Companion

  • Be different and impress with the unique designs

  • Make it even more personal! Get creative and make your very own personal yoga mat design! >>> More info on that will follow soon. <<<

 

The Elements

Which one will you choose to work with first?

 

The Story

The whole project of Yogarts started in mid 2017 at a small local airport in Mexico. By that time I was working at a Yoga Healing Retreat in Puerto Escondido as a Yoga and meditation teacher and assistant retreat manager. While waiting for my ongoing flight, this one thought crossed my mind:

"If the space I go to in meditation, is the same space that all my drawings come from - why wouldn't I combine the two and enhance each one by the other?" The idea was born.

 

After all the stages we have gone through so far, we want to go live NOW. So next is:

  • Finalizing Website and Online Platforms
  • Marketing, Social Media, Online and Local Presence
  • Having you involved! In sharing your experience, contributing with your ideas, etc.

 

What your contribution means to us

  • Our next step is placing the first big order
  • For that we need a minimum of 2500€
  • And an estimate of how many interested prospects we actually have

 

The Challenges

Since Yoga has become quite a widespread and popular trend in today's time, there is a variety of different techniques and styles, studios and certified Yogis around - just as different types of Yoga Mats! So being outstanding, unique and eye-catching in-midst of all these existing designs and variations in thickness, length, etc. could be a challenge. To honestly make some profit out of the process of design, production, online presentation, marketing and shipping might be another!

We believe, wherever there is a dream and a vision, it is possible for us to achieve it! We just need to keep going and strive towards pursuing it. Create a good plan, keep the focus and work hard.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

In case you can't contribute in regards of financial matters or aren't particularly interested in ordering any mat right now, yet would like to help in another way, there are plenty of opportunities to do so, liek sharing on your Social Media Profile or through your local network for example.

Your help means a lot to us, and we would appreciate your comments and suggestions!

 

>>> For all further information, questions and plans for the future coming, please send us an inquiry, message or contact us via the comment section on the Indiegogo Campaign page.

We are looking forward to be sharing and cooperating with you!

story:
About the Project




L8 Boy Clothing was created by Me (Josiah Terronez) a eighteen year old artist (fresh out of high school), who has a passion for art and a love for fashion. I've always enjoyed illustration, photography, graphic design and fashion. I decided that it was my mission to bring art and design to modern fashion. 

I'm just like any other eighteen year old boy, I play video games, read comics, and spend most of my time watching television. But It was time to get off my ass and do something for myself. As a young artist I wanted to create something of my own, combining my love for fashion and passion for art to created LATE BOY Clothing; a illustration and design driven brand, with the influences of streetwear and modern apparel.  





It all started with an Idea. I've always wanted to start my own brand, I just never had the courage to start it. But after sitting on the idea for awhile, and imagining what this company could become, I decided to just go for it. 

The Logo Process






I started to design shirts, to show off one of the brand logos. 


Men's Heather Grey Shirt & Black Shirt 


*note that these are photos of old prototype shirts.* 


Late Boy Heather Grey (Back)


Side by Side: Black Shirt (Front) & Heather Grey Shirt (Back) 


Late Boy Black Shirt (Front) 





Men's Heather Grey Shirt & Black Shirt 


Women's Heather Grey Shirt & Black Shirt 


Dry Summers Shirts (Red)- Limited Supply



Men's Dry Summer Shirt (Red)


Men's Dry Summer Shirt (Black)


Men's Dry Summer Shirt (Yellow, Red, Black)


Women's Dry Summer Shirt (Yellow, Red, Black)


"11 x 17" Dry Summers Signed Print 


The Future 

Although above you only see one shirt design, these are only the beginning to what the company will create. The design was made to simply to get the brands name out to the world. The goal is to print more designs and products, that I have lined up for the future. Hopefully if I reach my campaign goal I can launch my first collection.

I have big dreams for this company. But at the moment all I have is dreams. So, I need your help to make those dreams a reality. Your contributions will help me build a online business of my own. 

By funding this campaign you will help me:

  • Launch My Official Site.
  • Print More Shirts / Products
  • Create My First Collection
  • To Make the Business as Professional as Possible


Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you for taking the time to read through the campaign. 

If you want to keep up to date with Late Boy's progress; You can follow us on Instagram & Twitter (@l8boyclothing). Dont forget to share the campaign with all your friends and family.  

Thanks friends.

The goal is to print more designs and products, that I have lined up for the future. Hopefully if I reach my campaign goal I can launch my first collection.
I have big dreams for this company. But at the moment all I have is dreams. So, I need your help to make those dreams a reality. Your contributions will help me build a online business of my own. 
By funding this campaign you will help me:


Launch My Official Site.
Print More Shirts / Products
Create My First Collection
To Make the Business as Professional as Possible







Other Ways You Can Help

Thank you for taking the time to read through the campaign. 
If you want to keep up to date with Late Boy's progress; You can follow us on Instagram & Twitter (@l8boyclothing). Dont forget to share the campaign with all your friends and family.  



Thanks friends.

story:
Imagine a premium watch at an affordable price, combining an innovative mix of precision cut wood, high grade stainless steel, sapphire glass and with high quality automatic movement... 

Welcome to the new Goodwood range from Designed On Nature's Kingdom (DONK).

Based in North Yorkshire (England), but inspired by many years of life on the road as two friends, trekking and biking some of the world's most inspirational landscapes, our company truly reflects our love of an adventurous lifestyle.

As we increasingly live in a battery operated, disposable age where products have a life span of months not years, creating a visible, self-powered watch mechanism was at the forefront of our design process, leaving you in control of your time.

When we conceptualised the Goodwood range we set out with two very clear aims; to produce the best mix-material, long lasting watch available and to produce this at an affordable price. We hope you will join us in our next adventure, launching Goodwood to the world!


Press/Reviews

http://www.thetimebum.com/2015/04/preview-goodw...

http://the-gadgeteer.com/2015/04/21/goodwood-wo...

More about us

We are Designed on nature's kingdom and specialise in precision crafted wooden watches. We have been trading in England for the past 18 months and currently have a range of ten watches, and are stocked in more than 30 stores, and receive orders online from all around the world.

The Specifics

Case Width - 40mm

Case Depth - 12mm

Movement - NH35A

Strap Width - 20mm

Clasp - Fold over safety clasp with push button

Waterproof - 5ATM

Weight - Max 94g


Warranty

All our watches come with a 1 year warranty.

Shipping

We offer free worldwide shipping. However you are liable for any import duty due in your country.

Visit Us On

https://www.facebook.com/donkwoodenwatches

https://instagram.com/donkwatches/

story:
Hello Indiegogo, my name is Jakša Račić.

Sock's Secrets is a project I started two years ago out of trouble I had. Namely, when I used to spend a lot of time behind the steering wheel, I had problems with excessive feet sweating and therefore unpleasant smells. Since I have an innovative spirit I came up with an idea for this product.

I don't like travelling nor working by myself, so I gathered friends of different occupations/proffesions who helped me with the development of this project. With a team of experts we created socks which completely meet my personal needs, but also the needs of many like me.

We planned collecting a total amount of 32.000 USD with this campaign.

We contrived investing that money into two currently most important processes:

  • 23.000 USD – to purchase raw materials needed for the first phase of production.

  • The rest of the money (9.000 USD) – would be invested into marketing activities. Part of it to create a web page with a web shop, part of it to make marketing materials such as flyers, bilboards ect. needed for presentations on trade shows, the attendance of trade shows itself and of course investment in web advertising and growth on social media.

If we don't raise all the money we intented to, our priority is the purchase of raw materials, after which we'll invest the rest of the money into marketing.

We developed a product „ANTIMICROBAL SOCKS“ which allow the feet to sweat, but disable the procreation of fungus, bacteria and microbs which are the reason why unpleasant smells occure. Our product consists of high quality cotton cultivated in controlled conditions, dyed with dyes that don't have heavy metals in them. The knit on the sole of the socks that prevents procreation of microbs is in its original production color and has multiannual activness. Ordinary laundry washing doesn't affect its properties.

The „JR SOCKS“ were created out of need to protect small valuable items, e.g. ID cards, credit cards, cash, mobile phones ect., additionally from possible theft or  loss. The „JR SOCKS“ also have antimicrobal properties.

Our team consists of people with different proffesions and skills: IT specialists, sales managers, accountants, textile experts, innovators...but with same team spirit and sedulity. This gives us the confidence to believe in the future of our project and campaign.

In case we don't raise enough money to reach the goal of this campaign, part of it will be invested in similar marketing channels and fundrising!

story:
Globally more than 350 million pairs of shoes are discarded, while 1.2 billion people still do not have footwear. At Greensole, we recycle discarded shoes to comfortable footwear, keeping them away from landfills and provide them to children in need.

Towards building a self-sustaining social venture, here we are with our first upcycled retail collection! 

The Corona Crisis induced the shutdown of our production. However, we want to keep on paying the salaries of the women in our skill center. Therefore, we decided to pre-sell our first upcycled retail collection. With every pair sold, an old pair of shoes would be upcycled in the skill centre and donated to children in need.

And we promise you an awesome pair of slippers.

 

Together, we empower Indian women & children

  • We train women to recycle old shoes and pay them a salary. Our goal is also to open 2 skill centers in Maharashtra and Rajasthan in the upcoming year. 
  • We donate slippers to children in need, making their walk to school safe & fun.

Together, we make the world a little more green

  • We save CO² emission by upcycling old shoes instead of burning them 
  • We prevent shoes from ending up in landfills
  • The materials used in the slippers are 70% recyclable & 100% vegan

 

We are striving towards a 100% recyclable retail range. Our R&D team works hard to apply the latest processes. We'll keep you up-to-date on the developments of the product. 

 

Don't need shoes right now? No worries. You can help us in your own way:

  • A small contribution would also helps us set-up the skill centers, to donate more pairs of slippers to children in need. We promise you a personal note from the women helped. 
  • Get the word out! Share our campaign now via the Indiegogo share tools. 
  • Reach out to us in case you would like to contribute in another way.

story:
1.Presentation

A new lingerie brand for women of premium segment and appealing, unique cultural DNA with sophisticated handcraft. 

We create a new approach to female empowerment.

This brand is devoted to the Russian Ballet as Ballet is the key cultural indicator of Russian heritage.

Classical ballet is part of art where Russia was always leading worldwide.

Similar to Faberge Russian Ballet enjoys an elite association (similar to the Polo brand of Ralph Lauren) and offers a rich world of design motives.  

We think about the female body in its magnificent movements and we interpret it in lingerie.

The brand is all about strong, active, smart, stylish women, sporty and healthy bodies that are sexually liberated and free.

We want to create something that represents the confidence our underwear gives the wearer

and we represent the woman of a new generation.

We produce sensual innovation.

Furthemore we are going to realize this project in VR as a Virtual World Lingerie show.

This is a great performance we make in VR and it will be the same event like to go to Bolshoi theatre or Opera or Royal Opera House.

After the show you can buy our lingerie online or visit our private show rooms.

This show will be available in all messengers like Telegram, Viber, Youtube.

Special limited collections will be created for these virtual shows.

2.Key Achievements to Date (bullet points)

Design study 
Brand registration 
Prepresentation for leading retailers
Supply chain management

3. Investment Requirement 

500 000 usd

4.Use of Funds 

50 % purchase of goods,increasing sales turnover 

10 % administrative costs

40% marketing /VR

5.Business Model 

Business model with low start-up investments – using new technology and changes in distribution network.  Stable demand for the designed goods in the absence of strong competition in this market segment in Russia - only two competing well established brands.

Beautiful design with ballet theme and for Russian as well as international trendsetters.

High quality, handcraft – product development with leading French lace company – key supplier of Agent Provocateur and Dolce - Gabbana

Affordable and competitive price, cost advantage because project is based in Russia mainly.

6.Competition 

Our competitors:

Aubade

Agent Provocateur

Victoria`s Secret

Etam

Our competitive advantage:

Development local сollection, considering special characteristics of figures of Russian women

Beautiful design with ballet theme and for Russian / international trendsetters

High quality, handcraft – product development with leading French lace company – key supplier of Agent Provocateur and Dolce - Gabbana

Affordable and competitive price, cost advantage because project is based in Russia

Experienced of design team

7.Market Information 

The lingerie market in Russia :

US $3.2 billion in total

10-15% - PREMIUM

320-480 US$ million

8 million consumers

Spending on Lingerie per year & per person: about 100

US$ in Russia and 1000 US$ abroad

Despite high level of the competition on the market, this project is realized in the market niche where for the time being no real competition.

Our average price for the set will be 250 USD.

It is 60 % cheaper than Aubade and Agent Provocateur

story:
About the project

 

A NORMAL WALLET

1/  IS CUMBERSOME     2/  DEFORMS THE POCKETS        3/  IS HEAVY   

SO WE HAVE CREATED

HANDY

A NICE EXTRA FLAT WALLET 

HANDY IS JUST
BEAUTIFUL PRACTICAL & ​ROBUST !

BEAUTIFUL

MADE OF GENUINE LEATHER AND THICK COTON CANVAS

3 COLORS : NAVY BLUE - OLIVE GREEN - RED BURGUNDY

MAKE A GREAT PRESENT WITH THE GIFT BOX 

PRACTICAL

PULL-OUT SYSTEM TO GET THE CARDS OUT

A SNAP-BUTTON TO SECURE THE CARDS

SLIM BUT A GOOD STORAGE CAPACITY : UNTIL 12 CARDS !

2 SLOTS 
ONE FOR COINS AND KEYS
ONE FOR THE BANK NOTES AND THE BILLS

COINS AND BANK NOTES DO NOT COME OUT

ROBUST

HANDY is made with good quality leather
which has been oiled and waxed
giving it an inimitable vintage look.
Each friction or scratch changes the appearance
of the leather without altering its quality

Coton canvas 8oz,
Nice finishing and robust sewing.
HANDY has been tested and improved for several months to get a final version at the top!

For a first use you will have to draw a couple of times your cards to make the HANDY system slides perfectly.
(Leather need to be relaxed a little bit)

What are the funds for?

Supporting our campaign and talking about it to your friends and family will help us to develop our company.
Today we are only 2 person working on Alaskan MAKER but our dream is to hire and develop more talent in our team.
All will be possible only thanks to you!

DELIVERY

The pre-order system is the most efficient way to offer you an exceptional level of quality with a fair price. We plan 2 differents waves of delivery depending of the number of pre-order we get, here is the detail :

SHIPMENT BEFORE THE
30th NOVEMBER 2017

For the first 1.000 HANDY

SHIPMENT BEFORE THE 
15th OF DECEMBER 2017

For the following HANDY

SHIPPING COSTS

The delivery costs of $4,5 are included in the price. No surprises when validating your cart!
For the rest of the world a supplement of 5 dollar will be requested. 

About the project owner

WHO ARE WE ?

 

After several years in the business, we decided to create a project that resembles us.
We dreamed of designing beautiful practical and robust accessories.
The starting point, our crazy INDIEGOGO Campaign in March 2017 (Review the campaign here)
during which we sold 720 aprons. User feedbacks are great.

Alaskan MAKER was born!

Since we have created the Alaskan MAKER FIREPIT which is for sale on our site
The Handy wallet is one of our latest creations

Our challenge is very simple:
Proving that it is still possible to sell at a very correct price, quality accessories, beautiful and practical.
We will need you to help us in this mission.

Thank you all for your support !

story:
Introducing WalletsMatter 

Wallet Matter is designed for people who enjoy the minimalist way of life. We designed the wallet for ourselves because we hate carrying around a bunch of junk in our pockets like  1$ bills, coins, receipts, and  multiple loyalty cards (Seriously, how loyal do you want us to be).


Thanks to Technology, Digitalization, & Steve Jobs almost all our transactions, receipts and bunch of other stuff are happening on our smartphones, making all the extra stuff you carry in your wallet a thing of the past.  


We believe that all you really need in your wallet are your essentials - YOUR CARDS. Wallet Matter was created with this in mind - to be a super-thin, easy to carry, no bulk wallet.

 

Fat Wallets Make Your Pants Look Less Fashionable and Causes You Back Pains !

 

 

At only 0.16”, Wallet Matter is as thin as the cards in your pocket.


 

 

 


 

“We made a Wallet that is aesthetically   Minimalistic & Simple.”

 

WalletsMatter's Design Approach

Our mission is not to reinvent the wallet, but to simplify it.
Our Design approach was to emphasize the simplicity of a Wallet.

WalletMatter’s design character is focusing on minimalism in both aesthetics and functions. The design has been inspired by a single piece craftsmanship. 
“WalletsMatter was born out of our desire to be SIMPLE and EFFECTIVE”   

If you’re using the old school wallet style like one from 50 years ago, it’s time for a facelift.

WalletsMatter is in 1st lot manufacturing phase and we will look to ship out by February 2018. We have worked extremely hard to partner with top local manufacturers to ensure WalletsMatter is shipment ready by February. However, here is what I see as some of the risk & challenges.

Risk & Challenges 

Fulfillment

Sometimes things go awry that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline, a machine breaks down, or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. To minimize the possibility of manufacturing setbacks we will enter the manufacturing stage with at least one backup supplier & my product commercialization experts will help ensure smooth sailing from our suppliers and factories.

Product Adjustments

As WalletsMatter gets geared up for production, there will likely be some minor adjustments to improve the final product. Pre-production prototypes are made to test and refine the product and allow us to incorporate our adjustments and those suggested by experienced manufacturing partners. These will always be for the benefit of you, the consumer, and we will let you know exactly how and why any are made.


Manufacturing

We are working with top manufacturers with years of experience making Wallets. We are confident that these years of experience and expertise will ensure our products are shipment ready as per our designated deadline. 


Thank You

We will be working with manufacturers who have years of experience delivering excellent products in tremendous quantities. There will no doubt be some surprises along the road, but any obstacle will be addressed by combining our internal knowledge with external expertise, and an overall goal of making the best possible product for you. Any pledge amount brings us one step closer to our goal. Help us make WalletsMatter into the best wallet by clicking the ‘Back This Project’ button at the top of the page, or by helping us spread the word by sharing our page.

We raise a toast in your honor and say ‘Thank you’ for your help!

story:
Introducing the Everyday Duffle: The Most Versatile Duffle Bag on the Market 

We have designed a bag that makes hitting the gym before or after work easier.  As an attorney, it was difficult to fit exercise into my chaotic schedule.  We have designed a bag that keeps everything you need for your day organized and clean, so you can easily hit the gym before, during, or after work.   

The Perfect Work Companion to the Modern Day Briefcase

FEATURES

The Everyday Duffle is designed to make your life easier by helping you keep your clean clothes ready for work and your dirty clothes isolated from the rest of your gear.  The everyday duffle comes with two shoe pockets: one for your dirty gym shoes, and another one for your work shoes.  The bag also has a roll garment bag to keep clothes from getting wrinkled, a dopp kit for your bathroom essentials, a waterproof laundry bag for your dirty clothes, two external pockets, and four internal pockets.  

Available In Three Colors

Two Shoe Compartments - One for Gym Shoes and One for Dress Shoes

Two Vents on Each Shoe Pocket For Sufficient Ventilation​

Garment Roll Bag

Keep Your Clothes Rolled Up Neatly in Your Bag

Laundry Bag to Keep Your Dirty Clothes Separate From the Rest of Your Gear

External Pockets For Keys & Headphones

Four Internal Pockets For Additional Storage

Four Internal Pockets For Additional Storage

MATERIALS

To make sure that the Everyday Duffle is durable and will last, we started with the highest grade materials.

The leather on this bag is vegetable tanned leather that is sourced from one of the oldest and most respected Italian tanneries in the world.  This leather is durable and will age beautifully with each additional use. 

For the exterior of the bag, we chose a 10 oz. waxed cotton to make the bag water resistant and durable. In addition, we used the most reliable zippers on the market, YKK zippers, to ensure that the bag will last.

Luxurious Italian Vegetable Tanned Leather

Using Old World Tannery Techniques

Durable 10 oz Waxed Cotton

YKK Zippers Designed to Last

DESIGN

When we started designing the Everyday Duffle, we wanted to have a great looking bag that also functional and easy to use.  After numerous iterations, we were able to incorporate the functionality we needed for everyday use into a great looking bag.

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS

PROJECT TIMELINE

September 6th - Indiegogo Closes

September 27th - Send Out Surveys

October 1st - Send Purchase Order to Factory

November 1st - Start Production

December 1st - Ship From Factory 

December 15th - Ship Out in Time for Christrmas

PAST CAMPAIGNS 

See What People are Saying About Our Products!

Check out last three Crowdfunding campaigns below:

THE MODERN DAY BRIEFCASE

 

THE BRETON WEEKENDER

 

THE CONVENIENT MINIMALIST WALLET

 

FAQ

1. INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING: IMPORT DUTY AND TAXES

We can collect import duty and taxes for certain countries. We will collect these additional fees in Backerkit after the campaign closes. We are able to collect import duty and taxes for all member countries of the E.U., UK, Canada, South Korea, Mexico, Brazil, and Chile. 

 Import Duties and Taxes will not be charged on the Convenient Minimalist Wallet by Austraila, Hong Kong, New Zealand, and Singapore. 

 Unfortunately, we are unable to collect import duty and taxes form any other country.

Here is a handy tool that can assist you in calculating duties. Remember to convert the US dollars to your local currency:

http://www.dutycalculator.com/new-import-duty-a...
