story:
Passer à la version Française

 


Meet Goji Lowly !

Jewelry that connects you to the essentials.

 

Goji is the present moment, the time of a glance and a gesture.

Nacre, turquoise, ebony, coconut, this jewel glorifies what nature has given us. Dressed with pink, blue, red and orange leather, it brightens your day and connects you to the essential.

The essential is what matters. It's different for each one of us. 

Whether your essentials are your children or your parents, your job or private life, it needs your full attention. 

Goji, in a non-intrusive and discreet way, uses the last technologies to connect you to the essential. Through vibrations, you stay informed if your closed ones need you or if you have to fulfill a task.

Goji Lowly is a soft start for your digital detox.

Enjoy the present moment, Goji takes care of the rest.

 

Researches have been done about our interactions with our smartphone, that we check around 210 times a day.

The results clearly show that constantly having a smartphone besides us has a negative impact on our attention span.

 

To disable all notifications might be too much.

Goji filters and sends you vibrations when the notification matters.

 

 

Who is it for?

For you, your friends, relatives, that can’t let go of the smartphone, afraid from missing an important information.

For those who want to take a moment to breathe, to focus on their daily essentials.

 

Goji in 3 Steps

 

Discreet vibrations for call & messages

Select your most important contacts (family, friends or job) and receive a discreet vibration when they call or send you a message.

Event reminder

The App connects automatically to your calendar. You won't forget your mother-in-law's birthday anymore ! ;-)

Alarm Clock

Don't wake up your SO or your neighbours.

You can create a recurring alert and wake up with a discreet vibration.

Then your jewel will vibrate, even if you turn off your phone.

Contactless payment

Goji Lowly will benefit from new functionnalities such as contactless payment.

We are currently working with our developers to integrate this into our jewel/application. 

Activity follow-up

You can easily measure your heart rate with our application.

Meditation

Stay zen, follow the bubble.

Our App integrates a breathing exercice so you can stay zen during your morning commute.

 

Another variation has been thought by our designer: a necklace that allows women who do not like or cannot wear jewelry on their wrist. They can stay in touch with their friends and family while keeping their phone in the bag.

 

Choose your color!

A new range of quality leather bracelets sewed by hand. You can swap them, in order to reflect your personality with your Goji Lowly.

The leather bracelets are designed for every type of wrists. You can mix & match depending on your mood. The casing is made of chrome cobalt, a surgical steel that prevents allergies.

This unique jewelry brings technology and craftmanship together. The casing are made with an additive production, then our designer works on it by hand so each piece can fit perfectly.

This smart jewel allows you to disconnect from your phone without missing any important information. Break free from the digital world while staying in touch with what matters the most.

 

The Perks

 

 

Get the french smart jewel that will improve your daily life and get rid of your digital stress.

 

Connect Goji Lowly to your phone with our App.

 

Usage of the fundings

 

Timeline

 

Team Goji

We are a start-up based in Nantes.

FAQs

Can I shower with my Goji Lowly?

The jewelry resists to water. However it isn't recommended to keep the jewel under water for a long time because this leads to a worsening of the leather bracelet.

How do I set it up?

To set-up your Goji Lowly, you have to connect it to your smartphone (iOs or Android) with out application. Then follow the instructions on the screen. Follow this link to access a page where you'll find a download link.

I cannot launch the app on my phone.

If you are having some difficulties to launch our application on your smartphone, please verify that the application is updated. If the problem is tenacious, delete then install the application again. For any question about this topic, send us a mail at this address: solution@hi-goji.com

What do you mean by mix & match?

We are currently working on an easy way for anyone to change the appearance of their Goji Lowly with simple steps.

The electronic part is detachable from the jewel. It allows you to simply remove it from the casing and putting it back to another casing. It is also possible to remove the current bracelet and swap it with another one with a different color.

Can you tell me more about the dinner?

Around March 2018 we are going to organize an event in which our supporters will be able to test the prototypes and have a chat with us. The event will be orgainzed in Nantes, France.

If you are in France or around Nantes and want to participate, see the perk "Dinner with Goji".

Can you tell me more about the "Trip Made in Nantes"?

Discover the behind the scenes of Goji Lowly. Follow us around Nantes, we are going to show you where we are producing Goji. It is an amazing opportunity to learn more about our project and the start-up world.

 

Find us on : 

 

Our partners: 

 

They talk about us:

 

___

VERSION FRANCAISE

 

Voici Goji !

Le bijou qui vous connecte à votre essentiel.

 

Goji c'est l'instant présent.

Nacre, turquoise, ébène, noix de coco, ce bijou magnifie les matières que la nature nous a donné. Habillé de cuir rose, bleu, rouge ou orangé, il éclaire votre journée et vous connecte à l’essentiel. 

L’essentiel est ce qui compte. Il est différent pour chacun, selon nos impératifs du quotidien.

Que votre essentiel soit vos enfants ou vos parents, votre métier ou votre vie privée, il nécessite votre attention pleine et entière. Cette attention est aujourd'hui trop souvent détournée par ces notifications numériques qui nous submergent en permanence. 

Profitez de l’instant présent, Goji s'occupe du reste.

 

Des recherches ont été faites à propos de nos interactions avec notre smartphone, que nous regardons en moyenne 210 fois par jour.

Les résultats montrent clairement qu'avoir un smartphone constamment avec nous a un impact négatif sur notre attention.

 

Désactiver toutes les notifications est une solution un peu trop drastique.

Goji filtre et vous envoie des vibrations lorsque la notification est importante pour vous.

 

 

Goji utilise les dernières technologies de façon discrète et non-intrusive pour vous connecter à l’essentiel. Ses vibrations vous informent si vos proches ont besoin de vous, si vous avez une mission à accomplir.

 

Pour qui est Goji ?

Pour vous, vos amies, vos proches, ayant du mal à lâcher le téléphone, de peur de rater une information importante.

Pour celles qui souhaitent prendre du recul pour se concentrer sur les moments essentiels de leur quotidien.

 

D'où vient Goji ?

Nous sommes une start-up Nantaise qui a pour objectif d'améliorer notre quotidien. La première version du bijou Goji est née de l’alliance d’un savoir-faire artisanal et de nouvelles technologies, le tout dans un bijou design, fabriqué en France.

Après le succès de cette première version, l’équipe Goji vous propose aujourd’hui de contribuer à la production de nouveaux bijoux, plus féminins, plus fins. Ils bénéficient de nouvelles fonctionnalités telles que le paiement sans contact, l'accompagnement dans vos activités physiques, la méditation, et un nouveau mode de recharge par induction encore plus pratique.

 

Goji en 3 étapes

 

Vibrations discrètes pour vos messages et appels

Sélectionnez vos contacts les plus importants (famille, amis ou travail) et recevez une vibration discrète lorsqu'ils vous appellent ou vous envoient un message.

Rappel d'évènements

L'application se connecte tout seule à votre calendrier. Vous n'oublierez plus l'anniversaire de votre belle-mère. ;-)

Réveil

Ne réveillez plus votre moitié ou vos voisins.

Vous pouvez créer une alerte récurrente et vous réveiller avec une discrète vibration.

Votre Goji Lowly vibrera, même si vous éteignez votre téléphone.

Paiement sans contact

Le bijou va bénéficier de nouvelles fonctionnalités telles que le paiement sans contact.

Nous travaillons avec nos développeurs pour l'intégrer dans notre bijou/application. 

Suivi d'activité

Vous pouvez facilement mesurer votre pouls avec notre application.

Méditation

Restez zen, suivez la bulle.

Notre application intègre un exercice de respiration. Qui vous apprend à être zen en toute circonstance.

 

Une nouvelle variation a été pensé par notre designer : le collier Goji permettra aux femmes qui n'aiment pas ou ne peuvent pas porter de bijoux au poignet de pouvoir garder le contact avec leurs proches tout en se détachant de leur smartphone.

Choisissez votre couleur !

Une nouvelle gamme de bracelets de cuir de qualité cousus main interchangeables vous permettra de personnaliser le bijou Goji pour qu’il vous ressemble. Les bracelets en cuir sont cousus main et pensés pour tous les types de poignets. Ils sont interchangeables à l’envie. Le boitier est fait en chrome cobalt, un acier chirurgical ce qui permet d'éviter les allergies.

Ce bijou unique allie technologie de pointe et artisanat. Les boitiers sont réalisés en fabrication additive, ils sont ensuite travaillés à la main afin que toutes les pièces s’adaptent parfaitement.

Le bijou connecté Goji permet de vous déconnecter du téléphone sans manquer une seule de vos actualités importantes. Débarrassez-vous du superflu et connectez-vous à l’essentiel.

 

Les contreparties

 

 

Soutenez la production française du bijou qui allie design, savoir-faire et technologie pour plus de bien être numérique.

 

Application gratuite disponible sur iOs et Android.

 

 

Utilisation des fonds

 

Timeline

 

La team Goji

 

FAQs

Puis-je me doucher avec mon Goji ?

Le bijou résiste à l'eau. Cependant il n'est pas recommandé de laisser le bijou sous l'eau pendant une longue durée car cela dégrade le bracelet en cuir.

Comment le paramétrer ?

Pour paramétrer votre Goji, vous devez le connecter à votre smartphone (iOs ou Android) avec notre application. Suivez les instructions qui apparaissent sur l'écran. Veuillez suivre ce lien pour accéder à la page du téléchargement de l'application.

Je ne peux pas lancer l'application sur mon téléphone.

Si vous avez des difficultés pour lancer notre application sur votre smartphone, veuillez vérifier que l'application est à jour. Si le problème persiste, supprimez l'application puis installez-là de nouveau. Pour toute question sur ce sujet, envoyez-nous un email à cette adresse: solution@hi-goji.com

Que voulez-vous dire par interchangeable ?

Nous travaillons actuellement sur une manière simple pour n'importe qui de changer l'apparence de leur Goji, avec des étapes simples.

La partie électronique est détachable. Cela vous permet de l'enlever du module simplement et de la mettre dans un module différent. Il est également possible d'enlever le bracelet actuel et de le changer avec un bracelet d'une couleur différente.

Pouvez-vous m'en dire plus au sujet du dîner?

Autour de mars 2018, nous organiserons un évènement dans lequel nos contributeurs auront l'occasion de tester les prototypes et de discuter avec nous. Cet évènement sera organisé à Nantes, en France.

SI vous êtes en France ou autour de Nantes et souhaitez y participer, veuillez vous référer à la contrepartie "Dinner with Goji".

Pouvez-vous m'en dire plus au sujet du "Trip Made in Nantes"?

Découvrez ce qu'il se passe derrière la création du Goji. Suivez-nous autour de Nantes, nous souhaitons vous montrer où se passe la production du Goji. C'est une superbe opportunité d'en apprendre plus sur notre projet et le monde des start-up.

Retrouvez-nous sur : 

 

Nos partenaires : 

Goji dans la presse :

Il est également possible d'enlever le bracelet actuel et de le changer avec un bracelet d'une couleur différente.Pouvez-vous m'en dire plus au sujet du dîner?Autour de mars 2018, nous organiserons un évènement dans lequel nos contributeurs auront l'occasion de tester les prototypes et de discuter avec nous. Cet évènement sera organisé à Nantes, en France.SI vous êtes en France ou autour de Nantes et souhaitez y participer, veuillez vous référer à la contrepartie "Dinner with Goji".Pouvez-vous m'en dire plus au sujet du "Trip Made in Nantes"?Découvrez ce qu'il se passe derrière la création du Goji. Suivez-nous autour de Nantes, nous souhaitons vous montrer où se passe la production du Goji. C'est une superbe opportunité d'en apprendre plus sur notre projet et le monde des start-up.Retrouvez-nous sur :  Nos partenaires : Goji dans la presse :

story: ​

How Waseem Authentic Came About

The inspiration for Waseem Authentic came when I needed products to manage my beard but couldn’t find a brand that I could support. I grow my beard due to religious reasons, but it gets prickly, itchy and messy from time to time. When I searched for products to help with that, I found brands that promoted themselves using silly gimmicks with the word ‘lumbersexual’ flying around a lot. I don’t keep my beard to attract women or look manly. I don’t do it to please others, I do it for me. I wanted a product that was simple and got the job done but was from a brand that I could get behind. So I grabbed a couple buddies and started my own.

Beard and Hair Oil

Nourish your beard with natural oils that will hydrate your beard and the skin underneath while tucking in flyaway hairs and treating split-ends. Keep your beard soft, full, shiny, flake-free, groomed and smelling fresh.  Perfect for the hair on top your head too.

Beard Wash

Made with raw honey and natural therapeutic oils, this 2 – in – 1 shampoo and conditioner for your beard will clean gently and hydrate to keep your beard from looking shaggy.

Exfoliating Cleanser

Beard oil may not be suitable for short beards or stubble. But they still itch right? That’s where our exfoliating cleanser and moisturizer come in. Our foaming exfoliating cleanser with hibiscus petals and jojoba beads gently sloughs off dead skin cells to relieve itch without stripping essential oils from skin. Gentle enough for daily use.

All-Purpose Moisturizer

Avocado Oil, Jojoba, Aloe Vera, Shea Butter, Vitamin E and Grapeseed Oil will shield your face from abuse from the elements, as well as abuse from your own fingernails. Perfect for your body too.

All pledges of $10 CAD or more will come with a hand-written Thank You note from our owner himself, a Waseem Authentic branded cookie for you to remember us by and discounted shipping that will not be available during retail.

Giving Back

Beards are a lot about community than the individual that they are on. Therefore, we have partnered with WaterAid so that when you look after your facial hair, you will be looking after millions across the world who don't have access to clean water, sanitation or hygiene.

10% of every dollar we make will go towards providing safe water and sanitation to people, communities and economies worldwide.

WaterAid focuses on providing safe water, decent toilets and good hygiene – the three essentials that unlock progress for people, communities and economies worldwide. Without all three, people can’t live dignified, healthy lives. With all three, they can break free from poverty, unleash their potential and change their lives for good. WaterAid works in 38 countries worldwide, transforming millions of lives every year with clean water, sanitation and hygiene projects.

Right now, the world’s poorest people do not have access to clean water, sanitation or hygiene. This crisis is ruining lives and holding back development. Good hygiene maximizes the benefits of clean water and proper toilets, preventing the spread of deadly disease and keeping people healthy so they can go to school or earn a living.

In just 35 years, with the global support of amazing supporters, WaterAid has made enormous progress. Since 1981, they have provided 24.9 million people with safe water, and since 2004, 24 million people have received improved sanitation. Their goal is to provide clean water and safe toilets to everyone, everywhere by 2030.

You and your beard can be a part of that progress.

We will accept pledges for June and July and will begin to ship our products two months after. That will provide ample time to refine our products and ensure that you receive the best care for your beard. The first 50 backers will be a part of our early-user group and be able to try out our products first-hand before we launch so that we can provide the best products based on your specific beard care needs.

 

If you can't back the project, there are other ways to support. Follow us on Facebook, Twitter and Instagram at Waseem Authentic and share the page and its posts to spread the word.

story:
Risks and challenges

Prior to this crowdfunding campaign, our working prototypes have been rigorously tested. We are confident that we will meet or beat our projected delivery dates. We have built-in extra time (“buffer”) for any potential delays in the manufacturing process and expect to ship by the projected dates. Our backers will be in the loop as we communicate updates at every stage of the process. Our manufacturers stand ready to begin production as soon as the campaign ends and we have successfully met our funding goal.

Long-lasting design

We spent almost 3 years researching sustainable and humanitarian production practices around the world to bring you what the best the world of watches can offer. Our timepieces are painstakingly hand-assembled in the Jura Mountains of Switzerland. Our production line is certified by the Swiss FH, meaning our quality rivals that of the most iconic Swiss heritage brands in the world. Although this means longer production times, the end result is well worth the wait. Each watch gets as much love as the next. This will ensure years of wear with minimum breakage.

Sustainable materials

One of our goals is to provide a sustainable solution for supercar parts that no longer have utility. By incorporating them into our watches, we are retelling their stories while reducing the impact they have on the planet.

Environmentally friendly factories

We chose our production line for their respect for their workers as well as mother earth. With humanitarian employer practices and waste reduction at the forefront of their mission, we are working on minimizing our impact on the planet.

story:
Meet the Clover Bag, the clever bag you always waited for

We are happy to present you the first innovative luxury bag - CLOVER.

We wanted to be like other market leaders, but our product turned out to be more technological and more convenient to use. All well-known brands care only about their name, but we care about you.

Yes, we know that we are expensive, but our Italian leather, accessories we use, our innovations as well as our labour cost a fortune.

Such a combination of quality and price as ours cannot be found in any other brand - we are the first.  Now, the Clover Bag is a high-functioning accessory that changes the way we understand bags.

 Our Clover collection for Kickstarter

The Clover bag keeps everything in order. It has a modular design, which means an inner part can be easily transferred to another bag.

The removable inner part – which lets you transfer items from one bag to another in a couple of seconds - just move the inner compartment with all the contents from one bag to the other. It really saves time. Available in 4 main models.

Inner removable part includes (for free):

  • wallet for coins
  • wireless light
  • key holder
  • bottle holder
  • headphone holder
  • branded steel pen and table bag holder

 Light up the bag! Light up the world!

 

The Clover bag lights everything up. Literally. No more arduous endeavors in search of needed things. Internal wireless light works from the motion sensor. To turn it on, simply put your hand in your bag. It helps you find things in the dark. Available in most of the models.

The bag combines beauty and functionality.

 The bag cares about every single detail and makes them simple for you.

 and a lot of accessories that keep your bags organized

PICK YOUR CLOVER BAG FOR A PERFECT LOOK

 

 OUR PRICES

FREE SHIPPING WORLDWIDE. Order any color from the presented ones. The price of a transfered inner bag and marked accessories are included. 

To purchase more than one product, select a reward for your first product. Then add the additional price for your subsequent products. 

By ordering two Clover bags with one inner removable part you can save 70 EUR. Also you can choose and order 3 bags - saving 140 EUR, and order 4 bags - saving 210 EUR from Kickstarter price. You save on an inner part that costs 70 EUR with all including accessories.

How we create Clover bags

 The finest natural Italian leather and furniture are used on every step of CLOVER’s production. Each bag is handcrafted to ensure high quality.

We ship all our bags in a beautiful Clover branded boxes

Want to know more information and photo about us - click the button below: 

 

Risks and challenges

Our main goal is to create the new brand of innovative, smart bags with high quality, high functionality and at same time high exterior standarts. Kickstarter is our first step on the way. We are opened for any ideas and ready to implement them in the future. Duty/VAT charges: Some international backers will be subjects to local customs import duties and taxes; these backers will be responsible for covering all of their local customs duties and taxes. Import duties and taxes are not covered by this Clover campaign. Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one. We hope that you will receive the package as soon as possible. Creating a new product is always a challenge, but we are well-prepared: we have signed contracts with reliable suppliers, we have the best craftsmen. We have done everything to create and deliver the best Clover bags to our backers on time.

story:
Our Project

N plus ONE design is an experienced watch design and manufacturing firm with over 20 years of experience who desire to deliver our own uniquely designed products directly to our customers.    

We are proud to introduce our unique unisex minimalist 40MM ISA K62/132 Swiss movement watch with a screwed-on bezel ring design that allows you to quickly switch the look and feel of the watch - The Model One.  Every pledge comes with three unique interchangeable stainless steel bezel rings at just $95!  With our vertically integrated supply chain, you can be confident that you will receive a watch made with the best materials available.     


Interchangeable Bezel Rings


Various Bezel Ring Combinations

The Watch

Swiss movement watches with 316L stainless steel cases typically retail for double or triple our price.  As an experienced watch design and manufacturing firm, we are able to provide true manufacturer direct pricing and bypass all intermediaries to offer this unique watch at just $95.

  Crown-less Circular Case



Case And Dial Combinations  

  • Case A: Black Leather Strap, Silver Case, Silver Dial, Electric Blue Hands
  • Case B: Black Leather Strap, Silver Case, Black Dial, Space Grey  Hands
  • Case C: Black Leather Strap, Black Case, Silver Dial, Space Grey Hands
  • Case D: Black Leather Strap, Black Case, Black Dial, Space Grey Hands

6 Unique Bezel Rings

  • Bezel Ring 1: Black Smooth Stainless Steel Bezel Ring 
  • Bezel Ring 2: Silver Smooth Stainless Steel Bezel Ring
  • Bezel Ring 3: Rose Gold Smooth Stainless Steel Bezel Ring
  • Bezel Ring 4: Black Knurled Texture Stainless Steel Bezel Ring
  • Bezel Ring 5: Silver Knurled Texture Stainless Steel Bezel Ring
  • Bezel Ring 6: Rose Gold Knurled Texture Stainless Steel Bezel Ring

Knurled Texture Stainless Steel Bezel Ring Details Shown Above

Smooth Stainless Steel Bezel Ring Details Shown Above

Stretch Goals

If we are able to meet our first stretch goal of $20,000, we will INCLUDE our Organic Vegetable Tanned leather strap with every pledge!


At the $40,000 mark, we will upgrade every watch lens to Sapphire Crystal!  



Setting Time


When the back button is pushed, the hands will move


Our Manufacturing Process
We have been designing and producing watches for the past 20 years and hold our products to the highest of quality standards.  Every watch is individually inspected prior to shipment to you.  Below is a small glimpse of the raw watch manufacturing process. 

 Watch case manufacturing process
Watch case cut-out process 


Pricing:

We don't believe that you need to spend $200 or more for a quality watch.  We want to be a part of the Indiegogo community and help to deliver quality products at a fair price.   As a watch design and manufacturing firm,  we are able to offer you the lowest price possible for a Swiss movement watch with the three stainless steel bezel rings.


Warranty

We are proud of the quality of our products and offer a 5-year limited warranty for the Model One.  Should you experience any problems with your watch within the that time frame, please reach out to us for repair or replacement.  


Timeline


Risks & Challenges

We have thoroughly analyzed our production and quality assurance process for over the past 20 year and are confident that we can deliver at the projected December delivery date.  If anything should happen to delay our anticipated delivery date, we will be sure to keep you updated on the latest news.


Need Your Support!

We've spent a large amount of time perfecting and prototyping this design and are excited to launch the project.  However, we need your support to turn our dream for the production of this watch into a reality.  By sharing and helping us reach our goal, we will be able to continue developing new exciting lines and watches in the future!   Thank you for your support!

 We've spent a large amount of time perfecting and prototyping this design and are excited to launch the project.  However, we need your support to turn our dream for the production of this watch into a reality.  By sharing and helping us reach our goal, we will be able to continue developing new exciting lines and watches in the future!   Thank you for your support!

story:
ESMAR X-shoe is a kind of magic shoe with special additive property. You can dirve it at  a top speed of 15km/h which is about 3 times than that of walking.  

If you need  a normal walking, the four rubber tires of the electric shoe will be automatic locked through controlling the bluetooth remote control. At the same time, the two elastic cushion of fore sole will eject. The locked tire will be as comfortable as rubber sole, and it can walk, run and jump as ordinary sports shoes on the basis of at least 7 supporting point. When needing to glide, pack up the two elastic cushion of fore sole through controlling the remote control, and the four rubber tires will automatic unlock, then it can normal travel with people on. On the basis of controlling to slow down or brake, the user can quickly stop with only fore sole landing for several steps of buffer.


 

 No matter taking the subway, bus or walk, the ESMAR X-shoe will bring you a more relax and pleasant journey experience. At present, the configured battery of electric shoe with full energy has a endurance of 5 kilometers, which can meet the walking need of a person.




Starting them, in a matter of seconds it reaches to top speed. It is absolutely amazing to be going like a flash whenever you want.



PERKS








FAQ

1、Q：How difficult is it to learn about X-shoe? Can a person who doesn’t know how to skate learn it?

A：The product is easy to learn with an average of 10 minutes learning time. It is very  stable in its own right that, unlike skating shoes making you fall because of easy slipping, you just have to stand firm with X-shoes on. It is necessary for beginners to learn how to stand firm, calf carrying the force, which will render the calves tired with long duration of sliding. It requires some time to adjust accordingly. Although the X-shoe is heavier than a regular one, the difference between them is not that obvious. A person not so strong may take a fews days before getting used to its weight, otherwise it is easy for users above 70 kilograms to handle.

2、Q：What should we pay attention to while using?

A：1、It is recommended that beginners practice in a less populated place, preferably a flat surface. It is inadvisable for beginners to practice on slopes and they should wear protective gears like kneepads and helmets.

      2、During the learning process, it is unwise to skate with great acceleration. After getting familiar with the shoes, you may go into the streets.  If obstacle or any other incident leads to an abrupt halt, placing your forefeet on the ground to cushion the momentum is a very practical and safe approach. Before learning to skate, you may firstly get to know how to stop applying the method.

      3、Beginner should decelerate when turning and stomp both feet to stop if it is too late to slow down.

      4、Please do not overburden the shoes above the specified load capacity, or climb slopes for long duration, because it will cause the motor and drive board to overheat which eventually will shut down the system due to safety issues.

       5、Before sliding, it is best to first slide both feet back and forth to ensure the shoes are ready.

       6、With the product being active, please do not jump from a height of 1 meter or above. If you jump, it should be the forefeet on the ground first to buffer the momentum. Any manner to render the product fair impacting force is prohibited, because the roller and support pad will be distorted and damaged.

       7、When under heavy traffic, please pay attention to the speed and the traffic condition and keep a safe distance. At anytime, traffic regulations should be obeyed. If is crowded, it is suggested to walk.

3、Q：As for the shoes designs, what if there is not one I like?

A：We plan to launch several new designs every year and, in the mean time, welcome and sports shoes designers to add better ones to our list. If adopted, we will offer a great remuneration. Customization is allowed for distributors and group purchasing.

4、Q：What should I do if I have lost the remote control?

A：X-shoe uses 2.4Ghz bluetooth communication module. Aside from the handheld remote control, cellphones can connect to the shoes to control it through the volumes up and down button to accelerate and decelerate; turning can be controlled by the body leaning left and right. If you are used to control it through your phones, you can even leave with one without the remote control.

5、Q：How do media workers or film crews get a sample?

A：We have plans to provide some related media and film crews some samples, but relatively perfect samples will be not out until the April of 2017 according to our schedule. If film crews are to use it as prop, we can deliver in the February of 2017. Because the product is built by hand, we are only to provide limited samples to media and film crews in order to keep on the product development and production process for which we beg your forgiveness.

6、Q：What should I do when encountering obstruction when sliding?

A：Most roads in many cities are suitable for sliding. Usually, you can decelerate in advance or slide pass it and, if is too late for that, stomp the forefeet on the ground to alleviate the momentum, which is in consistence with safety in our practical tests.

7、Q：What kind of roads is suitable for X-shoe?

A：Hard and flat surfaces are suitable for sliding, like flat asphalt and concrete roads. The maximum width and highest step for passage is 1.5 centimeter and 1centimeter separately. Normally walk can pass almost any roads in the cities.

8、Q：About the distance per charge？

A：On a flat surface with a breeze, a 80 kilograms user is able to slide for at least 5 kilometers. If under better condition, it reaches up to 7 km. Different load and wind velocity, climbing up and down slopes and frequently shutting down and starting the system can result in various distance per charge.

9、Q：Limitation on foot size and weight

A:1、Due to restriction of inner structure, small size shoes cannot fit in the device without some effort. Even if we increase the thickness to optimize the structure, the design will not come out beautiful. As technology progresses, we may support even smaller sizes shoes.

   2、Influenced by sales, we haven’t provided for bigger sizes. Please contact us if you are in need of customization.

   3、Load limit is between 100 and 120 kilograms. Considering the overall structural strength and power supply, if it is above the maximum load, the shoes are likely to be damaged under strenuous exercises or other extreme cases. Under specified load, the shoes almost are unable to break in normal operation. If they are overloaded, the motor will need even more power that slopes are harder to climb and the distance per charge will be much shorter, which is why it is best to operate below the maximum carrying load.

    4、Shoes with different sizes employ different structure. Even the sizes of motor, battery and tyre differ to ensure the needs of different customers.
story_txt:
ESMAR X-shoe is a kind of magic shoe with special
additive property. You can dirve it at  a top speed of 15km/h which
is about 3 times than that of walking.  
If you need  a normal walking, the four rubber tires of the electric shoe
will be automatic locked through controlling the bluetooth remote control. At
the same time, the two elastic cushion of fore sole will eject. The locked tire
will be as comfortable as rubber sole, and it can walk, run and jump as
ordinary sports shoes on the basis of at least 7 supporting point. When needing
to glide, pack up the two elastic cushion of fore sole through controlling the
remote control, and the four rubber tires will automatic unlock, then it can
normal travel with people on. On the basis of controlling to slow down or
brake, the user can quickly stop with only fore sole landing for several steps
of buffer.




 
 No matter taking the subway, bus or walk, the ESMAR X-shoe will bring you a more relax and pleasant journey experience. At present, the configured battery of electric shoe with full energy has a endurance of 5 kilometers, which can meet the walking need of a person.











Starting them, in a matter of seconds
it reaches to top speed. It is absolutely amazing to be going like a flash
whenever you want.






PERKS










   



FAQ1、Q：How difficult
is it to learn about X-shoe? Can a person who doesn’t know how to skate learn
it?A：The product is
easy to learn with an average of 10 minutes learning time. It is very  stable in its own right that, unlike skating
shoes making you fall because of easy slipping, you just have to stand firm
with X-shoes on. It is necessary for beginners to learn how to stand firm, calf
carrying the force, which will render the calves tired with long duration of
sliding. It requires some time to adjust accordingly. Although the X-shoe is
heavier than a regular one, the difference between them is not that obvious. A
person not so strong may take a fews days before getting used to its weight,
otherwise it is easy for users above 70 kilograms to handle.
2、Q：What should we
pay attention to while using?
A：1、It is recommended that beginners practice in a less
populated place, preferably a flat surface. It is inadvisable for beginners to
practice on slopes and they should wear protective gears like kneepads and
helmets.      2、During the learning process, it is unwise to skate
with great acceleration. After getting familiar with the shoes, you may go into
the streets.  If obstacle or any other
incident leads to an abrupt halt, placing your forefeet on the ground to
cushion the momentum is a very practical and safe approach. Before learning to
skate, you may firstly get to know how to stop applying the method.
      3、Beginner should decelerate when turning and stomp both
feet to stop if it is too late to slow down.
      4、Please do not overburden the shoes above the specified
load capacity, or climb slopes for long duration, because it will cause the motor
and drive board to overheat which eventually will shut down the system due to
safety issues.
       5、Before sliding, it is best to first slide both feet
back and forth to ensure the shoes are ready.
       6、With the product being active, please do not jump from
a height of 1 meter or above. If you jump, it should be the forefeet on the
ground first to buffer the momentum. Any manner to render the product fair
impacting force is prohibited, because the roller and support pad will be
distorted and damaged.
       7、When under
heavy traffic, please pay attention to the speed and the traffic condition and
keep a safe distance. At anytime, traffic regulations should be obeyed. If is
crowded, it is suggested to walk.
3、Q：As for the
shoes designs, what if there is not one I like?
A：We plan to
launch several new designs every year and, in the mean time, welcome and sports
shoes designers to add better ones to our list. If adopted, we will offer a great
remuneration. Customization is allowed for distributors and group purchasing.
4、Q：What should I
do if I have lost the remote control?
A：X-shoe uses
2.4Ghz bluetooth communication module. Aside from the handheld remote control,
cellphones can connect to the shoes to control it through the volumes up and
down button to accelerate and decelerate; turning can be controlled by the body
leaning left and right. If you are used to control it through your phones, you
can even leave with one without the remote control.
5、Q：How do media
workers or film crews get a sample?A：We have plans
to provide some related media and film crews some samples, but relatively
perfect samples will be not out until the April of 2017 according to our
schedule. If film crews are to use it as prop, we can deliver in the February
of 2017. Because the product is built by hand, we are only to provide limited
samples to media and film crews in order to keep on the product development and
production process for which we beg your forgiveness.
6、Q：What should I
do when encountering obstruction when sliding?
A：Most roads in many
cities are suitable for sliding. Usually, you can decelerate in advance or
slide pass it and, if is too late for that, stomp the forefeet on the ground to
alleviate the momentum, which is in consistence with safety in our practical
tests.
7、Q：What kind of
roads is suitable for X-shoe?
A：Hard and flat surfaces are suitable for sliding, like
flat asphalt and concrete roads. The maximum width and highest step for passage
is 1.5 centimeter and 1centimeter separately. Normally walk can pass almost any
roads in the cities.
8、Q：About the
distance per charge？
A：On a flat surface
with a breeze, a 80 kilograms user is able to slide for at least 5 kilometers.
If under better condition, it reaches up to 7 km. Different load and wind
velocity, climbing up and down slopes and frequently shutting down and starting
the system can result in various distance per charge.
9、Q：Limitation on
foot size and weight
A:1、Due to
restriction of inner structure, small size shoes cannot fit in the device without
some effort. Even if we increase the thickness to optimize the structure, the
design will not come out beautiful. As technology progresses, we may support
even smaller sizes shoes.
   2、Influenced by
sales, we haven’t provided for bigger sizes. Please contact us if you are in
need of customization.
   3、Load limit is
between 100 and 120 kilograms. Considering the overall structural strength and
power supply, if it is above the maximum load, the shoes are likely to be
damaged under strenuous exercises or other extreme cases. Under specified load,
the shoes almost are unable to break in normal operation. If they are
overloaded, the motor will need even more power that slopes are harder to climb
and the distance per charge will be much shorter, which is why it is best to
operate below the maximum carrying load.
    4、Shoes with
different sizes employ different structure. Even the sizes of motor, battery
and tyre differ to ensure the needs of different customers.

story:
BinGeil ist eine Web-App, die es professionellen SexarbeiterInnen ermöglicht, kommerzielle Inserate zu schalten.

Die Web-App ist bereits fertig entwickelt und auch schon online verfügbar. Mehr Informationen gibt's hier (FB-Login nötig): https://www.facebook.com/BinGeil


Unser Ziel

Wir bieten unseren UserInnen eine seriöse Plattform, die sich vom oft schmuddeligen Image des Milieus klar distanziert. Wir stellen daher ein Kontakt-Service zur Verfügung, über das SexarbeiterInnen ihre Kundenkreise erweitern können. Es ist uns ein großes Anliegen die „alten Wege“ der Sexarbeit zu modernisieren, um unseren InserentInnen mehr Selbständigkeit für ihre berufliche Zukunft zu ermöglichen. 

Für KundInnen ist und bleibt die Web-App kostenlos, anfallende Gebühren für das Schalten von Inseraten werden allein von der werbenden Person getragen. Diese Kosten sind im Vergleich zu anderen Mitstreitern jedoch relativ günstig gehalten. Die Web-App ist überdies spielend leicht zu bedienen und auch ästhetisch gesehen ein echter Hingucker. Sie ist rund um die Uhr auf der ganzen Welt verfügbar und lässt sich am Desktop genauso so anwenden wie über Tablets und Mobiltelefone.


Die BinGeil Web-App umfasst viele attraktive Features wie:

Datensicherheit


Eine Kartenansicht/Listenansicht mit exakter Angabe zur Entfernung der nähesten SexworkerInnen sowie eine Auskunft über den aktuellen Status der SexworkerInnen (Bereit/Beschäftigt/Offline)


Detaillierte Profile zu einzelnen SexworkerInnen (Bilder, Leistungen, Preise uvm.)


Die Möglichkeit zur direkten Kontaktaufnahme mit SexworkerInnen (per Anruf und SMS)


Die Suche nach speziellen Wünschen und Bedürfnissen (angebotene Leistungen der SexworkerInnen)


uvm.

Wir sind ein kleines, aber eingespieltes Team aus der IT-Branche. Unser Unternehmen besteht konkret aus 5 Mitarbeiten und deckt intern folgende Aufgabenbereiche ab: Programmierung, Online- & Social-Media-Marketing sowie Design & Redaktion. Jeder von uns ist Spezialist und auf seinem jeweiligen Gebiet bereits mehrere Jahre tätig.

Das gesamte Team lebt und arbeitet in Wien, unser Firmensitz liegt aufgrund günstigerer Konditionen allerdings in Bratislava. Gemeinsam ist es uns mit viel Ehrgeiz gelungen, das Unternehmen samt seiner Platform BinGeil ohnerlei finanzielle Unterstützung ins Leben zu rufen.


Obwohl unser Team wie eben beschrieben bereits viele wichtige Arbeitsbereiche abdeckt und die Web-App auch schon voll einsatzbereit ist, fehlen uns dennoch wesentliche Aspekte für einen kommerziellen Erfolg:


Vertrieb

Für einen erfolgreichen Vertrieb benötigen wir finanzielle Unterstützung. Damit soll primär ein starkes Vertriebsteam aufgebaut werden, das auch abseits der virtuellen Welt für Kundenakquise sorgt. So wird es uns möglich sein, unser Service schon bald in mehreren Städten und Ländern anzubieten. 


Marketing

Der zweite Bereich des Investments betrifft die Marketingkosten; momentan schalten wir gezielte Werbung mittels Google Adwords. Ein Teil des Erlöses unserer Crowdfunding-Campagne soll daher in die Investition für eine erhöhte Schaltung im Onlinebereich fließen. Auch Merchandising-Aktionen sowie die klassische Flyer-Verteilung fallen in diesen Bereich; Informationen zu unseren Produkten finden Sie weiter unten in den Perks (zB Kondome, T-Shirts, Feuerzeuge uvm.).


Planung

Mit dem angestrebten Budget von € 12.000 ist es uns möglich, eine weitere Stadt in der Größenordnung Wiens erfolgreich zu akquirieren und zu bewerben. Die Entscheidung unser Projekt generell in Wien zu starten liegt daran, dass das gesamte Arbeitsteam in dieser Stadt angesiedelt ist.


Ziel 2015/2016 => Österreich, Deutschland & Schweiz

Unser Ziel ist es, bereits heuer und vor allem im kommenden Jahr (neben Österreich) auch in Deutschland und der Schweiz zu launchen. Dies geschieht, sobald wir den nötigen Umsatz in Wien erwirtschaftet haben. Sollten wir durch unsere Crowdfunding-Kampagne allerdings mehr Einnahmen als erhofft erzielen, so wird das überschüssige Buget automatisch für die Ausweitung der Web-App in unsere Nachbarländer verwendet. Je eher Sie uns also unterstützen, desto früher können Sie BinGeil für Ihre unmittelbare Umgebung nutzen!


     BinGeil Feuerzeug

      BinGeil Kugelschreiber

     BinGeil Sporttasche

     BinGeil Strandset


     BinGeil T-Shirt 

     BinGeil Kondom


Die Schwierigkeiten in diesem Bereich liegen vor allem am Zugang zum Milieu, wobei unsererseits kein Interesse besteht, in dieses aktiv einzusteigen. Wir wollen ganz einfach die "alten Wege" der Sexarbeit modernisieren und SexarbeiterInnen wie ihren KundInnen ein optimales erotisches Erlebnis bieten.  


Sie können unser Projekt jederzeit mit einem einfachen Like oder dem Teilen unserer Fansite via Facebook unterstützen: https://www.facebook.com/BinGeil

Vielen Dank!


Falls Sie noch Fragen haben, können Sie uns gerne unter support@bingeil.eu erreichen.

story:
We are ready for production, but we need the support of a group of people who love our watches as much as we do.

To ensure top quality in every aspect of a Clerestone watch and its accessories, we are working with several Chinese manufacturers. Our dial manufacturer has over 10 years experience in the gemstone industry. Our gemstones are sourced from all around the world and cut with precision. We have carefully selected manufacturers for our watches, boxes, microfiber cloths, and our straps, who are all experts in their field.

We have covered all costs for our design and manufacturing up to this stage.

Our fixed goal is the minimum funds we need to cover the manufacture and shipping costs for all perks to our backers.

Indiegogo perk fulfilment is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed. Fulfilment is our responsibility and we take it seriously. We are confident that once we reach our funding goal, all backers can receive their chosen perks.

We have prior experience in manufacturing so we know that there are always risks and challenges. We have already overcome many issues to get to where we are today and we expect there will be more snags along the way. We know we can tackle any issues that arise and we have allowed reasonable time frames for each stage to give us some buffer in the event of delays. We will be posting regular updates to keep our backers informed.

We are excited and confident that within 8-10 weeks of a successful campaign, all our backers can be wearing their chosen Clerestone perk.

 

 

Warranty and Refunds

Clerestone Watches warranty covers manufacturer's defects for 3 years from the end of our post campaign shipping period. Your watch movement, case, hands and dial are covered by warranty. If your watch does not work properly due to a parts defect, contact us and once approved we will repair or replace it, free of charge. Our watch warranty does not cover normal wear and tear, scratches, accidental glass damage, strap damage, batteries, theft, or any damage caused by carelessness, water or rough treatment. Proof of purchase is required for all warranty claims so be sure to keep your receipt. If you wish to apply for a refund during the campaign you can use this Indiegogo link to do so.

 

Import Taxes

Some international backers may be subject to local import duties and/or taxes in their country. These are not covered by this campaign or Clerestone, they are the backers' responsibility.

 

What is Next For CLERESTONE?

Our Gemstone watches are just the beginning. Our next collection is waiting in the wings and will feature watch dials that as far as we know, have never been done before. They will be the perfect addition to the wardrobe of every lover of watches and nature. So stay tuned beyond this campaign.

 

The Basics of IndieGoGo

Dream it. Fund it. Make it. Ship it.

Indiegogo is a crowdfunding platform that helps people bring projects to life. People can support a project they love or want by pledging funds to it. In return for their support, these backers can receive products at heavily discounted prices, also known as ‘perks.’ If our campaign does not reach its goal, all pledged money is returned.

 

Your Impact

Your support makes a difference. We can't do it without you!

We have a large group of people who can’t wait to get their watch, and of course, that all depends on a successful launch! By pledging to our project, you not only claim big savings on your perk, but you are also helping to bring Clerestone to life.

We would love for you to join us in bringing CLERESTONE into the world and to your wrist.

Thank you to all our backers, we really appreciate your support!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't back us at this time, we would still love your help in sharing our campaign. Use the share tools at the top of our campaign to share our project with your friends!

If you have backed our project, thank you, we really appreciate your support. Please share our project with your friends so we can have a successful campaign and get your watch made!

story:
HAVING PROBLEMS WITH BACKING THIS CAMPAIGN?

IF YOUR CREDIT CARD IS GIVING YOU A HASSLE WHEN YOU TRY TO PLACE AN ORDER PLEASE CONTACT SUPPORT AT http://bit.ly/29vmZwM or email me at connect@anastasiaakahakaur.com

I REALLY APOLOGIZE FOR THE INCONVENIENCE

A NOTE TO ALL LOCAL SUPPORTERS: Your shipping charges will be reimbursed if you prefer to pick up your order from me directly. For now you will be paying shipping, but I will give it back ~ I promise!

 

I'm Anastasia Akasha Kaur ~

A yogi, mother, dirt worshipping tree hugger, and designer of the TRIPLE GODDESS PANT.

                           I needed a pair of pants that were comfortable, organic, sweatshop-free and stylish. They also needed to be versatile and appropriate for all the fun, amazing, and many things I like to do! I searched for years for these pants, and spent a lot of money on pants that never really looked good or felt right for me. I finally realized that in order to have the perfect pant, I had to design it ~ and the TRIPLE GODDESS PANT was born.

     As a woman with so many roles to play ~ sometimes all in the run of one day ~ having one pair of pants that can work no matter what I need to do is practical (and let's admit, much easier on the pocket book!) The amazing thing is, the TRIPLE GODDESS PANT accommodates a woman's needs no matter what phase of life she's in too.The fold over organic cotton/lycra waistband expands and contracts to meet the needs of active teenagers, mothers-to-be, and wise crones. 

     Once the TRIPLE GODDESS PANT idea was born, I found the perfect person to manufacture them.

     Reza Iso is a Syrian refugee who recently moved to Nova Scotia with his family to escape the civil war that created the worst humanitarian crisis of our time. Half the country’s pre-war population — more than 11 million people — have been killed or forced to flee their homes. I am grateful Rezan found his way safely to Canada, and am honoured to have him share his immense skills in the making of The Triple Goddess Pant.

     As a solo mother of two children living in rural Nova Scotia, the years of parenting babies have taken their toll on every aspect of my resources. That is why this Indiegogo Campaign is so important. The capital raised over the next 21 days will raise the much needed funds required to buy organic fabric and supplies, as well as pay Rezan to manufacture the pants.  Your much appreciated contribution to the TRIPLE GODDESS PANT campaign is amazing because it will support many wonderful things including industry in rural Nova Scotia, organic agriculture, a mother-in-business, as well as a refugee urgently in need of stable employment during his time of resettlement in a foreign country. 

THE TRIPLE GODDESS PANT

The Triple Goddess Pant is a super stylish and comfortable wide legged pant ethically made from an Organic Cotton/Lycra Blend French terry in Mahone Bay, Nova Scotia Canada. 

     The pants feature a fold over waistband that moves and stretches when you do, no matter what time of the month, or phase of life you're in. Let's face it, women expand and contract as quickly as the phases of the moon, and these pants will fit you no matter what (and that includes during pregnancy). It's time to get smart ladies and prioritize comfort when it comes to your wardrobe - and I am happy to announce you don't have to sacrifice fashion while you're at it. They are the perfect basic pant that works when you're out on the town, or down dogging it in the yoga studio. Layer it up, dress it up, dress it down - heck you can even sleep in them. The ONLY pant you'll ever need.​

SIZING

The Triple Goddess Pant comes in a Cropped "Gaucho Style" and Full Length​

XS= size 0-2 waist 26, hip 32
S= size 4-6 waist 28, hip 34-36
M= size 8-10 waist 30-32, hip 38-40
L= size 12-14 waist 34-36, hip 42-44
XL = size 16-18 waist 38-40, hip 46-48

LENGTH

FULL LENGTH TRIPLE GODDESS PANT

TWO INSEAM LENGTHS TO CHOOSE FROM ~ Regular 32" and Tall 34"

 

CROPPED "GAUCHO STYLE" TRIPLE GODDESS PANT

INSEAM LENGTH IS 22"

COLOURS AVAILABLE:

CINDER (Black)


SAT NAM (White)

CINNAMON (Brown)

 

AT THIS MOMENT 3 COLOURS ARE AVAILABLE TO CHOOSE FROM.

THE MORE MONEY RAISED, THE MORE COLOURS I CAN MAKE AVAILABLE FOR PURCHASE.... 

@ $15 000 3 colours

@$20 000 4 colours

@$25 000 5 colours

ABOUT THE FABRIC

     The TRIPLE GODDESS PANT is made from an Organic Cotton/Lycra blended French Terry fabric. French Terry is known for its luxurious texture which is soft and comfortable against the skin. The  addition of lycra provides an elegant drape and fluidity to the TRIPLE GODDESS PANT, as well as a lovely resilience.

CARE OF YOUR PANTS: 

Minimal shrinkage in length will occur with the first washing and then it remains stable after that. The TRIPLE GODDESS PANT will last longer if you  keep it out of a dryer, so tumble dry on low only when necessary ~ or even better hang them out on the line to dry!

ABOUT MY BUSINESS PRACTICES

ORGANIC COTTON

     What makes organic cotton so much better than the conventional ones? Organic cotton is grown in a way that uses methods and materials that lessen the impact on our environment. A big effort in the organic movement is to use growing systems that replenish and maintain soil fertility and build biologically diverse agriculture. Organic cotton uses far less water too. 

The main benefit of organic materials, however, is that the crops aren’t treated with pesticides, insecticides, herbicides and Genetically Modified Organisms. These toxins are harmful for farmers and workers, us as consumers, and entire wildlife eco-systems. 

     Conventionally grown cotton uses more insecticides than any other crop in the world. It is estimated that each year cotton producers use as much as 25 percent of the world’s insecticides and more than 10 percent of the world’s pesticides; an incredible amount for one just one crop.

     I am committed to organic cotton to minimize my impact on the environment and improve the conditions and quality of life for the people who make my clothing. I believe organic cotton is the foundation for addressing labor and environmental challenges that surround clothing. 

SWEAT SHOP FREE

     It’s no secret that sweatshop labor is behind much of the clothing sold today. The media and nonprofits on the ground overseas report on factory bosses paying starvation wages, forcing employees to work unpaid overtime, denying bathroom breaks and sick leave, and retaliating against workers who seek better treatment. Such practices may lead to cheap clothing on the consumer end, but more shoppers are saying that they don’t want low prices to come at the expense of workers. I am proud that the TRIPLE GODDESS PANT is ethically made in Mahone Bay, Nova Scotia Canada.

​​

What We Need 

     The goal for this campaign is to raise $15 000. This minimum will enable us to finalize the production details, pay for the manufacturing of all the Indiegogo pant orders, the perks, as well as finance the production of Triple Goddess Pants to make available Direct to Consumers:

* Locally at events, markets, fairs 

* Online (via www.anastasiaakashakaur.com,)

* at International Yoga Events 

What You Get

     When you back this TRIPLE GODDESS PANT Indiegogo campaign, you get the warm, fuzzy, feel- good feeling that comes when you help make someone's dream come true. Oh yes, and of course, the option of receiving a "PERK" for your support, including pre-ordering one of the most gorgeous and comfortable pair of organic cotton pants on the planet.​

If pants aren't your thing you can choose from one of the many other great "perks" available... 

A "You Are Magic" Bumper Sticker

 

"YOU ARE MAGIC" Mug

 

"TRIPLE GODDESS PANT" Mug

 

"YOU ARE MAGIC" Cotton T-Shirt

 

"YOU ARE MAGIC" Organic Cotton Tote Bag

 

CHAKRA REVIVAL: Journey Into Consciousness 

with Anastasia Akasha Kaur

E-Course 

     Our bodies contain a blueprint for healing called the Chakras. 

The chakras connect your spiritual and energy bodies to your physical one, and they regulate the flow of energy throughout the electrical network (meridians) that runs through your body. Sometimes chakras become blocked because of stress, emotional or physical problems.

This in-depth program guides you through a process of personal transformation through the integration of the wisdom of your chakras. 

In this course you will discover how chakra awareness promotes wellness both emotionally and physically.

This Do It Yourself 8 Day/Week/or Month Program provides you with everything you need to conduct your very own personal chakra revival including:

* A complete 57 page downloadable/printable PDF Chakra Revival E-Book

* 19 Kundalini Yoga & Meditation Videos you can do in the comfort of your own home

* A Complete Guide to the Chakras 

* Keys to Chakra Integration with Aromatherapy, Herbalism, Colour Therapy & more..

* 24/7 ongoing access to all course materials to watch and read again and again 

​

MY TRACK RECORD OF BUSINESS SUCCESS

     In 2002 I moved from Toronto to Nova Scotia where I started a handmade natural cosmetics business called Anointment Natural Skin Care. Every Saturday I set up shop and sold my handmade soaps, ointments and other cosmetics at the Halifax Farmer's Market, as well as established numerous wholesale accounts at retail locations across Canada. Over the years customers came to love and trust the Anointment brand and products. Six years later after the birth of my first child I sold Anointment, and it has flourished and remains a reputable and recognized quality product available all over North America. This business success makes me an experienced and professional person you can trust with your investment.

S T R E T C H GOALS

     Stretch goals are a way for us to add additional colour options as we get more funding. A stretch goal is a funding target set beyond our original Kickstarter goal of $15,000. Once we hit a stretch goal, a new colour will be added to the product selection and become available to our backers. 

     You can help us meet our stretch goals by spreading the word about the TRIPLE GODDESS PANT! Tell your friends, share online, and more! You are also welcome to increase your pledge in order to help us meet a stretch goal.

@ $20 000 LAVENDER (purple)

@$25 000 TIBET ROBE RED

@$30 000 TROPIC (turquoise)

 

Other Ways You Can Help

There are many ways you can help this TRIPLE GODDESS PANT campaign:

  • Pre-order the Triple Goddess Pants here on this INDIEGOGO campaign ~ I think your friend wants a pair too (what? they make great gifts!)
  • Buy one of the many great perks
  • Don't want pants, don't want perks? Ok! Just click the "Back this Campaign" Button at the top of the page and you can contribute any amount of money
  • Tell ALL your friends! Help me get the word out by making some noise about the campaign. Look for these SHARE buttons at the top of this campaign page and spread the word on social media...

And now for the disclaimer....

     The images and videos of the pants are prototypes therefore slight details may change in actual production.

 

WORDS CANNOT EXPRESS HOW GRATEFUL I AM FOR YOUR SUPPORT!

For more information visit www.anastasiaakashakaur.com
story_txt:
HAVING PROBLEMS WITH BACKING THIS CAMPAIGN?
IF YOUR CREDIT CARD IS GIVING YOU A HASSLE WHEN YOU TRY TO PLACE AN ORDER PLEASE CONTACT SUPPORT AT http://bit.ly/29vmZwM or email me at connect@anastasiaakahakaur.com
I REALLY APOLOGIZE FOR THE INCONVENIENCE
A NOTE TO ALL LOCAL SUPPORTERS: Your shipping charges will be reimbursed if you prefer to pick up your order from me directly. For now you will be paying shipping, but I will give it back ~ I promise!
 

I'm Anastasia Akasha Kaur ~
A yogi, mother, dirt worshipping tree hugger, and designer of the TRIPLE GODDESS PANT.
                           I needed a pair of pants that were comfortable, organic, sweatshop-free and stylish. They also needed to be versatile and appropriate for all the fun, amazing, and many things I like to do! I searched for years for these pants, and spent a lot of money on pants that never really looked good or felt right for me. I finally realized that in order to have the perfect pant, I had to design it ~ and the TRIPLE GODDESS PANT was born.
     As a woman with so many roles to play ~ sometimes all in the run of one day ~ having one pair of pants that can work no matter what I need to do is practical (and let's admit, much easier on the pocket book!) The amazing thing is, the TRIPLE GODDESS PANT accommodates a woman's needs no matter what phase of life she's in too.The fold over organic cotton/lycra waistband expands and contracts to meet the needs of active teenagers, mothers-to-be, and wise crones. 
     Once the TRIPLE GODDESS PANT idea was born, I found the perfect person to manufacture them.

     Reza Iso is a Syrian refugee who recently moved to Nova Scotia with his family to escape the civil war that created the worst humanitarian crisis of our time. Half the country’s pre-war population — more than 11 million people — have been killed or forced to flee their homes. I am grateful Rezan found his way safely to Canada, and am honoured to have him share his immense skills in the making of The Triple Goddess Pant.
     As a solo mother of two children living in rural Nova Scotia, the years of parenting babies have taken their toll on every aspect of my resources. That is why this Indiegogo Campaign is so important. The capital raised over the next 21 days will raise the much needed funds required to buy organic fabric and supplies, as well as pay Rezan to manufacture the pants.  Your much appreciated contribution to the TRIPLE GODDESS PANT campaign is amazing because it will support many wonderful things including industry in rural Nova Scotia, organic agriculture, a mother-in-business, as well as a refugee urgently in need of stable employment during his time of resettlement in a foreign country.

The ONLY pant you'll ever need.​

story:
Inspiration:

It all started in winter 2014, we crafted a wallet for a friend by keeping his requirements in mind and he was amazed in every aspect either its design or a quality or a purpose. So, our research starts from his motivation. And as we are design freak and technology lover, we thought to create something what is missing. Finally, we came up with something sleek and simple because we know one thing, simplicity is the soul of good design.

Introducing Hashtag Series

Why Hashtag :

Like hashtag symbol, trend in technology and  does mean a lot, we want our products to be meaningful yet trendy.  With the aspect of professional and elite designs, we pursuing a balance between functionality and beauty and trying to provide new experience for all. Our all products are handmade and hand packaged, so that you feel and experience the perfect styling and comfort.

Option 1

 

Option 2

 

Option 3

Super protection
Effectively blocks unauthorized RFID readers for security.

What is RFID?
Many credit card issuers now include an RFID chip (Radio Frequency Identification Data) that store personal information. Criminal can use RFID readers to steal your information. The RFID blocking wallet effectively blocks RFID readers.
Perks

Support

Our Leathers

We use cowhide premium grade leather in our products, sourced from Turkey. Turkish hides are known for quality, strength, character and grain. By this way, we can achieve a product of extremely high quality. 
Turkey has a strong tradition of processing leather which comes from its historical past. In the means of this tradition, today, Turkey is one of the most assertive countries in producing high quality leather products in the world.

What Next

We’re a startup company with limited fund but empowered by a bold mindset, we dream to change things for the better and leave a mark on the world, so we set our goals.
If we achieve more than $20,000 funds, to cheer up with you we decided to give you a choice to upgrade it with Top Grain and Bridge leather which is the best leather in the industry and use by most of the celebrity brands. (Because we’ll buy it in Bulk, sourced directly from a Tannery), we also planned for gold and rose gold metal tags.
We need your support to cover our limitation of funds. You are our only marketing hands, so please do share on social media, and to your family and friends, so that we can achieve our goal and give you amazing, something most amazing products.

About us

It all started with only 2 persons, we are the makers with an ambition to do meaningful work. We believe, with positive thinking and hard work, we can do anything. Being able to craft something with meaning and a purpose, pushes us to design and create. We are challenging the limitation of technology and innovation to create unique designs.

Risk and challenges

  • As we have completed our research and development stage, as well as small production stage, so we very well mitigated most of the risk and challenges. 
  • For a startup company, on mass production it is quite difficult to find reliable and quality hide suppliers and on time. To minimize these risks, we have been negotiating with suppliers and backup suppliers.
  • When products are handcrafted with extreme care and attention, so there is a chance of slightly delays in production.
  • We are very confident about our quality of the leather and about the quality of the other materials we use and as our each product are handcrafted with a proper attention, so we promise we won’t send you a product with any problem.

Timeline

FAQ

Q. Are your leather is leatherite, PU, Synthetic leather or Faux leather?
A. No, we only use 100% genuine leathers.
Q. Can I choose thread colour, magnetic button or leather?
A. Yes, we are very flexible about that, so send us mail with your order details.
Q. Why your products are so cheap?
A. We are a start-up company with a less manpower expenses and other expenses, and we buy raw materials in bulk directly from the tannery and as it’s a early bird discount, and you are a supporter so we are selling our products with no profit and no loss. Ultimately we want to gain your love and trust, forever.
Q. Can I place an order for corporate gifting purpose with customized message ?
A. Yes, you can select corporate gifting perks, or send us email about your requirement, we’ll help you out.
Q: When will I receive my order?
A: You will receive your order in April 2016. For more details, check out our timeline on the campaign page.
Q: What if I received damaged product?
A: First of all, as our products are handmade with a proper attention on each product and we inspect each product before shipping and we ship our product by reliable and experienced transport companies but in case you have received damaged item, send us email, we’ll re-ship the product for you. Ultimately we want to gain your trust and love.
Q: Will I receive all my orders together?
A: Yes
Q: Is shipping included in the perks?

A: Shipping costs are not included in the perk prices, Shipping price is added when you select your country. Purchasers are responsible for any VAT or customs duties levied by their own countries.

Q: Is your product available in my country?
A: Yes, we deliver to all countries in which Indiegogo is available, unless your country is an embargoed nation.

Being a startup company we need your support so that we can combine with a hardworking team to create something what is missing and where you don’t want to compromise. We promise every time you’ll find something unique and innovative.

Being a startup company we need your  support so that we can combine with a hardworking team to create something what  is missing and where you don’t want to compromise. We promise every time you’ll  find something unique and innovative.

story:
As an early bird bonus, everyone who purchases one of the first jackerts will automatically get a 10% discount on our future products!

Our jackets are handmade and extremely limited so back us now to get an early bird discount. If the size you want is sold out let us know by messaging us above. We will get back to you once the correct size is available.

Our jackets are designed to last long and look good. We don’t have lots of quirky features. We concentrate on creating a high-quality luxury product that is entirely unique. You will be the only person you know that has one. As you know, luxury products are expensive. We have created a brand that combines luxury with economy. We cut out the middle man by delivering direct from the manufacturer. Reducing the cost but not reducing the quality.

We denim we use comes from Kojima in Okayama prefecture in Japan. Kojima is famous worldwide for producing the highest quality denim in the world. Worn denim from Kojima is sought throughout the world and is considered the quality benchmark for denim products. Home of the first pair of Japanese jeans they have been making denim for a generation.

The cotton is 100% Zimbabwe and is dyed and knitted together using traditional Japanese techniques. We us 12oz denim fabric for luxury feel and sturdiness. Suitable for summer and winter wear. Our denim ages well, with a beautiful indigo sheen.

Of course, the most unique highlight of the jacket is the hand painted lion on the back. This follows the latest street trend in Japan and is a mark of uniqueness. Each Lion is hand painted with a unique edge. Hand painting follows a retro trend in Japan and Europe.

Comparison and merits summary

 

                           

About washing issues

The Lion design on the jacket is hand painted using acrylic paint so can be washed at cool temperature in a machine. Please do not soak for any extended period or hand wash.

 

Risks & Challenges

We are an early stage startup so the potential for delays are always present. We have reduced these possibilities as much as possible by carefully planning our launch and ensuring that we only work with small exclusive number of clients at a time.

 

Where are they made

The jackets are hand crafted in Japan.

 

At the same time we also offer Advanced Stain & Odour Repellent T-shirt to choose from

About transportation

We have reduced the shipping costs as much as possible and are willing to work with our clients to help reduce any local tax or import fees on a case by case basis.
