story:
Like it or not, the 1970s was a great decade for watches. After the Golden Age, we may saw the design of modern watches lose their direction. In order to recall the wonderful memory of the golden age, we present our first wrist watch collection: ‘courage’.  

 

 

As we called our collection ‘courage’, we to have the courage to modify the movement. We selected one of the best manual winding movement from one of the most famous watchmaking firm in China and infused it with effort. We added one jewel bearing to the movement to 19 jewels in order to reduce the worn. Then we named this beautifully redesigned 3/4 plate movement to ‘Z19.01’. The power reserve is longer than 42 hours.  

 

 

After a 4-position adjustment, we also work with our partner to conduct a severe in-shop test. According to our test, our engineering samples reached an extraordinary result on the timegrapher, with rates +3~7 seconds per day and beat error 0.0~0.2 msec considering positional variation.

 

All of the engraving parts are from our master engraver. All the engravings is the labor of hundreds of work hours. Every piece has its own pattern, and every piece is unique. Since then the movement is no longer a mechanical device, it’s more like a piece of art.

 

 

Except the movement, we prepared the full-engraving watch dial and a gold inlay version as extra bonus perks for those enthusiasts with deeper pockets.

 

 

We do respect the preference of our customers, you can choose the style of the font (Arabic numerals or Roman numerals).Independent serial number will be engraved on the dial. Design draft and sample parts as follows (Pictures for demonstration purpose only, final product may differ from the pictures):

 

 

 

The collection is named as Courage. Who dares, wins; we totally agree. We also believe in finishing and decoration, for most watch manufacturers, they just use mass-produced movements with no improvement. We believe that we can do more, like Côtes de Genève, beveling and polishing on the plate, engraving on the movement, etc. we dare to improve and decorate the original movement.

 

 

Besides, we curve the number of jewels, number of adjustments and identical serial number on the movement. For each owner, your watch is unique.

 

Why manual? Even the automatic winding watches are the mainstream, but lots of enthusiasts would like to ‘communicate’ with their watch by winding it up. Moreover, if you ‘keep in touch’ with your watch, a hand-winding watch can reach better accuracy than automatic.

 

 

Besides, without the rotor we can see the beauty of movement as well as the magnificent engravings on it, and that we believe to be meaningful. That’s why we choose the manual winding movement.

 

The design of the watch dial is inspired by 70s vintage wrist watches and some antique pocket watches. This is fully expressed on the design of our dial. The only difference with a genuine vintage watch is we tried to increase the diameter of the watch's crystal to make the watch have a bit more modern value.

 

We carefully chose four colors for the Courage collection. We chose alpha style hands on all of our watches, which is widely used by famous luxury watch brands. 

 

After we reach the target of crowd funding, we’ll release the ocean blue on the perks.

 

 

The case of the watch is just like the shell of the snail, it protects the sophisticated movement. We choose the 316L stainless steel as our case material. Each watch case is carefully polished by hand and electroplated with multiple layers.

 

 

Instead of weak plastic parts, a metal spacer ring is installed in the case in order to provide a solid foundation for the movement.

 

We choose the sapphire crystal as our watch glass, as well as exhibition display back. And the glasses are domed in order to reduce the influence of the strong sunlight and make time-reading much easier.

 

‘Have you ever seen a crocodile being slayed?’ Unfortunately, we did.

We are brave, but not bold. Using crocodile leather is against our moral standard and code of ethics. In this case, the best choice for both consumer and us will be the cowhide. Protecting endangered wildlife and reducing slaughter is our obligation, we can start from now.

 

 

Fine polished 316L stainless steel traditional pin buckle will be fitted on our watches, butterfly buckle (Pictures shown) perk can be selected.

 

 

An excellent engraved and decorated movement deserves to be peered carefully. So we also bespoke our unique wooden eye loupe for the hand engraving watches. Wooden eye loupe, most belong to those extremely high-end watch manufacturers, now available for most of our consumers. So please enjoy the time with our ticking movement!

 

 

A nice watch also deserves a better case, we provide the matt wooden case for all the Courage collection wrist watches. Within the case, a pair of gloves and cleaning cloth will be shipped together to our consumers.

Within the case, a founder-stamped Certificate of Authenticity will be issued with all of our watches, every watch has its unique identity.

 

 

Watch case: Stainless steel (grade 316L) Polished & Brushed Finish

Glass: Domed Sapphire front and back

Case Size: 40 mm diameter / 9.7 mm thickness

Crown: screw Style Push Crown with Double O ring  

Strap: 20mm Width, High quality genuine leather strap

Buckle: traditional pin type, butterfly buckle for option

Movement: Hand-winding Z19.01

Water resistant: 5 ATM / 50 meters

 

We believe in the best product can only manufactured by the best team. We proudly present our manufacture team, all of our partners have more than 3 decades experience in the watchmaking industry. A two-year international warranty will be applied to all Zach watches. For more details please see our website or user manual.

 

 

July 2017 - First idea of watchmaking

August 2017 - Company registration

September 2017 - First design – A Bauhaus design fashion wrist watch with quartz movement

October 2017 - Dispose the first design, planning to design a high-end mechanical watch

November 2017 - Design Ver.2.0 finished, seeking major suppliers

December 2017 - Register the trademark ‘Zach’

January 2018 - Improve the design Ver.2.1 with 70s style, seeking supplementary supplier

February 2018 - Decide to integrate engraving to movement

March 2018 - Engraving parts finished, accessory material ready

April 2018 - Final assembly of engineering sample, in-shop test

May 2018 - Patent applying, continuous improving

July 2018 –  Say 'Hello World' on IGG

Our goal is to provide the products which meet the high quality standard. Horology is about accuracy, but there is a reasonable limit to production tolerances. Even though we have a robust supply chain and outstanding partners, we have several extra processes in order to decorate and improve the movement and the watch itself; there will be potential risk in the manufacturing and transportation process. Besides, other circumstances may occur like delivery delays and/or engraving process delays. In addition to this, even though all of our pictures are actual photo of our watches, but we believe that we can do better when it comes to mass production; which means all of our backers will receive better watches than online photo. Anyway, whether it’s rain or shine, we will keep all our backers and anyone following us updated promptly.

 

  • $1 supporter: We’ll send you an appreciation letter from our founder via Email.
    • Every 50 supporter with $1, we will randomly choose a lucky supporter to send an exclusively bespoke wooden eye-loop.
  • You can win free gifts or upgrades if refer this project to Facebook or Instagram, winners will be chosen randomly, rules are as follows:
    • Re-post/share to more than 30 people, you may win a leather strap with pin buckle, a total of 3 opportunities;
    • Re-post/share to more than 40 people, you may win an exclusively bespoke wooden eye-loop, a total of 3 opportunities;
    • Re-post/share to more than 60 people, you may win a non-engraving courage wrist watch, only one lucky supporter can win this prize.

 

 

  • Guideline: please send your Instagram or Facebook page link and screenshot picture to us, so we can reach you. We will fulfill all the prizes after the crowd funding ends. Please kindly notice that all the prizes or gifts can only be redeemed once. Thank you for your support.

 

 

Any questions about this project?  Please send Email to: info@zachwatches.com

story:
Why WHYSTL? Why not?

Enjoy quick access to your JUUL and never lose an AirPod. Simple as that. Look great, feel great. Plus, think of all the things you can do with your hands! WHYSTL on the go, WHYSTL while you binge, WHYSTL while you work. 

We have years of experience designing and shipping incredible products. We won’t let you down (on purpose).

Choose between three colors:

Charcoal grey: Subtle and Subdued

Coral Red: Edgy and Elevated

 

 

Turquoise: Calm and Collected

 

 

Give and Take: Give us your money and take a moment to feel good.

We need $3000 to cover the tooling costs for the Silicone Molds and for the Die Cut Insert and Packaging. Another $1500 will go to securing the raw material for the strap and creating the label and sticker assortment. All vendors are secured already and waiting for the go ahead. That’s where you come in!

Backers can select between three delicious colors: Coral Red, Turquoise, or Charcoal Grey.

Buy more and save! Discounts for purchasing multiple units. Check out our 2x, 5x, and 8x packs.

If you do not want to commit to a WHYSTL-1, we also offer some mind-bending stickers to show you get it. One day these could be used as currency.

If we don’t reach the minimum funding, the project will be cancelled and you will be refunded. Simple as that, and it's probably for the best.

 

Really Good Sales Pitch:

Plenty of products exist to prevent you from losing your AirPods and your JUUL, but we’re the first to make sure you either keep track of them all or lose them in a single go. The minimal and slim design of the WHYSTL-1 makes it easy to store when not in use and it could barely be simpler to install.

Something this cool is sure to turn heads! Maybe it’s the reason you meet the person of your dreams and fall in love. Maybe you guys get married and have kids and decide to name them WHYSTL-1. Maybe we send you a bunch of stickers if that happens. We cannot predict the future with 100% accuracy but we’re fairly certain something like this could happen.

 

Where are we Now?

We have 3D printed various prototype molds to refine the shape and function of the product, and have sourced paracord for the lanyard. Color matched silicone parts have been made with the molds and are being user tested now. We have already locked down our supply chain and vendors for packaging and the final silicone parts, and are ready to go to production

Beta Unit being field tested by an Anonymous Model

 

Prototype Making:

In order to accurately test the Silicone Parts, a 3D printed mold was made. Then, the prototype parts were custom colored and molded individually.  Various molds were printed to test different grip strengths and cable retention features.

Time lapse of molding parts

 

Rocky testing the lanyard retention
 
 
Very scientific testing
 
 
Color matched prototypes
 
 
Artsy, right?

 

What are the Risks?

Due to the incredible simplicity of the design of the WHYSTL-1 there are very few challenges. Aside from dialing in the molding and packaging tools it will be some of the smoothest sailing known to mankind. Our vendors are fantastic and quick, ensuring we can iterate and improve at lightning speed.

story:
♥MY STORY♥

Hey Y'all! My name is Talisha White and I've got a simple question for you - Have you ever had a dream?

Well, I can tell you, I have. I've wanted to be a designer and show at fashion week my entire life (well, for as long as I knew what it was). I often spent time during things like math class sketching the latest fall fashions instead of solving quadratic formulas and "I ain't shamed!"  Now, I can barely catch my breath, because I can hardly believe... my dreams are coming true.

I started off in a corner in my mom's guest room, sewing $0.99 patterns. As I got better, I was able to dress pageant girls on the state and national levels, reality TV stars, have my work appear in local publications, and last year I was able to see my work walk down a runway in New York. It was at that moment, if it wasn't clear before, that it became ABUNDANTLY clear now. This is where I belong.

I've already taken the first step: I've been accepted to show at the prestigous Gotham Hall during New York Fashion Week ( where my favorite evening wear designer just showed at last season, so yea, total fan-girl life affirming realization going on here) AND Vancouver Fashion Week in yes, CANADA! Being able to showcase my work on such collasal stages can and will help to propell my career as a notable fashion designer.

BUT, I CANNOT DO IT ALONE! I need your support to help get me to that next level and bring my southern sassy, cute and classy, brand of fashion to the world - literally! Fashion to me is so much more than pieces of fabric sewn together, it's what we live our lives in. 

It's all-or-nothing, fashion week or bust! However, I'm hoping that I'll see you on the runway!

♥WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET♥

To be very specific, we need help to show up and glow up in this way:

  • $3,528 will go directly to production fees to be able to showcase my designs
  • $1,000 will go to travel expenses (Those two collectively are the "show up")
  • $50 will be spent on tshirts for the models
  • $20 will be spent on totes for the models
  • $150 will be spent on robes for the models 
  • $400 will go towards materials like fabric and zippers (This is that "glow up" I told you about)

Besides that warm fuzzy feeling you get from helping young girls' dreams come true and my unwavering gratitude, perks for backing this project include:

  • some personalized social media shoutouts to praise you in all of your gloriful awesomeness
  • Swag so exclusive you can't even buy it
  • Gift cards and gift cards galore to make your life a little more fabulous
  • Some behind the scenes access to what it's really like
  • A handwritten postcard from New York and Vancouver, because mail is suddenly cool again

♥THE IMPACT♥

I truly and honestly believe that I can change the world one stitch at a time through my designs. People are living their lives in my clothes, and I hope when they're living in a Talisha White ball gown and their hair is slayed by the hair gods and all of their social media posts are accompanied by the #FLAWLESS, that they create those special moments that last a lifetime. 

As a children's wear designer, I have the ability to make an impact on the young lives that wear my clothes. When I reach for the moon, it's not just me reaching. It's every little girl who has ever had a dream, no matter how big or how small, reaching with me. That's why when I do a show I cast my own models and are often models who have no experience and are just looking to make their dreams come true. They are literally able to live their wildest dreams on my runway, and that to me is special.

Funding my dreams will help fuel theirs., and you never know what a little girl will do once she feels as though she can follow her dreams and they will come true.

 

♥RISKS AND CHALLENGES♥

Heidi Klum said it best, "As you know with fashion, one day you're in and the next day you're out." With that being said, fashion itself is a risky business. You never know what people will like, that's why you have to give it your all with every stitch you sew,

There is no reward without risk, no triumph without challenges, so in this case the biggest risk would be simply doing nothing.

♥OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP♥

If you are unable to contribute you can still help! Tell a friend to tell a friend, and then tell that friend to tell their friend! Share on social media! Hand out flyers! Leave a comment telling me I can do it! (No really! It would mean a lot to have some encouragement!)

Any and every little bit helps. Follow me on social media! @shoptalishawhite, doing that makes me look super cool and it helps!

♥THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT IN ADVANCE AND IN ABUNDANCE♥

I often spent time during things like math class sketching the latest fall fashions instead of solving quadratic formulas and "I ain't shamed!"  Now, I can barely catch my breath, because I can hardly believe... my dreams are coming true.I started off in a corner in my mom's guest room, sewing $0.99 patterns. As I got better, I was able to dress pageant girls on the state and national levels, reality TV stars, have my work appear in local publications, and last year I was able to see my work walk down a runway in New York. It was at that moment, if it wasn't clear before, that it became ABUNDANTLY clear now. This is where I belong.I've already taken the first step: I've been accepted to show at the prestigous Gotham Hall during New York Fashion Week ( where my favorite evening wear designer just showed at last season, so yea, total fan-girl life affirming realization going on here) AND Vancouver Fashion Week in yes, CANADA! Being able to showcase my work on such collasal stages can and will help to propell my career as a notable fashion designer.BUT, I CANNOT DO IT ALONE! I need your support to help get me to that next level and bring my southern sassy, cute and classy, brand of fashion to the world - literally! Fashion to me is so much more than pieces of fabric sewn together, it's what we live our lives in. It's all-or-nothing, fashion week or bust! However, I'm hoping that I'll see you on the runway!♥WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET♥To be very specific, we need help to show up and glow up in this way:
$3,528 will go directly to production fees to be able to showcase my designs
$1,000 will go to travel expenses (Those two collectively are the "show up")
$50 will be spent on tshirts for the models
$20 will be spent on totes for the models
$150 will be spent on robes for the models 
$400 will go towards materials like fabric and zippers (This is that "glow up" I told you about)
Besides that warm fuzzy feeling you get from helping young girls' dreams come true and my unwavering gratitude, perks for backing this project include:
some personalized social media shoutouts to praise you in all of your gloriful awesomeness
Swag so exclusive you can't even buy it
Gift cards and gift cards galore to make your life a little more fabulous
Some behind the scenes access to what it's really like
A handwritten postcard from New York and Vancouver, because mail is suddenly cool again
♥THE IMPACT♥I truly and honestly believe that I can change the world one stitch at a time through my designs. People are living their lives in my clothes, and I hope when they're living in a Talisha White ball gown and their hair is slayed by the hair gods and all of their social media posts are accompanied by the #FLAWLESS, that they create those special moments that last a lifetime. As a children's wear designer, I have the ability to make an impact on the young lives that wear my clothes. When I reach for the moon, it's not just me reaching. It's every little girl who has ever had a dream, no matter how big or how small, reaching with me. That's why when I do a show I cast my own models and are often models who have no experience and are just looking to make their dreams come true. They are literally able to live their wildest dreams on my runway, and that to me is special.Funding my dreams will help fuel theirs., and you never know what a little girl will do once she feels as though she can follow her dreams and they will come true. ♥RISKS AND CHALLENGES♥Heidi Klum said it best, "As you know with fashion, one day you're in and the next day you're out." With that being said, fashion itself is a risky business. You never know what people will like, that's why you have to give it your all with every stitch you sew,There is no reward without risk, no triumph without challenges, so in this case the biggest risk would be simply doing nothing.♥OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP♥If you are unable to contribute you can still help! Tell a friend to tell a friend, and then tell that friend to tell their friend! Share on social media! Hand out flyers! Leave a comment telling me I can do it! (No really! It would mean a lot to have some encouragement!)Any and every little bit helps. Follow me on social media! @shoptalishawhite, doing that makes me look super cool and it helps!♥THANKS FOR YOUR SUPPORT IN ADVANCE AND IN ABUNDANCE♥

story:
With attention to details , simple lines  and the best materials we have created top quality frames suitable for everyone.

Polarized Lenses from "Breitfeld und Schliekert" (B&S) one of the leading companies in the industry of optics.All lenses comply with EU standard regulations (EN1836:2005+A1:2007) , are suitable for driving and have a 100 % UV protection.

Made entirely by hand, each pair of glasses is unique and is made in a small workshop by Greek craftsmen.

Double Flexed Hinges provide flexibility and easy excellent fit.

Lightweight design!Only 30gr. You wont even know its there ;)

Each pair of Woodoo Sunglasses comes with an elegant hard case along with microfiber cloth.

 

We have produced the first 100 pairs and we ask for your help to expand our product line.We offer you our products in a very low price in order to gain your trust so you can spread the word ;)

OUR COLLECTION

Inspired by the beautiful Greek Islands

 

MYKONOS-GR1CB (Beech and walnut wood with brown lenses)

MYKONOS-GR1AB (Walnut wood with brown lenses)

MYKONOS-GR1ABB (Beech wood with brown lenses)

MYKONOS-GR1CG (Beech and walnut wood with green lenses)

MYKONOS-GR1AG (Walnut wood with green lenses)

MYKONOS-GR1BG (Beech wood with green lenses)

SANTORINI-GR2CG (Beech and walnut wood with green lenses)

SANTORINI-GR2AG (Walnut wood with green lenses)

SANTORINI-GR2BG (Beech wood with green lenses)

SANTORINI-GR2CB (Beech and walnut wood with brown lenses)

SANTORINI-GR2AB (Walnut wood with brown lenses)

SANTORINI-GR2BB (Beech wood with brown lenses)

.

CORFU-GR3CB (Beech and walnut wood with brown lenses)

CORFU-GR3AB (Walnut wood with brown lenses)

CORFU-GR3BB (Beech wood with brown lenses)

CORFU-GR3CG (Beech and walnut wood with green lenses)

CORFU-GR3AG (Walnut wood with green lenses)

CORFU-GR3AG (Beech wood with green lenses)

 

Size Chart

Mykonos

Santorini

Corfu

After your pledge we need 2-4 days to process your order.

Delivery Time depends on your location (normally takes 2-8 days).

After shipment you will be provided with the tracking number.

Woodoo Eyewear is a new company in the field of handmade optics.We do our best to provide customers with the higher quality of products by putting all our effort and love in what we do.We managed to assemble a team of young people with vision and experience in the field.Located in Athens Greece where the sun is always up and people are always smiling.

 

 

We depend on your support to make our dreams come true!

For any additional info please contact us at info@woodoo.vision

story:
A Boy and A Bunny Shop wants to help you add neutral colored tees to your child’s closet.  It is often a struggle to find clothes for a toddler that appeal to our own taste; a minimal look that is simple, classic, yet still playful.  Tees with cute designs that will delight both you and your child.

 

My name is Janet and I am a former elementary public educator turned stay-at-home mom to a lovely almost 2-year-old boy.  I've always been a crafter and creator (Stampin' Up anyone?).  Also, I love to shop and specifically love shopping for him.  However, I’ve noticed that the majority of toddler tees use bright colors and have sayings/designs that don’t hold any significance to us.  I was always searching for a more minimalistic style but had a hard time finding exactly what I was looking for.  This led me to explore designing my own shirts that fit more of a minimalistic aesthetic. 

The shop is named after my son, Jordan, and his favorite pal, Bunny.  Hence, ‘A Boy and A Bunny’!

The online shop (most likely on Etsy) will be selling toddler tees with sizes ranging from 2T to 5T, with the possibility of expanding the sizes in the future.  The tees will have minimalistic designs that are hand drawn by me.  They will then be inked using permanent fabric paint onto the shirt.  

 

  • Production supplies: Cricut machine, fabric paint, ink, shirts
  • Building inventory: purchasing shirts of various sizes for quicker turnaround
  • Packaging & shipping: any costs related to packaging the items and shipping them

 

You will receive a perk for your contribution towards this project starting at $20, though any amount is significant for this campaign!

  • Tier 1 Perk: one tee of your choice
  • Tier 2 Perk: three tees of your choice
  • Tier 3 Perk: all six tees (one of each design, plus the secret design tee!)
  • NEW!  One Any Sized Tee!
  • NEW! Two Any Sized Tees Bundle!

All tier perk tees come in sizes 2T- 5T (toddler sizes).   

**The any sized tees will include a range of sizes from newborn to adult!  A shirt for everyone in the whole family!**

Here are the designs!

 

Design #6-  IT'S A SURPRISE!  Special for our Tier 3 Perk!

 

  • Small Business Supporter:  by supporting this campaign you are supporting a small business!  You are fully aware of where the item is produced and can feel good about directly supporting a family business.
  • Handmade Supporter: you are supporting the slowly dying art of creating things by hand.  The time that a human hand spent thinking about, creating and producing your item is a labor of love.
  • Minimal Lifestyle Supporter: the shirts are designed to go with various outfits.  This minimizes the time trying to plan outfits (perfect for capsule wardrobes!), but also maximizes the use as you can mix and match the shirts with various outfits!  Also, the shirts are a great quality tee that you can use over and over again, creating less waste for our environment!


  • Low stock at wholesale retailer: There could be occasions where the specific size/color will be out of stock at the wholesale retailer where I purchase the shirts.  However, I am not tied to this retailer so I would be able to switch to a different retailer.  Hopefully, through the campaign, I would be able to purchase extra shirts in order to build a personal inventory.
  • Slow turnaround time:  I am a business of one.  I also am fully in charge of my son, my home, chef duties, etc.  This could slow my production time, but thankfully I have my small tribe of family and friends that I can call on for help. 
  • Room for human error:  There’s always room for error when an item is handmade.  I am human after all!  However, the prototypes turned out great, so I do not foresee this being an issue.

 

 

 

                                                       

  • Follow us on Instagram @aboyandabunny!  Don’t underestimate the power of following, liking and sharing our account and its posts!  
  • Spread the word!  Maybe you aren’t interested in this campaign, but you know someone who might be!  Feel free to share this campaign as well as our account on Instagram!

Follow us on Instagram @aboyandabunny!  Don’t underestimate the power of following, liking and sharing our account and its posts!  

Spread the word!  Maybe you aren’t interested in this campaign, but you know someone who might be!  Feel free to share this campaign as well as our account on Instagram!

story:
WHY USE LEATHER SHOES?

 

 

Thanks to the fact that leather is a very flexible material, with its use it adapts to the anatomy of the foot, making it feel more comfortable and preventing it from becoming deformed.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

"SUPPORT OUR DREAM OF SHARING HAPPINESS"

 

Our country have high level of poverty. it's more evident in rurals zone, most children that live there don't have necessary conditions for go to school. we are aware that to sow a better future, the education is fundamental. therefore, in this campain your contribution help a child to have new shoes for go to school. For each pair of shoes you buy, we will donate 1 pair for the children.

 

You can also make a donation directly to a child, with 24 USD , you will make a happy child.

 

MANOS AMIGAS is a organization that has more than ten years helping children less favorated from our country. its idea was born due to the high level of poverty suffered by certain areas of the country where children do not have what it takes to go to school. as that their parents don't have much economic resources. the backing of MANOS AMIGAS is fundamental for their growth, because they contribute help educational, food and psicologic.  Its passion for help children has conmoved the hearts of thousand people of different countries. until moment, they have received the help of more eight hundred international volunteers, all these people sponser a child  and help him during his stay in the foundation, his support isn't economic, his support is emotional as is essential give them love. MANOS AMIGAS have a page web "LET'S GO VOLUNTEER", there you can know them and inform you about this great foundation, through this page you can be part of that great group of volunteer than MANOS AMIGAS have  welcomed. 

SERRACCI want to be part of this great group, so we see the need to help children less favorated with our campain. we belive that education is fundamental in the growth stage, we dream of being able to provide everything necessary so that none child is absent from school. With your donation you can help a child to have a better quality  of life

 

    OUR HISTORY

    It all started when my grandfather in the seventies decided to start his own shoe business, for years this tradition has remained in the family, my parents have worked in this world for several years, and I have grown up with the mentality of continuing with this art.

     OUR VISION

    With your support we can finance our proyects, the purpose is enlarged our company, position our brand, increase production, do our own physical shop and online shop, also we want create employment for vulnerable people, prioritizing in women head of family. It's very important for we that this campain can support who more they need, Children are the ones who can change the future of all things.

    THE FAMILY BEHIND THE PROJECT

     

    Tradition is a fundamental part of our company, being made up of a family of collaborators, who give their effort with all dedication.

     

    FAQ

     

    WHAT HAPPENS IF THE SHOE IS NOT MY SIZE?

    You can contact us by email sycmanufacturas@gmail.com to give you a solution as soon as possible.

     

    WHO PAYS THE SHIPMENT IF A RETURN IS SUBMITTED? 

    We will do everything possible so that you have the correct size, in the case that the shoe doesn't fit for you, the shipment must be paid by the client, we appreciate your understanding.

     

    ARE COLORS EXACTLY AS THEY APPEAR HERE?

    our products are made with 100% original leathers and treated with ecological processes, which guarantees even more its authenticity. leather is not a material that is manufactured in series which makes each shoe has unique characteristics, for that reason it is very likely that it will change a bit to that of the description photo.

     

    HOW MUCH DOES SHIPPING COST?

    We offer free worldwide shipping. However, please keep in mind that import fees or any other carrier fees are not included. Depending on your country's custom's regulations, you will have to pay for them upon arrival.

story:
Hi! 

Welcome to my campaign, I have designed the world’s first Cyrillic Slavic wristwatch. 

"The Cyrillic numerals are a numeral system derived from the Cyrillic script, developed in the First Bulgarian Empire in the late tenth century. It was used by the First Bulgarian Empire and by South and East Slavic peoples." 

The system was used in Russia as late as the early 18th century, when Peter the Great replaced it with Arabic numerals as part of his civil script reform initiative.

Part of our mission is to raise awareness about this numeral system and revive it. 

What We Need & What You Get

If there is enough interest in resurrecting this beautiful script your donations will help through the prototyping and developmental phase and eventually to production. 

The perks are being part of history and preserving history, supporting a small business that support the struggling people in Kosovo and Metohija, and getting a unique one of a kind watch for a great value,

Impact

Russians and Serbs are often portrayed negatively in the media and there is little awareness of the beauty of our culture and kindness of our people. 

Your investment in a Cyrillic Slavic wristwatch will have a positive impact in three ways:  

By wearing the watch you will educate yourself and those you encounter about Slavic (Serbian, Russian) history and culture

You will help awareness about the struggles faced by Serbian families in Kosovo, the birthplace of the Serbian Orthodox Church. Three percent (3%) of all funds ($4.5 per watch) raised will go to humanitarian organization “Mother of Nine Jugovic” (Majka Devet Jugovica).

You will help us popularize the revival of the Cyrillic numeral system in Russia and Serbia

Humanitarian organization "Mother of the Nine Jugovic" was founded in 2000 and is officially registered by UNMIK. During its twelve years of work, the organization has worked intensively with international and local NGOs (IOCC, WCRP, Glasgow Caring City, UMCOR, CARE, Handicap International, Center for Peace and Tolerance, NGO "Homeland"). The headquarters of the organization is currently at the historic Gracanica Monastery. 

More information about “Mother of the Nine Jugovic” can be found here: http://www.narodnekuhinjekim.com/o-nama

Risks & Challenges

The great part of this project is that there is not a lot of risk involved. 

As long as we raise sufficient funds the watch will be made, a portion of our proceeds will go to a great charity, and you will get a beautiful watch. A small investment from you will make all of this possible. 

 A percentage of all profits made by Bijes LLC will always be donated to the charity. This will be the case for the Cyrillic Slavic watch and any new products we create in the future. 

We have everything lined up and I will post pictures and update every step of the way! 

All that is left is testing consumer interest! So if you want to get behind this project please donate!

What happens to your money if we don’t meet our goal during this campaign? 

If we don’t meet our goal we will put the money aside and continue seeking further investments until the project is complete.

Other Ways You Can Help

Please share this campaign with your friends and family through social media sites. I hope to find likeminded individuals who will be interested in supporting this project. 

I am also happy to hear all of your suggestions and comments!

If we don’t meet our goal we will put the money aside and continue seeking further investments until the project is complete.
Other Ways You Can Help
Please share this campaign with your friends and family through social media sites. I hope to find likeminded individuals who will be interested in supporting this project. 
I am also happy to hear all of your suggestions and comments!

story:
OAKAs are the world's healthiest men's dress shoe for active professionals.

OAKAs combine suit ready style with a zero drop inner sole made from soft, breathable fibers.  Machine Washable, Slip-On, and Anti-Slip.

 

We made OAKAs to truly be the healthiest and best dress shoe available, representing a new kind of professional.  I have been ripping the soles out of my traditional dress shoes for years trying to make them at least not be detrimental to my health by creating poor posture, changing my gait, and shortening the tendons.. Then I decided enough and set out to fix everything I hated about old school dress shoes.

 

 Faux Heel

We developed a shoe mold that gives the typical dress shoe look from the outside but in fact is actually a faux heel derived from special cut outs allowing your foot to stay flat to the ground.

 

Soft, Breathable Fibers

The whole shoe is soft and flexible for extreme comfort.  The upper is made from flyknit fibers that helps reduce production waste compared to more traditional manufacturing processes. 

 

 Anti - Slip

OAKAs have an innovative anti-slip open tread outer sole that utilizes our specialized faux heel cutouts as a way to drain water out and prevent hydroplaning like you'd find in a traditional dress shoe without you being able to see the treads from the outside like with a sneaker.

 

Zero Drop

OAKAs have a zero drop inner sole.  What that means is as you walk your feet stay flat to the ground rather than at an angle like with almost all other shoes.  Most shoes, not just dress shoes, have a 8mm to 16mm height difference between the toe box and the heel making you walk at an unnatural angle and can contribute to changing your gait, poor posture, shortening the tendons, and foot pain.  A zero drop sole allows you to walk more naturally and strengthen your feet over time.

 

Slip On

Laces can be necessary but are often just annoying to deal with on a constant basis, so we made the whole shoe an easy slip on.

 

Machine Washable

OAKAs are completely machine washable making them ready for travel and any adventure.

 

Our Research

We’ve been developing OAKA for the last two years, spending many hours designing every aspect in order to fix what we’ve always hated about traditional dress shoes.  We built the shoe mold from scratch to achieve a dress shoe form but with a zero drop sole.

 

We Built OAKA for Active Professionals

When I think about traditional dress shoes I imagine that old school banker in the back room smoking a cigar.  However that's not who I am nor my friends.  We're all good at what we do and are definitely professionals but we go about it in our own way.  Think:

  • Tech over finance
  • Purpose driven work
  • Body and mind as one
  • West coast over East coast
  • Nature to reset the mind & body
  • Meditation for mental performance
  • Working to live rather than living to work

 

The Traveler

Travel and mobility are incredibly important to us and OAKAs ability to fold up and be flexible make them perfect for the road.

 

The Barefoot Enthusiast

Being zero drop allows your feet to walk flat to the ground like you're barefoot.  This will help correct posture and allow your feet to strengthen over time.

 

Colors

We will start with 2 colors Gray and Black:

 

Sizing Guide

Sizing Comparison - OAKAs sizing is similar to a traditional dress shoe though our toe box is slightly wider.

 

Half Sizes - If you typically wear a half size we recommend you sizing down.

 

Size Exchanges - We are committed to making sure you get the right fit and size and will have a full free exchange program to make sure of it.

 

What Happens After the Campaign?

After our campaign has concluded we will send out a survey to collect preliminary sizing and colors.  You can change this later as this is to give us a rough idea of the distribution within our initial production order.  

 

Once we have the initial production run in our warehouse all backers will be able to select their exact size and color through our site and have their OAKAs shipped to them.  Shipping is free within the continental U.S. and regular shipping will be calculated and apply for rest of North America and International. 

 

Contact Us

Please feel free to contact us directly at michael@oakastudio.com with any questions.

Featured On

"Named one of  ProductHype's Best Projects of 2021."

 

Credits

Big thanks to Oakland based Stablished Projects for their creative help and eye.

story:
Jump Over The Moon by MAALS

Combining classic, proven Japanese technology with modern design touches, we've built a watch that is eye-catching, completely new and instantly recognisable.

 

Reviews, reviews, reviews

We are over the moon (see what we did there) with the reaction we’ve had about our watch. We’re really proud of what the quality and design of Jump Over The Moon so sent them out around the world to be independently reviewed.  

Unique moonphase movement

Available in either brushed stainless steel or black steel, early on we decided to shy away from creating a design heavy dial face, preferring to tread a simpler path, adding subtle detail touches to its look and feel.

Through the triangular opening neatly step stacked top to bottom, sit the minutes and hours on two rotating discs over a moonphase that completes its lunar cycle every 29½ days. Pinning the stack is a centrally located metallic second hand.

Double domed dial and crystal

Domed sunburst silver or black finishes to the dial were added to capture light and add vibrancy, then we also domed the crystal with anti-reflection coating to create a classic look.

 

Exclusive caseback artwork

We worked with renowned UK artist OKSE, to design exclusive caseback artwork for Jump Over The Moon. Using the name as inspiration, OKSE created an outer space star studded scene, with an astronaut reaching out and jumping over the moon, while in the background an alien abduction over Earth is detailed. 

Every caseback for JOTM, both black and silver, will be etched with OKSE’s unique artwork.

Handmade leather watch pouch

As collectors, we are used to taking a few watches with us if we go away somewhere. To protect them on the go, we teamed up with UK boutique handmade leather goods company FizzArrow, to create an exclusive hand cut and stitched tan leather watch pouch. Each pouch is made using vegetable tanned leather with red thread detail. 


To encourage people to collect watches – whether they be from MAALS or any other brand – each pouch features zips to the side to connect to additional MAALS pouches so you can protect your collection as it grows. A curved tuck flap closure secures the pouch, behind a debossed MAALS logo to the front.

Specifications

story:
(Free Worldwide Shipping Included)

Fashion

 a field whereby many aspiring designers have strived towards, and later had their dreams shattered. The fashion process is an cruel  and expensive one. Without the right financial backing, it is next to impossible to realise a collection. 

It’s always challenging especially because you have to straddle the creative and financial aspects …” 
-  Tara St. James, Designer of high-end fashion brand, Study 

With no other avenues, most aspiring designers settle for a fashion house minion, if they are lucky. 

“Figures from the University of Kent show there are more than 4,000 textile and design graduates in the UK competing for around 500 jobs every year.”

- Guardian


Some say graveyards of broken dreams, we say untapped creative potential. 

We call ourselves 


We want to create a platform that will enable any fashion designers to monetize their creativity. The crowd will be the judge of their creation through their pledges while we will take care of the fabrication and logistics. All designers have to do is to stick to what they do best - design.


But before that...

We need answer to the one fundamental question: 

Will people buy fashion the crowdfunding way?

This campaign represents our attempt at verifying the fundamental assumption we have made. This is also our attempt to walk in the shoes of the designers whom we are trying to help. (Notice how the dress is modelled by our very talented designer/ co-founder, Xiu)


And hence, The Camilla Dress project

Xiu works a 9 to 5 desk-bound job but deep in her heart, she has always wanted to be a designer and explore the creative side of herself. She has no formal training in fashion design but always have had an eye for art and fashion (the same profile of people we hope to help). 



The Camilla dress manifests the idea of a power woman.



(Free Worldwide Shipping Included)


The Process

Caption: Going through the process selecting the materials

Caption: From the very first sketch to the final product


The campaign

We will consider the funding campaign a success when we have 60 pledges (or pre-order if you will). The campaign will continue running but no more than 150 pieces will be produced. 

The campaign will close when we have 150 pledges or at the end of 60 days. 

The money will go towards commitment to the production run of the Camilla Dress. 

You will receive a limited edition dress designed by me that is brought into existence thanks to your support!

(Free Worldwide Shipping Included)

The Camilla Dress

Now let the pictures do the talking


Risks & Challenges

We aim to deliver the dress to you within 60 days upon conclusion of the campaign. While we have the manufacturer lined up and ready to produce, there is a possibility that we might run into delays given that this is our first small scale production. In the event of unforeseen circumstances, we will notify supporters via the communication channel registered with Indiegogo. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Leave us a private message if you are a designer and would like to learn more about how you can bring your designs to fruition. 

Leave us a private message if you are a consumer that likes what you see, and would like to follow future updates from us.

Please help us spread the word by sharing via Facebook or Twitter! 

All words of encouragement and suggestions are welcome!

And The People Behind the Experiment

Thank you for hearing us out!

story:
MatchLab is the next efficient and convenient app that everyone needs. With so many different functions this app can do, everyone can get a use out of it. 

We all get dressed in the morning, and it goes a little something like this-

You wake up, crawl out of bed, and stumble to the closet. You look, hanger by hanger, for some top that you want to wear. The likely outcome is frustration and cycling through all your tops at least twice before stumbling to the dresser. After looking through your clothes, you find a pair of shorts and think "Oh I really want to wear my favorite blue shirt with these!" So, a little more awake and a lot more excited, you go back to the closet and look everywhere for your favorite blue shirt. The problem is, you forgot you wore it last weekend at the family BBQ and a little bit of Uncle Ronny's Secret Sauce dripped off the Chicken Wing you were trying to eat and left a stain right in the middle of your shirt, which is now in the laundry. Disappointed, you go back to bed and just decide to stay in your PJ's all day.

_________________________________________________________________

Lets see how having MatchLab could have helped "you":

Right off the bat, you don't even need to get out of bed (How Awesome!). Simply by grabbing your phone, you can look through your entire closet without even being at the closet (Even More Awesome!).


Look through your shirts, shorts, pants, jackets, skirts, tank tops, etc. through the app. Instead of going hanger by hanger, just simply swipe left and right.

_______________________________________________________________

Select the shirt, pants, shorts (you get the drill) you want to wear. In this example, its a shirt as shown above. Under your choice, you will see the rest of your clothes that match the particular article of clothing you chose!

______________________________________________________________

Let's focus on this part real fast. On the right you will see a calendar, where you find your wear history and laundry. Instead of the disappointment about the crime that happened to your favorite blue shirt, you could have known by simply looking at the laundry list and wear history. Never be heartbroken again!


The camera in the middle is how to enter clothes into your MatchLab closet. 

(2 examples)

Take the picture, choose your category, dull out the background, double check the colors, identify its pattern. It truly is that simple.


Join us to get this app built so everyone can enjoy an incredibly helpful app!


A couple of quick notes!

  1. It will only be available on iPhone (sorry everyone else!)
  2. Free to download
  3. Every account comes with 60 free closet spaces, you can purchase more spaces if you need.

story:
You're tired of looking like everyone else, because deluxe editions are too expensive? Not anymore! You want immediate access to new releases, but won't buy into that ridiculous pricing that's only affordable when it's lame? You don't need to. You always wondered why you were paying 50€ for a shirt, and only 0.50€ to the maker? It doesn't have to be that way. And then you suddenly feel out-of-trend and notice that the seams are falling apart. "Come on!" - you think - "What am I even paying for?"

We decided to change the rules of the game!

 

Our products are made to order, meaning that every item you purchase is manufactured by-request and will take around 6 weeks to be delivered. This means we have no stock, so no waste. This also allows customization because workers have time to make unique and seasonless products. Also, we achieve fair prices and high-quality because the production is sustainable.

Without the middleman and the markups, we sell directly to you. This lowers our price and gives you the power to decide how much you want to pay. We reversed the pricing model, flipped the calendar upside down, empowered the consumer and cut out some smart-ass players. It's an equal gain for everyone!

Because our business model allows us to manage time in everyone's favor, it is possible to benefit from the durability of premium materials and the best manufacture. The products are influenced by minimalist  Scandinavian design and are handmade in Portugal, where fine shoemaking and textile production has been part of its tradition for centuries. The artisans wisdom at every step of the production is heartened by fair working conditions. And the clean lines of our shoes, t-shirts, and accessories are designed to be  timeless and to delight the user for years to come.

 

Paulo Silva is a daring 46 year-old entrepreneur with the shoe business running in his family for generations. He comes from the heart of shoe production, up in the north of Portugal, where he has been dealing with this sublime art and its adversities. He collaborated with global luxury brands, and at the same time took in a greater consciousness about the fashion industry pros and cons with his international experience.

 

We develop and handpick our leathers in partnership with the best and premium tanneries from Italy, Portugal and Spain, with vegetable tanned finishing ensuring top notch beautiful, soft, durable and quality touch.

Our insock is developed exclusively after a lot of research and testing to ensure the maximum comfort using the most natural materials, and the memory foam makes for a customized, total contact fit which provides excellent shock absorption to help comfort joints and soft tissue. The unique properties of cushioning allow this material to continually rebound to its original form, so you get a custom fit during each use.

 

 

Why the name "The Riot Studios"? Our major purpose was to revolutionize - not just the market - but also the Fashion system. This is not just about the new design, nor the new revenue model. This is about a new philosophy that has been rising all over the world, and "Riot" sound just as disruptive.

Why would you start selling at discount prices, over wholesale prices? It sounds as if we were loosing money, right? We are not. And neither are the makers! We can basically afford to financially benefit those clients who place their orders first, because they give us enough time and cash flow to negotiate in bulk and get the best production deals. We can furthermore make wholesale prices, because there's no middleman. We sell directly to you.

Where can I see all the styles available? All of them are available in our gallery (top of the page). Every shoe is named after revolutionary leaders who have left ever-lasting impressions in the world. And all our sneakers are unisex.

When will the backers be able to choose the model, color and size? We will send out a survey for backers to choose it after the campaign ends. Don’t worry about it!

Do you ship internationally? Yes, we ship to every single country in the world.

Do I pay shipping fees? No, you don't pay for anything but the items you order. The shipping fees are on us. However, please keep in mind that import fees or any other carrier fees are not included.

How do I measure myself to find my right size? Here's our guide to help you find the perfect size of your new shoes:

Where can I make a complaint or suggestion? We're always available to receive your feedback. Please email us at info@theriotstudios.com.

How can I help, besides ordering your perks? If you believe in The Riot Studios, please feel free to share our Indiegogo campaign in your networks (see the links below). Also, you can talk with your friends and relatives about how you feel about the fashion industry's pros and cons. The more you challenge the status-quo, the more chances we will have to make the world a fairer place.

 

Follow us to get the best deals. The trick is to know the release dates on time so you can place your order as soon as you can. And feel free to write us every time you have any question to info@theriotstudios.com. We will write you back as soon as possible.

      


 

Thank you for your support!

And the clean lines of our shoes, t-shirts, and accessories are designed to be  timeless and to delight the user for years to come. Paulo Silva is a daring 46 year-old entrepreneur with the shoe business running in his family for generations. He comes from the heart of shoe production, up in the north of Portugal, where he has been dealing with this sublime art and its adversities. He collaborated with global luxury brands, and at the same time took in a greater consciousness about the fashion industry pros and cons with his international experience. We develop and handpick our leathers in partnership with the best and premium tanneries from Italy, Portugal and Spain, with vegetable tanned finishing ensuring top notch beautiful, soft, durable and quality touch.Our insock is developed exclusively after a lot of research and testing to ensure the maximum comfort using the most natural materials, and the memory foam makes for a customized, total contact fit which provides excellent shock absorption to help comfort joints and soft tissue. The unique properties of cushioning allow this material to continually rebound to its original form, so you get a custom fit during each use.  Why the name "The Riot Studios"? Our major purpose was to revolutionize - not just the market - but also the Fashion system. This is not just about the new design, nor the new revenue model. This is about a new philosophy that has been rising all over the world, and "Riot" sound just as disruptive.Why would you start selling at discount prices, over wholesale prices? It sounds as if we were loosing money, right? We are not. And neither are the makers! We can basically afford to financially benefit those clients who place their orders first, because they give us enough time and cash flow to negotiate in bulk and get the best production deals. We can furthermore make wholesale prices, because there's no middleman. We sell directly to you.Where can I see all the styles available? All of them are available in our gallery (top of the page). Every shoe is named after revolutionary leaders who have left ever-lasting impressions in the world. And all our sneakers are unisex.When will the backers be able to choose the model, color and size? We will send out a survey for backers to choose it after the campaign ends. Don’t worry about it!Do you ship internationally? Yes, we ship to every single country in the world.Do I pay shipping fees? No, you don't pay for anything but the items you order. The shipping fees are on us. However, please keep in mind that import fees or any other carrier fees are not included.How do I measure myself to find my right size? Here's our guide to help you find the perfect size of your new shoes:Where can I make a complaint or suggestion? We're always available to receive your feedback. Please email us at info@theriotstudios.com.How can I help, besides ordering your perks? If you believe in The Riot Studios, please feel free to share our Indiegogo campaign in your networks (see the links below). Also, you can talk with your friends and relatives about how you feel about the fashion industry's pros and cons. The more you challenge the status-quo, the more chances we will have to make the world a fairer place. Follow us to get the best deals. The trick is to know the release dates on time so you can place your order as soon as you can. And feel free to write us every time you have any question to info@theriotstudios.com. We will write you back as soon as possible.       Thank you for your support!

story:
---------------------------------------------------------------------

  • Pat Leather was founded in November 2015. by two designers who have a passion for leather, arts and design. 
  • Mini Pat Wallet was our first project That's run as a campaign on Indiegogo.

  • Design the best leather products that made by hand. 
  • Control the production process and ensure the quality of every piece of leather products.
  • Most importantly, our income distribution to people in the communities outside the big city.

  • Where our funding will be used?
  • We choose to distributed to people in the community of countryside. Better than paying to a factory in the city.
  • Still get handmade and high quality products.

  • Most gardeners, farmers and housekeepers who are unable to work in a big city. They gets our jobs done at their home.
  • They are expertise in leather works.

---------------------


"In our eyes leather products as a valuable piece of art."


---------------------
Thanks for helping us to bring this project to life.
------
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

FAQ

  • Are colors exactly as they appear here?

  It's very hard to represent the exact color of this Top-grain leather,The tone of color can change if you look in different angle. However, we tried to show the colors as accurate as possible.

  • How many cards and bills it can take?

  Recommend for 4 cards but It can hold 6 cards and 8-12 folded bills. 

  • Do you cover import fees as well as shipping costs?

  We only cover the shipping costs. Import fees and other customs fees are not covered by us.

Pat Leather was founded in November 2015. by two designers who have a passion for leather, arts and design. 

Mini Pat Wallet was our first project That's run as a campaign on Indiegogo.







 



Design the best leather products that made by hand. 


Control the production process and ensure the quality of every piece of leather products.

Most importantly, our income distribution to people in the communities outside the big city.








Where our funding will be used?
We choose to distributed to people in the community of countryside. Better than paying to a factory in the city.

Are colors exactly as they appear here?

  Recommend for 4 cards but It can hold 6 cards and 8-12 folded bills. 
Do you cover import fees as well as shipping costs?
  We only cover the shipping costs. Import fees and other customs fees are not covered by us.

story:
LEONARDO Eyewear: See the world differently!

When it comes to our vision, there is no replacement for comfortable, high-quality lenses and frames. Seeing is essential, but what steps do we take to protect our eyes from changes in light and the constant strain of staring at screens throughout the day? Why isn't there a single pair of eyewear that can meet all of these needs, while providing you with a stylish frame that you can feel comfortable in? Meet LEONARDO, the last pair of eyewear that you will ever need. 

Leonardo contains advanced vision technology that automatically adapts to the changing light conditions, offering your eyes the ideal amount of light in any situation. They protect your eyes from the UV spectrum at 100% filtration, and from the harmful blue/purple spectrum with 80% filtration - the highest blue light protection ever achieved! They also have special filters blended inside the lenses which make our eyewear darken even behind the windshield of a car. They are truly the most technologically advanced eyewear to protect your eyes!

 

Why Choose Leonardo?

 

 

Total protection from UVA/UVB radiation

Sunlight consists of two types of harmful radiation: UVA and UVB. The UVA penetrates deep in the skin and is the main cause of premature aging of the skin and eyes. UVB is mostly responsible for sunburns.

The overexposure to the sun can cause serious damage to your eyes, such us cataract and macular degeneration. So we all need to protect ourselves as best as possible. 

LEONARDO is the eyewear that does exactly that! It protects you by blocking both UVA and UVB at 100%, ensuring that your eyes are as safe as possible, no matter where life takes you.

 

The highest protection from the Blue/Purple spectrum

Leonardo lenses are photochromic, which means that they change color according to the conditions, both outside or inside.

When used outside, they darken up to 100% to completely protect you from the UVA and UVB rays and from the blue light emitted from the sun.

Inside, due to the technology within the lens, they turn white and they protect you from the blue light emitted from computers mobile phones and tablets, thus reducing eye strain and headaches that you might have from working many hours in front of a screen! 

The blue light protection of our eyewear reaches 80%, which is the highest ever achieved.

IMPORTANT NOTE: This 80% protection is achieved by adding a special filter which makes the colors warmer. This means that it might not be suitable for people working with photoshop, Corel, autocad or color palettes. 

If you do, please let us know when you pledge. We will make your lenses without this filter (60% Protection - still the highest amount of protection available without discoloration).

 

Quick Facts

  • They filter blue light from computer/tablet/mobile screens
  • They filter UVA/UVB and blue/purple rays from the sun
  • They reduce glare from the sun or opposite car lights while driving
  • They are scratch, water and fingerprint resistant
  • They come with your prescription, so you can wear them day and night (sf +4 to -4 / cyl +2 to -2)
  • They ALWAYS protect your eyes, reducing strain and discomfort throughout the day
  • They darken even inside your car for maximum comfort when driving.
  • They are the best lenses you can have for protecting the eyes of your children
  • They are the PERFECT combination of safety and style - unlike any other!

 

 

COLORS

Brown: 

Green: 

Grey: 

 

LEONARDO eyewear provides CONSTANT care for your eyes

There are no worries about scratching our filters or the technology being negatively affected, as our process ensures that the photochromic dyes and all filters are part of the lens and cannot be scratched or peeled off. They are designed to last for the life of your prescription!

 

LEONARDO. Fashion and Technology!

Our frames are all made in Italy and Japan, from anti-allergenic materials. These materials are high quality handmade acetate, metal, titanium and carbon fibre.

Here is a glimpse from our premium frames:

Carbon Fibre

Titanium

Metallic

 

Handmade Acetate

 

PERKS

 

STRETCH GOALS

 

 

We start with a vision...

To spread this technology, along with fashion and comfort, to every part of the world.

We are depending on you. Be a part of our journey...

Help us spread our eyewear so everybody can see the world differently!

 

Risks & Challenges

There are no obvious risks as we have everything planned and ready. We talked with our suppliers and they agreed, as soon as the campaign reaches its goal, they will begin shipping the frames and lenses with a just a deposit from our part.

The money we will raise through our campaign will be spent on equipment, the design of new frames and new colors for our lenses.

So, all the perks will begin shipping in late June.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you are not ready, or you just can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Spread the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • You can use Facebook, Twitter, Instagram or the Indiegogo share tools!

From our team, a big THANK YOU!!!

story:
YOUR BEST TRAVEL MEMORIES, 

TURNED INTO A DRESS.

Our favorite clothes usually have intense, beautiful emotional value: they remind us of good memories, special moments in our lives. 

We would love to hear about your travels (real or imaginary) and work together to make a unique fabric print (and dress) that will tell your story.

 

HOW DOES IT WORK?

We'll work together on a interactive online moodboard, trough our new website.

You will share directly with us all the elements that made that trip so special (pics, songs, quotes) and we will turn your unique story into a custom designed fabric print. 

Once we have your print design made, you will choose:

- The color between 3 proposals 

- The print placement (between 3 proposals)

- The dress design: choose one of the 5 flattering styles available (see pics below), 

pick your size and have your unique dress made & shipped to your door.

 

WHAT WILL THE CROWDFUNDING FUNDS COVER?

A new amazing interactive website, that will allow a unique customer experience: creating a unique piece that tells your story.

 

WHAT DO I GET IF I SUPPORT THIS CAMPAIGN? 

 

DRAWING YOUR OWN MAP DRESS (your unique print on a dress)

VERY EARLY BIRD (219€) EARLY BIRD (259€), OR INDIEGOGO SPECIAL PRICE (299€)

Be the first to enjoy our new service at very special prices: have your unique print designed, then choose a style from this range of 5 designs. 

 

 

SOUL SISTER PACKAGE (your unique print, 2 dresses)

A trip to Palm Springs, a weekend in Marrakesh. That special experience you shared with your (soul) sister.  The next destination you two are dreaming about. Turn your dreams into two different dresses and feel inspired everytime you wear them.

 

BACHELORETTE PACKAGE (1 unique print, 5 dresses)

Are you setting up a bachelorette party or trip?  (choose 5 same or different dresses of your choice, with a print inspired by the bride's favorite place in the world, or by  the theme of the wedding). Andalusia? The Tropics? Make that day even more special.

 

THE WANDERLUST CLOSET (5 unique prints, 5 dresses)

The sunsets of Mexico, sunrises in Hawaii, road tripping along California West Coast, sipping coffees in New York. You have travelled the world, or you are planning to do it: choose 5 destinations and we design 5 inspiring prints just for you. Then choose 5 pieces from our range and we build together your new wanderluster closet.

 

BOUTIQUE EXCLUSIVE (1 print, 8 dresses)

You have in mind a capsule collection for your boutique, inspired by your last travels, and want to offer your customers an exclusive experience? We design an exclusive print for you, and make 8 dresses of your choice from our range.

CATALOGUE

 

THE GLAMPING WEEKEND EXPERIENCE

Live a unique Glamping experience on beautiful island, close to nature, near the ocean.

Sleep 2 nights at our fully equipped vintage caravan, we provide breakfasts & pic nic lunch, and transfers from the airport and back. For two people. (Plane tickets not included).

 

THE CARAVAN PIN

Rock this cute pin, featuring our caravan, on your denim shirt, bag or tee, and show the world you are a proud supporter of the sustainable fashion movement.

 

THE TOTE BAG

An environmental friendly way to go shopping at your local market&shops.

Featuring our caravan and showing you are a conscious consumer. 


ABOUT SUSTAINABILITY

A SLOW FASHION BRAND

ZERO WASTE & ECO-FRIENDLY PRINTED FABRICS

We make your clothes mostly on demand,so we don't have leftover fabrics, or stocks.

We use only eco friendly printed fabrics, from a certified Italian provider.

Our headquarter is solar powered and we can create wherever, using clean energy.

 

 

ETHICALLY AND LOCALLY MADE BY US

Yes, we personally make your clothes on the island. When we are not on the road, you can find us cutting and sewing, pop by and see how everything happens, our workshop is located in Santa Catalina neighborhood, where we share our space with other makers.

 

THE IMPACT

The clothing industry is the second largest polluter in the world ... second only to oil. Clothes cover one of people's basic needs, like food, water, shelter. We all need to wear clothes. We are getting more and more curious about the food we buy, why don't we start wondering about clothes, too?

We think that we, as consumers, can make a huge difference, just asking ourselves more questions about how our clothes are made: (who makes them? where are they made? in which conditions for workers and environment?).

With "Drawing your own map", we want to throw a brand new perspective on slow fashion, taking a step forward: customers will be fully involved in the whole process, both from the creative side, and the production side: we will tell you about how we are making their clothes.

This is a new point of view on fashion: emotions and special memories that  become a dress make it a timeless piece, a wearable memory, a time machine to live that holiday vibe whenever you like.

We really think that together we can make a difference and show the world that slowfashion can be sustainable, possible and beautiful.

 

Risks and challenges 

Our biggest challenge could be managing many one-of-a-kind  orders in a reasonable time. If our project is fully funded, one our strech goals is using the funds to add a new member to our team to help with this project.

 

OUR STORY (SO FAR)

Sunvibes is a bohemian and vintage inspired fashion brand for free spirits. It is also a sustainable, local made slow-fashion label based in Majorca island. 

Sunvibes caravan boutique, a pink atelier on wheels, has been the first fashion mobile atelier in Europe, starting in 2012, and perfectly embodies the brand's values: optimism, a light-hearted attitude, passion for travel & freedom, love for nature.

Sunvibes' signature characteristics are the feminine and body flattering designs, and unique colorful hand designed prints.

OUR INSPIRATION: IT'S ALL ABOUT TRAVELS

Meet us by the ocean, in the countryside, or on the road, and jump on our nomad headquarter and boutique.

Travel is an endless source of inspiration: the people we meet, the places we see. We treasure the experience and then translate it into prints, colors, and shapes. Then these journeys become clothes that tell unique wearable stories.

HOW YOU CAN HELP 

There are many ways you can support Drawing your own map:

PRE-ORDER our sustainable designs through this Indiegogo campaign 

SHARE this campaign with your family and friends on Facebook or Instagram. Also with newspapers, magazines, tv, radio and journalists, and bloggers who write about sustainability. Here's the link to share around :) 

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/drawing-your...

FOLLOW us on Facebook  https://www.facebook.com/sunvibesbohochic/

or Instagram https://www.instagram.com/_sunvibes_/

SIGN UP for our mailing list at sunvibes.it http://www.sunvibes.it

By spreading the word about sustainable fashion, we’ll send a strong message together to the fashion world: we’ll be able to show how many people demands new standards of fashion, and to know who makes your clothes, and where and how they are made.

PRESS

If you are a journalist or a blogger and are interested in writing about our project,

you can download a press kit here, available in 3 languages:

English

https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B3CgAHEr_IWUL...

Italian

https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B3CgAHEr_IWUc...

Spanish

https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B3CgAHEr_IWUW...

 

 

THANKS

A  thank you to my love and partner in crime Alexandre Escribá for your unconditional love and support: I couldn't have made it here without you. To my friend and fellow creative Andrea Bianchi for beautifully bringing my ideas to life and always injecting a new bright perspective in the making. To my beyond amazing family. To Everyone that helped in the process, especially Sascha, Eugenia, Kaveh. To my enthusiastic friends and customers that have supported this dream from the very beginning. Thank you from the bottom of my heart.

 

Eli

SUNVIBES

Here's the link to share around :) https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/drawing-your...FOLLOW us on Facebook  https://www.facebook.com/sunvibesbohochic/or Instagram https://www.instagram.com/_sunvibes_/SIGN UP for our mailing list at sunvibes.it http://www.sunvibes.itBy spreading the word about sustainable fashion, we’ll send a strong message together to the fashion world: we’ll be able to show how many people demands new standards of fashion, and to know who makes your clothes, and where and how they are made.PRESSIf you are a journalist or a blogger and are interested in writing about our project,you can download a press kit here, available in 3 languages:Englishhttps://drive.google.com/open?id=0B3CgAHEr_IWUL...Italianhttps://drive.google.com/open?id=0B3CgAHEr_IWUc...Spanishhttps://drive.google.com/open?id=0B3CgAHEr_IWUW...  THANKSA  thank you to my love and partner in crime Alexandre Escribá for your unconditional love and support: I couldn't have made it here without you. To my friend and fellow creative Andrea Bianchi for beautifully bringing my ideas to life and always injecting a new bright perspective in the making. To my beyond amazing family. To Everyone that helped in the process, especially Sascha, Eugenia, Kaveh. To my enthusiastic friends and customers that have supported this dream from the very beginning. Thank you from the bottom of my heart. EliSUNVIBES

story:
Short Summary

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • We have an idea to personalize the luxury watches made from premium material and want you guys to support us in making our vision a reality.
  • your contribution will help us fund for our first production run and in exchange you will get your personalized watches at a discounted price for being an early believer.

The Impact

 

  • We believe in creating unique products which are just as unique as you are.
  • Our watches are of minimalist design which can easily be worn in an office setting or a casual setting.
  • customization adds character to the watch,which makes our watches unique.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • folks get the word out and make some noise about our campaign.
  • Remember  to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
If there's one thing we've learned from following the love lives of Hollywood celebrities, it's that couples just don't work. Duos, pairs, twosomes, they all seem to eventually lead to a broken heart.

The world of socks is no different. A fresh pair of socks arrive at your door and things are looking promising, they're stylish, fit nicely, these could be the ones. However, before you know it, one of the socks has run off with your best friend, who has accidentally been wearing it around the house. You finally get the sock back to discover that there's now a hole in the toes. Your pair of socks are ruined, two perfectly good socks, ruined by the bad deeds of one.

It got us thinking, why do socks come in pairs? Who said socks have to match? Why do we only buy two socks at a time when it's simply not an efficient way of buying?

We create sets of socks that can all be worn together. Why limit your socks to one sock partner, when they could come in a group of 7? Socks that all have enough similarities that they can be worn together, however, are all unique in their own way.

story:
Fashionable women's shoes Atelier № 5 - a combination of exclusivity and convenience

 

Ideal footwear for women must meet several requirements at once: to be elegant and attractive, original and stylish, comfortable for the foot and demonstrating a high level of comfort in general. This is what our brand produces today.

Our developments are characterized by creative execution, successful selection of materials and decor, an organic mix of British rigor and practicality with Italian passion and riot of colors. To compare the production of our brand is impossible with any other. For it are peculiar:

  • Use of natural materials (leather, cotton, suede);
  • The use of leading trends in the fashion industry;
  • Rate on Q-factor in combination with luxury;
  • A wide variety of designs and variations of shoes;
  • Quality sewing + creative finishing.

During the process of wear, this product interacts with the foot as softly as possible, seldom rubs and leaves callouses.

Materials from Italy

Our leather is an Italian full leather, being the most premium part of leathers an excellent type of leather. We used the best leather we could think of : according to us, it’s the best out there. Its flexibility will create the comfort you’re looking for in such a pair of shoes, and its strength will make it last years, not just months.
 The sole is not only glued, it’s also sewed to make sure it won’t fall out over time.
Because we truly believe in our products, we provide a 2-year warranty against manufacturing defects.

Our goal: $ 30,000
We want to enter the external (international) market under the means of opening new points.
Opening of new points we want to start with Europe, in the future also to arrange the sale of our brand in the US.
Why $ 30,000?
-production of new products (purchase of material to increase production)
- the necessity of opening a company in Europe in accordance with the current legislation, in order to comply with all the legal norms of the state and the payment of taxes;
- advertising;
- rent of premises;
- transport services;
- decor of the room (racks, counter, mirrors, etc.);
- employees (employment of staff and payment of taxes).

Risks and challenges

We are confident in the product!!!

Nowadays, under current market conditions, demand on fashionable shoes continues growing, if to rely upon the official data shoes retail development.  It is due to the increased number of shoes per capita and specific requirements towards products quality.

Shipping details

After the Indiegogo campaign, a survey will be sent where you will be able to provide your mailing address, choice of models and colors and other details. The early birds will be shipped out during October-November. Usually, shipping takes from 2 weeks for Europe, from 3 weeks for USA and Canada, and from 4 weeks for Australia and other countries. Sometimes it takes little more. After the shipping we will send you the tracking number of your package.
