story:
In the video above, you see the techniques used to make and design the leather goods, and a prototype for a new iPhone wallet, hopefully coming soon, with your help ;)

 

Short Summary

After more than 13 years of working in graphic design, I decided it was time for a change, and decided to be a shoe maker, spent more than a year learning the craft until I saw the need to go back to graphic design due to the lack of income and my wedding coming up. Now with limited time still needed to make leather goods, the first thing I made is the wallet I use today, made out from one piece of leather and almost no stitching.

The first SIMPLE wallet!

Fast forward some months, (got married) and, was getting my first orders from friends and family. So I decided to give it my full attention and quit, once again, my graphic design (secure, good-paying) job and risk it all, to make leather goods, and with the help of some friends got SIMPLE leather goods off the ground, but there is still so much to do, so here we are, asking for your help to bring Simple leather goods out of Guatemala and into your hands.

I'm working with a small artisan team who keep using traditional methods of craftsmanship, paying them fair wages, and together aim to bring you the best in top quality leather goods, suitable for students, travelers, businessmen, etc. at affordable prices.

 

Prototyping

 

What We Need & What You Get

Our goal is to bring handmade leather goods from Guatemala to Indiegogo backers around the world. Indiegogo funding will cover the production costs and shipping, new machinery and tools, and of course buy all the necessary leather.

The main goal is to use your contribution to build and launch our website, expand our catalog and buy a small CNC machine to make new and better designs. Our designs, production and shipping plans are finalized and are ready to go into action the moment our project is successful. And plan to keep working on new products as well.

 

  • I'm asking for $5,000, first to build the website, second, expand the catalog, and finally buy a small CNC machine, that will allow me to make my own custom-made metal fittings

    --------------------------------

  • Website: $2,000 

    - This will cover, the hosting, design, production, etc.

  • Materials for new designs: $1000

    - Leather, new machinery, tools, and new prototypes

  • CNC machine: $2,000

         - A dream machine, to make our own, exclusive metal fittings!

  • You can get your hands on our exclusive designs, made by hand by me and expert craftsmen on leather from Guatemala and help me continue to give them fair trade jobs and security.

 

  • ALL PERKS COME WITH A FREE GIFT! be sure tu check them out!

 

The perfect CNC machine we could buy!

 

Leather stash

 

The Impact

Your contribution will allow me to keep growing and get more jobs for the community, I believe in paying fair trade wages to those who help me and work with me, so they can have a steady income, provide to their families, and help grow the leather craft in Guatemala.

I  love what I do for a living and can't see doing anything else, so the biggest impact would be for me to continue doing what I love and get more designs out, so people can use them and identify with them, and keep paying my talented artisan team!

That's me!

 

Risks & Challenges

I have been doing leather goods for 5 years now, and every day I encounter a new challenge that helps me get better. The challenge this time is a new approach to selling on the internet and now I have the experience to keep up with demand, after more than 4 years of running the company and doing leather goods 24/7 non-stop, I'm ready to take the next leap forward!

I love taking risks and experiencing with new designs!

 

Products

OUR LAUNCH COLLECTION, the perks you can get.

---------------------------------------------------------------

• Let's start small - The one and only, SUNGLASS WRAP

Take your sunglasses around with style. The great thing about this case is that it's not a soft case (so your glasses wont break) and it's not a hard case either (so it's not an unnecessary bulk), yet the perfect size and material to protect your glasses and be small at the same time.

Great minimalistic design / Durable leather / BLack leather strap

---------------------------------------------------------------

• A stylish way to carry your writing essentials - THE PEN WRAP

​Keeping it small, a great way to pack you pencils, pens, markers, etc. fits 5 pens.

Great minimalistic design / Durable leather / Black leather strap

---------------------------------------------------------------

• Front pocket load - THE HALF WALLET

Made from 1 piece of quality leather this is half of the slim, you can carry cards, documents and bills, wherever you go.

Fits debit/ID cards / Has an easily accesible front pocket

Feels really slim in your pocket / Looks great

 

---------------------------------------------------------------

• Let's keep it simple  - THE BIFOLD SLIM WALLET

Talk about simple. Made from 1 piece of premium quality leather you can carry all the important stuff with you wherever your journey takes you.

Fits at least 8 credit/debit/ID cards / Put in as much currency as you can fit in the big pocket

Feels really slim in your pocket / Looks great

---------------------------------------------------------------

• Carry all the important things in one place - IPHONE WALLET

A simple way to carry your iPhone, cards and money with style and class.

100% Leather / Hand-made /Simply Awesome

---------------------------------------------------------------

• A little more room but keeping it light weight - THE SIMPLE SATCHEL

Perfect travel companion; take your iPad, books, wallet, smartphone, notebook, headphones and all the "must" items for your daily journey. Made with great quality leather and minimal design, makes sure you look simply great and in style.

Divided into 2 compartments on the inside / A one-size-fits-all-full-leather strap

Great minimalistic design / One front smaller pocket made for your passport and cards

---------------------------------------------------------------

• Carry your office without the bulk and in style - THE PORTFOLIO

This portfolio is the perfect companion for everyday work. Computer, cables, files, pencils, mouse, you name it. It all fits somewhere in it. Brown 100% leather and great design, it has 2 zippers so you have easy access without having to open all of it.

Full of useful pockets for cables and all your gadgets / Amazing 100% leather

Shoulder strap / Hand strap / 2 zippers for easy access

Front pocket for files / Fits 13'' computers /Modern and simple design

---------------------------------------------------------------

• Take a break for the weekend - THE SIMPLE DUFFLE BAG

Going on a week end adventure? or just getting out of the city to take a breath? This is the duffle bag you need, on big storage space, and it even has a small pocket inside to put you keys, and all the small stuff so it doesn't ge tangle with your clothes!

Leather body and hand strap / minimalistic design

story:
The Space Colony

I run a small wearable art studio that dedicates time and effort on doing amazing stuff so people can identify and make they outfit one in a kind. We are honoring the word limited edition, doing only 50 editions of pins and distributing them worldwide, making you the owner of a real limited edition design. 

Why Crowdfunding?:

I'm an independent artist that want to expand the brand "The Space Colony" not only for spreading my designs and colonizing human spaces all around the world but to motivate young entrepreneurs to dream and make their dreams come true, that's the core of my social media strategy, making people have the desire of keeping their maximum effort on all the tings they do, I want them to be different to get inspired and to keep dreaming.

Once I thought I will never get the chance to get my designs to the public view that phase is now completed but now I need the help of all the people I could get so my dream doesn't stop here in just phase one @thespacecolony so I worked on a new set of collectives and hope you can help me get them done!

Preview of the New Collectives

Pop-Pin collection:

We selected a couple of rebels of the media picking them for the impact they made on standing up for the outcasts. They are:

Cartoon collection:

They are a mix of original designs and original pop-culture cartoons:

Robot collection:

They are just funny cool animal robots:

Mix designs:

We collected a few trends put a twist on them and made them real:

A place to put your pins:

You could get an original cap from our shop and make it more cool with a whole collection or even one small pin.

 

What will happen if I get extra funding?:

I'm committed to keeping my promise of doing just 50 editions of each design so I will keep the good work and dedicate a pin collection to motivation phrases and other pop-pin icons that inspire change in the LGTB movement, civil rights, Freedom of speech and gender equality. I'm a small artist on a small island but I know I got to make at least the effort to inspire a change of mind on our world and the only way of changing it is to inspire people to change.

“Since you alone are responsible for your thoughts, only you can change them.” 

~Paramahansa Yogananda

 

You decide how to help us: share/fund/donate it will be an honor of getting all the supports necessary to make this project keep going.

---

follow us on Instagram: @thespacecolony // message us thespacecolony@gmail.com to know more about the project.

story:
The Palm bracelet is a modern day adventure and travel accessory connecting wanderlust lovers around the globe.

Our aim is to create a product that radiates luxury, classy, positive vibes. We aren’t just creating a product but a brand which the consumers are able to connect with one another through a unique family orientated social community. We care about our consumers and we want everybody to share their adventures with our team for us to share online. 

We noticed that local and international bracelet companies were all made from cheap materials, had predictable, uncreative designs and had a weak relationship between product and brand. We wanted to create a luxury but affordable jewellery piece which represents our love for exploring new places and meeting new people across the globe. 

The reason we choose a palm tree as the anchor links was because palm trees radiate happiness and we believe featuring a palm instead of an anchor will drive a joyful image into the customers mind every time they glance down at their wrist. Our aim is to create a product that integrates people from all nationalities, religions and ethics. We believe the palm is an international symbol which can bring customers together into a collective network.

By wearing the palm band, this showcases the same positive attitude towards life which our community share. The palm is the icon for all things that truly matter in life. Beauty, love, creativity, joy and inner peace. We can't argue our story begins on the shores of Bali,Indonesia. A place we now call home. The white beaches and crystal waters will always be in our roots. But we can see the Palm Band as a brand which engulfs people from all walks of life. We aim to have the palm band in retailers in major cities around the world this year.

 

 

 

 

  • Innovative: we have put in a lot of time and effort in designing a brand new take on the classic anchor bracelet, resulting in a piece of jewellery that combines an adventurous lifestyle with the tree of life - the palm.
  • Quality: we only work with the best materials available, coming from trusted manufacturers that we have worked with before.    
  • Price: we have worked hard to be able to offer these exclusive bracelets at an affordable price while still maintaining such a high quality product. 
  • Packaging: with nature in mind, our premium packaging is an eco-friendly, recycable box with a satin interior. 

Each bracelet comes in a nice, eco-friendly, recycable box (Sand not included)

 

Our brand is going to driven by influencers

We believe these people are the key to sales. We are going to form an ambassador and influencer family who get new season products gifted before the customers, giving them brand exclusivity to create content.  

We will be hosting Palm Band meet ups/events around the world where influencers and fans will meet up and celebrate life in the Palm Band community. As part of our scheme are will doing Instagram competitions such as; "Best Palm Photo" "Best Palm Short Video" and "Tag 3 friends for a free bracelet" on the weekly once we have launched our website. We want to create an engaging online community where people meet, chat and share their experiences.  

We believe in gender equality, our bracelets are totally unisex, the palm tree is a symbol of androgyny as it possesses the perfect integration of both male and female attributes. Palm trees symbolise our ability to rise above conflict and spread our light brilliantly.

 

We'd like to thank you for the being the first to join our community. We want to be more than just a product but a brand that creates a positive movement and we hope you can join us for the long run. Don't forget to follow our beautiful Instagram page for your lifestyle inspiration and latest products.

Much love, Team Palm Band

https://thepalmband.com/

 

Risks and challenges

First off. we can say that the risks are minimal. We have carefully chosen the best factories, and we have been working with them a long time. So we can know that the process will run as smoothly as possible.

Of course there can always be unforeseen problems that we cannot control. But if a problem comes up, we will do everything we can to fix it as fast as possible.

We will always keep you updated on any crucial information about the production and shipping of products.

Thank you for believing in us!
story_txt:
The Palm bracelet is a modern day adventure and travel accessory connecting wanderlust lovers around the globe.Our aim is to create a product that radiates luxury, classy, positive vibes. We aren’t just creating a product but a brand which the consumers are able to connect with one another through a unique family orientated social community. We care about our consumers and we want everybody to share their adventures with our team for us to share online. We noticed that local and international bracelet companies were all made from cheap materials, had predictable, uncreative designs and had a weak relationship between product and brand. We wanted to create a luxury but affordable jewellery piece which represents our love for exploring new places and meeting new people across the globe. The reason we choose a palm tree as the anchor links was because palm trees radiate happiness and we believe featuring a palm instead of an anchor will drive a joyful image into the customers mind every time they glance down at their wrist. Our aim is to create a product that integrates people from all nationalities, religions and ethics. We believe the palm is an international symbol which can bring customers together into a collective network.By wearing the palm band, this showcases the same positive attitude towards life which our community share. The palm is the icon for all things that truly matter in life. Beauty, love, creativity, joy and inner peace. We can't argue our story begins on the shores of Bali,Indonesia. A place we now call home. The white beaches and crystal waters will always be in our roots. But we can see the Palm Band as a brand which engulfs people from all walks of life. We aim to have the palm band in retailers in major cities around the world this year.

story:
"We are the first generation to feel the effect of climate change and the last generation who can do something about it." —President Obama

Global responsibility is the key to the many challenges we face today. No matter who we are, where we live or what we do, the effects of environmental degradation and its effects on climate change and humanity cannot be denied any longer. This unprecedented reality is upon us all and we know it.

There is a World Changer in all of us and it is time for the World Changer in you.

Launching The Worlds Most Powerful T-Shirt, The World Changer. Designed to empower the World Changer in you and deliver a globally responsible product with an objective that benefits our environment and the cause of humanity, creating a community of globally responsible customers.

Exclusive campaign launch offer, $28 with Free international shipping (30% off $40 RRP).

100% certified organic cotton and child labor free. Every World Changer T-Shirt you order plants 2 trees, donates 50% of its profit to the cause of humanity and our environment and empowers the world changer in you and builds a strong community of world changers that inspire, lead to advocate and make a positive change for our world.

Get a further 11% Early bird discount on our already discounted launch offer of $28. Early bird discount Limited to our first 500 pledges (male/female sizes).

Help us reach out to the millions of World Changers out there. Copy/paste the social link (chain icon) to your social media network and help us reach out to the many World Changers like you.

We will refund your pledge (minimum value of 1 pledge or equal to your referred pledges) when you refer a minimum of 10 family and friends (referees need to use the social link for the system to identify your referral).

 

 Follow us, tag us and help us reach out by sharing our campaign with others.

 

Every World Changer T-Shirt you order, Coretab will plant 2 Trees. 

The campaign has selected OneTree Planted as its reforestation partner to make this possible. One Tree Planted has been able to create a high level of credibility and resources that are in line with the Campaigns objectives.

The World Changer T-Shirt is made from 100% Organic Cotton that does not impact the environment and reduces its impact on climate change and carbon footprint through its reforestation objectives.

The World is suffering on all accounts and every effort needs to be made to help out and restore the balance.  Coretab will dedicate 50% of its profits from the campaign to the cause of humanity and our environment.

The Pie chart is a result of an average feedback from existing customers, family, and friends in their choices of support in terms of priority to various organizations and charities for our environment and humanitarian causes.

We will conduct a similar customer survey to help us priorities our 50% of the profit from the World Changer campaign to the various organizations and charities.

Building a community of customers who not only understand the power of being globally responsible, they become the catalyst for change by being World Changers themselves is the most defining objective for Coretab and the World changer campaign. 

This further opens up pathways to support and advocate for change. Not only is it important to be globally responsible ourselves, it is also important to support globally responsible brands, businesses, and leaders to advocate change.

We at Coretab have done our homework and ensure that not only will The World Changer T-Shirt fabric is 100% certified organic, we have lined up and selected manufacturing in child labor free facilities with fair labor practices.

Global responsibility starts at home and having the support of world changers like you who support globally responsible products will make all the difference to lead others by example to support child labour free and fair working enviornments.

This is what's possible if 0.5% of us (of the 7.65 Billion and growing)  order The World Changer T-shirt.

Global responsibility is the key and by supporting globally responsible brands and businesses we have the power to meet the many challenges we face today.

 

We have done our homework, negotiated and lined up one of the best manufacturers and suppliers in the business to deliver your World changer T-Shirt on time. Coretab also brings to the campaign its team and years of experience in manufacturing and fulfillment that guarantees you a 100% quality product.

Its important that you check your correct size before you order. Please refer to the size chart below for your size and fit.

Rahin is a young 16 year old High School Student from NSW, Australia who shares the same passion as her father for our environment and the cause of humanity. As a founder of The World Changer Campaign, Rahin hopes to inspire other young women and men to believe in their passion and work towards making our world a better place for all. 

Definitely, the proudest father ever to have a daughter who shares and is able to translate my passion for the cause of humanity and our environment. It has been an absolute pleasure to guide her and help her establish the World changer campaign.

With over 12 years in manufacturing and technology and a highly experienced team from Coretab, I can assure you that the World changer campaign and its fulfillment is in good hands.

What started out as a Max potential assignment for Rahin is now an actual startup that not only delivers a globally responsible product, it also establishes a globally responsible brand and business with very strong objectives to benefit our environment and humanity.

The World Changer campaign was launched at the Max potential presentation event on the 11 of September and blessed by The Hon. Victor Michael DOMINELLO, MP and minister Minister for Finance, Services and Property NSW, Australia and the Max potential organizers.

Shipping

 The World Changer T-Shirt order is inclusive of free international shipping. However it important to note that you are responsible for any VAT, Customs Duty, Govt Fees or any charges that may be applicable to your country of order.

Every effort will be made to deliver your order on time, however, we will not be able to control any unforeseen delay during shipping.

Tracking numbers will be provided for you to track your order. Delivery times may vary from 4 days to over 10 working days depending on your country of order.

We will not refund for any change of mind or incorrect size. However, in the event that you wish to get a refund on your order, you will need to ship your order in its original packing, not used, soiled or damaged and with its original tags back to our base in Australia.

We reserve the rights to refund.

All rights are reserved. The World Changer T-Shirt and The World Changer campaign is proudly owned and managed by Coretab, an Australian owned brand and business. ABN 87 682 186 174

For any question please email us on info@coretab.com

The logos and trademarks shown are for informative purposes of description only and to identify the product or service. Coretab is not authorized by, sponsored by, or associated with the any of the trademark owners. Coretab reserves all rights to donations and funds. Coretab is NOT a charity. 50% profit after  tax.

Copyright © Coretab. All rights reserved. © The World Changer logo & T-Shirt © 100K Trees

story:
Experience positivity

Cheerings are intelligent earrings connected to a mobile social media app, where you send voice messages to people you know and love. They integrate fashion and technology to create an experience of positivity for adolescents. More than simply looking stylish, Cheerings allow the user to receive positive messages from their biggest cheerleaders, such as friends and family.

Behind Cheerings is a team of young people working to bring change to the status quo of their own generation with social media. 19-year-old co-founders George and Leticia witnessed first-hand the negative impacts of social media on their closest friends and felt the urgency to do something to protect the mental health of young people around the globe. As aspiring engineers, George and Leticia decided to leverage technology to solve the problem that technology/social media itself created. 

A pledge means supporting a cause that will impact an entire generation of teenagers. Please check out our video above and consider sponsoring our journey!

Co-founders George and Leticia first met at a summer course at the University of Pennsylvania, the Management and Technology Summer Institute (M&TSI). There, the two, plus three other students, envisioned Cheerings and developed a business plan for the idea. From then to now, George and Leticia have worked tirelessly to bring Cheerings into fruition.

George plans to study Management and Bioengineering at the University of Pennsylvania's M&T program. Leticia plans to study Biomedical Engineering and Computer Science at Harvard University. 

 

What You Get

The Cheerings experience is composed by a pair of smart earrings (including charger) alongside the Cheerings mobile app.  Through the app, you record, send and receive voice messages with words of encouragement or positivity, which are played at the tap of your earrings. 

The technology behind Cheerings is being carefully crafted so that the message is only audible for the user, ensuring privacy in your communication. 

While designs are still being finalized, the sketch above illustrates a few of the rough designs for the different styles of Cheerings! From more fun and flashy to more elegant and chic, our earrings are the physical representation of our core values of positivity, confidence and well-being! 

With the funding from Indiegogo, we commit to keeping you updated with our newest designs. When it's time to deliver your Cheerings, you get to pick the one that best fits your personality! 

As well as the earrings, we are designing a Cheerings app focused on promoting healthy, happy habits for young people on social media! We strive to create a personalized experience for the user, who gets to chose the app icon, colour palette and even customize homepage layout!  

The Specifics

Cheerings are intelligent earrings that connect to your smartphone via Bluetooth. On your smartphone through the Cheerings app, users can send and receive Cheerings messages. To ensure the positivity of the platform, Cheerings implements an artificial intelligence (AI) algorithm to filter out potentially offensive or insulting messages. Beyond the social media features around encouraging messages, the earrings themselves contain fitness tracking functionalities which will help provide the user with insights into their mental health. 

+    Your Earrings connect to the Cheerings Mobile App via Bluetooth. As current smartphones support more than one Bluetooth connection at a time, you can still use other devices while you use Cheerings.

+    On our app, you can record voice messages and send it to other Cheerings users.

+    Through a notification on the earrings, you can choose to listen right away (one tap), or save for later (two taps).

+    You can then reply through the same path.

+    Bone conduction technology is integrated so that Cheerings messages are only audible to you, providing full privacy and safer listening.

+    Our earrings also contain a heart rate monitor, accelerometers, and more fitness sensors to provide you with insights into your day-to-day mental health through the Cheerings app.

What if my ears aren't pierced? 

Don't worry, Cheerings will be versatile as both a clip-on and pierced-ear design. Everyone who wants a pair of Cheerings to brighten their days will be able to wear them :)

 

What We Need  

We are hoping to get at least $75,000 CAD in order to complete the prototype development and move towards manufacturing. This is a bare minimum amount, and the more support we get on Indiegogo, the faster we will be able to finish development and deliver Cheerings to more young people around the world. 

With the funding from Indiegogo, Leticia and George will assemble two teams of student engineers and designers at Harvard and University of Pennsylvania, bringing together some of the most talented young people in the world. The two teams will collaborate and meet regularly to finish the product development and deliver on the promise of Cheerings. The teams will also carry on to create new lines of Cheerings products, spreading positivity to more people around the world. 

With consideration to the funding raised, Cheerings' finances will be managed by aspiring business professionals at the Wharton School, so that any money we raise will be used most efficiently towards delivering on Cheerings and changing the social media status quo. 

Our Inspiration 

As teens themselves, our co-founders realized the lack of personal connectivity and disconnect from reality that can stem from youth's current experience on social media. 

"We must create a more positive way to connect with our friends and family online,” George.

Recognizing that the issue is more prevalent with girls, Cheerings is born from the urgency to change the status quo. Differently from the rest, from our stylish earrings to our choice of using voice messages, the focus is on the well-being of the user! Why voice? Studies have shown that hearing the voice of someone you love causes a response beyond the auditory areas of the brain! So, who's your cheerleader? After all, we all need a "pick-me-up" every once in a while. 

“With platforms like Indiegogo, we have so much at our disposal to bring our idea of Cheerings to reality." Leticia. 

But we need your help! 

Need any more reasons to contribute? 

Once we have reached our goal, Cheerings is committed to donating 15% any further pledges we receive to the Canadian Mental Health Association. Promoting healthier habits for young adults is a collaborative effort, and we want to be part of this challenge! 

Our Story 

Risks & Challenges

Cheerings are a brand new type of wearable that will require some amount of R&D to become fully developed. To us, it is important to inform you of the potential risks associated with this development. The challenge mainly lies within the development of such a small device, integrating a processor, battery, and Bluetooth module all within the space. There is a possibility that the development of Cheerings will run into some sort of technical barrier. This may delay delivery of our device or in the worst case scenario, derail the project from going forward. We as a team will do our best to avoid and overcome these challenges. Most importantly, we are committed to inform all our backers of all developments regarding Cheerings. 

Other Ways You Can #JOINTHEWAVE

Don't worry if you are not able to support Cheerings now - share this page with friends and family because they may be passionate about our cause too! Use the share buttons on top of this page, or simply tell them about Cheerings or direct them to our website www.cheerings.ca

This may delay delivery of our device or in the worst case scenario, derail the project from going forward. We as a team will do our best to avoid and overcome these challenges. Most importantly, we are committed to inform all our backers of all developments regarding Cheerings. 

Other Ways You Can #JOINTHEWAVE
Don't worry if you are not able to support Cheerings now - share this page with friends and family because they may be passionate about our cause too! Use the share buttons on top of this page, or simply tell them about Cheerings or direct them to our website www.cheerings.ca

story:
We are back! After two succesful Titan campaigns on Kickstarter and 1000's sold in our store we have taken in a lot of information about what you liked about our Titans and what you didn't like and we saved it all and gone through it. First off, we have simplified the lens changing mechanism so you'll able to change lenses even easier on the go. Secondly, we've added a round design for everyone not completely sold on the wayfarer and aviator models. Thirdly, we upped the quality on the coating and changed small details that we felt wasn't perfected.

 

 

After all the changes the collection have gone through, we are now very happy with the new models and are super excited to present the new series of TITAN. 

 

 

We hope you love them as much as we do and help us get this project into production so we can deliver a whole new collection of awesome sunglasses.

 

The most recognizable sunglasses design today, and probably throughout history of eyewear, is the classic wayfarer model. Even though the design has been through some over time, the original design lives strong, and will probably always be somewhat similar to what it once was. When they first were introduced to the masses they were considered to be revolutionary as they didn't look anything like sunglasses that had been offered before that. 

 

 

The characteristic design can be described to have a thick upper rim that leads to what is called wings, and has become a must-have accessory in must people's collection. 

 

 

The designer frames are found in next to all sizes, shapes and colors. Even though they are considered to historically be sunglasses for men, many women consider them as go-to sunglasses because of their shape and details that characterize them.

 

 

This is the perfect product for you if you're into round shaped sunglasses. The round style frame and their round shape lens give these a unique design. You can choose from 2 different frame colors and 10 different lenses.

 

 

And who is famous for wearing round sunglasses? Well, John Lennon and Janis Joplin for starters. If you are a creative person then round sunglasses might just be the right thing for you to wear.

 

 

The slim design and the ability to customize them make them fit any place and occasion. Mix them up and get modern at the same time.

 

What can we say about the Aviator sunglasses which has not already been said? There is a good reason why this model never goes out of style. Icons like Elvis Presley and Freddy Mercury are but a few who liked this design.

 

 

The aviator was originally developed for pilots to protect their eyes while flying but

after World War II aviator sunglasses were made available for civilians. 

So they got super popular because everything military was in fashion.

 

 

Aviators became popular among civilians in the 1940's and 1950's and are still in high demand among celebs and fashionable people.

 

To make things even more interesting, this time we also made a more luxurious model, still made of high quality titanium and plated with 24K real GOLD. Only for those who want the most exclusive sunglasses.

 

 

They come in a luxurious wooden box with everything you need. We will make the 24K model in all designs but in our pre-production we only made aviators because of the cost. Now check out these beauties!

 

 

 

 

Next generation lenses

 

The lenses might just be the most important part of a pair of sunglasses. And what good would they do if they didn't match the high quality of the titanium frames? We have worked with our best factory to get these lenses to match the perfectly designed titanium frames.

 

  •  Next gen polarization 

First off we use 5 layer polarized lenses that effectively reduces glare, eliminating dazzling light reflection and scattered light which makes the vision more soft and clear. The polarized lenses have five layers composite materials with UV400 ultraviolet ray standard. This means that they block all wavelengths of light from 400 nm, which covers all of the UV spectrum. The first and last layer features a clear and durable scratch-resistant layer to avoid any damage you expose them to.

The mirror lenses is less durable against scratches so we always recommend a pair of black or gradient ones when you order.

 

 
  •  State of the art lens-changing mechanism 

Besides the quality of the lenses we wanted to up the diversity so that you can give your Titans a more personalized look. The solution was to design them so that you safely and easily can change the lenses yourself. We upgraded the way you change them so now you can just click them in without any hassle with screws and screwdrivers.

 

 

  • A huge variety of colors

With bunch different colors of polarized lenses you can give your Titans a new look every day of the week!

 

  • Prescription ready

All our frames are prescription ready and you can order lenses from your local optician to fit the frames. Sadly we don't manufacture our own prescription lenses at this time.

 

Aerospace grade titanium frame

 

Titanium metal is the top material of choice in the aerospace industry due to its high strength-to-weight ratio. As it also owns extreme temperature and corrosion resistance, we used this material before and know it will last the test of time.

 

 

Titanium is also hypoallergenic, meaning its super safe for the human body. That's why doctors use it for hip and knee replacements.

 

ALL MODELS - ROUND, WAYFARER & AVIATOR COMES IN THE FOLLOWING COLORS

  •  Gun metal frame 
  •  Black frame 
  •  24k gold plated frame - can be chosen by backing the TITAN 24K Gold Plated Sunglasses reward
     

 

 After you have chosen your favorite model you'll be able to choose the color of the frame you want as well as which pairs of lenses you want to equip your new Titans with.

 

Sturdy german OBE hinges

OBE is the leading international manufacturers of components for the eyewear industry since 1904.

 

 

And we only want the best for our Titan series. Since we make the frame in Titanium we also wanted our springs to be 100% titanium and OBE is the best at what they do.

 

Protective coating

Ion plating is a PVD process that uses reactive electron beam evaporation – calling on titanium which is vaporized through heating the alloy to over 2,000 °C. During this process, a titanium nitride layer is added to the stainless steel component. The ionized titanium is then bonded using pressure to form the surface coating.

 

 

Using magnets, ion plating is carried out in a vacuum environment. As part of the process the plating metal is added (for example to produce a rose gold color), normally not exceeding 0.3 urn in thickness. At extremely low pressure metal will vaporize. It then become electric ions when heated and bombarded by electrons, known also as plasma. The strengthening technique will build up a super surface hardness.

The greatest bonus of this process is that the titanium nitride produced is both harder and chemically more stable than that produced through traditional plating methods.

 

Here are more photos and videos to inspire you, even though we don't think you need more inspiration :) Although, we really love our products and just wanted to show your some more nice photos of our new exclusive collection.

 

We are still on our mission to show you that there is more than the big companies out there. And you don't have to to pay overprice to get quality products. We will keep doing our best to promote and provide our products at a fair price.

story:
1. Introduction 

 

It's now been a month since we started the "We Make Mask" campaign. Both the demand worldwide for masks as well as raw material prices continue to soar, and they don't look like they'll fall anytime soon. But here comes Summer.

Our "We Make Mask Kit" has been improved thanks to the feedback we got from our Backers; now it's a "Feasible & Usable Solution" for all these conditions.

"We Make Mask Kit" has been upgraded as "life wear" for the Summer Season via the following six improvements. 

 

 

2. 6 Upgrades

 

We upgraded to life wear for many people who have to wear masks during the Summer Season (like the Iron Man Suit “Mark” series).

 

 

1) I feel more comfortable breathing.
The Summer Season requires a wider breathing space as hot air and sweat can fill the mask.
We have increased the breathing space by up to 100% compared to the previous filter-replacement silicon mask and cotton mask.
It's also designed to spread your breathing from side to side, allowing you to breathe more comfortably.

2) Even if I sweat, it’s manageable.
No mask can keep you from sweating during the Summer Season.
However, this mask dries quickly without sticking to the skin using a well-ventilated, breathable Converse-like material. If you give it a 30-second refresh period after wearing it for an hour, you can wear the mask again comfortably.

3) It's lighter.
The design has been changed so that the side clips increase the grip with your face, giving weight to both the side of your face and ear. The filter-replaceable mask weighs as little as a nominal medical mask, and when worn, effectively reduces the weight and pressure transmitted to your ear.

4) The filter releases moisture.
The three-layer filter is designed to absorb and drain moisture inside the mask. It helps in creating a more comfortable experience and dries faster than conventional filters.

5) Sealing has been improved.
Areas in the top & bottom zone, where the mask filter may not cover, now produces a safer seal thanks to a silicone cover treatment.

6) Wash and use it again tomorrow.
Made with a highly stain-resistant and fast drying material, the mask can be reused immediately after simply hand washing it and then drying with a hair dryer for 1-2 minutes.

 

 

3. About Filter 

 

 

 

4. Background 


We are well aware that the WHO and CDC do not recommend the use of face masks by the public. However, masks are effective at capturing droplets, which is a main transmission route of many diseases including COVID-19. If you are likely to be in close contact with someone, wearing a mask could help you. 

https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/advice-for-public/when-and-how-to-use-masks

 

 

5. Solution 

 


We would like to solve these three problems at once by "What if we make our own mask?" Campaign.

 

We think that making a face mask at home can replace time-consuming processes within manufacturing at the factory. The face mask kit has two parts: frame and roll-filter. You can replace one part with similar material you can get in daily life.

 

If you wash the ordinary disposable mask, filter layers in the mask would lose its function properly. However, as our filter is removable, our mask frame can be washed with water and used again with a new filter. 

 

 

Also, this reusable mask is made of 50% less material compared to normal disposable masks, reducing wasted material up to 70% in disposable masks.

 

 

6. Social Contribution

 


Premade disposable masks can be supplied for those who really need the masks, especially front-line health workers.

 

 

7. Reward

 

 

 

 

 

 

OFF-WHITE

 

DARK NAVY

 

 

 

 

SIZE

 

​

 

 

 

8. Reward List

 

9. Who Make It? 

 

Make Mask Campaign is planned and managed by a team which comprises professional data analyst, fashion designer, and engineer.
We all experienced the shortage problem in South Korea, and we all thought that this campaign could be the solution to the shortage problem.

The data analyst planned the requirements for the mask and analyzed the needs of users. The fashion designer designed aesthetics and prototype of Make Mask Kit, and the engineer designed the structure of the mask and worked for the performance of the mask.

 

 

10. Timeline

 

 

 

11. Press Kit

 

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1PYxQNhlZrg6KbgxcTKo8upSBqfIeVjRq?usp=sharing

*You can download free mask making patterns and this campaign information data here.

 

 

12. Risks and Challenges

 

We are working on this project with the mission of making products that will be used by many people desperately, and we promise to provide transparent and thorough feedback. Every team member will do their best to deliver fast and accurate results and to control every possible risk.

 

We are currently working on this project after confirming that raw material availability is available in China. The price of raw materials has risen by roughly 10 times compared to one before this situation, and the price is still rising every minute. Even though raw material factories are expanding at a tremendous rate, and mask manufacturing factories are also busy trying to expand, it is not enough to satisfy the demand. Therefore, we are planning to quickly start securing raw materials as soon as we achieve the goal of this project.

 

There is a risk that the trade of materials and mask products might be prohibited if several cases in China explodes again. Under the supply and demand control of the Chinese government, the project might be in danger of being delayed.

 

There is a risk that there might be slight changes in rewards due to changes in raw material prices in the future.

 

There might be slight changes in product design to improve user experience and to minimize manufacturing costs.

story:
Company background

Following on from the BÖRJA collection launched in 2017, ALLISDONE design studio presents the second collection of LAGOM Watches – Sjö.

Our co-founder Daniel grew up in Stockholm and moved to Hong Kong 8 years ago. This relocation from Sweden to Hong Kong, taught him the importance of living a balanced, fuss-free life so he decided to spread this philosophy to the world, and created LAGOM Watches.

Brand Introduction

“LAGOM” has long been a vital deeply-rooted aspect of Scandinavian culture - the Swedish concept of “not too much, not too little.” That which is enough, sufficient, satisfactory. Just right.

 

 

 

 

 

 

In each collection of LAGOM Watches, there are two important elements - the stainless steel case and an unique acetate ring. Its simple yet aesthetic design evokes the Swedish philosophy of moderation.

Inspiration

Sjö means lake or small sea in Swedish, a country blessed with 11,500 km of coastline and around 100,000 lakes. Its capital, the city of Stockholm, is situated on fourteen islands of an archipelago where Lake Mälaren meets the Baltic Sea.

Daniel, our co-founder, was mostly raised by his grandfather who worked in the shipbuilding industry in Sweden. Unsurprisingly, he spent lots of time sailing around with his grandfather when he was a child, and this is where he fell in love with the ocean and the vessels who sail on it.

Having similar geographical features, Hong Kong naturally reminded Daniel of home. Victoria Harbour, situated between Hong Kong Island and the Kowloon Peninsula, bustles day and night with all manner of watercraft; from the historic Star Ferries to cruise liners, cargo ships, and wooden fishing vessels. Thus, Daniel was inspired to have two different dial designs in the Sjö collection. 

This choice was also inspired by the Vasamuseet, the maritime museum in Stockholm, which showcases salvaged ships from history. Ships are the main transport of the ocean, yet it is the sailing control panel that has the most importance for sailing on the tremendous empty oceans. 

A ship’s control panel serves as the design inspiration for one of the dial designs in the SJÖ collection (LW029 to LW036).

In addition, the blue acetate symbolizes the ocean, and the unique pattern on the acetate pieces imitates the waves of the sea. They can be calm but quickly become raging; just like the ups and downs of our everyday live. The uniqueness of each acetate furthermore tells our own individual story.

The stainless steel case highlights the lion rock spirit of Hong Kong, the core values passed by Hong Kongers from generation to generation. This spirit enablesd the people of Hong Kong to evolve from fishing villages into the dynamic global financial hub it is today. But in return, the people lead a fast-paced city life. Hence, we would like to add some "lagom" into people's everyday lives, so we can all slow down and discover the beauty of life. The combination of the stainless-steel case and acetate ring symbolises the harmony in diversity.

Daniel grew up in a traditional Swedish family and no matter how busy the family members were, they spent lots of time together. But in Hong Kong, Daniel was separated from his family and he found himself alone. To remind himself of all those precious moments, he gave the watch the bolded strokes on the 5-10-hour marks, representing 17:00 to 22:00 in the evening.

Material & Craftsmanship

We have sourced the acetate from Mazzucchelli 1849, an Italian company that has existed for centuries. They supply acetate of the best quality and in the finest traditions.

Every acetate piece is laser cut and polished by experienced watchmakers. We cannot guarantee the acetate pattern is the same on every watch, but we like this uniqueness.

The quartz movement is from Swiss Ronda, it comes with battery will last for at least 36 months. 

The premium leather strap is from Italy. It is super soft and sits very well on your wrist.

Specifications

  • Size: 40mm Diameter (including acetate case)
  • Depth: 7.4mm
  • Outer Case Material: Italian Mazzucchelli 1849 Acetate
  • Inner Case Material: 316L Stainless Steel
  • Movement: Swiss Ronda Quartz 515
  • Function: 3 Hands + Date
  • Strap Width: 20mm
  • Buckle Width: 20mm
  • Quick release spring bar 
  • Strap Material: Double-sided Premium Italian Leather
  • Water Resistance: 5ATM
  • Warranty: 2 years

Please understand and appreciate there will be small differences in the patterns on the acetate of our watches. Our watchmakers polish them individually and all are made with heart.

Press Coverage

This choice was also inspired by the Vasamuseet, the maritime museum in Stockholm, which showcases salvaged ships from history. Ships are the main transport of the ocean, yet it is the sailing control panel that has the most importance for sailing on the tremendous empty oceans. 

A ship’s control panel serves as the design inspiration for one of the dial designs in the SJÖ collection (LW029 to LW036).

In addition, the blue acetate symbolizes the ocean, and the unique pattern on the acetate pieces imitates the waves of the sea. They can be calm but quickly become raging; just like the ups and downs of our everyday live. The uniqueness of each acetate furthermore tells our own individual story.

The stainless steel case highlights the lion rock spirit of Hong Kong, the core values passed by Hong Kongers from generation to generation. This spirit enablesd the people of Hong Kong to evolve from fishing villages into the dynamic global financial hub it is today. But in return, the people lead a fast-paced city life. Hence, we would like to add some "lagom" into people's everyday lives, so we can all slow down and discover the beauty of life. The combination of the stainless-steel case and acetate ring symbolises the harmony in diversity.
Daniel grew up in a traditional Swedish family and no matter how busy the family members were, they spent lots of time together. But in Hong Kong, Daniel was separated from his family and he found himself alone. To remind himself of all those precious moments, he gave the watch the bolded strokes on the 5-10-hour marks, representing 17:00 to 22:00 in the evening.










Material & Craftsmanship
We have sourced the acetate from Mazzucchelli 1849, an Italian company that has existed for centuries. They supply acetate of the best quality and in the finest traditions.
Every acetate piece is laser cut and polished by experienced watchmakers. We cannot guarantee the acetate pattern is the same on every watch, but we like this uniqueness.

The quartz movement is from Swiss Ronda, it comes with battery will last for at least 36 months. 

The premium leather strap is from Italy. It is super soft and sits very well on your wrist.

Specifications

Size: 40mm Diameter (including acetate case)
Depth: 7.4mm
Outer Case Material: Italian Mazzucchelli 1849 Acetate
Inner Case Material: 316L Stainless Steel
Movement: Swiss Ronda Quartz 515
Function: 3 Hands + Date
Strap Width: 20mm
Buckle Width: 20mm
Quick release spring bar 
Strap Material: Double-sided Premium Italian Leather
Water Resistance: 5ATM
Warranty: 2 years

Please understand and appreciate there will be small differences in the patterns on the acetate of our watches. Our watchmakers polish them individually and all are made with heart.

Press Coverage

story:
Let's Have Fun With Fashion

Inspired by print and runway, I chose to start my own publication! I was born and raised in Detroit; I even went to college in Detroit. After I graduated, double majoring in Marketing and Fashion Merchandising, I didn’t know what I wanted to do, regarding fashion. I just knew I was inspired by print and runway, and I had to have it in my life.

A few years after having a hand in styling, personal shopping and visual merchandising, I wanted more and knew it would take something drastic for me to create a tangible vision to my satisfaction. I saw so many great publications online. So many people went digital and had great publications. There were even avenues, like MagCloud, where you could do print-to-order. I decided that would be perfect for me. At that point, I had magazine collections bigger than living room furniture. I decided I could create my own magazine while in Michigan. I’ve always been passionate about magazines. It was time to create my own and do it my way.

I sent out TONS and TONS of e-mails explaining what I wanted to do. I was really inspired by European publications. I knew I wanted a fun point of view. I wanted to work with nice people who enjoyed fashion and had fun with it. I wanted to reach out to readers who find joy in fashion and are inspired by multiple aesthetics and designers. Fashion makes me happy. I wanted both reader and contributor to have fun with fashion, so I decided to name the magazine “PlayHaus.”

I really think there's something to be said about men's fashion. Lots of people enjoy more than "one look" and love diversity. Men's fashion is exciting, too!


PlayHaus

Some publications describe to you which tie is best for the office and how to transition a polo from work to party. Some of these publications concentrate on suits, cuff links, and oxford shirts. While that look is fine, it doesn’t speak to everyone. Everyone doesn’t dress like that and shouldn’t have to. We can all enjoy fashion how we see fit and we are allowed to have different ideas, styles and aesthetics.

There are so many talented designers! We get these amazing fashion shows with these amazing clothes and it seems like they aren’t being showcased enough. What’s the point of having awesome Fashion Week collections and coverage when some magazines go back to the same aesthetic and show the predictable pieces you could have guess they would focus on?! I believe there are so many great designers and clothes that don’t get the recognition or spotlight they deserve.

And these clothes don’t have to be from well-known designers either. There are so many smaller brands that make awesome clothes. High or low, well-known or newer, great clothes are great clothes. The fun thing is mixing and matching for us. We can go to showrooms and use high-end pieces and mix them with student work. We like to incorporate a good mix. It’s been great work with so many diverse pieces!

Dana Scruggs x Issue 1

Horacio Hamlet x Issue 3

Martin Brown x Issue 4

Martin Brown x Issue 4

Martin Brown x Issue 4

Gary Freeman x Issue 4

Tatchatrin Choeychom X Issue 5

Raen Badua x Issue 5

Arron Dunworth x Issue 5

Marc Tousignant x Issue 5

Arron Dunworth x Issue 6

Kira Bucca x Issue 6

Zach Alston x Issue 6

Debarati Sanyal x Issue 6

Models are not just hangers. They’re PEOPLE. It’s been great working with Vara Reese along the way (she did all of these videos so be sure to check her out). She’s been sweet and collaborated with us for most of our videos. We were able to interview models and get to know them. I wanted to do interviews with models, which we still do. We got to shoot so many diverse models for our editorials. Not only is promoting their skill as a model important to me, I want people to get to know them as well.

One of the greatest things about shooting and interviewing male models is the brotherhood. We’ve had group shoots before and everyone was extremely nice to each other. So much humility and personality!


Teamwork Makes the Dream Work

Together, we can do this! Though this issue won't have any advertising, the goal of $9,000 will make sure we get Issue 7 (Fall/Winter 2016) in print and in stores. The breakdown consists of:

  • $7,000 for printing and shipping of the magazine
  • $600 for gifts/perks and shipping of the perks
  • $500 for graphic design and videos
  • $900 for Indiegogo processing fees


Other Ways You Can Help

PlayHaus has gotten some AWESOME support! Realistically, everyone won't be able to donate. BUT, there are other ways YOU can help!

Please share the page if you can!

You can also follow us on Instagram: @playhausmag.com

I strongly believe in PlayHaus and EVERYONE who has worked so hard to make it what it is today. While there are many behind behind-the-scenes expenses we all have incurred, getting PlayHaus to print will require more support. 

As far as postcards are concerned , you will be e-mailed 20 pictures to choose from!

Thank you so much! :)

story:
Hammock Life Clothing

Have you ever wondered how much satisfaction you are getting out of your regular 9-5 job? Is it really what you thought you would be doing once you grew up? Are you really following your passion, slaving for someone else? Is your employer appreciating the remarkable ideas you possess?

Statistics suggest that 52.3% people are unhappy at work, with their usual 9-5 jobs. So what are we really doing with our life, living it in a robotic way? This was the question that pinched my mind one day at work, when I realized that rather than serving my unique passion, I am serving to a corporate structure in a mechanistic way that is profitable to my wellbeing in the least.

Since very young, I wanted to launch my own clothing line. I dreamt of my products inspiring individuals to become bigger and better, helping them find their inner light in the most positive of fashions. Recollecting fragments of my adolescent passion, I decided to open my own company, called Hammock Life Clothing. It is a clothing line that aims to promote good vibes and positive actions. It has always been my dream to be my own boss and not only own my own business but to own a business that has a positive impact on the world. With the advent of Hammock Life clothing (http://hammocklifeclothing.com/), I want to generate a ripple of positivity and growth, compared to the stagnancy of our usual daily lives.

Since it’s a recent start-up, I am looking for funding to execute my ideas in a wearable form. I request you to pitch in whatever you can to give a formal structure to this start-up. Hammock life has given me a vision and I wish to propagate this vision around the globe. Only you can help me do it!

Thank you.

story:
R.O.C. is an independent clothing company located in Upper East Side, Manhattan. Owned and operated by Jos Piriz, who has been designing and printing urban customized apparel in Central Europe and America since 2005.

Founded in January this year, Raised on Concrete originally started in an underground area in Queens, and has grown to its current location at 1st Ave in New York City

Through manufacturing exceptional products, our confidence is currently growing day after day together with our reputation; today, however, reputation also depends on how we deliver on our commitments.

Although we believe that a strong brand overcomes the mass advertisement in its concept capability, we are aware of the importance of implementing and achieving adequate marketing components to our Business Strategy so we can develop into a solid label, staying true to our vision and reaching out to specific targets according to what we represent as an entity nowadays.

 

With over 50 million tourists from all over the world visiting the City of Dreams each year, souvenir market has exploded, establishing a chain with hundreds of shops offering over thousand variations of low-cost and tawdry NY objects to choose from all over the city.

An important segment of New York citizens (F/M btw. 18-33 y/o) who potentially buy and use printed clothing is not willing to wear what they consider “cheap and predictable”. Most of them would put aside any visual idea which is not perceived as consistent and original[1]. When not choosing from sports articles like a Yankees logo Cap, a Giants Logo T-shirt or perhaps a Jets Jersey, many purchasers would be probably feeling something similar to a betrayal of originality.

The general visual conception of Raised on Concrete Brand (R.O.C.) is inspired by the analysis of these facts. With designs like NY Creators™ Monogram (created and used by the firm in several of its products), R.O.C. presents a solid visual composition which allows the user to experience new ways of experimenting and displaying graphic statements of what it means to be and to feel a New York citizen and to differentiate from others.

[1] www.bls.gov

 
 

We started this fundraising campaign so we are able to meet and connect with people who identify themselves as independent thinkers, people who believe in Small Enterprises with Big Concepts, humans who can help us improve and conduct well-defined promotional and branding activities (such as online and print advertisement, packaging improvement processes, Multimedia creation & public performances in the area of New York City).

The funding amount we would like to reach was generated from the comparison between two random semester-campaign proposals we received from three US branding firms.

A successful funding result would drive the following investments into reality:

In Raised on Concrete we would like to extend our sincere gratitude and appreciation to all of you for your time and your support.

With your help, we will be able to continue making what we love: to create and to contribute to the development of street culture in New York City.

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help, they are still able to use the Indiegogo share tools and spread our cause on the Web!

story:
English
Español


WWW.LAMBAPPAREL.COM


 
LA IDEA

We all like to express ourselves with our clothes, make clear our personality and identity and dress well.
So create this brand goes beyond making nice clothes and fashion, the essence is to bring the gospel and impact the world.
-------
A todos nos gusta expresarnos con nuestra ropa, dejar clara nuestra personalidad e identidad y vestir bien.
Así que crear la marca va más allá de hacer ropa bonita y a la moda, la esencia es llevar el evangelio e impactar el mundo.




TÚ PEDES SER PARTE

Project funding is for the production of shirts and accessories, buying supplies and expenses, which we can start a web shop and a time later a physical store. Why not?
By contributing with LAMB, we will be grateful for life plus you can get discounts on future purchases of products, t-shirts, accessories and the satisfaction of helping people and institutions that we allocate a percentage of total sales.
-------
El financiamiento del proyecto es para la producción de camisetas y accesorios, compra de suministros y gastos, con lo cual podamos comenzar una tienda en línea y más adelante una tienda física. ¿Porqué no?
Al contribuir con LAMB, además que estaremos agradecidos de por vida, puedes obtener descuentos en futuras compras de productos, camisetas, accesorios y la satisfacción de ayudar a personas e instituciones a las que destinaremos un porcentaje de las ventas totales.



IMPACTANDO EL MUNDO

I hope to draw in your mind this example as I imagine:
People wearing clothing with images and Bible verses, they call the attention of those around them. And people come to ask what it is about what they wear.
This is the time!
With our lifestyle we impact others and we aim them to life with Christ, proclaiming the gospel.
-------
Espero dibujar en tu mente este ejemplo como yo lo imagino:
Las personas vistiendo prendas con imágenes y versículos bíblicos, que llaman la atención de los que les rodean. Y la gente se acerquen a preguntarles de qué se trata lo que llevan puesto.
¡Este es el momento!
Con nuestro estilo de vida impactamos a los demás y los apuntamos a una vida con Cristo, proclamando el evangelio.



DESAFÍOS

With our experience in design and printing, we promise to give the best effort in this project.
There will be challenges but we know that everything will work for a purpose.
-------
Con nuestra experiencia en el área de diseño e impresión nos comprometemos a dar el mayor esfuerzo en este proyecto.
Van a haber retos pero sabemos que todo saldrá bien conforme a un propósito.



OTRAS FORMAS EN QUE PUEDES CONTRIBUIR

Besides economic contributions there are also very valuable contributions:
Pray for this project.
Share this campaign across all your social networks.
Talk about the project to your friends, your family, your church or your workplace.
-------
Además de las colaboraciones económicas también hay aportes muy valiosos:

Ora por este proyecto.
Comparte la campaña en todas tus redes sociales.
Habla del proyecto con tus amigos, tu familia, tu congregación o tu lugar de trabajo.



¡MUCHAS GRACIAS! :)

Stay tuned for updates on this campaign and on our social networks.
Follow LAMB: Facebook * Twitter * Instagram * YouTube * Google+

story:
When the person on the other end grabs their cup, the cup color changes letting you know that you're connected and together.

Use Tlinkle to connect with your far away loved ones. 

"Even though you're far apart, you'll feel as if you're sharing a cup right next to each other."

Through the associated application, you can change the color of the light and customize it based on whoever is on the other end of the cup allowing you to know at a moment's notice whether it's you loved on, mother, father, etc. 

Through the app, you can communicate by different means other than the color of the light. You can communicate through text and images through the app as well. 



How many times a day do you think about your significant other and/or family?

When you spent most of your day cramped up in the office or out running around, it can be hard to think about or remember the faces of your loved ones. 

Even though you want to, it can be hard to contact parents that may be far away. 

Connect with all those you miss using Tlinkle.

When you're busy at work and you see a twinkle coming from your cup, you'll instantly think of the faces of the ones you love and share Tlinkle with and vice versa.

Tlinkle will always twinkle no matter how close or far your loved ones are. 

Couples can create their own Tlinkle community via the smartphone app and once registered, when one grabs their Tlinkle, the other will be notified by a twinkle on theirs. 

When both grab their Tlinkle's, a pre-selected "couple" color will notify you that both of you are grabbing your individual cups.

Through the app, bulletin boards, photo albums, calendars can be shared via the community as well. 

Families can also create their own communities and when one member grabs their Tlinkle, the rest of your family will see a twinkle from their Tlinkle. 

If celebrities and their fans register their own community as well, when the celebrity grabs their Tlinkle, world-wide fans will be notified through their cups that their favorite celebrity is enjoying a cup of coffee or tea and they can connect with them as well. 

If a date has been agreed upon, fans can grab their cup letting their celebrity know that you're waiting for them. 



  1. Tlinkle App Registration
  2. Community Creation through the app
  3. Once registered, couples and families must set their account to "star mode". This allows bi-lateral twinkle notification through Tlinkle. If not set this way, the uni-lateral function will notify others when the person who has their account set to "star mode" (aka a celebrity). 
  4. Tlinkle Time Start – Once you begin, you and those connected in the community can start using Tlinkle.
  5. When one of you grabs your Tlinkle, and the other person does too, a pre-selected color will notify you that both or all parties have grabbed their cup as well. 
  6. Tlinkle App will be available in the Google Play Store.


Tlinkle Cup connects to your smartphone via Bluetooth.

When you grab your Tlinkle, sensors in the cup in combination with your Bluetooth connected application will send notification to the your loved ones. 

* Tlinkle must be connected to your smartphone in order to send twinkles. 

* Currently, Tlinkle is only compatible with Android devices.









Through Tlinkle we want to help people connect with the ones they love even at their busiest times through technology.

With the support we receive through your pre-orders, the funds will be used to create better molds for our cups as well as safety testing.




Since the cup is still being fine tuned, the final commercial version may differ from the prototype due to changes in parts, materials, etc. 

Design changes will only help in improving convenience and safety.

But don't worry. All progress updates in development will be sent out to our backers. 

We will do our best to not delay production and development to our backers even if there are changes to parts or materials and we will deliver our product on time. 

Q: How do we select Tlinkle cup type and color?

A: Upon successful completion of our campaign, we will send out a survey requesting color and type selection to the email address we have on file.

Q: Does Tlinkle not work with iPhones?

A: Unfortunately, the initial models will only be compatible with Android. We expect to begin iOS development in the second half of 2015.

Q: Does Tlinkle need to be connected to your smartphone in order to use?

A: If you to notify your connected users instantly that you're using your Tlinkle, it must be connected to Bluetooth when using. Of course you can use Tlinkle as a normal tumbler/cup, but please connect it to your smartphone to leverage all of its functionality and notify your loved ones. 

Q: Does it work even if the other users are far away?

A: Of course. As long as there are no network issues on either end, the cup will twinkle. 

Q: Can we select the color of our choosing for the lights?

A: Through the app, the LED colors can be changed for your Tlinkle.

Q: When can we expect delivery of Tlinkle?

A: We expect Tlinkle delivery in October of 2015. The exact date is still yet unknown. We will be sending out continues updates to keep our backers notified.
story_txt:
When the person on the other end grabs their cup, the cup color changes letting you know that you're connected and together.Use Tlinkle to connect with your far away loved ones. "Even though you're far apart, you'll feel as if you're sharing a cup right next to each other."Through the associated application, you can change the color of the light and customize it based on whoever is on the other end of the cup allowing you to know at a moment's notice whether it's you loved on, mother, father, etc. Through the app, you can communicate by different means other than the color of the light. You can communicate through text and images through the app as well. 


How many times a day do you think about your significant other and/or family?When you spent most of your day cramped up in the office or out running around, it can be hard to think about or remember the faces of your loved ones. 
Even though you want to, it can be hard to contact parents that may be far away. 

Connect with all those you miss using Tlinkle.
When you're busy at work and you see a twinkle coming from your cup, you'll instantly think of the faces of the ones you love and share Tlinkle with and vice versa.
Tlinkle will always twinkle no matter how close or far your loved ones are. 

Couples can create their own Tlinkle community via the smartphone app and once registered, when one grabs their Tlinkle, the other will be notified by a twinkle on theirs. 
When both grab their Tlinkle's, a pre-selected "couple" color will notify you that both of you are grabbing your individual cups.Through the app, bulletin boards, photo albums, calendars can be shared via the community as well. 
Families can also create their own communities and when one member grabs their Tlinkle, the rest of your family will see a twinkle from their Tlinkle. 

If celebrities and their fans register their own community as well, when the celebrity grabs their Tlinkle, world-wide fans will be notified through their cups that their favorite celebrity is enjoying a cup of coffee or tea and they can connect with them as well. 
If a date has been agreed upon, fans can grab their cup letting their celebrity know that you're waiting for them. 

Tlinkle App Registration


Community Creation through the app


Once registered, couples and families must set their account to "star mode". This allows bi-lateral twinkle notification through Tlinkle. If not set this way, the uni-lateral function will notify others when the person who has their account set to "star mode" (aka a celebrity). 


Tlinkle Time Start – Once you begin, you and those connected in the community can start using Tlinkle.

When one of you grabs your Tlinkle, and the other person does too, a pre-selected color will notify you that both or all parties have grabbed their cup as well. 
Tlinkle App will be available in the Google Play Store.





Tlinkle Cup connects to your smartphone via Bluetooth.
When you grab your Tlinkle, sensors in the cup in combination with your Bluetooth connected application will send notification to the your loved ones. 

* Tlinkle must be connected to your smartphone in order to send twinkles. 

* Currently, Tlinkle is only compatible with Android devices.









Through Tlinkle we want to help people connect with the ones they love even at their busiest times through technology. 
With the support we receive through your pre-orders, the funds will be used to create better molds for our cups as well as safety testing.


Since the cup is still being fine tuned, the final commercial version may differ from the prototype due to changes in parts, materials, etc. Design changes will only help in improving convenience and safety.But don't worry. All progress updates in development will be sent out to our backers. We will do our best to not delay production and development to our backers even if there are changes to parts or materials and we will deliver our product on time.

Q: Does Tlinkle not work with iPhones?A: Unfortunately, the initial models will only be compatible with Android. We expect to begin iOS development in the second half of 2015.Q: Does Tlinkle need to be connected to your smartphone in order to use?A: If you to notify your connected users instantly that you're using your Tlinkle, it must be connected to Bluetooth when using. Of course you can use Tlinkle as a normal tumbler/cup, but please connect it to your smartphone to leverage all of its functionality and notify your loved ones. Q: Does it work even if the other users are far away?A: Of course. As long as there are no network issues on either end, the cup will twinkle. Q: Can we select the color of our choosing for the lights?A: Through the app, the LED colors can be changed for your Tlinkle.Q: When can we expect delivery of Tlinkle?A: We expect Tlinkle delivery in October of 2015. The exact date is still yet unknown. We will be sending out continues updates to keep our backers notified.

story:
An Epochal Project

An expression used by a professor to describe the Gold Coin Initiative. 

The Gold Coin Initiative aims to amend the Swiss constitution to allow the private production of practical and useful gold coins and to protect their unhindered and tax-free trade. 

The proposed Dollar amount will double our funds and allow us to start the political process to realize this historic project. 

The Gold Coin Initiative is maybe the only politically realistic and peaceful project to the present paper money system. Gold is the precursor and the origin of paper money and the logical alternative, should paper money ever get existential problems. The proposed gold coins offers small savers and the voters an additional way to protect their savings. They provide direct economic benefits to commerce and the financial sector worldwide. 

The project has a historical dimension, because it is in fact the reintroduction of a commodity money system. It will promote awareness of money matters and contribute to stabilizing the global financial system. For more details and scientific support for these statements visit our website at www.goldfranc.org

story:
To help Seattle restaurants live through the COVID-19 shutdowns, we are selling T-Shirts to raise money to donate to the Plate Fund King County Charity. This organization puts money directly in the hands of those who need it most.

What motivates us?

In a recent interview David Chang, owner of famed New York city restaurant Momofuku, stated:

There is going to be a morbidly high business death rate. My fear is the restaurants that survive are going to be the big chains, and we’re going to eradicate the very eclectic mix that makes America and going out to eat so vibrant and great. (source: NYT)

We are patrons of local Seattle restaurants who are working to support the local food scene during these tough times. Our restaurants are unique locations that bring flavor to our neighborhoods and maintain individuality and vibrance throughout the city. Since the state-wide shutdowns, businesses which already operated on tight margins to begin with are finding it increasingly difficult to keep their doors open. 

What are we doing?

This campaign is raising funds for the Plate Fund King County Charity through T Shirt sales. All profits from the campaign ($10 per t-shirt sold) will go to the fund. 

What's on the T-Shirts?

Glad you asked, it's Bigfoot! Each t-shirt is screen printed by hand, and depicts a local Seattle creature eating his favorite take-out meal. All t-shirts are unisex, pre-shrunk and 100% cotton.
