story:
Short Summary

I am a disabled small business owner that is in college, my business is meant to help fund my service dog's training so I can regain my independance. 

After starting to get into buying dog accessories for my service dog in training I realized there is not anything cute for dog poop bag holders. A necessary item for any dog owner. Since the dog will accompany me everywhere I need them to be stylish. 

I want to add this product to my shop and get them into the hands of other dog parents. I cannot afford the first order without some help. 

What We Need & What You Get

I need about $2,500 to pay for the first order to get the minimum quantity of 500 custom poop bag holders. After much research I found a great manufactorer and got the prototype from them. 

Now what you probably are eager to know. There are different tiers to backing this project. You'll revieve Boba Dog merch and can pre order your own Boba Poop Bag Holder by backing this. 

If the goal is not reached I'll save the funds to help with this project after I secure more funding. 

The Impact

As mentioned earlier I am disabled. I have postural orthostatic tachycardia syndrome, mast cell activation syndrome, hashimotos, elhers danlos syndrome and IC. I was diagnosed my first year of college and since than had al my plans thrown to the side. 

The service dog will give me back my independence that I briefly had, I'll be able to go to college that isn't 20 min from home. 

 I've been struggling to find where I belong in society and as a small business. I came up with this idea and at first thought it was silly. After further research no one else seemed to be doing it. 

Risks & Challenges

The largest risk is not being able to get this seen by people. This is the largest risk for any project. I will be using the bit of money I have to run ads in hopes of getting it in front of people. Having insentives for interaction and encouraging people to share. If we all work together this project will be a success. 
 

Other Ways You Can Help

It's ok if you can't contribute money to the project. There's plenty you can do! 

1) Share this project with your friends and family. The more we spread the word the better chance we have of succeeding. 

2) Follow the project for updates to keep up with us.

3) Continue to be supportive. This project is hard to do without the support of others.

story:
Motora One is a backpack designed for every wheelchair user and non user. It is a functional, beautiful and easy to use bag that's meant to bring you more autonomy and comfort. 

Motora can be manipulated without any strength or fine motor skills, it also adapts perfectly to every wheelchair backrest, and has special compartments to store your day to day items.

In its "S" version, we have adapted Motora so users without a disability can be benefited of its characteristics.

In order to make Motora functional, aesthetic and easy to use we have integrated many components that will allow you to use it with more autonomy and comfort. 

 

Motora integrates a magnetic clasp to open and close it, so you don't have to use strength to manipulate it. Also, it is mixed with a circular string so you can just use  the clasp, closures and many other elements without fine motor skills.

To open the magnetic clasp just pull the circular string, and to close it just get both parts of the clasp close enough so the magnets do the job for you.

 

In the search of your safety, we added reflectant properties to the circular strings in the backpack so you can be visible at night. If you don't want this feature just tell us in a survey that we will send to you when the campaign is over! 

Easy to use, also means easy to grab and lift. Motora includes handles in the front, in the sides and in the top so you can manipulate it as you please.

The top handle is adjustable so you can give it the large you want. Also, the side handles can have different texture so you don't confuse them with the straps when you grab them from behind, this is an optional feature and you will be able to tell us your preference in a survey that we will send you at the of the campaign.

 

Motora posses four external pockets, one in the upper part, two in the sides and one in the front.

In one of its sides, it has a bottle pocket which integrates elastics and a square string to ease its manipulation. In the other side of the bag, there is an ease access pocket that you can use when the backpack is in the backrest of your wheelchair, you can use it to store frequently used items like wallets and keys,  


In the upper part you have a pocket to store common used items that needs fasts access from the front like your technicals aids. And in the front it posses a raincoat compartment so you can store your hygienic stuff and protect the other objects from any liquid leak.

Another important element is the bottom cover, that protects your things from potential hits and water splash that the backpack may suffer when moving around in the streets.

 

Can't find a bag where you can store all your objects properly? Motora was designed to store all your everyday objects.

It posses an internal pocket so you can store your catheters without bending them.

Also a compartment for your computer that has a retraible pull out systems attached to a square string that will ease the take out of your notebook and will go back to its original position once you release it.

Additionally, the small pockets inside will allow you to store less frequently used items and its large volume will let you pack away everything you want.

As a final plus, the inner of the backpack is waterproof, so it can protect the items that you are carrying from liquid leaks in the outside of the bag.

Tired that your backpack hits your backrest all the time? Motora One includes an adjustable straps systems so you can fix them where it suits you more, eliminating the pendulum effect that mosts bags have when you move around with them.

Just use the circular string to open it and pull the straps to the level you want, then close the systems and your Motora One will fit perfectly in your backrest. No more pendulum effect,  no more hitting your bag with the floor and no more discomfort with your backpack in your wheelchair.


Since I had my accident some years ago, I have looked a lot alternatives to become more autonomous in a world that is not conceived to be accessible. Unfortunately not having many options I was forced to make improvised adaptations or have to ask for help. That`s why l decided to take action on the matter and undertake this challenge as one of many more to come.

I met Claudio at college, where we became friends and started to undertake together. Im a passionate entepreneur and a dog lover and together with Claudio we want to make this project come true

 

Motora  is though to fit perfectly to the backrest of your wheelchair and your back in case you want to carry it with you. Here you will find more info about the dimensions of Motora and the development process. 

We have been working for over two years designing, prototyping and testing with different kinds of users so we can make sure that everyone can use Motora comfortably and with ease.

In order to develop Motora, we have been working with the bests workshops in Chile. With the help of our suppliers and designers, we have been able to achieve the best quality for the backpack.

 

To access the press kit please click the image above or enter in this link.

For additional questions contact us at: carriazv@gmail.com

The main reason we want to use Indiegogo is to get as much users as we can and build a community, we believe that through this platform we can accelerate the process to benefit as much people as possible. Also, it will help us in the production and logistic process, allowing us to make delivery easier.

Motora One and Motora S comes with a 12 month limited warranty for Indiegogo backers. We also ensure that every unit is free from manufacturing defects and handled with the utmost care during shipment. If there is any problem with the sent product, we will send immediately new backpack.

If you have additional questions please write us to: carriazv@gmail.com

As we are new to Indiegogo, time will be the most challenging part. Depending on the demand of the product, we may take a little longer to make the delivers.  However, we have started working since before the launch of this campaign to find the bests suppliers to cover the demand. As we are also trying to find new suppliers to cover the whole demand of this campaign, it could take some time to find one that satisfy our quality demands, we prefer to take a little more time to deliver something that is going to please you rather than delivering  something that doesn't fulfill our promise in order to deliver in time. We believe that we can mitigate all potential risks in this journey as we have been working two years in this project and we are well aware of the difficulties that may come in our way. In any circumstance, we will keep informing you and telling in advance the status of the production and delivery. Thanks you for believing in us!

For more info or if you have any doubts, please write us to carriazv@gmail.com or write us to our social networks or see the FAQ.

Thanks you for helping us making this dream possible, we hope that this will be the first of many more projects that will help to improve the quality of life of people with disabilities and will help them to achieve more autonomy in their everyday. This is an ambitious project that started by the own needs of its founder and that can be possible thanks to you. ¡Thanks for believing and many thanks for being part of this project!

We would also want to make a special thanks to everyone that has been part of the creation process, thanks to the many wheelchair users and occupational therapists that tried the backpack and gave us their feedback, thanks to the health institutions and hospitals that received us, thanks to our mentors Diego Aguilar, Stefan Prinbow, Carolina Avila, Martin Ojeda and many others for giving us advice in moments of need, thanks to Agencia Match for helping us with the marketing, thank to Bicla for helping us with the backpack development and thanks to the many people that believed in this project and lended us a hand. But we would make a real special thanks to our family and friends for their unconditional love and constant support, it has been rough years of work and you have always been there for us. Thanks you

 

 

 

 

Motora One es una mochila diseñada para cualquier usuario de sillas de ruedas como no usuario de estas. Es un bolso funcional, estético y fácil de usar que está destinado a brindarte más autonomía y comodidad.

Motora puede ser manipulada sin fuerza o motricidad fina, también se adapta perfectamente a cada respaldo de silla de ruedas, y tiene bolsillos especiales para almacenar tus artículos diarios.

En su versión "S", hemos adaptado a Motora para que usuarios sin discapacidad puedan beneficiarse de sus características.

 

Con el objetivo de que Motora sea funcional, estética y fácil de usar, hemos integrado diversos componentes que te permitirán usarla con mayor autonomía y comodidad.

 

 

Motora integra un broche magnético para abrirla y cerrarla, de modo que no tengas que usar fuerza para manipularla. Además, está acompañado de un tirador circular para que no solo puedas usar el broche, sino también los cierres y muchos de los otros elementos sin necesidad de motricidad fina.

Para abrir el broche magnético simplemente jala el tirador circular, y para cerrarlo, acerca ambas partes del broche lo suficiente como para que los imanes hagan el trabajo por ti.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

En búsqueda de tú seguridad, agregamos propiedades reflectantes a los tiradores circulares en la mochila para que puedas ser visible en la noche. Si no deseas esta función, solo dinos en una encuesta que enviaremos cuando finalice la campaña!

Fácil de usar, también significa fácil de agarrar y levantar. Motora incluye agarraderas en la parte frontal, en los lados y en la parte superior para que puedas manipularla como desees.

La agarradera superior es ajustable para que puedas darle el tamaño que desees. Además, los mangos laterales pueden tener diferentes texturas, para no confundirlos con las correas cuando lo tomas por detrás, esta es una característica opcional y podrás darnos tu preferencia en una encuesta que le enviaremos al final de la campaña.

 

 

Motora tiene cuatro bolsillos externos, uno en la parte superior, dos en los laterales y otro en la parte delantera.

En uno de sus lados, tiene un bolsillo para botellas que integra elásticos y un tirador cuadrado para facilitar su manipulación. En el otro lado del bolso, hay un bolsillo de fácil acceso que puedes usar cuando la mochila está en el respaldo de tu silla de ruedas, que puedes usar para guardar artículos de uso frecuente como carteras y llaves.

 

En la parte superior hay un bolsillo para almacenar artículos comúnmente usados que requieren de un acceso rápido desde el frente como algunas ayudas técnicas. Y en la parte delantera tiene un compartimento impermeable para que puedas guardar elementos de higiene personaly proteger los otros objetos de cualquier fuga de líquido.

 

 

Otro elemento importante es la cubierta inferior, que protege tus cosas de posibles golpes y salpicaduras de agua que la mochila puede sufrir al moverse por las calles.

 

¿No encuentras un bolso donde guardar todos tus objetos correctamente? Motora fue diseñada para almacenar todos tus objetos cotidianos.

Tiene un bolsillo interno para que puedas guardar cosas como catéteres sin doblarlos.

También tiene un compartimento para guardar tu computadora que cuenta con un sistema retráctil conectado a un tirador que facilitará su extracción, volverá a su posición original una vez que lo sueltes.

Además, los pequeños bolsillos en el interior te permitirán almacenar artículos de uso menos frecuente y su gran volumen te permitirá guardar todo lo que desees.

Como una ventaja adicional, el interior de la mochila es impermeable, por lo que puedes proteger los elementos que estás cargando de los derrames de líquido en el exterior de la mochila.

Cansado de que tu mochila golpee tu respaldo todo el tiempo? Motora One incluye un sistema de correas ajustables que te permiten ajustarlo como desees o necesites y adaptar la mochila a diferentes tipos de respaldos. ¡Consigue el ajuste perfecto!

Simplemente usa el tirador circular para abrirla y tira de las correas hasta el nivel que deseas, luego cierra el sistema y tu Motora One encajará perfectamente en tu respaldo. No más efecto péndulo, no más golpes de tu bolso con el suelo y no más molestias en tu silla de ruedas.


Desde que tuve mi accidente hace algunos años, he buscado diferentes alternativas para volverme más autónomo en un mundo que no esta diseñado para ser accesible. Desafortunadamente, al no tener muchas opciones, fui forzado a hacer adaptaciones improvisadas a los objetos que usaba o tenía que pedir ayuda. Ese es el motivo por el cual decidí tomar acción en la materia y tomar este emprendimiento como uno más de los que están por venir.  

Conocí a Claudio en la universidad, donde nos volvimos amigos y comenzamos a emprender juntos. Soy un emprendedor apasionado y un amante de los perros, junto a Claudio queremos hacer que este proyecto se vuelva realidad.

 

Motora está pensada para calzar perfectamente con el respaldo de tu silla de ruedas o tu espalda en el caso de que desees llevarla contigo. Aquí encontrarás más información sobre las dimensiones de motora y el proceso de desarrollo de la mochila.

Hemos trabajado por más de dos años diseñando, prototipando y probando Motora con diferentes tipos de usuarios para asegurarnos de que cualquiera la pueda usar de manera confortable y con facilidad.

Para desarrollar Motora, hemos trabajado con los mejores talleres de Chile. Con la ayuda de proveedores y diseñadores, hemos logrado la mejor calidad para la mochila.

Para acceder al kit de prensa, por favor acceder a este link.

Para preguntas adicionales contactamos a : carriazv@gmail.com

 

 

¿Por qué Indiegogo?

La razón principal por la cual deseamos usar Indiegogo es para atraer a la mayor cantidad de usuarios y construir una comunidad, creemos que a través de esta plataforma podemos acelerar el proceso para beneficiar a la mayor cantidad de gente posible. Además, nos va ayudar con el proceso logístico y de producción, permitiéndonos hacer la entrega más fácil.

Garantía

Motora One y Motora S vienen con una garantía limitada de 12 meses para los contribuidores de Indiegogo. Además, aseguramos que cada unidad es libre de defectos de producción y que serán tratas con el máximo cuidado durante el envío. Si hay algún problema con el producto enviado, te enviaremos inmediatamente una mochila nueva.

Si tienes preguntas adicionales, por favor escríbenos a carriazv@gmail.com

 

Para mayor información

 

Para más información o si tienes cualquier duda, por favor escríbenos a carriazv@gmail.com o escríbenos a nuestras redes sociales o mira el FAQ.

Gracias por ayudarnos a hacer este sueño realidad, esperamos que este sea el primero de varios proyectos más que ayuden a mejorar la calidad de las personas en condición de discapacidad y podamos ayudarlos a obtener mayor autonomía en su día a día. Este es un proyecto ambicioso que comenzó con las propias necesidades de uno de sus fundadores y que puede ser posible gracias a ti. ¡Muchas gracias por creer en nosotros y ser parte de este proyecto!

Motora One is a backpack designed for every wheelchair user and non user. It is a functional, beautiful and easy to use bag that's meant to bring you more autonomy and comfort. Motora can be manipulated without any strength or fine motor skills, it also adapts perfectly to every wheelchair backrest, and has special compartments to store your day to day items.In its "S" version, we have adapted Motora so users without a disability can be benefited of its characteristics.In order to make Motora functional, aesthetic and easy to use we have integrated many components that will allow you to use it with more autonomy and comfort.  Motora integrates a magnetic clasp to open and close it, so you don't have to use strength to manipulate it. Also, it is mixed with a circular string so you can just use  the clasp, closures and many other elements without fine motor skills.To open the magnetic clasp just pull the circular string, and to close it just get both parts of the clasp close enough so the magnets do the job for you. In the search of your safety, we added reflectant properties to the circular strings in the backpack so you can be visible at night. If you don't want this feature just tell us in a survey that we will send to you when the campaign is over! Easy to use, also means easy to grab and lift. Motora includes handles in the front, in the sides and in the top so you can manipulate it as you please.The top handle is adjustable so you can give it the large you want. Also, the side handles can have different texture so you don't confuse them with the straps when you grab them from behind, this is an optional feature and you will be able to tell us your preference in a survey that we will send you at the of the campaign. Motora posses four external pockets, one in the upper part, two in the sides and one in the front.In one of its sides, it has a bottle pocket which integrates elastics and a square string to ease its manipulation. In the other side of the bag, there is an ease access pocket that you can use when the backpack is in the backrest of your wheelchair, you can use it to store frequently used items like wallets and keys,  In the upper part you have a pocket to store common used items that needs fasts access from the front like your technicals aids. And in the front it posses a raincoat compartment so you can store your hygienic stuff and protect the other objects from any liquid leak.Another important element is the bottom cover, that protects your things from potential hits and water splash that the backpack may suffer when moving around in the streets. Can't find a bag where you can store all your objects properly? Motora was designed to store all your everyday objects.It posses an internal pocket so you can store your catheters without bending them.Also a compartment for your computer that has a retraible pull out systems attached to a square string that will ease the take out of your notebook and will go back to its original position once you release it.Additionally, the small pockets inside will allow you to store less frequently used items and its large volume will let you pack away everything you want.As a final plus, the inner of the backpack is waterproof, so it can protect the items that you are carrying from liquid leaks in the outside of the bag.Tired that your backpack hits your backrest all the time? Motora One includes an adjustable straps systems so you can fix them where it suits you more, eliminating the pendulum effect that mosts bags have when you move around with them.Just use the circular string to open it and pull the straps to the level you want, then close the systems and your Motora One will fit perfectly in your backrest. No more pendulum effect,  no more hitting your bag with the floor and no more discomfort with your backpack in your wheelchair.Since I had my accident some years ago, I have looked a lot alternatives to become more autonomous in a world that is not conceived to be accessible. Unfortunately not having many options I was forced to make improvised adaptations or have to ask for help. That`s why l decided to take action on the matter and undertake this challenge as one of many more to come.I met Claudio at college, where we became friends and started to undertake together. Im a passionate entepreneur and a dog lover and together with Claudio we want to make this project come true Motora  is though to fit perfectly to the backrest of your wheelchair and your back in case you want to carry it with you. Here you will find more info about the dimensions of Motora and the development process. We have been working for over two years designing, prototyping and testing with different kinds of users so we can make sure that everyone can use Motora comfortably and with ease.In order to develop Motora, we have been working with the bests workshops in Chile. With the help of our suppliers and designers, we have been able to achieve the best quality for the backpack. To access the press kit please click the image above or enter in this link.For additional questions contact us at: carriazv@gmail.comThe main reason we want to use Indiegogo is to get as much users as we can and build a community, we believe that through this platform we can accelerate the process to benefit as much people as possible. Also, it will help us in the production and logistic process, allowing us to make delivery easier.Motora One and Motora S comes with a 12 month limited warranty for Indiegogo backers. We also ensure that every unit is free from manufacturing defects and handled with the utmost care during shipment. If there is any problem with the sent product, we will send immediately new backpack.If you have additional questions please write us to: carriazv@gmail.comAs we are new to Indiegogo, time will be the most challenging part. Depending on the demand of the product, we may take a little longer to make the delivers.  However, we have started working since before the launch of this campaign to find the bests suppliers to cover the demand. As we are also trying to find new suppliers to cover the whole demand of this campaign, it could take some time to find one that satisfy our quality demands, we prefer to take a little more time to deliver something that is going to please you rather than delivering  something that doesn't fulfill our promise in order to deliver in time. We believe that we can mitigate all potential risks in this journey as we have been working two years in this project and we are well aware of the difficulties that may come in our way. In any circumstance, we will keep informing you and telling in advance the status of the production and delivery. Thanks you for believing in us!For more info or if you have any doubts, please write us to carriazv@gmail.com or write us to our social networks or see the FAQ.Thanks you for helping us making this dream possible, we hope that this will be the first of many more projects that will help to improve the quality of life of people with disabilities and will help them to achieve more autonomy in their everyday. This is an ambitious project that started by the own needs of its founder and that can be possible thanks to you. ¡Thanks for believing and many thanks for being part of this project!We would also want to make a special thanks to everyone that has been part of the creation process, thanks to the many wheelchair users and occupational therapists that tried the backpack and gave us their feedback, thanks to the health institutions and hospitals that received us, thanks to our mentors Diego Aguilar, Stefan Prinbow, Carolina Avila, Martin Ojeda and many others for giving us advice in moments of need, thanks to Agencia Match for helping us with the marketing, thank to Bicla for helping us with the backpack development and thanks to the many people that believed in this project and lended us a hand. But we would make a real special thanks to our family and friends for their unconditional love and constant support, it has been rough years of work and you have always been there for us. Thanks you    Motora One es una mochila diseñada para cualquier usuario de sillas de ruedas como no usuario de estas. Es un bolso funcional, estético y fácil de usar que está destinado a brindarte más autonomía y comodidad.Motora puede ser manipulada sin fuerza o motricidad fina, también se adapta perfectamente a cada respaldo de silla de ruedas, y tiene bolsillos especiales para almacenar tus artículos diarios.En su versión "S", hemos adaptado a Motora para que usuarios sin discapacidad puedan beneficiarse de sus características.

 Con el objetivo de que Motora sea funcional, estética y fácil de usar, hemos integrado diversos componentes que te permitirán usarla con mayor autonomía y comodidad.  Motora integra un broche magnético para abrirla y cerrarla, de modo que no tengas que usar fuerza para manipularla. Además, está acompañado de un tirador circular para que no solo puedas usar el broche, sino también los cierres y muchos de los otros elementos sin necesidad de motricidad fina.Para abrir el broche magnético simplemente jala el tirador circular, y para cerrarlo, acerca ambas partes del broche lo suficiente como para que los imanes hagan el trabajo por ti.       En búsqueda de tú seguridad, agregamos propiedades reflectantes a los tiradores circulares en la mochila para que puedas ser visible en la noche. Si no deseas esta función, solo dinos en una encuesta que enviaremos cuando finalice la campaña!Fácil de usar, también significa fácil de agarrar y levantar. Motora incluye agarraderas en la parte frontal, en los lados y en la parte superior para que puedas manipularla como desees.La agarradera superior es ajustable para que puedas darle el tamaño que desees. Además, los mangos laterales pueden tener diferentes texturas, para no confundirlos con las correas cuando lo tomas por detrás, esta es una característica opcional y podrás darnos tu preferencia en una encuesta que le enviaremos al final de la campaña.  Motora tiene cuatro bolsillos externos, uno en la parte superior, dos en los laterales y otro en la parte delantera.En uno de sus lados, tiene un bolsillo para botellas que integra elásticos y un tirador cuadrado para facilitar su manipulación. En el otro lado del bolso, hay un bolsillo de fácil acceso que puedes usar cuando la mochila está en el respaldo de tu silla de ruedas, que puedes usar para guardar artículos de uso frecuente como carteras y llaves. En la parte superior hay un bolsillo para almacenar artículos comúnmente usados que requieren de un acceso rápido desde el frente como algunas ayudas técnicas. Y en la parte delantera tiene un compartimento impermeable para que puedas guardar elementos de higiene personaly proteger los otros objetos de cualquier fuga de líquido.  Otro elemento importante es la cubierta inferior, que protege tus cosas de posibles golpes y salpicaduras de agua que la mochila puede sufrir al moverse por las calles. ¿No encuentras un bolso donde guardar todos tus objetos correctamente? Motora fue diseñada para almacenar todos tus objetos cotidianos.Tiene un bolsillo interno para que puedas guardar cosas como catéteres sin doblarlos.También tiene un compartimento para guardar tu computadora que cuenta con un sistema retráctil conectado a un tirador que facilitará su extracción, volverá a su posición original una vez que lo sueltes.Además, los pequeños bolsillos en el interior te permitirán almacenar artículos de uso menos frecuente y su gran volumen te permitirá guardar todo lo que desees.Como una ventaja adicional, el interior de la mochila es impermeable, por lo que puedes proteger los elementos que estás cargando de los derrames de líquido en el exterior de la mochila.Cansado de que tu mochila golpee tu respaldo todo el tiempo? Motora One incluye un sistema de correas ajustables que te permiten ajustarlo como desees o necesites y adaptar la mochila a diferentes tipos de respaldos. ¡Consigue el ajuste perfecto!Simplemente usa el tirador circular para abrirla y tira de las correas hasta el nivel que deseas, luego cierra el sistema y tu Motora One encajará perfectamente en tu respaldo. No más efecto péndulo, no más golpes de tu bolso con el suelo y no más molestias en tu silla de ruedas.Desde que tuve mi accidente hace algunos años, he buscado diferentes alternativas para volverme más autónomo en un mundo que no esta diseñado para ser accesible. Desafortunadamente, al no tener muchas opciones, fui forzado a hacer adaptaciones improvisadas a los objetos que usaba o tenía que pedir ayuda. Ese es el motivo por el cual decidí tomar acción en la materia y tomar este emprendimiento como uno más de los que están por venir.  Conocí a Claudio en la universidad, donde nos volvimos amigos y comenzamos a emprender juntos. Soy un emprendedor apasionado y un amante de los perros, junto a Claudio queremos hacer que este proyecto se vuelva realidad. Motora está pensada para calzar perfectamente con el respaldo de tu silla de ruedas o tu espalda en el caso de que desees llevarla contigo. Aquí encontrarás más información sobre las dimensiones de motora y el proceso de desarrollo de la mochila.Hemos trabajado por más de dos años diseñando, prototipando y probando Motora con diferentes tipos de usuarios para asegurarnos de que cualquiera la pueda usar de manera confortable y con facilidad.Para desarrollar Motora, hemos trabajado con los mejores talleres de Chile. Con la ayuda de proveedores y diseñadores, hemos logrado la mejor calidad para la mochila.Para acceder al kit de prensa, por favor acceder a este link.Para preguntas adicionales contactamos a : carriazv@gmail.com  ¿Por qué Indiegogo?La razón principal por la cual deseamos usar Indiegogo es para atraer a la mayor cantidad de usuarios y construir una comunidad, creemos que a través de esta plataforma podemos acelerar el proceso para beneficiar a la mayor cantidad de gente posible. Además, nos va ayudar con el proceso logístico y de producción, permitiéndonos hacer la entrega más fácil.GarantíaMotora One y Motora S vienen con una garantía limitada de 12 meses para los contribuidores de Indiegogo. Además, aseguramos que cada unidad es libre de defectos de producción y que serán tratas con el máximo cuidado durante el envío. Si hay algún problema con el producto enviado, te enviaremos inmediatamente una mochila nueva.Si tienes preguntas adicionales, por favor escríbenos a carriazv@gmail.com Para mayor información Para más información o si tienes cualquier duda, por favor escríbenos a carriazv@gmail.com o escríbenos a nuestras redes sociales o mira el FAQ.Gracias por ayudarnos a hacer este sueño realidad, esperamos que este sea el primero de varios proyectos más que ayuden a mejorar la calidad de las personas en condición de discapacidad y podamos ayudarlos a obtener mayor autonomía en su día a día. Este es un proyecto ambicioso que comenzó con las propias necesidades de uno de sus fundadores y que puede ser posible gracias a ti. ¡Muchas gracias por creer en nosotros y ser parte de este proyecto! sdfsdfsdfsdfsdfssfdfsjdfois

story:
Remember To Reach For The Prize!

Remain Focused. Stay Motivated.  

"Remember to reach for the prize". "Remain focused and stay motivated." These are sayings college students hear often, usually during the first few days of class. By week two, we're often set off to fend for ourselves, as freshman or returned students. Sometime after, the up and up turns the opposite way and so do some of us. Hi, my name is Izeem Mcherrin, and I believe students need to be self-sufficient. But how to become self-sufficient? I believe it starts by being self-motivated, and to finish long-term goals; like college. Which historically is not always easy. Why, because there are very bad things in college, such as bullying. Which I'd like to call a "misunderstanding". Or even a missed opportunity to work with peers towards mutual successes in college.

 

Who? Is Izeem Mcherrin, Founder

 

(image: SUNY Broome College President, Dr. Drumm and Izeem Mcherrin)

Izeem Mcherrin is the founder of the education focused start-up clothing website, called The Forward Never Backward Store -online at www.fnbstuff.com. Also has 2 locations, Upstate New York, at retail.

My partners and I first started this company in 2015, out of the need to help motivate other youths to keep moving forward with long-term goals, such as college. As college is extremely important, especially in urban cities. Yearly, we've accomplished many goals in the Binghamton, New York area. Some mentions are having a platform where student's can intern for credits toward their major, and/or work part-time with pay. In 2017 through research we've pinpointed a major cause for college dropouts, not only in our city but state-wide. We'll discuss that shortly. Recently in 2018, on its third year of business, our store has been bought by the largest us college bookstore seller in the United States. The story is just beginning. Now lets begin.

 

What Is The Problem?

 

In New York State, there is confusion between students on various occasions in various areas, prevalent mainly during after off hours in the dormitories. Through interview research, we've quantified that of all the hardest things to do as a student in college, is to defend yourself against other students. Because you're all, well, students. Makes sense.

 

So What Is The Solution?

A Great First Impression!

 

 

A good first impression, is a lasting impression.  Which, when matching an specific environment can stop many types of confusion. We answer the question, "how to mean business, at college on a college budget?"  Well by first trying our campaign product, Success Material Clothing. I think we may finally have "a" solution.

Here are some highlights of our clothing product:

  • Showcases many career aspirations printed on front chest design!
  • Alleviates confusion by having peers and opportunities become interested in you!
  • Show inspiration to others, one social-media photos, video and meeting people!
  • Helps boost self-esteem by expressing "I Am Success Material" outright!
  • Represents the ambitions within yourself toward others!

                              

 Why Pay For Aide Twice?

 

In a nutshell, we think every student should at a minimum, be knowledgeable of success material. And have a choice to use it for personal and social-aide, and trust us, it works! And also for student's to have available, new helpful programs for everyone, included with tuition. This combination can act as a precaution towards peer confusion, fighting and becoming unmotivated. These good results can prevent dropouts, arrests and sometimes death.

"For problems that come along with higher-education institutions, historically". "This is a solution." -Izeem Mcherrin

                                   

 Campaign Goals

 

This campaign's goal is to raise enough funds for one college, before the end of the spring semester 2019. And to give the majority of their freshman students their own Success Material attire choices to wear ending of semester. For free! We're hopeful this may at least bring a change byway of attire presence at our colleges. And if we meet goal, it'll potentially help grow our voice in our community, to then allow for us to discuss important topics like bullying and other student issues with solutions to college councils and staff. Some of the important topics are:

  • Cultural sensitivity teaching and training to students and staff
  • How bully in college affects an entire family
  • How to stay motivated for the long-term
  • Hygiene and bathroom ethics 
  • The real on Campus Sexual-Assault and how to prevent it from happening to you
  • A college petition for new bed mattresses every few semesters!
  • An I Am Success Material group for increasing self-worth

                             

What We Need From You

  

We're starting the campaign fund goal at $2,400 dollars. Enough for one shirt per student, for the majority of freshman classes at our local SUNY college. If our $2,400 goal is not met, we will use any given proceeds to pay for as many student's as possible. Along with paying to spread the word about their cause, in campus papers, blogs, and online. With mentions of supporters of this campaign (per request) who believes in the future of college students' well-being and success.

 

What's In It For You!

You may receive any of our wonderful perks, along with your donation. Also you'll recieve a social-media shout out (per request) for your kindness and donation! All of our perks are of the highest-quality that we sell, and are yours as a token of our gratitude.

                               

  Risks & Challenges

 

We are aware of the challenges involved toward meeting our campaign goal. For example, our small following on social-media. We are a local-community business. But we are confident in our ability to convey the importance of this campaign and moving forward in the best and most efficient manner possible. With your help too, we can make it happen! Follow our blogs on our website www.fnbstuff.com's, updates and e-mail.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 

We need your help in other ways beyond monetarily. Your Social-media posts and links can have a tremendous effect! So please share and retweet our posts and links with us. And be sure to use the Indiegogo share tools! Thank You For Your Support!

 

Youtube's credits* 

Special Thanks to:

1. Kristin McLeod, www.youtube.com/watch?v=HPJelHua0gk

2. National Institute of Mental Health (NIMH),

 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9aHTHGjQ628

3. Arlin Moore, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wEfBy9z7S74

Special Mentions

SUNY Broome College Dr. K Drumm

Our Team And Facebook Groups

Everyone For Their Donation! (Heart)

story:
We are happy to announce that FLASHSAFE available on the official website! https://flash.so


Hello, I'm SmartFlash. You might think that you are looking at an ordinary flash drive, but that couldn’t be further from the truth. Never before did users have a data storage device so simple and so safe at the same time. Through your personal Flashsafe, you get an access to a super-secure unlimited cloud storage. It’s very simple: you don’t need to sign up and enter your login/password, you don’t even need a web browser! Now you can store and share files of any size anonymously and safely. 

You will no longer need to go through all this authorization procedure. Simply connect your Flashsafe to your computer and start working, playing, listening to music or watching films. We took great care and effort to make Flashsafe easy to use: each time hardware authorization chip creates new passwords that are impossible to break. Thus, not a second of your time is lost .

Insert your SmartFlash in your computer and gain access to a file storage with unlimited ability to upload and download data. Always.

We are glad to introduce Smartflash 4G cellular Use SmartFlash 4G anywhere on the planet to store your files with no limit and with no need to enter login/password or sign up. - just insert a SIM card into your SmartFlash 4G and use a 2048-bit secure connection to transfer and store your data directly from the server. SmartFlash 4G cellular works with all the operators all over the world and makes your data storage as safe as noone else can do. Never run out of memory till you have the SmartFlash 4G with you! Pre-Order just for $65 (35% off from the initial price $99)



We take stored data security to a whole new level! Nobody will ever know what data you are keeping, because your files are not linked to your personal information on our servers. That means total anonymity. All data is encrypted using a 2048-bit key a technology similar to the one used for bank transactions but even better. It all happens on your computer, and even if someone lays hand on your data, they won’t be able to decipher it without a SmartFlash itself. You can use an additional pin-code that is impossible to track if you use a mouse to enter it. Losing your Flashsafe is like losing your bank card: the device is blocked while you get a new one and continue to use it. A "trusted computer" function lets you use your SmartFlash only on your devices.

Want to share a song you like with a friend? Or show a presentation to your boss? Add your colleague or a friend to a list of trusted persons and share all the info or a selected folder. It’s that simple.


Flashsafe is a smart device that is upgraded just like your smartphone or PC. Our team is constantly looking for new ways to improve the opportunities provided by Flashsafe, making it comfortable to use, glitch-free and quick to embrace new functionality. In the near future, the following new functions will be introduced:

Hello! My name is Alexsey, we are creating a SmartFlash without login or password. Meet the members of our Flashsafe team:

Flashsafe co-founder and world's sexiest hacker

His skills in development of mobile applications help make using Flashsafe so easy and intuitive, whereas his experience in cloud technologies makes our device not only simple but safe as well.

Highly knowledgeable specialist with experience in development of various projects (such as five-fold growth of an e-store turnover). She is in charge of creating a sensible and concise strategy for development and scaling for international market.

Talented and famous founder of numerous creative projects. Let's go creative - that what Pavel say when we met first time.

Creative approach and attention to details combined with many years of experience in development and implementation of designs for projects of various degrees of complexity are the qualities possessed by our designer. For our project, he has created a stylish design that emphasizes the handy functionality of the device.

Risks and challenges

We dedicate all of our time to Flashsafe because we want all stages of production and distribution to be given a maximum amount of thought and care. We need your help for our final step! Your support will enable us to start volume production of Flashsafe. After that, we will be able to guarantee timely delivery and keep Flashsafe prices affordable to any customer. 

Currently our team is working on expanding the functionality of the device and on building productive relationships with our suppliers. We select as our partners only the companies with high reputation in terms of production quality and reliability of services. Currently we are collaborating with three factories in Samara, Russia. We are working closely with them in order to ensure impeccable quality of our products.

Writing about us? Check the press kit page or send email on press@flash.so
story_txt:
We are happy to announce that FLASHSAFE available on the official website! https://flash.so


Hello, I'm SmartFlash. You might think that you are looking at an ordinary flash drive, but that couldn’t be further from the truth. Never before did users have a data storage device so simple and so safe at the same time. Through your personal Flashsafe, you get an access to a super-secure unlimited cloud storage. It’s very simple: you don’t need to sign up and enter your login/password, you don’t even need a web browser! Now you can store and share files of any size anonymously and safely. You will no longer need to go through all this authorization procedure. 
Simply connect your Flashsafe to your computer and start working, 
playing, listening to music or watching films. We took great care and 
effort to make Flashsafe easy to use: each time hardware authorization 
chip creates new passwords that are impossible to break. Thus, not a 
second of your time is lost .Insert your SmartFlash in your computer and gain access to a file storage with unlimited ability to upload and download data. Always.
We are glad to introduce Smartflash 4G cellular
Use SmartFlash 4G anywhere on the planet to store your files with no limit and with no need to enter login/password or sign up. - just insert a SIM card into your SmartFlash 4G and use a 2048-bit secure connection to transfer and store your data directly from the server.  SmartFlash 4G cellular works with all the operators all over the world and makes your data storage as safe as noone else can do. Never run out of memory till you have the SmartFlash 4G with you! Pre-Order just for $65 (35% off from the initial price $99)
We take stored data security to a whole new level! Nobody will ever know what data you are keeping, because your files are not linked to your personal information on our servers. That means total anonymity. All data is encrypted using a 2048-bit key a technology similar to the one used for bank transactions but even better. It all happens on your computer, and even if someone lays hand on your data, they won’t be able to decipher it without a SmartFlash itself. You can use an additional pin-code that is impossible to track if you use a mouse to enter it. Losing your Flashsafe is like losing your bank card: the device is blocked while you get a new one and continue to use it. A "trusted computer" function lets you use your SmartFlash only on your devices.



Want to share a song you like with a friend? Or show a presentation to your boss? Add your colleague or a friend to a list of trusted persons and share all the info or a selected folder. It’s that simple.



Flashsafe is a smart device that is upgraded just like your smartphone or PC. Our team is constantly looking for new ways to improve the opportunities provided by Flashsafe, making it comfortable to use, glitch-free and quick to embrace new functionality. In the near future, the following new functions will be introduced:

 My name is Alexsey, we are creating a SmartFlash without login or password. Meet the members of our Flashsafe team:

 skills in development of mobile applications help make using Flashsafe 
so easy and intuitive, whereas his experience in cloud technologies 
makes our device not only simple but safe as well.

 knowledgeable specialist with experience in development of various 
projects (such as five-fold growth of an e-store turnover). She is in 
charge of creating a sensible and concise strategy for development and 
scaling for international market.

Talented and famous founder of numerous creative projects. Let's go creative - that what Pavel say when we met first time.

Creative
 approach and attention to details combined with many years of 
experience in development and implementation of designs for projects of 
various degrees of complexity are the qualities possessed by our 
designer. For our project, he has created a stylish design that 
emphasizes the handy functionality of the device.
Risks and challenges
We dedicate all of our time to Flashsafe because we want all stages of production and distribution to be given a maximum amount of thought and care. We need your help for our final step! Your support will enable us to start volume production of Flashsafe. After that, we will be able to guarantee timely delivery and keep Flashsafe prices affordable to any customer. 
Currently our team is working on expanding the functionality of the device and on building productive relationships with our suppliers. We select as our partners only the companies with high reputation in terms of production quality and reliability of services. Currently we are collaborating with three factories in Samara, Russia. We are working closely with them in order to ensure impeccable quality of our products. 









Writing about us? Check the press kit page or send email on press@flash.so

story:
HOW IT WORKS

 

 

The iMoney is very comfortable to use, one of its strengths is its simplicity. No mechanical components are used since it is totally magnetic, single hand operated.

iMoney has a fan-shaped opening and its magnets never touch the cards. iMoney is safe and doesn't demagnetized cards: GUARANTEED.

It is safe because the aluminum protects our cards and documents from illegal data theft – called RFID Scanning.

 

The magnetic modular design attracted a lot of attention because of its versatility. You can choose to remove some of the components of the wallets if you don’t plan to carry that much for example when you are going for a jog around the park. At other times when you need to fill up your wallet, just snap back on all the pieces of the wallet.

 The iMoney wallet includes an  built-in wallet tracking feature. You pair your smartphone to the wallet via Bluetooth and should you misplace your wallet, you can use the included app to help track it. You can even make the wallet emit a ring to help you find it. The tracking function works both ways. Should you misplace your phone, you can use your wallet to activate your phone’s ringing. You also get an alert on your phone if the wallet is separated out of Bluetooth range.

The money clip is located on the inside of the wallet. The advantage of this is that your cash is not exposed which is good.

PRODUCT AND DESIGN

The main strengths of iMoney are design, practicality, lightness and elegance.

We managed to build a unique product that collects all in one wallet. iMoney is unique, durable and lightweight.

iMoney is an exclusive product in line with current fashion trends.

MANUFACTURING

iMoney is made of aluminum, a material used in aviation-aerospace field.

In recent decades, many materials have been developed to achieve high performances, particularly in the aeronautical and aerospace industry, where these materials have to work in usual critical conditions.

In aeronautics-aerospace field the most important mechanical properties required are:

  • High Strength
  • High Fracture Toughness
  • Fatigue Resistance
  • Corrosion Resistance
  • Low Density
  • Resistance to High Temperatures
  • High Creep Resistance (at Low Temperature)

iMoney was own realized with this valuable material for durability

The selected aluminum to build iMoney is the AA 6000 series which is basically used to have better corrosion resistance, good mechanical properties and high yield

iMoney is built using precision CNC milling from a single aluminum block.

Each piece is then blasted with glass beads, this is a handmade process.

Subsequently undergoes an Anodic oxidation process.

The anodizing is an electrochemical process not spontaneous whereby a protective oxide layer occurs on the metal’s surface and protects it from corrosion.  The material’s layer size is 15 µm, thickness commonly adopted for items outdoors exposed.

The aim of treatment is to:

  • improving material corrosion resistance;     
  • increase surface hardness;
  • increase wear and abrasion resistance;
  • provide thermal insulation;
  • aesthetics

After making the surface treatments,  graphics are directly printed on aluminum, we use two techniques that make graphics indelible and not subject to wear

  • Laser engraving: the technique of engraving with laser beam, offers many advantages, among which an indelible marking, anti-counterfeiting, precision, even with very reduced dimensions

To build iMoney we used advanced materials and process techniques.

 

SPECIFICATION

Length: 4,52 inches - 115 mm

Width: 2,36 inches - 60 mm

Weight: From 1,48 OZ - From 42 grams

 

RFID-BLOCKING

With respect to traditional wallets,  aluminum made iMoney protects our papers and documents from illegal theft of data – process called RFID-Scanning.

RFID-Scanning (RFID = Radio Frequency Identification) occurs when our personal data, more and more stored in new cards and passports chips, are scanned illegally.

In this case, the data stored in our personal cards are detected and read by handheld scanners, located at short distance . These devices can extract our data even from traditional bags, jackets or pants pockets.

Since iMoney is made by aluminum, it keeps away radio waves that could scan our information, blocking in this way this process and protecting our data.

iMoney in addition to protection from RFID rays offers two additional protective functions: in fact it protects against demagnetization and physical shock.

The iMoney  realization in aluminum protects cards from electromagnetic radiation and the demagnetization, which can arise not only from phones and other mobile devices, but also by magnets.

With respect to traditional wallets in leather or other materials, iMoney protects also the contents from damage, such as dents, cracks or damage caused by weather factors such as snow, rain, sand and fluids.

This is the reason why iMoney combines safety with small dimensions.

 

STORY

Hello to Everyone, my name is Marco and I live in Italy. I’m 39 old and I have a Dream!

I’d like to present my project: iMoney a made in Italy wallet, easy to use and very intuitive

You can configure it accordingly to your needs very quickly, increasing or decreasing the elements on which is composed; it is a wallet without any limits

iMoney wallet includes an built-in wallet tracking feature

I decided to made in aluminum because in this way it’s possible block the RFID scanning, make safe and secure the codes of your cards

Guys, I can guarantees that myself and my team have considered iMoney in details; iMoney is nice and helpful, I decided to made it thin to make it invisible in your pocket pants and we have succeeded.

Thanks You

The CHALLENGE

The biggest challenge has been to offer a product with a Design, safe and manufactured with technologically advanced tools.

We succeeded!

We can provide you iMoney on schedule, we have studied all production processes in detail without neglecting anything. The iMoney on the video is not a prototype, but the final product fully operational.

Thanks you for your confidence in us.

story:
ENGLISH | ITALIANO


Our Story

SOUL WOOD was born from an idea of two guys with the passion for fashion, with the intention to create a new eco-friendly product.
So we decided to engage us in the eco-friendly fashion industry that combine attention to details, new trends and environmental protection.
One day Manuel was reading an article about "Start up, sustainability and youth entrepreneurship". Some minutes later he was calling to London where Diego listened the suggest and he was persuaded. Soul Wood began.
The attention for the environment has become a main component that the new business must include in the creation of all products.


The Campaign

We decided to take up this work on IndieGoGo because with your help we can start production of our "Season Edition" Wooden Watch, 100% natural, hypoallergenic with Swiss movement. Thanks to your help we will develop and create a new model.

We believe that through this channel we can reduce the cost of development, production and marketing. We want to offer a great product at a fair price.

Your contribution will help us create a solid startup and to establish an effective partnership with the supply chain.


Our Watches: "Season Edition"

Summer - for Man

Classic model with simple lines and sporty essence.

The light color of the Wood gives a perfect feeling of freedom and serenity for the wearer.

Diameter: 40mm

Thickness: 11mm

Weight: 52gr

Wood: Maple Wood

Water resistance: Splashproof

Movement: Swiss, quartz, Ronda AG CH-4415 Lausen/Switzerland Cal. 515


Autumn - for Man

Model that gives the wearer an elegant and confident look and connects the features of traditional watches and modern eco-fashion.

Diameter: 40mm

Thickness: 11mm

Weight: 52gr

Wood: Black Sandal Wood

Water resistance: Splashproof

Movement: Swiss, quartz, Ronda AG CH-4415 Lausen/Switzerland Cal. 515


Winter - for Woman

It has a warm colored and extremely elegant essence, with a chic and refined halo, sometimes sophisticated.

Diameter: 37mm

Thickness: 9mm

Weight: 50gr

Wood: Red Sandal Wood

Water resistance: Splashproof

Movement: Swiss, quartz, Ronda AG CH-4415 Lausen/Switzerland Cal. 505


Spring - for Woman

The main quality of this essence is giving the wearer the immediate desire for lightness, comfort and convenience.

Diameter: 37mm

Thickness: 9mm

Weight: 50gr

Wood: Maple Wood

Water resistance: Splashproof

Movement: Swiss, quartz, Ronda AG CH-4415 Lausen/Switzerland Cal. 505


The New Model - LOCKED

Two watches of the new model (Chinook and Apeliote) will be unlocked only when we reach the stretch goal of 100.000€ and if you help us go even further towards the next stretch goal of 150.000€ you can unlock two more models (Khamsin and Zèfiro)

New Model: Khamsin (for Man) - LOCKED

Its rounded shape and light wood make it the perfect accessory to wear on a cheerful day.

Diameter: 40mm

Thickness: 9mm

Strap Width: 20mm

Wood: Maple Wood

Water resistance: Splashproof

Movement: Swiss, quartz, Ronda AG CH-4415 Lausen/Switzerland Cal. 515


New Model: Chinook (for Man) - LOCKED

The simple design gives a touch of lightness to an elegant color like black sandalwood. 

Diameter: 40mm

Thickness: 9mm

Strap Width: 20mm

Wood: Sandalwood

Water resistance: Splashproof

Movement: Swiss, quartz, Ronda AG CH-4415 Lausen/Switzerland Cal. 515


New Model: Zéfiro (for Woman) - LOCKED

The soft curves and the thin strap perfectly accompany light colors for a comfortable and lightweight look.

Diameter: 34mm

Thickness: 8.5mm

Strap Width: 15mm

Wood: Maple Wood

Water resistance: Splashproof

Movement: Swiss, quartz, Ronda AG CH-4415 Lausen/Switzerland Cal. 505


New Model: Apeliote (for Woman) - LOCKED

Its sleek design allows you to wear, on several occasions, an intense color as the red sandalwood.

Diameter: 34mm

Thickness: 8.5mm

Strap Width: 15mm

Wood: Red Sandal Wood

Water resistance: Splashproof

Movement: Swiss, quartz, Ronda AG CH-4415 Lausen/Switzerland Cal. 505


Stretch Goals

Reach 50.000€

  • Screwdriver to regulate the strap
  • Additional wooden links for the strap

Reach 100.000€

  • More elegant box with refined design
  • Unlock Chinook and Apeliote, two of our new models for man and woman

Reach 150.000€

  • Unlock Khamsin and Zèfiro, two of our new models for man and woman

Reach 200.000€

  • All our watches will be shipped with Sapphire Glass instead of mineral glass for a more robust and scratch resistant watch


Customizations

We can create backplate with customized text and symbols from our catalog:


Here you can see an example of a customized backplate


We can also create customized backplate using a logo, a photo or a vectorized image. Remember to choose the right perk (Fully customized backplate)
Here there are a pair of examples:


Other Ways You Can Help

Share  this page on Facebook, Twitter and other social network!

Every share is important to us.


Timeline



Risks & Challenges

If we don't reach the goal of 25.000€ of the campaign for launching the production, you will be paid back. The only risk will be a delay in production. We are working with the best factories to ensure a reliable production but we are also customers, so we are dependent on these factories.

Warranty

All products are warranted to be free from defects in materials or workmanship for one year from the date of purchase. 

Within this period, we will, at our sole discretion, repair or replace any components that fail in normal use. Such repairs or replacement will be made at no charge to you for parts and/or labor, provided that you shall be responsible for any transportation charges.  Replacement products may be new or refurbished at our discretion.

This warranty does not apply to: (i) cosmetic damage, such as scratches, nicks, stains and dents; (ii) consumable parts, such as batteries, unless product damage has occurred due to a defect in materials or workmanship; (iii) damage caused by accident, abuse, misuse, water (in excess of specifications), flood, fire, or other acts of nature or external causes; (iv) damage caused by service performed by anyone who is not an authorized service provider of SOUL WOOD.

Repairs have a ninety (90) day warranty.  If the unit sent in is still under its original warranty, then the new warranty will be the longer of ninety (90) days.


__________________________________________________________________________



La Storia

SOUL WOOD nasce dall’idea di due ragazzi, con la passione per la moda e la voglia di creare un prodotto fashion ed ecosostenibile. Dall’unione di queste due spinte abbiamo deciso di impegnarci nel nuovo campo dell’eco-fashion che racchiude la cura del dettaglio e delle nuove tendenze e l’attenzione alla salvaguardia dell’ambiente.

Un lunedì mattina l'occhio di Manuel cade su una pagina del quotidiano: "Start up, sostenibilità, imprese giovanili". La mente inizia a macinare e parte la telefonata in direttissima a Londra, dove un dubbioso Diego che ascolta la proposta concitata di Manuel e l'idea lo colpisce, può essere vincente. Dall'idea all'impresa il passo è breve: E così inizia Soul Wood.

L’attenzione all’ambiente è diventata una caratteristica che le nuove aziende devono considerare e soprattutto prendere come punto estremamente centrale ed importante nella creazione dei loro prodotti. 


La Campagna

Abbiamo deciso di intraprendere questa impresa su IndieGoGo perchè con il vostro aiuto potremo avviare la produzione dei nostri Orologi in Legno 100% naturale, ipoallergenico con movimento svizzero "Season Edition". Inoltre ci aiuterete a sostenere lo sviluppo e la creazione di un nuovo modello.
Crediamo che attraverso questo canale potremo abbattere i costi di sviluppo, realizzazione e marketing per potervi offrire un grande prodotto ad un prezzo equo.
Il vostro contributo ci aiuterà a creare una solida startup e ad instaurare un efficace collaborazione con la filiera produttiva.

I Nostri Orologi "Season Edition"


Summer - per Uomo
Modello classico dalle linee semplici e dall'essenza sportiva.
Il colore chiaro del legno conferisce una perfetta sensazione di libertà e di serenità per chi lo indossa.
Diametro: 40mm
Spessore: 11mm
Peso: 52gr
Legno: Acero
Resistenza all'acqua: Splashproof
Movimento: svizzero, al quarzo, Ronda AG CH-4415 Lausen/Switzerland Cal. 515


Autumn - per Uomo

Modello che conferisce a chi lo indossa un aria elegante e sicura di sé accomunando le caratteristiche degli orologi più tradizionali alla novità dell' eco-fashion.

Diametro: 40mm

Spessore: 11mm

Peso: 52gr

Legno: Sandalo Nero

Resistenza all'acqua: Splashproof

Movimento: svizzero, al quarzo, Ronda AG CH-4415 Lausen/Switzerland Cal. 515


Winter - per Donna

Si tratta di un essenza dal colore caldo ed estremamente elegante. Un aura chic e raffinata, a tratti aristocratica.

Diametro: 37mm

Spessore: 9mm

Peso: 50gr

Legno: Sandalo Rosso

Resistenza all'acqua: Splashproof

Movimento: svizzero, al quarzo, Ronda AG CH-4415 Lausen/Switzerland Cal. 505


Spring - per Donna

La principale qualità che quest'essenza conferisce è per chi lo indossa l'immediata voglia di leggerezza, comodità e praticità.

Diametro: 37mm

Spessore: 9mm

Peso: 50gr

Legno: Acero

Resistenza all'acqua: Splashproof

Movimento: svizzero, al quarzo, Ronda AG CH-4415 Lausen/Switzerland Cal. 505


Il Nuovo Modello - BLOCCATO

Due orologi in un nuovo modello (Chinook e Apeliote) saranno sbloccati al raggiungimento di 100.000€ e se ci aiuterete a raggiungere il target successivo di 150.000€ potrete sbloccare altri due modelli (Khamsin e Zèfiro)


Nuovo Modello: Khamsin (per Uomo) - BLOCCATO

La sua forma tondeggiante ed il legno chiaro lo rendono l'accessorio perfetto da indossare nelle giornate più soleggiate.

Diametro: 40mm

Spessore: 9mm

Larghezza Cinturino: 20mm

Legno: Maple Wood

Resistenza all'acqua: Splashproof

Movimento: swiss, quartz, Ronda AG CH-4415 Lausen/Switzerland Cal. 515

Nuovo Modello: Chinook (per Uomo) - BLOCCATO

Dal design semplice dà un tocco di leggerezza ad un colore elegante come il nero del sandalo.

Diametro: 40mm

Spessore: 9mm

Larghezza Cinturino: 20mm

Legno: Sandalo nero

Resistenza all'acqua: Splashproof

Movimento: swiss, quartz, Ronda AG CH-4415 Lausen/Switzerland Cal. 515

Nuovo Modello: Zéfiro (per Donna) - BLOCCATO

Le curve morbide e il sottile cinturino accompagnano perfettamente i colori chiari per un look comodo e leggero.

Diametro: 34mm

Spessore: 8.5mm

Larghezza Cinturino: 15mm

Legno: Maple Wood

Resistenza all'acqua: Splashproof

Movimento: swiss, quartz, Ronda AG CH-4415 Lausen/Switzerland Cal. 505

Nuovo Modello: Apeliote (per Donna) - BLOCCATO

Il suo design raffinato permette di indossare, in diverse occasioni, un colore intenso come il sandalo rosso.

Diametro: 34mm

Spessore: 8.5mm

Larghezza Cinturino: 15mm

Legno: Red Sandal Wood

Resistenza all'acqua: Splashproof

Movimento: swiss, quartz, Ronda AG CH-4415 Lausen/Switzerland Cal. 505


Bonus

Con 50.000€

  • Spingiperno o cacciavite per la regolazione del cinturino in autonomia
  • Maglie aggiuntive in legno del cinturino

Con 100.000€

  • Confezione più elegante e raffinata
  • Sblocca Chinook e Apeliote, due nuovi modelli per uomo e donna

Con 150.000€

  • Sblocca Khamsin e Zèfiro, due nuovi modelli per uomo e donna

Con 200.000€

  • Tutti gli orologi saranno spediti con Sapphire glass invece del mineral glass per orologi più robusti e resistenti ai graffi.


Personalizzazioni
Possiamo creare fondelli (backplate) personalizzati con testi e simboli dal nostro catalogo:


Un esempio di fondello personalizzato:

Possiamo anche creare fondelli personalizzati usando loghi, foto o immagini vettoriali. Ricordati di selezionare la perk corretta (Fully customized backplate)

Ecco alcuni esempi:


Altri modi in cui puoi aiutarci

Condividi questa pagina su Facebook, Twitter e gli altri social network!

Ogni condivisione è importante per noi.


Timeline

Rischi d'Impresa

Se non riuscissimo a raggiungere l'obbiettivo di 25.000€ della campagna per la produzione degli orologi sarete rimborsati.
L'unico rischio è un ritardo nella produzione.
Stiamo lavorando con le migliori fabbriche per garantirvi una produzione affidabile ma siamo a nostra volta clienti e dipendiamo da loro.

Garanzia

Tutti i prodotti sono garantiti privi di difetti di produzione per un anno dalla data di vendita.

Entro questo periodo ripareremo o sostituiremo componenti danneggiati dal normale funzionamento. Queste riparazioni o sostituzioni saranno effettuate gratuitamente per parti di ricambio o lavorazioni. Il cliente è responsabile delle spese di trasporto. I prodotti sostituiti possono essere nuovi o ricondizionati a nostra discrezione.

Questa garanzia non si applica a: (i) danni cosmetici, graffi, scheggiature, macchie o ammaccature; (ii) parti di ricambio, ad esempio batterie, a meno che il danno al prodotto non sia dovuto a un difetto di materiale o fabbricazione; (iii) danno causato da incidente, abuso, uso improprio, acqua (oltre il limite specificato), allagamento, incendio o altre cause naturali od esterne; (iv) danni causati da interventi effettuati da un servizio non autorizzato da SOUL WOOD.

Le riparazioni hanno novanta (90) giorni di garanzia. Se l'unità inviata è ancora nella sua garanzia originale la nuova garanzia sarà allungata di novanta (90) giorni.
story_txt:
ENGLISH | ITALIANO







Our Story
SOUL WOOD was born from an idea of two guys with the passion for fashion, with the intention to create a new eco-friendly product.
So we decided to engage us in the eco-friendly fashion industry that combine attention to details, new trends and environmental protection.
One day Manuel was reading an article about "Start up, sustainability and youth entrepreneurship". Some minutes later he was calling to London where Diego listened the suggest and he was persuaded. Soul Wood began.
The attention for the environment has become a main component that the new business must include in the creation of all products.
The Campaign

We decided to take up this work on IndieGoGo because with your help we can start production of our "Season Edition" Wooden Watch, 100% natural, hypoallergenic with Swiss movement. Thanks to your help we will develop and create a new model.
We believe that through this channel we can reduce the cost of development, production and marketing. We want to offer a great product at a fair price.
Your contribution will help us create a solid startup and to establish an effective partnership with the supply chain.

Timeline







Risks & ChallengesIf we don't reach the goal of 25.000€ of the campaign for launching the production, you will be paid back. The only risk will be a delay in production. We are working with the best factories to ensure a reliable production but we are also customers, so we are dependent on these factories.
WarrantyAll products are warranted to be free from defects in materials or workmanship for one year from the date of purchase. Within this period, we will, at our sole discretion, repair or replace any components that fail in normal use. Such repairs or replacement will be made at no charge to you for parts and/or labor, provided that you shall be responsible for any transportation charges.  Replacement products may be new or refurbished at our discretion.
This warranty does not apply to: (i) cosmetic damage, such as scratches, nicks, stains and dents; (ii) consumable parts, such as batteries, unless product damage has occurred due to a defect in materials or workmanship; (iii) damage caused by accident, abuse, misuse, water (in excess of specifications), flood, fire, or other acts of nature or external causes; (iv) damage caused by service performed by anyone who is not an authorized service provider of SOUL WOOD.
Repairs have a ninety (90) day warranty.  If the unit sent in is still under its original warranty, then the new warranty will be the longer of ninety (90) days.









__________________________________________________________________________


La Storia





SOUL WOOD nasce dall’idea di due ragazzi, con la passione per la moda
e la voglia di creare un prodotto fashion ed ecosostenibile.
Dall’unione di queste due spinte abbiamo deciso di impegnarci nel nuovo
campo dell’eco-fashion che racchiude la cura del dettaglio e delle
nuove tendenze e l’attenzione alla salvaguardia dell’ambiente.

Un lunedì mattina l'occhio di Manuel cade su una pagina del quotidiano: "Start up,
sostenibilità, imprese giovanili". La mente inizia a macinare e parte la telefonata in direttissima a Londra, dove un dubbioso Diego che ascolta la proposta concitata
di Manuel e l'idea lo colpisce, può essere vincente. Dall'idea all'impresa il passo è breve: E così inizia
Soul Wood.
L’attenzione all’ambiente è diventata una caratteristica che le nuove
aziende devono considerare e soprattutto prendere come punto estremamente centrale ed importante nella creazione dei loro prodotti. 



La Campagna
Abbiamo deciso di intraprendere questa impresa su IndieGoGo perchè con il vostro aiuto potremo avviare la produzione dei nostri Orologi in Legno 100% naturale, ipoallergenico con movimento svizzero "Season Edition". Inoltre ci aiuterete a sostenere lo sviluppo e la creazione di un nuovo modello.
Crediamo che attraverso questo canale potremo abbattere i costi di sviluppo, realizzazione e marketing per potervi offrire un grande prodotto ad un prezzo equo.
Il vostro contributo ci aiuterà a creare una solida startup e ad instaurare un efficace collaborazione con la filiera produttiva.

story:
We are Silver Shield. Our aim is to pave the way for the new every-day face mask. We are using silver, a natural anti-bacterial agent in the creation of the Silver Shield. Silver helps to eliminate any harsh odours whilst also contributing towards a healthier breathing environment. We wear masks to protect those around us, but our aim was to create a mask that also had anti-bacterial properties.

We have infused each mask with nano-silver particles. Nano-silver release’s ions that slow down the growth of bacteria and fungi. As a result, nano-silver kills viruses and bacteria, making it a vital attribute for our future every-day face mask.

We use a thin, light, economical high-performance fabric with superior wicking for a cool, dry, and fresh feel. The Silver Shield is engineered for ultimate comfort. The mask is made with extremely breathable, soft, stretchy, and durable fabric which uses premium hydrophobic fibres.

The Silver Shield is the answer to everyday mask wear. The infused silver lining helps control bad odours and create a long-lasting freshness without the use of harsh toxic chemicals.

 

Silver Shield is not like your ordinary face mask. If you ever needed more reason to join the Silver Shield family, take a look at some of its fantastic features:

 

Each one of our masks is hand crafted to the utmost quality. We are asking for the help of our future backers today to assist in the mass production of the Silver Shield line so we can supply our anti-bacterial product worldwide.

Each mask is also embroidered with high quality thread to give it a sleek exterior. We want to stress the embroidery detail will not deter the effects of the silver infused lining.

 

 

We live in a world where face masks have become the “new normal”. As we adjust to new life in the world of a global pandemic our face masks have become our new and most reliable accessory. Whether you are nipping out the shops, working in the public sector or using public transport – wearing your face mask is a necessity.

We made it our aim to create a mask that is suitable for everyone, whilst helping fight against bacteria and harsh toxins. With 9 colour variations and two universal sizes there is sure to be a Silver Shield suitable for everyone.

 

A huge motive behind our campaign was to contribute towards a happy, healthier planet. Disposable masks have been hugely damaging to the environment so we made it our aim to ensure we created a durable mask that can be used again and again.

But why did we choose silver? Let us explain it’s inspiring benefits:

 

The silver properties we use for our masks are a naturally occurring element. There are no chemicals and no toxicity for the wearer, so you can use your Silver Shield freely, knowing you aren’t at risk of breathing in any harsh toxins. 

Silver is one of the safest and benign substances known around the world.

Disposable masks can be rough on your skin causing breakouts and soreness particularly if you suffer from sensitive skin.

The material used to create Silver Shield are non-sensitizing, and non-irritating to human skin.

Disposable masks are extremely harmful to the environment. We ensured that the Silver Shield uses eco-friendly material that is reusable so you can wear your mask between washes again and again.

Each mask is hand-crafted with durable long-lasting material to ensure you get lots of use out of your mask.

Our face mask can be washed at 30°C and uses durable material that stays intact after every wash!

 

As mentioned previously, your Silver Shield is reusable! Not only will your Silver Shield protect you and others around you, but also contributes to a happy, healthier world. What’s not to love?

 

We are pleased to announce we have made Silver Shield in two universal sizes. We have both adult and child size available. We recommend that the child size mask is suitable for the ages 3-11 years old. 

 

If you choose to back the Silver Shield, you will receive your choice of:

Why stop at just one Silver Shield? We have a number of fantastic bundles for you to choose from. Each bundle has extra discount on top of the RRP. Choose from:

 

Risks and challenges

We take pride in our strong manufacturing plan and supply chain in place, and we will work quickly and concisely to meet our delivery goals. Unforeseen production delays are always a real possibility specifically during recent times with COVID-19. We take great care over our team here and will take all necessary steps to ensure they are always working in a safe environment. However, we promise that you will always have our full disclosure should any delays occur. Communicating with you in a timely manner and ensuring the earliest possible delivery of a high-quality product will always be our top priorities.

Reusability and recyclability

We use eco-friendly and recyclable packaging. The Silver Shield is a reusable face mask that can be washed and worn over again.

Sustainable materials

Our packaging is both eco-friendly and recyclable.
