story:
Our Story

Glasses (spectacles) have been around since the 13th century, and are still not perfect after 800 years.

Just like many of you, we wear glasses too. Just like you, we keep pushing our glasses back into place when we perspire or move. We use elastic specs bands or ear stoppers to keep our glasses in place, which make it difficult to wipe our perspiration. We felt we had to do something about it as we users of glasses, deserve better. It is time for a better design!

Tapping into our experience in the optical and medical devices research & development industries, we worked on designing and engineering our spectacles frame especially for freedom. We focused on simplifying the ways of getting our glasses frame to stay securely on the face during movement and perspiration while ensuring it is easy to remove, light in weight, durable and gives users the best possible comfort and freedom ever. After months of effort, we are thrilled to bring to you:

vOOk Freedom

Probably the Most Secure Comfy Glasses Ever!

Taste freedom with vOOk Freedom. The secret to freedom is at the tips of our spectacles frame!

 

Features and Benefits of vOOk Freedom

Each vOOk Freedom frame comes integrated with a pair of our patent-pending world’s first secure comfy Temple Grips. Designed by one of our founders in Singapore, the Temple Grips’ unique smart design help keep vOOk Freedom in place and yet easy to use. Say goodbye to cumbersome add-on accessories such as elastic specs bands and ear stoppers.

The Temple Grip’s unique smart design allows a pair of them to form an anti-compression suspension grip system that minimises slippage and keeps vOOk Freedom in place on you when you move or perspire. As vOOk Freedom stays in position, it also helps to reduce myopia and hyperopia progression.

 

Made of hypoallergenic elastomer, the anti-compression Temple Grips are ultra-light and gentle on ears. These qualities make it comfortable to wear vOOk Freedom for long hours and under headgear.

vOOk Freedom frames come with a high-quality build. We work with a very experienced and long-time manufacturer of high-end glasses to produce vOOk Freedom frames that are well-crafted, beautifully finished and stylish.

To make vOOk Freedom frames even better, we chose to use a high-tech Swiss polyamide from a world market leading Swiss manufacturer, to bring high-performance stylish eyewear into the everyday lives of users. The high-tech high-performance Swiss polyamide makes our frames durable, impact-resistant, scratch-resistant, high-flex tolerant and ultra-light! It is also more durable and lighter than the other commonly used materials in the market such as acetate and polycarbonate.

 

vOOk Freedom is Suitable for Whom?

vOOk Freedom is especially great for active people who do sports/exercise, or with active lifestyles. Leave your hands free to focus on what you want to do; Do sports or exercise, run about carrying kids, carry packages, cook for your loved ones, do gardening and so much more!

 

Let's Bring More Freedom to All Users of Glasses

We ask for your support to bring vOOk Freedom to the world.  We have an actual working product, ready for mass production. All we need now is your backing to start manufacturing.

You can also help us by spreading the word and sharing about vOOk Freedom with your family, friends, colleagues and others.

 

Choice Frames

vOOk Freedom is the go-to frame for active people and is available in the following styles, colours and sizes. Our frames are suitable for users who wear glasses with temple lengths of between 135mm to 145mm.

Please note that there may be a slight variation of colours for the actual frames from the colours shown in the photographs due to the photography lighting or manufacturing process.

 

How to Choose Your Frames

First, check and take note of the numbers printed on the inside of the temple of your current glasses frame. For example:

If the numbers cannot be seen, here is a guide to take all the measurements:

If this is your first pair of glasses in your life or you want to try a new frame shape, we suggest choosing the frame shape that complements your face shape.

  • Round frame: Best suited for all face shapes except for round, heart and triangle face shapes
  • Rectangle frame: Best suited for round, heart and triangle face shapes.

 

Choice Lenses

Should you need lenses, you have the option of choice performance lenses from Shamir, a leading well-known lens brand. Their prescription lenses come with multi-coating and its numerous capabilities including the anti-refractive and anti-UV qualities.

The choice Shamir lenses are available in these options:

Lens Index

SPH range

CYL range

Type of Lens Available

1.56

+2.00D to -4.00D

Up to -2.00D

Prescription only

1.6

+3.00D to -6.00D

Up to -2.00D

Prescription with

anti-blue light coating.

Please note that the offered prescription range only corrects astigmatism up to (CYL) -2.00.

We recommend getting the prescription lenses with the anti-blue light coating, which is the Shamir Blue Zero prescription lenses, to protect your visual health especially for users who spend a lot of time looking at digital screens on e.g. computers and mobile phones. The anti-blue light coating helps to reduce our eyes’ exposure to blue light and the symptoms of digital eye strain and general health issues.

For more information on the benefits and capabilities of the Shamir Blue Zero prescription lenses, you can refer to:   https://www.shamirlens.com/products/materials-p...

If you need to custom make lenses outside of these ranges, just email us for a discussion at care@vookvision.com with the email subject header ‘custom lens enquiries’. We could explore your requests to see how we can assist, and if Indiegogo has a payment option to cater to special requests.

In order to provide you with choice quality lenses, in addition to the perks paid for by you, we will be reimbursing SGD45 to SGD70 to our optometry partner for your lenses.

 

Eyesight Prescription

For better eyesight and to receive the appropriate and correct lenses, please get your eyes checked by an optometrist to obtain a valid and up-to-date prescription. It is your responsibility to ensure your prescription is valid and according to your local laws. It is also your responsibility to input and submit the correct prescription as your prescription lenses provided to you are based on the information submitted by you to us.

The prescription from your optometrist will look something like this and these are the same information we need from you:

Prescription

For those residing in Singapore who need an eye check to obtain a prescription, you can visit our very experienced and licensed optometry partner in Singapore. There is a special prior negotiated small fee of SGD25 for the eye check, of which we have no share of, to be paid directly to our partner. All you have to do is to show your Indiegogo order to our partner to be eligible for this special rate. We will pass you our partner's contact details after our campaign closes successfully.

 

Frame Fitting Guide

Should you be fitting the frames on you yourself, we will provide a written or video guide later to show you how to fit the frames on yourself.

 

Confirmation Survey

We will contact Indiegogo Backers after the campaign closes successfully, to request for prescriptions and to reconfirm contact details for shipping purposes.

 

Note to Backers with Delivery Addresses in Singapore

We are not able to cater to self-collections for frames-only orders (frames with no lenses) at the moment. Frames-only orders will be couriered to you.

For backers who ordered full sets of glasses (vOOk Freedom + lenses), you have to personally collect them from our licensed optometry partner due to laws and regulations in Singapore. Collections will be based on available fixed time slots. We will inform you of the location when the full set of glasses are ready for collection. Our partner has also kindly agreed to offer a free one-off frame fitting service during the collection if you need some help with frame fittings.

 

Join Us & Help Bring Better Glasses to the World!

Come join us on this fulfilling journey! We ask for your support and backing to make vOOk Freedom a reality so that users of glasses can have it better.

You can also help us by sharing about vOOk Freedom with your family, friends and on your messaging apps and social media. Use Indiegogo’s social media sharing tools to spread the word!

Bulk Sale

We are open to exploring distributorship, wholesale and resells/retail partnerships in future. Contact:  teamup@vookvision.com.

 

Enquiries and Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)

Kindly refer to the FAQs first, before sending you your enquiries. We will update the FAQs as we go along.

 

With gratitude and appreciation,

Dan, Jon & Gel

Founders of vOOk Vision.
story_txt:
Our StoryGlasses (spectacles) have been around since the 13th century, and are still not perfect after 800 years.Just like many of you, we wear glasses too. Just like you, we keep pushing our glasses back into place when we perspire or move. We use elastic specs bands or ear stoppers to keep our glasses in place, which make it difficult to wipe our perspiration. We felt we had to do something about it as we users of glasses, deserve better. It is time for a better design!Tapping into our experience in the optical and medical devices research & development industries, we worked on designing and engineering our spectacles frame especially for freedom. We focused on simplifying the ways of getting our glasses frame to stay securely on the face during movement and perspiration while ensuring it is easy to remove, light in weight, durable and gives users the best possible comfort and freedom ever. After months of effort, we are thrilled to bring to you:vOOk FreedomProbably the Most Secure Comfy Glasses Ever!Taste freedom with vOOk Freedom. The secret to freedom is at the tips of our spectacles frame! Features and Benefits of vOOk FreedomEach vOOk Freedom frame comes integrated with a pair of our patent-pending world’s first secure comfy Temple Grips. Designed by one of our founders in Singapore, the Temple Grips’ unique smart design help keep vOOk Freedom in place and yet easy to use. Say goodbye to cumbersome add-on accessories such as elastic specs bands and ear stoppers.The Temple Grip’s unique smart design allows a pair of them to form an anti-compression suspension grip system that minimises slippage and keeps vOOk Freedom in place on you when you move or perspire. As vOOk Freedom stays in position, it also helps to reduce myopia and hyperopia progression.

 
Made of hypoallergenic elastomer, the anti-compression Temple Grips are ultra-light and gentle on ears. These qualities make it comfortable to wear vOOk Freedom for long hours and under headgear.vOOk Freedom frames come with a high-quality build. We work with a very experienced and long-time manufacturer of high-end glasses to produce vOOk Freedom frames that are well-crafted, beautifully finished and stylish.To make vOOk Freedom frames even better, we chose to use a high-tech Swiss polyamide from a world market leading Swiss manufacturer, to bring high-performance stylish eyewear into the everyday lives of users. The high-tech high-performance Swiss polyamide makes our frames durable, impact-resistant, scratch-resistant, high-flex tolerant and ultra-light! It is also more durable and lighter than the other commonly used materials in the market such as acetate and polycarbonate. vOOk Freedom is Suitable for Whom?vOOk Freedom is especially great for active people who do sports/exercise, or with active lifestyles. Leave your hands free to focus on what you want to do; Do sports or exercise, run about carrying kids, carry packages, cook for your loved ones, do gardening and so much more! Let's Bring More Freedom to All Users of GlassesWe ask for your support to bring vOOk Freedom to the world.  We have an actual working product, ready for mass production. All we need now is your backing to start manufacturing.You can also help us by spreading the word and sharing about vOOk Freedom with your family, friends, colleagues and others. Choice FramesvOOk Freedom is the go-to frame for active people and is available in the following styles, colours and sizes. story:
Fashion, meet Function

VIIIZE is designed to cover your eyes, nose, and mouth and offers safety and style to compliment your lifestyle.

Each face shield is designed to be worn like glasses and consists of a durable, lightweight, UV 400 protected lens that extends to the chin while allowing you to communicate with ease and breathe freely.

‘Wind guard.’ ‘Bug shield.’ ‘Snow cover.’ ‘Sun visor.’ Describe it as you may, VIIIZE is an accessory that complements your lifestyle. Go ahead, be fabulous.

 

Lightweight

VIIIZE Face Shields weigh only 90 grams – similar to most sunglasses; adding to its overall comfort. 

 

Durable

 Each lens is 2mm thick. Contrary to the large majority of shields currently available in the market, VIIIZE holds its shape which means it can endure even the toughest workout sessions.

 

UV Protected 

Each lens is crafted to offer protection against the harmful rays of the sun when enjoying outdoor activities all-year round. 

 

Available in a Variety of Colors  

VIIIZE face shields comes in a variety of colors. From our most popular product, Crystal – featuring a clear lens, to an all-black lens, a mirror effect lens, and even a technicolor lens to suit every style and preference.

 

Our Products

Each face shield is designed to be worn like glasses and consists of a durable, lightweight, UV 400 protected lens that extends to the chin while allowing you to communicate with ease and breathe freely.

Each pair features a lightweight, minimal-contact frame to complete the stylish look.

Crystal: Our most popular item. Crystal features a clear lens. 

 

Midnight - Limited Edition: features an all-black lens.

 

Prism  - Limited Edition: features a technicolor lens.

 

Shine: is true to its name and features a mirror-effect lens.

 

MEASUREMENTS
             Lens Height: 150 mm (5.9 in) 
             Lens Width: 172 mm (6.78 in) 
             Bridge: 19 mm (0.75 in) 
             Frame Width: 172 mm (6.78 in) 
             Arm Length: 140 mm (5.52 in)

SPECIFICATIONS
             Frame: PC
             Composite lens, UV400
             Non-Polarized
             Unisex
             Weight: 90 grams

 

VIIIZE, in real life

See how our clients integrate their VIIIZE Face Shields with their daily lives.

 

Your Support

We have developed the prototype and produced multiple limited batches to test the product. We are currently in the mass production stage and need your help to bring Viiize to the masses so everyone can experience safety, in style.

 

Risks & Challenges

Due to the impact on shipping providers and additional safety measures implemented, shipping times may encounter delays, however we will do our best to communicate progress and tracking information every step of the way.

 

Environmental commitments

Long-lasting design

The thick, yet lightweight frame offers stability and durability. Each lens is 2mm in thickness and has been stress-tested to maintain its shape under pressure and with daily wear. To extend the life of the product, clean the lens using mild liquid soap, lukewarm water, and a soft moist cloth. Allow the lens to dry naturally. Avoid abrasive cleaning products.

Reusability and recyclability

All packaging is recyclable.

Sustainable Distribution

Products are batched to optimize the load in each delivery vehicle by shipping as many items together as possible at the lowest emissions rate.

story:
Kamarg used to be the best selling Rucksack in Austria in the 50s and 60s, a trusted companion for adventurers. We now bring this classic back, protecting its timeless core while carefully adding the craft and sustainability of today. So smile and say hello to your new favourite bag.
 

High quality materials. Built to last.

 

We believe it’s time for a more sustainable approach to backpacks. We want Kamargs to last for decades just as the originals, that's why we use natural materials like sailcloth and leather and avoid plastic as much as possible. We assure longevity and higher durability by superior product design and more expensive materials like real leather.  

Durable simplicity

All Kamargs have a carrying system based on a patent first used to carry coal in the 1920s. It allows for a more even distribution of the weight, increasing comfort while reducing padding and additional weight of the backpack itself. And we think what worked so well to carry coal should work for your stuff, too. 
 

Finally water repellent

One thing we dramatically improved from the original was sailcloth. We made it fully water repellent while keeping its soft feel. So you can enjoy your Kamarg even on rainy days. 

Spacious while lightweight

Kamargs only weight 480g but are spacious enough for thicker books and your 15" Laptop. Their toploading opening is easy to reach. 

Repairs? Easy as pie.

If after years of good service, a part of a Kamarg breaks, it does not mean the end the of the joint adventure. Our product is designed to be easily repaired with replaceable straps, ropes and zippers that one will be able to order from our website. You can repair it yourself, ask your mum/dad or support a local repair shop.  

Ready for your adventure, wherever you are



 


 

 

  



Kamarg was founded in 1949 in Graz, Austria, with the aim to supply Austrian adventurers with high quality backpacks made of durable materials. The brand went on to become the best selling backpack in Austria in the 50s and 60s. In the 70ties Kamarg lost out to cheaper products from Asia and the the brand went into a deep sleep. It was in August 2013 when Franz came across a Kamarg backpack when cleaning out the attic of his parents’ house in Austria. He fell in love with the rucksack and since 2014 started to work on the project bringing in experts in design and production to help built a strong product in line with the original. 

They say it takes a village to raise a child, for us the support of many people truly helped us move forward. Thanks to all the Marketing Rockstar Academy attendants for helping sharping the ambition, Maria for pushing me back in the initial steps, Anne-Karin for supporting us with the trademark registration and fighting off ALDI, Matthias and Hannes for helping us find our production partner, Richard for the great product shots, Johannes for our great Kickstarter video, Michèle, Stefanie, Karoline, Martin, Christian for staring in it, Petra, Katrin and Andreas for helping with outreach and Lukas (LukeRoberts), Miriam (Herbert) and Stephanie (Ünique Skies) for all the advice and support for our Kickstarter campaign. We owe you.

We are here not just to pre-sell Kamarg but make our vision of sustainable, durable and repairable Rucksack accessible to more people. We would like to create an alternative to bags that just last a few months, wasting your time and the earth's resources. With your support we would like to start a small revolution in bags and also get other brands to rethink their approach. It is about time that products are durable enough to travel with us through the decades, becoming the companions for our adventures.
